text: - butler service that actually gets you anything in 5 mins - plantation restaurant had best steak and lamb chops ever - fabulous breakfast and staff in general - good clean beach, no unnecessary solicitations, live bands, great drinks and food at beach nearby
title: Fantastic Stay

date post: Alex Morrell wrote a review Nov 2019
text: 15 of our family & friends stayed 7 nights at double six on the beach!!! The service was incredible / staff were friendly & attended to our every need. There is a young lady named Lena on reception who was just incredible she booked taxis restaurants etc etc canâ€™t thank her enough. All in all double six was fancy fun & we will return - Thankyou ðŸ¥°
title: Honeymooning with our Baby

text: 2014 was our 6th year to Bali and we have stayed at the same place every year. Watching the Double Six in Seminyak being built and come together was exciting and something told us when it was finished we must stay there. MAGNIFICENT just isnâ€™t enough to describe our stay at the Double Six! From the moment my daughter and I arrived we were greeting by the Double Six friendly staff, warm and very welcoming. We were taken to our room and there he was â€˜our own butlerâ€™ waiting with chilled champagne and refresher towels. An absolute pleasure walking in to our room, it was so inviting, the first thing I noticed was the fresh flowers, those extra touches make you feel special and not to mention the fresh fruit bowl, which was replenished every day. Breakfast was the best we have; â€¦
title: Fit for a King

text: 5 days ago we applied for an 8 night stay at Double Six in Semanyak providing full payment via credit card. A computer gerated response confirmed a booking number and stated we would be contacted within 24 hours. Since then we have followed up on two ocassions with the Australian representative Luxury Escapes by email made two phone calls and the only reponse we have had is asking us again for our details. This is unforgivable service for a "5 plus star" resort. Our booking request was for 4 weeks time flight prices have gone up and we are left still with no idea of where we stand.
title: Wonderful service!

text: A fabulous hotel. Wonderful staff, very friendly and extremely helpful. Nothing was a problem. Food was great. Easy to walk to different places. Pool is amazing. Thanks for making our stay so relaxing and enjoyable. Will Definitely return.

A friend and I both booked at the same time, my friend received complimentary vouchers for dinner a massages and recieved nothing. The people staying in the room next door mixed up their room by accident and managed to use their swipe card and get into my room in the middle of the night. When I complained nothing was resolved nor was I offered anything complimentary to make up for this mistake. After I checked out my car was not due to arrive for several hours and I found they weren't as friendly as they had been all week. The fridge was warm and the meals were small and over priced.

A fusion of boutiqueness, location and 5 star luxury. Double 6 is a gem of a hotel offering facilities that will blow your mind. The Seminyak Italian restaurant was scrumptious, the rooms spacious - the bathroom bigger than most peoples lounge rooms, Rooftop is not to be missed and was a highlight of my stay in Bali this time. There is nothing like it. The staff were incredibly hospitable nothing was too much trouble, I almost felt like extended family. That boutiqueness and personal service are much harder to find in much larger impersonal resort brands. Double 6 you have an amazing product and I will be telling everyone to choose you first since you made my time in Bali magical. Thank you.

date post: Debbie W wrote a review Sep 2014
text: A new hotel, the accommodation was first class but the staff were the standouts. Nothing was a problem for any of them, They genuinely wanted to make sure our stay was a memorable one. They succeeded. Food and drink reasonably priced for a luxury hotel, Aqua Perla Spa excellent and the rooftop bar spectacular. The hotel has some type of relationship with the Ku Da Ta and the Chez Gado Gado restaurants and provide you free return transport. Both restaurants are quality establishments (Chez GG a fine dining experience) Found this hotel on Luxury Escapes and thats what it turned out to be. Had a great 8 day stay. Many thanks to the staff, particularly Chadney, the Executive Restaurants Manager, who enhanced our experience.
title: "AWESOME LUXURY HOTEL"

text: A truly wonderful experience from start to finish. The service was above and beyond with attentive staff and great facilities, we really felt looked after. We had a beautiful room with pool and ocean view, we will certainly be back.
title: A brilliant hotel, excellent location and terrific staff

text: â€œSimply Spectacularâ€.......10 Stars We recently stayed at Double Six, Seminyak for our Honeymoon. Arriving quite late in the evening we were so pleased we had pre-arranged our Transport with Double Six Hotel. We were so thrilled to be greeted at Bali Airport by the smiling faces of Tea & Agus who escorted us to the Double Six luxury vehicle, presented us with a cool hand towel & a welcome drink, Tea directed our attention to the bottles of water that were also available in the car. Driver Agus asked if the music playing was suitable for us. We sat back & relaxed as we travelled to Double Six Hotel, whilst Tea processed our Hotel Registration in the vehicle, we realised that this was going to be a very exciting & different experience to other Hotels. As we pulled up to Double; â€¦

Absolutely amazing hotel !!! Our recent stay at the Double-Six Luxury Hotel, Seminyak, was all we could have hoped for and more. This new hotel offers everything you could wish for. We were greeted with a warm welcome, cool drinks, and complimentary nibblies. The staff go above and beyond the call of duty; warm and friendly, whilst being extremely professional, competent and well-groomed. Our butler, Nopah, was outstanding !! I wish I could have brought him home with us ;) Our ocean view room was the best room we've ever stayed in. It was spacious, modern and very comfortable. To my surprise, there was a belated birthday dessert waiting for me in our room :)) The food in all eateries was heavenly to say the least. Food quality, presentation and value would rival many top; â€¦

date post: Lynne D wrote a review Dec 2014
text: After 8 years in travel I rarely will rate something five ... I too often find something that the property can improve on. In short I've been spoilt. The Double Six however has been a jaw dropping experience from start to end. Whether it be the wonderfully designed uniforms the staff greet you in, or their desire to do the very most (and more) for you during your stay; the Double Six are hiring right. In suite check in is a nice touch. As are the generous size suites themselves. I dare you not to get lost in the stunning bathroom or catch an afternoon snooze on your own full size couch. The TV above the bath is genius ... And your own balcony provides the perfect haven at sunset. You must upgrade to Ocean View at the very least. The spa is the most decadent I have ever; â€¦
title: A Unique and Special Place

date post: Rudy F wrote a review Oct 2019
text: After a small hiccup upon arrival we had a lovely four days at this hotel. The staff are very attentive and a very special mention to the Operations Manager who went out of his way to listen to our feedback and ensure everything was just perfect for our stay. If you come here please go to the Plantation Restaurant. The service and food is exceptional. The spa is lovely and the guys around the pool do their best to ensure you have everything you need. The roof top bar is very cool for an evening drink. Seminyak is not the â€œcultureâ€ of Bali but this hotel was a lovely way to spend our final four days after an amazing ten days travelling around Ubud and Jimbaran.
title: Price and Quality Are Not Balanced

text: After letting my travel agent choose a quick getaway for us we were quite unsure what to expect. But it was absolutely great: we felt pampered and looked after, the staff is friendly without imposing and we didnâ€™t even feel the urge to venture out too much as everything we wanted from our stay was there: the beach, the bar, restaurants, spa etc. We had a really relaxing time and weâ€™ll definitely come back.

date post: Sam W wrote a review Dec 2014
text: After spending a week in the Double Six in November I have dual opinions. Firstly the first impression is very modern and a great use of timber in the foyer, plus the roof bar Is amazing to visit for an overall view of Bali. The rooms were weird as you walk through the front door into the bathroom if you are staying in adjoining rooms, and these were both bed rooms, not just one! The balconies are not private and anyone can see you from above if you have your own pool so they have no privacy for intimacy if you are a couple, which is disappointing for those seeking a romantic holiday! The upstairs roof bar seat pits don't have enough room for your feet but look inviting at first.Definately only for those with extremely small feet, or you need to sit sideways. It is a very large; â€¦
title: Love, love, love Double Six

text: All I can say to the very few negative reviews is that if you used a travel agent then you would have no issues! Simply amazing staff made this even more special. We have been to Bali 15 or so times and this was the best thus far. From the Happy Gilmore uniforms and the free golf buggy transports, to the location and outstanding staff, this was the best holiday stay we have ever had in Bali. From the Ayana and its rock pool bar, to the Padma or W Seminyak and many in between we were more impressed by Double Six. Rooms stunning Pool Stunning Restaurant suberb Breakfast stunning (no buffet here but you can eat as much as you want all ala carte...OMG...you get a voucher to try elsewhere for free (Ku De Ta) but why would you. The best best breakfast in Bali by a long way. Roof Top; â€¦

Almost didn't want to write a review of the Double Six as there are so many glowing reports below and didn't want to be the negative one....... but it really bothers me! Having travelled to Bali about 30 times in the last 10 years we have taken great interest in all the new development and have stayed in every type of accommodation from The W in Seminyak, to The Pearl Hotel in Legian, and have stayed in in Ubud, Caggnu, Legian, Seminyak, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Lembongan and Lombok. Apart from The W and The Pearl (tiny little boutique hotel in Legian) ,The Royal Seminyak Beach, The Padma, , The Oberoi, Kupa Kupa Barong, and Club Med along with numerous small luxury villas in these areas have been some of our choices over the years. As the years have gone by our tendancy is not to; â€¦

date post: Daryl O wrote a review Jan 2015
text: Although I use trip adviser regularly to research different destinations, this is my first (but not last) post. The reason for this is I wanted to share how special this place is. Truly remarkable in every way. If you wanted luxury accommodation in a beautiful resort with extremely professional and friendly staff and also the highest attention to detail given in every aspect, double 6 is it! I organised before we went that I would propose (she said yes!) upon arrival. In a very important moment of our life they assisted in making it relaxed and all go to plan, even more than expected. At my request they set up the room, and used the upmost discretion in all dealings. My fiancÃ©e was so blown away of the room that it was hard to match ;) We LOVED the Roof Top Bar, the Italian; â€¦
title: Daryl & Carole -Luxury Escape Package - Senior Travellers

date post: David P wrote a review Aug 2019
text: Amazing location and superb facilities. Room was spacious and modern, staff were excellent, included breakfast was superb. Turndown service was lovely, as was room service. The roofdeck lounge was great, as was the beach chair situation. Everything was great about this hotel, I would stay there again without a doubt. I spent a lot of time walking around the area and didn't see any hotel that looked more impressive than this. Thank you Double-Six!
title: Roof top bar - must experience

text: Amazing location in the heart of Seminyak and close to the beach, When we arrive to the hotel the check in was Great experience the lady led us to our room directly.The hotel is Luxury ,comfort, cozy and the staff were nice, welcome and hepful.This hotel offer many facilities like cool swimming pool with sea view ,Gym club,Spa,there are two Restaurant in the hotel Itlian cusine and the International restaurant Platinum and Sling bar.The hotel have different suites with Sea view and garden View. Our suite was fantasic everything was excellent the large king bed, the big Jacuzzi,the private pool in the room. This Hotel Perfect for moon and families. I stayed from 18-22 March and 100% I will come again.

Amazing luxury resort in a perfect location, Modern furnishings while still feeling like you are in Bali. I could not rave more about this hotel and would recommend couples or a girls trip! The Spa was nothing like I had seen before and the massages where divine. The staff make you feel like VIP's and they are all dressed imnaculately, including the staff at the restuarant they were there for your every need and went above and beyond to make sure you meal was exactly as you ordered, in which the food was delicious and reasonably priced. I hope to stay at the Double six again!!
title: Fantastic

text: Amazing place amazing device amazing staff amazing Manager (Selv) It was my second visit and my husbands First but We will return. A few names Max (mad Max) you by Bema and Muli to name a few. Great service great location and thanks for the birthday love for my husband and the invite for drinks and canapes with the head_ if each department. Loved our visit
title: Totally relaxed

text: Another amazing stay at the immaculate double 6 luxury hotel in Seminyak. From the moment you arrive you are greeted by the concierge staff, smiles all around they make you feel welcomed. When we went to check in the staff remembered us from our last stay. It brought the biggest smiles to our faces and made it even more exciting to be back. They immediately escort you to your room and you do the check in service from the comfort of your own space, may I add in air conditioning and without anyone else looking at you in the hotel lobby, the butler walks you through your room, explains how everything works all whilst enjoying the welcome cocktail and thatâ€™s when you realise youâ€™re in paradise and the service is next level. The breakfast is sensational, the staff are incredibly; â€¦

Another wonderful stay at Double Six, happy and helpful staff, amazing breakfast with huge menu, morning yoga on rooftop, great views and music for night life! Great location, short walk to Kuta and Seminyak shopping and restaurants. Drivers for hire at front door. 80metre pool overlooking beach great place to relax.
title: Fantastic Hotel

date post: Vicki M wrote a review Aug 2019
text: Arrived at double six for my 3rd visit. Lovely hotel. First night iwe had a room near cocoon nightclub, very very noisy. I emailed staff and got very prompt reply, i could move rooms asap. Moved to quieter part of resort straightaway and thoroughly enjoyed my holiday. Staff are lovely, food is great, drinks are delicious. Thank you double 6
title: Vicki McInnes

text: Arrived yesterday at The Double Six and was greeted by the most kindest and professional staff. We was greeted personally by the hotel manager Selvarajoo who was extremely welcoming and genuinely happy to see me and my wife. We had some small talk with him about the hotel and our visit and we mentioned its your wedding anniversary as he asked if we are enjoying Bali. He gave us complimentary drink vouchers for there Sling Bar which was very kind of him, he then mentioned he will have another small surprise in our room waiting for us as the team were getting it ready for us. We then relaxed in there waiting lounge with complimentary drinks and snacks with some amazing massage chairs, which was much needed!. Our room was now ready and we was escorted by a friendly staff member,; â€¦

As a first time traveler to Bali I didn't know what to expect. The staff at the Double-Six Luxury Hotel provide the highest standard of customer service I have ever experienced in my travels. It seemed like you just had to think of something and they were there already doing it for you. Friendly, prompt and professional. Our room was spacious, clean and comfortable. We loved all our breakfasts, lunches by the pool, room service meals and not to mention the cocktails. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone, we will definitely be back next year.

As a high end travel agent specializing in Bail it was a delight to try this 5* property prior to officially being open so bear in mind what I am saying here as it is not the full experience however, I was advised and shown around of what is to come and how awesome it will be and I must say I was well impressed with what will be on offer to you. My trial room type was the Deluxe Suite with pool access, ground floor with an ocean view â€¦only my photos can show what I experienced as words cannot describe how luxurious this room was, with a large terrace giving me direct access to the 120 meter millennium pool and from the edge of this pool I was virtually on the beach at high tide and with the exceptional surf out front I had spent many an hour on the terrace with my partner; â€¦
title: Enjoyable stay

date post: Jo B wrote a review Aug 2014
text: As great as this hotel sounds I am getting very frustrated . I have called 16 times to book a hotel room with a voucher I bought . Every person I have spoke to has been so nice but I have had no answer back . I can not book flights unless I get confirmation of accommodation . I have requested this 12 times . 2 bed suite for 2 adults 2 children and an infant . As it stands the flights have already gone up $100 pp .
title: â€œSimply Spectacularâ€.......10 Stars

date post: Marcella H wrote a review Sep 2019
text: As the title suggests I am writing this review to inform others. I booked a Penthouse Suite because I needed two bedrooms. I booked at short notice without reading previous traveler reviews like I normally would. The hotel is comfortable, the staff are welcoming and helpful, the location is almost on the beach (you have to cross a small road) BUT it is extremely noisy with very average music blaring from several competing sources (live and recorded) from 4.30-11pm every night. Previous reviewers have mentioned this on numerous occasions but the hotel suggests that if you don't like it don't stay. Fair comment. The alternative would be to soundproof the rooms better, of course this costs money. By way of constructive feedback, perhaps the management could consider giving staff; â€¦
title: Luxury Escapes

date post: Marg G wrote a review Jul 2014
text: Attitude says it all and every member of staff here cares and they care about you. Always a smile and can I help or be of service. The Hotel itself is beautifully positioned on the beach midway between Seminyak and Legian and offers spacious well appointed rooms with outstanding sea views. Designed by a person who loves awkward steps and height variations this hotel when complete with its rooftop bar (uncompleted ) offers a nice alternative to the W's of this world
title: New hotel with the lot!

text: Be careful C Trip users !!! Double six Luxury Hotel with such good comments , what could be possible wrong ? Well from the very beginning we got all wrong and was a shock . Stepping out the car a kind guy asked my name and accompany us to the wrong room according to my booking . We booked a room with a pool , he took me to a De luxe overlooking the Swimming pool ( partially and overlooking roofs restaurant and pool bar ) . When I mentioned the mistake and showed my booking already paid , he showed me a different booking telling us that it was happening a lot with C trip because there is a third party in Bali and that third party sent the hotel a different booking . I contacted C trip customer service from the room , they were kind and contacted the hotel but told me that for; â€¦

Beautiful hotel and the most amazing service......but for the first three nights our suite was impossible to use from 10.00 in the morning until after the beach club next door and the two live music bars closed at 12.00. The noise meant we could not open our balcony doors or even watch a movie with the doors closed. The hotel eventually moved us to a quieter suite....but first three days ruined the experience of what should have been a five star holiday. Just be aware that any room to the right of the hotel pool is going to be very noisy!

Beautiful hotel great location amazing swimming polo. Very friendly staff. I enjoyed their club sandwich. Highly recommended hotel. The hotel is very clean and neat. Very relaxing place good food good staff.
title: Fantastic, friendly, beautiful

text: Beautiful hotel on the beach....lovely views from huge ocean front suite (apparently all rooms are the same size even without ocean view). We have stayed all over the world but never in a bigger suite. Pool water was kept spotless from falling leaves by pool staff and staff also endeavoured to put a stop to those selfish guests who put down their books and hats and disappear for hours on end....room numbers are taken at pool and apparently guests not returning in 30 minutes have their gear put in the pool bar for collection. Staff are all young but unfailingly polite and eager to impress and please and therefore service was great - especially the young women in reception and the vehicle boys at the front. Very impressed with them....special gold star to vehicle boys. Downsides; â€¦
title: Thanks for a great holiday.....!

text: Beautiful hotel with total luxury provided. Staff were amazing and nothing was too much trouble. Facilities at this hotel were second to none from the luxurious suite to the pool area and rooftop sunset bar. The food was delicious. I had a special birthday while there and the extra surprises I received included a little birthday cake with my name and greetings written in chocolate, flowers and sweet treats in my room upon returning and serenaded by staff at breakfast. The resort sits in prime position overlooking the beach. Thank you Double Six for making our stay exceptional.

Beautiful resort, We started with a plunge pool suite then moved to a pool access suite. The suites are huge and beautiful appointed. Absolutely clean and fresh. But the staff are amazing and could not be any more helpful and friendly. We will definitely be back. To lay on our deck, beside the pool overlooking the beach, cocktails in hand. To all the staff "SUKSMA"

Best hotel weâ€™ve stayed at so far best service everything u needed they had so much to do in the hotel that u didnâ€™t even need to leave security was execellent staff were amazing Iâ€™d recommend this hotel to anyone if I could rate more then 5 I would of double six the way to go wen staying at semiyak
title: Fantastic resort

text: Booked 8 nights with Luxury Escapes and was very impressed. Hotel is new and very well appointed, rooms were sensational - stayed in Ocean view room. Restaurant and bar were also very impressive. Breakfast was order what you want from an extensive menu - like no other I have experienced. There were a few glitches to start with, room wasn't ready on arrival at 5pm, and room also overlooked noisy construction site. This was rectified the next day by very helpful and attentive staff and we were upgraded to sensational room overlooking beach. A smoking area in restaurant and around pool needs to be designated so non smokers do not have to deal with unpleasant cigarette smoke whilst eating and relaxing. Wish I had booked another deal and would take my husband next time. Would; â€¦

date post: ray t wrote a review Sep 2014
text: Booked in to an ocean view room on 15th Sept which was opposite the cocoon beach club. You have to expect some noise in seminyak but unfortunately cocoon goes until 5am!. For noise get an ocean view over looking the pool less noisy. Also be aware of construction as we could not sit on our veranda until evening due to workmen using power tools this was not explained when we checked in but we were out most days so we managed. Great service very friendly and helpful butler good for booking services that's all we needed. Breakfast package good as freshly made and good service no self serve pig out's. For price we paid I would say we should have had massages and some evening meals included as per Luxury Escape package but flight centre could not offer this so we missed out.; â€¦
title: Double Six Seminyak

text: Brand new first class hotel situated with easy access to the beach n within easy walking along the beach to great restaurants n shopping. Staff give impeccable friendly service with nothing too much trouble and things gets action in our time frame not traditionally "Bali" time. We were on the 2nd floor overlooking the ocean it was wonderful. You get a turndown service every night so your room is cleaned twice a day!Breakfast 1st class in presentation, selection n def in the large in the way of portion size, with not a buffet in sight! Hallelujah ! Love the golf buggy transfers to Chez Gado Gado n their sister property The Breezes, oh n Ku de Tah also. Love it n can't wait to come back again in the near future, I will be recommending it to everyone!

date post: Tessa S wrote a review Dec 2019
text: Check in here is done on a one on one basis in your actual suite, it was quick and efficient and we were also introduced to our butler who brought us a welcome drink and offered to help us unpack, a very nice touch but we declined. Weâ€™d booked a suite and were given a 2 bedroom one with one of the bedrooms locked off to us. Whilst it was a nice suite, the sitting area outside of the bedroom was disappointingly small, the bedroom though was quite large and the stunning and gorgeous bathroom was huge. It also had a massive balcony although our suite was unfortunately at the far end of the hotel and quite a long way from the sea, which we could only catch a glimpse of in the distance. The hotel is not quite on the beach, Thereâ€™s a small road to cross and then past some beach bars; â€¦
title: All the little things!

date post: claire F wrote a review Dec 2014
text: Could not fault anything at this hotel. One of the best things is the location away from the hustle and bustle of Kuta, just a short cab drive away (AUD4.00 each way). Across the road on the beach are some cheap little bars with great food that you can escape and get amongst the local culture. The staff are a stand out, nothing is too much hassle. Worth every cent! Definitely upgrade to the pool access rooms so you can step straight in to the pool and have a beach view. A la carte breakfast is a step above the normal buffet, Seminyak Italian Food have gone above and beyond. The rooms were impeccable. A lovely touch that bottled water is free of charge as it's quite humid and you end up going through quite a bit. Being a travel agent I am a massive snob when reviewing hotels; â€¦
title: Wow amazing

text: Couldn't ask for a better location, great personalised service, 1st class accommodation great beach front views and 120m pool is amazing, wine and dine until your hearts content highly recommended A++++++ ðŸ‘ðŸ‘Œ
title: A little bit of heaven in the heart of Seminyak

text: Couldn't fault this hotel! Having newly opened, everything was so clean and fresh. Breakfast was delicious and being a la carte, it was a nice change from the usual buffet style. The spaciousness of the room, the friendliness and attentiveness of staff were excellent. Our beds were turned down every night and even the towels were replaced. We would highly recommend a stay at Double Six if you're after a relaxing holiday.

date post: Cherylyn M wrote a review Aug 2014
text: Dear Mister Dheeraj Bagai We are currently staying at the Double Six Luxury hotel for sixteenth days, we arrived last sunday We are enjoying the hotel, we got married the 28th of june this year and choose Bali as the destination for our honeymoon and your hotel as it seemed very pleasant We mentionned the fact that it is our honeymoon to our travel internet agent (for advertising reason i prefer not to mention the name) and to your employees at the front desk, twice actually. The main reason is that except a heart with flowers in the room, when we arrived, we did not have more attention Lately, today, the front desk told us that the 'plus' was the roses and that we have been upgraded to a front ocean view As far as i am concerned when i read the internet voucher from our travel; â€¦
title: Top notch

date post: Hayley R wrote a review Sep 2014
text: Despite some initial hiccups with lighting and cable TV the staff were quick to rectify any problems and ensure we had a memorable trip. Very impressed with all the staff and in particular Gede, Anastasia and Ericson for their personalized help. Highlights included ocean views and location, a la carte breakfasts, excellent rooms (size and amenities), transport carts and general hotel facilities. Feedback would include additional sun lounges required around the pool and noisy air conditioners.
title: AMAZING !!!

text: Don't have a room next to cocoon. Music plays till early morning. They tell you to wear ear plugs ,which they supply! Screaming kids everywhere, taking up pool seating, restaurant seating,which are very limited, when they don't even pay. This is not a place to stay if you want peace and quiet. Staff not your traditional friendly Bali friendly. Very efficient but without that Bali smile.

Double six (on the package we got) is amazing! Rooms gorgeous, best bed we've ever slept in! Breakfast stunning - a la carte a refreshing change to buffet also included in our deal! Staff great (lovely with kids!). Location great for Beach action. Other restaurants in resort stunning & roof top bar great spot! Def recommend it!

Double Six definitely exceeded our expectations. From the time we arrived service was impeccable, we stayed in both leisure and ocean view suites both were amazing. Breakfast was lovely and coffee was good. For couples/groups I would highly recommend. Will definitely be back again The Hunts - Brisbane

Double six experience was the best. Could not fault anything and staff from arrival all the way through to departure. This is a must be the best place to stay. We were extremely impressed. Thank you Double Six for an outstanding stay.

Double Six has been an absolute pleasure. Situated right on the beach the views are breathtaking. The Staff are friendly,polite & attentive,willing to assist you with absolutely anything. The food has been magical - five star quality - absolutely delicious. I highly recommend a stay here this resort definitely stands out against the rest. Emma

Double six Hotel, bridges both the gender and generation gap, for children and adults all will be well catered for in this hotel ,the staff are exceptional and cater for every guests needs. Nothing is too much trouble for them. Head chef Robert Marchetti has taken simple food and created a feast with an exceptional breakfast menu. His Italian dinners should not be missed. The rooms are beautiful and spacious and the bathroom with bath and TV is a bonus after walking through the markets close by. We cannot speak highly enough of this hotel we would certainly go back there.

Double Six is definately the definition of a luxury hotel. From the friendly staff to the new and clear rooms, amazing pool and restaurant on the 2nd floor. Everything about this hotel is pure bliss. The guest relations officer 'Dede' in he lobby is so friendly and always available with the best suggestions and advice. He made our stay extra enjoyable and we will definately come back. Dede was our go to guy and was always there to help. Overal I would recommend this hotel to anyone wishing to stay in bali.
title: High Recommended Hotel in Seminyak

text: Double Six is just perfect. The hotel is gorgeous, neat, clean and situated at a perfect location. The rooms are beautifully designed, comfortable and above all spaceous. The staff... AMAZING. Iâ€™ve never seen so extremely polite, kind and well mannered people. They are willing to go beyond their efforts to make everything at ease for you, always with a big smile. Also, they remember your wishes, as if youâ€™re the only one staying at the hotel. Props to the hotel staff - you guys are amazing!

date post: Mefarrih Y wrote a review Jul 2019
text: Double Six is one of the best hotels I have ever stayed in. You get a great first impression as soon as you pull up to the hotel and then are swiftly taken to your room where you go through the check in process as well as meeting your butler with a great welcome drink. The rooms are huge and very modern, with everything you could possibly need. The bathroom alone is the best I have seen - huge bath tub, TV, double sinks, very good shower pressure, etc. Bed is massive and very comfortable. We hadn't booked a sea view room, but could still see it from our balcony. We could sleep through the music from the beach when we had the odd early night - wouldn't worry about this. Plenty of bottled water provided each day by the butlers. Breakfast was super tasty, tried a lot of things on; â€¦
title: Amazing

text: Double- six is the most amazing hotel I ever been!!! Nice design and great location!! The staff was very friendly and helpful!! The room was very clean and comfortable!!! I recommend it unconditionally!!!
title: Fabulous Hotel

text: Double Six really know how to look after their guests! From the moment you arrive you are looked after by the amazing staff in the resort. From the check in to your own butler greeting you with a delicious welcome drink, to the staff at breakfast...they cant be faulted! The rooms are so incredibly spacious, with the best amenities and all the perks you could want in a room (international power points, swivel tv so you can watch from bed or the couch, coffee pod machines - it even has a tv in the bathroom so you can soak away while watching a movie! The breakfast at both the italian restaurant and the rooftop (currently Wed & Sun on the rooftop) is always delicious and again, the service is impeccable. Do yourself a favour and stay here!
title: Fantastic Staff, Great Hotel!

date post: Dan H wrote a review Jun 2019
text: Double six resort is amazing. If you are looking for a great resort with luxurious rooms, friendly staff and fantastic food, this is the place to stay. The special touches like birthday cakes for my daughter and l and staff singing happy birthday to us, it was beautiful. I felt safe eating the food here after previous holidays to Bali getting sick, the food is great, fresh and top quality. I would definitely recommend that you stay here for a wonderful holiday.
title: Birthday stay

text: Double six Seminyak Bali was by far the one of the greatest places we have stayed. The staff and facilities are perfection. This was our first visit to Bali. The staff at double six made our stay pleasant and gave us a few hints and tips when we went out to play. I rate this resort 10/10
title: Great stay

text: Double Six Seminyak is a special experience every step of the way. Its personal, luxurious and peaceful, has a wonderful location in naturally beautiful surroundings. The breakfast and room service meals were fantastic - fresh and delicious, the best I've ever had! The menu is innovative and quite different, superb fresh juices and coffee, just delicious food any time of day or night, always delivered with excellent service and a smile. The staff could not be better - I stayed for 2 weeks and every single member of staff including the manager Mr Bagai was unfailingly polite, attentive and seemed happy to be working there. They all had a charming manner and made my stay so pleasant. It was so hard to leave.... But I left relaxed and rested after a perfect holiday.

Double-Six is a fabulous Hotel. I was so concerned that maybe we would have been more suited to Nusa Dua as I had read reviews about noise....Well we are in our fifties and absolutely loved the vibrant atmosphere The sunsets, the food even the local Rose! was awesome I have stayed in many resorts but this place is really special and we had a wonderful 7 nights Wish we were still there!! Thank you to all the wonderful staff for going beyond what we expected

date post: Sophia S wrote a review Apr 2020
text: Double-Six Luxury hotel Seminyak needs to send their staff and security team on a "Charming Class" to be educated on how to approach Customers! Very no friendly attitude from all of the team meeting the Customer by the door!
title: Amazing hotel

text: Enjoyed our stay here. Staff very helpful, two large rooms with two huge bathrooms. Plantation restaurant was really good and we ate here twice (once was for my birthday). Pool area and staff were very good. We would come back :)
title: AMAZING

text: Even accounting for price differences between countries, this hotel has been one of the better ones I've had the opportunity of staying at for the price I've paid. Alcoholic welcome drinks. Turn down services, more than enough glass bottled water, luxurious bathrooms, with all the little extra bits and bobs all make this an incredibly pleasant stay. The only thing I can make issue with is the breakfast, that it's all international fare with very little Indonesian options. I suppose your standard Australian/European traveler to Bali has little to know adventurous spirit to want to eat Indonesian food at a hotel like this. Those kinds of travelers would have gone somewhere else.
title: Absolutely perfect!!!!

text: Everything about this hotel was incredible and fantastic. The staff were jumping over themselves to help you, the facilities and rooms were top notch, and the food was very good. The hotel's proximity to the beach provided a great platform for evening strolls and afternoon surf swims. Would highly recommend.
title: Amazing Stay!

date post: Shivali M wrote a review Apr 2019
text: Everything is beyond my expectations! The room was huge, with another big tv in bathroom facing the big tub! ðŸ˜€ The seaview from my room was stupendous!!! The service staff was very friendly and very accommodating.. I left something at Diyanapura and they offered to drive me back to get my things.. Breakfast was awesome and a great meal I had at the Plantation simply was the icing to a great four day stay at Double Six.. ðŸŒ¹ðŸŒ¹ðŸŒ¹
title: Great stay at this hotel

text: Everything was good from service to food to location. Everything was walking distance the beach and the souvenir shops. Except for the breakfast which could have been better with more vegetarian options

Excellent service though improvement is needed, after all the high room rate calls for a class above the rest. Butler service is unique and makes us feel really special but we find that the butler is only seen at check-in and there was little communication and attention given to guests during the stay as every time u dial for the butler service, someone else will be attending to our needs. The room is very spacious and luxurious especially with Hermes toiletries, what more can we ask for. The mood lighting in the room and balcony is so funky! furthermore, there is complimentary ironing service and that worked perfectly for us who are here for a wedding. The Perla spa here has an exceptional design concept and if you have not tried the singing bowl, go for it! Choose a room away; â€¦

Fabulous resort accom. Resort and rooms lovely but what makes this resort special is the staff - they are lovely - all of them, and it is just small enough that they learn your names and great you as such when you see them. Particular praise to Agung and Made by the pool ðŸ˜„. All the staff are attentive and will do anything they can to help you. Right on the edge of Seminyak/Legian. Can take quite awhile - up to 30 mins to get up to main shopping/restaurant area. It's only 2-3kms but the traffic is madness as they have to go around the long way. Then we found the hack, walk along the little beach lane to Gado Gado and get taxi there, 5-10min walk and 5 mins in the taxi. Fares to get up to the main area approx 30,000rp. ($3Aud). Can walk it in 20 mins. Plantation; â€¦
title: Luxury stay

date post: Shelley Mac wrote a review Jun 2019
text: Fancy hotel right on the beach in the touristy area of Seminyak. Very modern and luxurious compared to other parts of Bali we visited (like Ubud) but you lose a lot of the feel of being in Bali. It's very westernized and if you're looking for a luxury resort vacation this place is definitely for you. Nice big pool with bar, easy access to the beach, plenty of restaurants and shopping nearby, rooftop bar with great sunset views. The hotel will arrange taxi rides and even tours/excursions for you right at the front desk. However, if you're looking for a more authentic, cultural Bali experience, go to Ubud.
title: Special Birthday Holiday

text: Fantastic hotel, quality service from check in through to departure. Great breakfast and pool servise. Attention to detail in all aspects. Buggy service to local resturants and message spa. Would highly recommend

date post: Lara S wrote a review Jun 2019
text: Fantastic location, outstanding Hotel, near beach, shopping, busy area but not crazy, great restaurants and cocktails. Wonderful hotel right in between Legian and Seminyak. Great couples spot and close to other local restaurants too.
title: Convenient location, great value, stunning view especially from roof top bar

date post: Imogen M wrote a review Jul 2019
text: Fantastic staff, amazing food, beautiful environment. Outstanding things for us were the morning Yoga class on the roof top, the pool and itâ€™s staff, the food, the shower, the location. Not to mention the day spa Aqua Perla a must try at least once. Would go back in a heart beat.
title: Double above and beyond!

text: First time and we loved it. Staff are excellent and well trained. Food and views are amazing and I think we have found our new favourite place to stay in BALI. Close to everything you need and best of all, sensational views.
title: Perfect service!!!

text: First time for us in double six We spent 5 nights in leisure suite Amazing welcoming and hospitallty. We enjoyed spa and rooftop sunset Location is close to touirsit area Outdoor swimming pool with aside legoon bar
title: Excellent hotel

text: First time to Bali. We felt this area was a good place to be in Bali. Especially if you donâ€™t like to be hassled by vendors Liked this area. Staff are amazing and the breakfast is fantastic. Plenty of staff and Butler service is great. Would recommend it.
title: Great hotel

text: First time visitors to Bali and we have been spoilt with just the ultimate best ! The staff here are a true testament to people who are passionate and love their job. We have stayed at many 5 star resorts for either work or holidays and can sincerely say these wonderful hospitality staff are amazing Our suite amazing! Bathroom exquisite, with all amenities, coffee machine, lots of tea which I love Iâ€™m sure itâ€™s the best room at the hotel #120, open the sliding doors and take one step and your swimming in this massive pool, water temperature just perfect, so clean and immaculate each swim Nothing was too much trouble for the butler who will unpack for you even ! Just given a call and bookings made for tours or restaurant. Take in mind that the restaurants here are to die; â€¦
title: Great hotel

text: First timer to Bali stayed 6 nights. First 3 nights we stayed at different location at a villa in Seminyak then last 3 nights at D6 to try different types of accommodation offered in Bali.. I am disappointed I didnt book the whole six nights at double six because it was just amazing and 3 nights just wasnt enough! I didnt want to leave.. Rooms are perfect, clean to high standard, bed is big and comfortable, aircon is excellent, has everything you need, 24hour butler service and room service. It's close to shops and they will provide buggy to drop you off. Lovely location also great view of sunset from rooftop. Breakfast is Amazing! Lot of selection. The service at double six was like nothing I have experienced before. The staff there are so helpful and kind and attend to your; â€¦

date post: Alessandro C wrote a review Aug 2019
text: For 1st timers in Bali, we had such wonderful time! The hotel is amazing! We were very comfortable and relaxed throughout our stay. The hotel is very luxuries from the bars, restaurants, all areas to relax! The staff were amazing, the facilities immaculate the amazing food, drinks and coffee options from each restaurant exceeded our expectations not to mention the beautiful views! We were treated like royalty and no question or request was difficult for the staff at double six/ I would highly recommend double six and we will be absolutely be returning soon!
title: Best Hotel in Seminyak Ever!

text: For me, it all started with the delicious welcome cocktail and beautiful smiling butler and if possible, just kept getting better! The restaurants in this property are really outstanding, can't speak highly enough of 'Seminyak Italian'. The whole place is just top shelf, the service, the food, the ambience- the staff go above and beyond to ensure your holiday is wonderful. Double-Six is funky, modern and beautifully maintained. Amazing rooftop bar too!

For the first time we were checked in right in our Suite rather than a reception area.. Never seen this experience at any other property. Welcome drink was a chilled fresh pineapple juice that was chilled with dry ice under & to top it all - Vodka shot for all. What a way to start your holiday. Double Six is beautifully located overlooking the sea. Fabulous Spacious Rooms. Huge Toilets and well stocked with Hermes Creams, Lotions, Shampoos & Conditioners. Brilliant service with a 24 hour butler with each suite. Excellent food. Top Service, A beautiful lounge to lounge around if after check in one needs to wait a bit. Super Spa, Nice gym facilities. Big infinity pool with a beautiful bar next to it. Truly a luxurious experience. We travel a lot & have stayed in some of the best; â€¦
title: Brilliant service, amazing hotel

text: From all the great reviews I have read, I am very keen to stay at D6! Being my 14th time to Bali we have stayed at some amazing hotels and I must say that I am very excited about staying here soon. With all previous reviews of the kind and helpful staff it should be a holiday to remember!

From first contact with D6 right through to the final night (complimentary extended checkout til 9pm to fit with our late night flights), we were taken care of in every way imaginable. Shown around the resort, spoken to by name by all wonderfully happy and helpful staff, and trips to spas and dinners were transferred by D6. A perfect spot on the beach, with the pool extending across the entire front of the resort, a twice a day turn down service, everything was made for a perfect get away! Particular mention to Kiki - the ever helpful manager who made sure everything we needed was taken care of. We stayed for 5 days in a private pool villa (fantastic deck for sun-baking, perfect shower set up, spacious living area, free movies on big screen for some chill time) in early; â€¦

From our arrival the staff were welcoming and generous. The suites were stunning, and the butler service professional, a special thanks to May who welcomed us with nothing being too difficult! Dinner at the Plantation Grill was a highlight, the ambience, opera singer and service was outstanding which resulted in two visits to the restaurant. Our holidays was made special by a staff who are focused on customer service and warmth! Thank you for a great stay!

From picking us up from the airport to the the time we reluctantly left the Double-Six the service and amenities exceeded all expectations. We spent 7 nights in an Ocean View Leisure suite which was just everything you want and need in a room, spacious, clean, comfortable and the butler service an added bonus (I had read reviews saying these rooms were too noisy with music from the beach bars but it doesn't go very late and it was lovey to sit on the balcony having a during listening to the live music which probably stopped around 9pm and with the large glass doors closed you can hardly hear it inside the room). The restaurants at the Hotel are first class. Make the time to go to The Plantation Grill - it is an amazing experience to be remembered. The staff in all areas of the; â€¦
title: Most Stylish hotel @ Seminyak

date post: Jacinta D wrote a review Jan 2015
text: From stepping out of our lovely transfer vehicle, to being escorted up to our beautiful room by the hotel manager and friendly hostess, our special holiday experience was a wonderful one right up until we needed to checkout 8 nights later. The room was beautiful and we were given a luxury suite with unrestricted ocean views (not to mention a gorgeous arrangement of flowers and dessert with 'Happy Anniversary' written in chocolate on the plate). The staff were extremely accommodating, friendly and hard-working. We found this hotel to be very luxurious, with attention to detail where ever we looked. There seemed to be someone in charge of practically every aspect of the running/cleaning of the hotel. The spa is out of this world (although pricey compared to other nice spas in the; â€¦
title: A Luxury Hotel

text: From the moment my friend and I arrived Double Six was an amazing experience. I've stayed at a tonne of 5 star resorts before and this one is up there with the best. The staff were amazing and the food was to die for. We had fun with the friendly staff and challenged them to fun little tasks like making towel animals for us and they obliged with laughter and glee. The pool is tranquil and overlooks the beach. All the facilities are very stylish, clean and modern. And there's a funky roof top bar and nightclub too for the party animals or those simply wanting a sunset drink. It's got magnificent views. Every detail was thought of in the creation of this hotel. An outstanding experience and I would only ever stay here for future trips to Bali. Thank you Double Six!

From the moment of check in you notice the subtle differences of being treated like a valued guest and not a number... welcome drink in room whilst being shown the features are just the start.. Great location, best staff and a friendly warm atmosphere make for a true 5 Star Holiday experience! Double Six you never fail to provide a wonderful holiday - Thank you!!! See you again soon!

date post: Sally F wrote a review Oct 2019
text: From the moment we arrived at Double Six Seminyak, we were made to feel very special. We were taken to our room to check in, and a beautiful cocktail was given to us. Our room was spectacular, we had an access pool room, which meant we had straight access from the room. The room had everything from amenities to a stocked up bar. Breakfast was amazing. We also had the privilege to dine at the Plantation Grill & the Sling Bar, for our Anniversary and my Husbands Birthday. It was so lovely, a must if you stay at Double Six. A big thank you to all your staff, from reception, bell boys, cleaners, waiters/waitresses, and especially Management for making our stay very enjoyable. Will highly recommend. Regards Anastasia and Arthur
title: Great place to relax in Bali

text: From the moment we arrived at Double Six we knew that we had hit the jackpot in regards to luxurious hotels. All the staff are welcoming, friendly and attentive. Nothing is too much trouble for them. Our room was upgraded when we checked in. The room is divine- very spacious and comfortable. The bed is even more comfortable than my own 'nothing will ever be more Comfortable than my own bed' bed!! The bathroom is amazing and is always fully stocked up. We had a couple of problems with lights not turning off but the butler fixed the problem instantly! The breakfasts were absolutely delicious and super tasty. We especially loved the eggs benedict!!!! Perfect!!! The day spa was divine- we had a complimentary 1 hour massage and it was that good we went back for more. I have never; â€¦

From the moment we arrived at Double six we were impressed. We were greeted by the manager who could not have been any more friendly and hospitable. We were then taken by staff to our truly amazing suite where everything we could possibly want to know about the hotel facilities was explained to us and what truly amazing facilities they were, a beautiful pool area , the stunning rooftop bar, gorgeous breakfast every day and amazing restaurants. The most impressive thing about the hotel though were the staff, every single staff member did their jobs to perfection and couldn't do enough for us and they are all a credit to the management team of this beautiful hotel. Cannot wait to come back!!

date post: Trish M wrote a review Dec 2014
text: From the moment we arrived at Double Six we were treated like royalty. Everything about this place deserves a 10/10 rating from the stunning hotel to the amazing food and also the friendliness of the staff who always couldn't be more helpful. Totally recommend and we are already planning our next trip back.
title: Roof top bar

text: From the moment we arrived at double-six hotel...we felt very special ..the staff and management go the extra mile to make you feel at home and are interested in your well being. Security is excellent you feel very safe ..location you have the best of both worlds, the beach across the road, shopping not far away. The food is 5 star all the way! Definately recommend double-six to all who are looking to stay in Bali, as it caters for everyone!! We cannot wait to go back!! From Paul & Alex Skoullos (Melbourne)

From the moment we arrived at the Double Six Hotel we were greeted and treated with the very best of customer care-we knew then that this holiday was going to be special-and it was! What a awesome room(223)one of the best hotel rooms in which we have stayed with a huge balcony over looking the pool & beach where we settled in with a cocktail nightly and watched those amazing sunsets! The a-la-carte breakfast was of high quality & delicious, as is all dining in the hotel and it doesn't stop there- nasi goreng by the pool(with a young coconut) I highly recommend! It did not take to long before the amazing staff greeted you by name -Mr Kim-any request was always attended to with a nothing was too hard or too much trouble attitude by the wonderful staff, they were always very; â€¦
title: Customer Service Focus

text: From the moment we arrived to the time we left the management and staff at the hotel were amazing, we had a wonderful room, overlooking the beach and pool. The room was very clean, serviced twice a day, and the overall feel at the hotel was the best!! The beach at the front of the hotel,( Seminyak), was kept clean and cleared each morning, it was not full of beach umbrellas like Kuta beach, we had easy access to the beach from the hotel. Everyone was helpful, if they didnt know they found out for you. When we had some travel issues, they were very helpful, gave us the same room to stay in for a few more nights till it was sorted. Management and staff made things easy for us to get it sorted, nothing was a problem. The customer lounge they have for customers to stay in before; â€¦

From the moment we arrived to time we left the service across the board was exceptional. All staff seemed to be driven to ensure that we had a memorable experience every time they spoke with us. Sounds easy to achieve in principal but difficult to do in practice - well done to all. The breakfasts we amazing and our pool access suite (120) was wonderful, very private and peaceful. We'll certainly be back
title: SEMINYAK'S BEST

text: From the time we arrived and all throughout our stay, the staff were AMAZING. The check in process to our ocean front room itself was a lovely experience. The room was huge - as was the double bathroom. And the restaurants and rooftop bar were incredible. After you check in, there is no reason to leave until the day of departure (and even then, you are looked after between check out and your flight departure). Will definitely return.

date post: Rolly de With wrote a review Dec 2014
text: From the time we arrived at this luxurious hotel we were impressed! The Butlers are gorgeous, their uniforms including the cap are just stunning. All Hotel staff are dressed immaculately behave professionally and are so attentive & helpful! The in room check in was fantastic especially after a 7.00pm flight from Melbourne. The room was stunning, the beds are more comfortable than our bed at home and that's saying a lot. The turn down service and the prompt daily serving of the room with fresh towels was on time every time. The Restaurants and food are stunning! The al la carte breakfast is to die for, we tried everything on the menu during our stay and everything was delicious! Although al la carte you can order as much of anything you like. The juices and Italian milk; â€¦
title: Stunning in every way.

text: From the time we arrived in Bali, we were greeted at the airport and taken to Double Six Hotel. Our room was not ready so we were taken to the departure lounge and offered free food and drink until our room was ready. We met a couple waiting to depart who gave us rave reviews for the hotel and it's services. We upgraded to a Ocean View Room and we were not disappointed as everynight was spent on the balcony enjoying a pre-dinner drink and watching the sunset (it also overlooked the pool which looked amazing at night). The cafe across the road also provided nightly music which we also enjoyed from the balcony. We booked this through Luxury Escapes where an evening meal at Seminyak Italian, Chez Gado Gado and breakfast at Ku De Ta were included, and we were not disappointed.; â€¦
title: Outstanding Hotel with impressive facilities and staff

date post: Jane W wrote a review May 2019
text: From when we arrived to when we left, everything was great. the room was amazing, larger than we expected, the complimentary supply of bathroom items :) handy. There was always plenty of water supplied and if you needed anything you just had to call the butler that was assigned to your room. The pool 100 metres, great for everyone and you never seemed to have that crowded feeling. There were a few children there when we were there and they seemed to have a great time. The food was great and the idea of ordering what you wanted when you were ready got rid of the issue of food sitting around and so it was always hot and fresh. The staff were always very friendly and dressed immaculately. Being able to use the Owners Lounge when you had checked out and had to wait for a late; â€¦
title: Best Hotel

text: Generally we have good experience in this hotel, they have very large room with nice ocean view, clean and also comfortable. Near the beach. Maybe because of outbreak they only serve ala carte breakfast, so it was took a long time to deliver the food. It was a little inconveniences about this waiting time. Maybe next time they will try to serve buffet breakfast with protocol health protocol like other 5 stars hotel.
title: Appalling Service

text: Generally we have good experience in this hotel, they have very large room with nice ocean view, clean and also comfortable. Near the beach. Maybe because of outbreak they only serve ala carte breakfast, so it was took a long time to deliver the food. It was a little inconveniences about this waiting time. Maybe next time they will try to serve buffet breakfast with protocol health protocol like other 5 stars hotel.
title: Appalling Service

text: Give yourself a treat and head to Double-Six Luxury Hotel Seminyak. From the moment we arrived in the airport and were greeted by hotel staff to the last goodbyes we were given the royal treatment. The rooms are opulent and extremely comfortable. The gorgeous swimming pool overlooking Double Six Beach is both stunning at day and night. Breakfasts at Seminyak Italian Food are the best I have ever had in any resort around the world. Double-Six Rooftop Bar is definitely one of its kind and has overwhelming views of Bali. Nothing is too much to ask for the dedicated staff at Double-Six. Thank you so much for an unforgettable stay.
title: One of Bali's best

text: Good place for chilling in this pandemic times. Still open and having high occupancy so they must be doing something right!? From check in to all around staff. I felt welcomed instantly. I hope that this warm welcome to local folks have always been the same - since there are less tourists and mainly are local Indonesian tourists. Just look at my pictures and I think the place sells itself. The beach is but a spit away from the premise! Nice room and facing. Not noisy and comfortable. WiFi not the best however thus 1 rating less but other than that... All is awesome. I think it's more for couples and solos as there are bars around. The pool is not exactly kid friendly due to the lack of kids specific 'fun'. Will I come back? Yes. Will I bring my kids? Not really. But yes,; for sure I will be back with the Mrs. ðŸ‘ðŸ½ðŸ‘ðŸ½ðŸ‘ðŸ½; â€¦

Good place for chilling in this pandemic times. Still open and having high occupancy so they must be doing something right!? From check in to all around staff. I felt welcomed instantly. I hope that this warm welcome to local folks have always been the same - since there are less tourists and mainly are local Indonesian tourists. Just look at my pictures and I think the place sells itself. The beach is but a spit away from the premise! Nice room and facing. Not noisy and comfortable. But yes,; for sure I will be back with the Mrs. ðŸ‘ðŸ½ðŸ‘ðŸ½ðŸ‘ðŸ½; â€¦

date post: Julie W wrote a review Sep 2019
text: Got a room with private plunge pool and a butler. Amazing. Great location next to double six beach. They got their own beds on the beach for their guests. Breakfast was al a carte. Orange infused musli was just heaven. Food is very good at all the resturants. The rooftop bar has amazing seats and great view for sunsets.
title: Wonderful!!!

text: Got this deal with Luxury Escapes, but have been disappointed. Hotel wanting to charge almost entire price again to have a third person in room, which was stated at time of booking but extra charges notified day before arrival. Rooms are large, but rest of hotel is not well air conditioned. Staff were not well informed, as we had to explain third person deal everyday. Rooftop bar very disappointing, as this was the major perk for the deal, but only worth one visit. Staff were very gracious and butler service was ok.

Great hotel, excellent services, beautiful location. Seminyak offers festive atmosphere. Kuta is quieter in comparison. Uluwatu, Nusa Duo are very quiet, remote. In Seminyak, 66 is easily one of the best. Hotel is new, luxurious. Penthouse suite is worth the money. Check out Owners Lounge is pretty smart, unique feature, especially for late flight. My flight was 10.25 pm, then pushed to 12.50 am, then 1.35 am. Being able to have a locker, shower facilities, complimentary beverages is a nice touch. Just been to Florida, New York, Carribean cruise few months ago, Bali is just amazing. Never realized someplace so close offers so much. I hardly made any reviews, and not to brag, or might be just a bit. This is off the topic, Qantas was a bit disappointed. The Sydney Bali; â€¦

date post: Bruce V wrote a review May 2019
text: Great hotel, fantastic staff all so friendly and helpful, Rooms had great views overlooking beach and pool very clean, location great and breakfast amazing. Stayed at double six twice now and would definately go back.
title: May 2019

text: Great hotel. Staff extremely friendly, polite and genuine warm hospitality. Good selection of breakfast choices ! Breakfast daily is unlimited from a menu ( Asian, western, continental) except for Wednesdayâ€™s and Sundayâ€™s which is buffet breakfast at the rooftop bar which has great ocean views. Rooms are spacious. Enjoyed stay here. Will highly recommend
title: All Class

text: Great location, wonderful room, great daily breakfast, amazing dinner at Plantation Grill and the staff and service was just fantastic. Very relaxing by the pool with lots of loungers and a great beach straight across the road with loungers there too.
title: Amazing from beginning to end

date post: Shahn P wrote a review Feb 2020
text: Great property and very attentive staff to ensure your visit was the absolute best experience. A la carte breakfasts were very nice and the buffet style was even better! Our room was overlooking the pool and beach on the 2nd floor. Beautiful view of the sunsets.
title: Outstanding stay - delicious breakfasts

text: Great resort in a brilliant location. The staff are simply amazing, they are friendly, warm, professional and make you feel like a guest in their home. The resort itself is clean, fresh, modern with every facility could want. The rooms are gorgeous and the butlers ensure that you are treated like royalty. My favourite is the stunning rooftop bar, that is a yoga studio in the morning overlooking the Indian Ocean and in evening a fantastic bar where you can watch the sunset whilst enjoying the delicious cocktails ðŸ¹

Great staff, always there to help. Car valet is convenient as well. Nice, big rooms. Very big bathtub. Comfortable bed. Some rooms have good view of the beach, others have views to next door resort. Breakfast spread is good, taste is okay. Alternate days for buffet and a la carte breakfast adds a nice touch is you are staying longer.
title: Staff canâ€™t do enough for you

text: Greeted and personally shown around the hotel. Staff where amazing, friendly and helpful. Nothing was to hard. Our room was amazing. Large, clean and just beautiful. They have a shuttle that drops and picks you up to take you into the start of the shopping strip in Seminyak. Rooftop bar and the sunset from there beautiful. Pool area lovely. Breakfast was great Al la carte. You could order as much and as many times that you wanted no limit. Wed and Sun breakfast buffet style at the rooftop. So much to choose that it was overwhelming :) I could not fault this hotel. If you want luxury this is the place. Would i go back... yes in a heartbeat. You will not be sorry.

Had a lovely dinner last night at this magnifique Restaurant. Best italian Restaurant on the island.!Great concept, great tables, awesome food, staff friendly and doing their job. Dutch manager friendly and very efficient. Oh and one thing for the chef: You know what your forgot on the menu? Absolutely nothing. 5 stars!!!! A must try.
title: Thankyou to all the staff at D6 luxury hotel

text: Had a wonderful experience with amazing suite and layout of Lagoon style pool . Butler service , polished amenities adds to the feel of luxury you get all the way . amazing food and cocktails with the friendliest of staff . looking forward to my next visit . thank you Double Six
title: Indulge!!!

date post: Sian S wrote a review Apr 2019
text: Had an amazing two nights in the Hotel, great staff. Amazing location, just next to Double-Six beach. Check in was so smooth, all the staff members are very helpful. You get the best view of the Sunset from the Ocean View room and Sunbar they have on the top of the hotel.
title: Everything and More

text: Had another lovely stay at Double Six again for the 3rd time! Ocn Facing Leisure Suite # 510. the pool is just the best and so inviting, plus you cant beat its location. rooms are well equipped and butler service was great, they steamed my dress for my party and helped clean our bathroom when i fell ill. plus i left my glasses by accident at breakfast, and when i rang our butler they had them at my door within a few minutes. so lovely to be well looked after. breakfast was a winner, and experienced the buffet at rooftop which happens every Wed & Sun, which was a nice change of scene as its beautiful view up there. they arranged meter taxi for me back to airport which was only 80,000 Rupiah, approx AUD $8 and took 30mins. will definitely be back!

Had the good fortune to stay 2 days at the Double-Six. The attention to detail is excellent. The staff are first rate even the pool guy ask if one of our party would like warm water and lemon for the cough she had. The butler greeted us on arrival in our room with sparkling wine and went through what was in the room. The bed and pillows were so comfy. The Italian restaurant is excellent and this is also the breakfast restaurant which was first class not just bacon and eggs it was so much more. The beds were turned down at night, the T.V swilled so you could watch in bed, the slippers where put by the side of the bed, the bins were emptied, the towels replaced. I cannot say enough about this hotel it has everything and more. Everything was perfect.
title: Service with a smile

date post: Ugly Duckling Wines wrote a review Feb 2015
text: Have been a regular traveller to Bali since 1983..therefore I had stayed at a different hotels over the years! From Hyatt,when the hotel was one of the few 5 star, Sheraton Laguna.,Discovery Plaza,number of times , The Royal Beach Seminyak!!All this long list ...only to say how have I and my husband enjoyed the recent stay at the Double Six!! Could not praise enough the wonderful, attentive staff,including the swimming pool area!!! The Italian restaurant it's excellent ,The Plantation Grill,,little more formal but equally sensational , the wonderful roof top Bar absolutely divine....you also get almost the full view of Bali...,perfect for sunset romance(although I am a bit passÃ©,) but I still enjoyed it immensely!!! Last but not least....but more important people are left to; â€¦
title: Fantastic Stay

text: Have just spent 8 nights at the Double Six and it was even more than we expected. Our room had everything that was needed - including a butler. All staff members were extremely friendly and nothing was too much trouble. We were a little concerned that breakfast was A la Carte but this was amazing as you could have anything you felt like. My one concern was getting in and out of the plunge pool as I have recently had both hip and knee replacements, however staff again came to my aid. Our first time at the Double Six but definitely not our last.
title: Awesome hotel

text: Having been a regular visitor over several years I continue to be impressed by the ever improving level of service and presentation. The in house facilities and dining /drinking options provide first class alternatives while the general location lends to enjoying all that the local beach nightlife has to offer
title: Excellent service With beautiful view and nice food!

text: Having been reluctant to visit Bali previously following friends comments re 'bogans' I was a little concerned when my travel agent presented me with this 5 star hotel at 4 star price......my concern was heightened further when I found one of the cheap websites in Aussie was advertising a ridiculously cheap deal for the same dates.....It also didn't help when I tried to contact the hotel directly regarding their VIP transfer and spa as their website was full of fantastic pictures but very little helpful information....thanks to Tripadvisor I found the manager's e-mail and contacted him direct, and this is where my concerns began to ebb away. Infact all the staff were fantastic. We arrived for a week in September and enjoyed the best breakfasts we've ever had at a; â€¦
title: A place to feel like royalty

date post: Greg M wrote a review Aug 2014
text: Having stayed at 66 a couple of times now (for work and leisure), I highly recommend to anyone who is after a 5 star hotel with amenities, facilities and service to match! The hotel rooms are amazing with all the amenities you could ask for, including a 24 hour butler! There are no bad rooms; however some have slightly more outside noise than others, but nothing that will keep you awake for hours! The service from hotel staff is outstanding, and they are always helpful and remember your name after only meeting you once! I can't recommend this hotel enough and will always stay here when in Bali :D
title: Like Driving a New Car

text: Hi fellow travellers, we have booked a stay at Double-Six for 10 days next June-July and have received confirmation. However, we have been asked to fax back a payment authorisation form and a photocopy of our passports and credit card details. I have tried to fax these a dozen times now, but to no avail! I am pretty sure I have the fax number correct : 0011 62 361 731144 but someone also advised use 0015 for faxes. If any of who could help me I would surely appreciate it. It sounds like an amazing place and I just want to be sure I have completed all the essential paperwork!
title: Beachfront Beauty

text: Hopped ouf ot the taxi at 12.40pm to be warmly greeted by name, very efficiently checked in followed by the presentation of my personal welcome cocktail. Our group are here to celebrate a dear friends special birthday. We have all been struck by the attentive, friendly service. The rooms are beautifully appointed with little luxuries that have added a special touch to the stay. The A La Carte breakfast (included in our package) has plenty of choice and the quality of the food is excellent. Pre-celebration drinks at the rooftop bar followed by the celebration dinner at the Plantation Grill, both superb. Each location has it's own unique 'feel' and atmosphere. The Plantation Grill is beautifully presented and the menu left us struggling to decide. Again, the service was; â€¦

I am a business traveler and my business takes me to various parts of Asia. I have always been staying in hotels like Mandarin Oriental, St. Regis, W Hotels but this time on my recent visit to Bali I stayed at Double-Six I must say that all the previous hotels were fantastic however Double-Six was different. This place is perfectly suitable for travelers as its not only accommodation but itâ€™s a happening place The staff is just amazing and always ready to go out of their way to helpâ€¦From check-in to check-out, be it breakfast or any meal â€“ it was just divine Rooms are being refreshed twice a day with Butlers all around, just felt being pampered Thank you Double-Six â€“ canâ€™t wait to come back

I am a regular traveller but this hotel is out of this world! I was upgraded to this hotel following a booking with the sister hotel Blu Zea... the rooms were not big enough there so Alidi was such a great help and we weâ€™re upgraded.. The rooms are amazing, bathroom is the best the special touches like the mood lighting was beautiful...food is great selection at breakfast and other snack menus are great. Love the carrot cake btwðŸ˜‹. Butler service very efficient and all the staff are helpful Fantastic location right on the beach and easy access to wherever you need to be. Loved it and would highly recommend.
title: A nasty surprise

text: I am a travel agent and I recently stayed at the Double Six on a work function. The Double Six is by far one of the best properties I've ever stayed in. Their service is amazing and I will be recommending it to all my clients. You must try out the Italian Restaurant upstairs, it is absolutely beautiful! If you're looking to stay at the Double Six, expect luxury and style for your whole trip. Also the beds are amazing! I wish I could have stayed longer.
title: "Outside the Box", Absolute luxury

date post: Sebrina Kartikasary HAKL wrote a review Nov 2014
text: I am not sure how to convey how great my stay at double six was. The service may have been the best I have ever experienced. Everyone seemed to care. I had a personal Butler, Alex, who clearly loved the hospitality game and created a great experience for me and my friends who were dropping by on their way back to Australia after we all did a conference a few days earlier. Max, the concierge and his dream team sorted out all my lunches and dinners and on the last day organised 3 motor bikes to ensure we didnt have to deal with peak our traffic to see the sunset at Kudteda. Amazing guys, highly recommended and where I will stay next time I am in Bali, much love
title: Lovely! recommended!!!!

date post: Jane M wrote a review Jun 2019
text: I am so glad to write you this feedback about my stay in Double Six hotel Seminyak for the last 2 days in Bali.First in the reception i could experience the luxury service which hotel has claimed by its name itself.Room has all the world class amenities which suites family,honeymooners and single passengers also. I could feel the comfort which a tourist is looking from a luxury hotel everywhere in this hotel.The restaurant has all the food options and has plenty of food varieties in breakfast too. All the staff are very attentive and i wish all of them very best in future ahead. Thanking all of you again and will surely promote this property in coming days from our agency.
title: Fabulous and Vegan

text: I am writing this from the Rooftop Sunset Bar, while enjoying glorious view of the ocean and a very tasty buffet breakfast. Everything I tried was good, if not great! And the service is excellent. The only sad thing is the Rooftop breakfast is only available Sunday and Wednesday. If you get a chance check out the local Snake fruit, you know what I am talking about when you see it. We are staying in the Two-bedroom deluxe suite and it lives up to the name, deluxe! Beds are super comfortable, the room configuration would suit couples, friends or families (see downside re noise for young kids). The bathrooms are beautiful, as are the products they provide and everything is clean. The air conditioning works well and makes for a wonderful nights sleep. The butler service is fast; â€¦
title: Perfection

text: I and 3 other friends stayed at the two floor Penthouse which has two big bedrooms on one floor and huge living and outdoor area with jacuzzi on the other. I must say that this Hotel understands great hospitality, the staff are courteous and very accommodating. They make our stay enjoyable and stress free. Our butlers were great with quick to response to our every requests. We were pampered from the second we stepped in at the lobby, the check-in was done in the penthouse and we were introduced to the rooms and all amenities. The breakfast was fantastic, normal days breakfast is ale carte by the pool and you can order as much as you can. On Sundays breakfast is buffet with great selections of local and continental, served at the big rooftop area with amazing view. Muli; â€¦
title: Very pleasant

text: I can't fault the his hotel, from the staff to cleanliness to the amazing food in the restaurabts and room service! The hotel is brand new and has so much to offer. We were fortunate to be fitted in for a 2 hour spa treatment that was unreal, definitely worth a visit!
