The restaurabts offer a great variety of food and the roof top bar has great views, music and cocktails. Absolutely loved our stay at Double Six and will hopefully be back soon.

I can't speak highly enough about this hotel. My family visited for recently for 5 nights and had a deluxe family suite. The room was huge, with two separate bedrooms and a small living area, an expansive balcony and 180 degree ocean views. Very comfortable bed with terrific room amenities. The staff were exceptional, from Gede the Operations Manager down to the people servicing room and everyone in between, nothing was too much trouble and all were most friendly, helpful and professional. We booked one of the rooftop bar seating areas to watch the sunset one night and it was a terrific space to take in the sunset. The breakfasts were great with a wide variety of international and local food. The Sling Bar with its specialty cocktails was a highlight. The hotel is; â€¦

date post: John G wrote a review May 2019
text: I checked into my deluxe beach view suite and the staff treated me like a princess the whole weekend! Smooth check in process, the butler team took such a good care of all wishes I had. The SPA treatment was absolutely amazing and I did not need to worry about anything for my whole time. Definitely take part at sunrise rooftop yoga and treat yourself with an evening at plantation grill, where double six is bringing you back into the 60s and providing a fantastic luxury experience! The food and wine were deliciouse and the service was absolutely perfect. I will definitely come back. If you want to have a perfect luxury experience in Seminyak, then this is the place to go.
title: Amazing

date post: Mars V wrote a review Jan 2015
text: I didn't get to stay here but did a full inspection of the resort and had dinner at the restaurant. It's rooms are pretty much all the same just depends really on the view that you have. They are bigger than your typical room and very luxurious. The rooms only have king sized beds with a sofabed to have a twin bed room you'd need to book a two bedroom, which is great if it's a family stay. The rooftop is stunning, would be great to have some cocktails while watching a sunset. The departure lounge is great if you have a late flight, they even include selected alcohol. The pool is quite big (120m) and changes colour at night. The spa looks amazing differently book in for a treatment while you're there. On my next stay in Bali this is where I'll be staying.
title: Second Stay just as good as the first. Thanks Double Six

text: I don't normally review where I havent stayed but after an inspection of this property for a potential investment, I feel that I have to share my observations. Hubby and I both agreed that we will be staying here on our next visit as we both fell in love with this Hotel. This Hotel is absolutely beautiful.Well positioned on the beach and near many great restaurants. The room decore is very luxurious with everything being of high quality and pleasing to the eye. Opulent! The rooms are very generous in size with some smart designs such as the computer desk running across the back of the bedhead. The bathroom would have to be one of the most spacious and well designed areas we have ever seen. Hubby and I liked both the display rooms we were shown. One with private pool and the; â€¦

I had such an amazing experience at this hotel. I arrived as a solo guest and from the minute I was picked up from the airport I was so impressed. I had arranged a $30 transfer to the hotel and I was greeted with a bottle of water and a cold towel which was a really nice touch. The lady who greeted me at the hotel took me straight to my room even though I arrived a few hours prior to check in. It was a very informative check in and I liked how it was done in room. I was lucky enough to be upgraded to a suite with direct access to the pool. The room was amazing and I could not fault it. The butler then arrived to my room with a welcome cocktail and showed me around the room. The lagoon bar staff were friendly and made delicious cocktails. The other staff at the hotel were all; â€¦
title: Western oasis in Bali

date post: Lee B wrote a review Feb 2020
text: I have been to many 5 star hotels.We stayed at this hotel for 6 nights. The bathroom walls was cracked open and it was falling apart and was moulded. The food was not five star. We ordered chicken mushroom pasta at the restaurant and it looked like they just put pasta with milk together. There was no chicken or mushroom.The other tourists staying there were very racist towards us and were complaining about us swimming in the pool just because the pool was outside there balcony they thought that it was only there pool which than the manager clarified we were allowed to swim. They were nice to there own kind but coz we look different we were getting evil stares and were targeted and felt very uncomfortable.The staff at reception and spa were very nice, friendly at first but once; â€¦
title: Ideallic honeymoon hotel!!!!

text: I have often thought I should write a review on places I have stayed but haven't done it....but this si different. We arrived at Double-Six and was greeted by Dheeraj, what an amazing host, we were shown around the resort and then to our room, showing us all the facilities and making sure we were settled, we started to relax from that moment on. The food and service could not be matched anywhere, let alone the cocktail list, I consider myself a cocktail connoisseur but some of these mixes I had never had before and they were amazing. We were lucky enough to be there when the spa opened and had a one hour massage...oh my...just walking in there made you realise you were in heaven, the massage was amazing and would highly recommend it. Had dinner at the Italian Restaurant and; â€¦
title: Luxury

text: I have recently returned from Bali where I stayed at the Double Six resort in Seminyak . It was a treat staying there and I can highly recommend this hotel. The room was AMAZING and our Butler did everything possible to make our stay memorable. All the staff were exceptionally friendly and made us feel so welcome . The pool area was beautiful and the beach facilities were excellent. We were able to order food and drinks on the beach from the resort. Daily breakfasts were outstanding and the buffet on the rooftop was exceptional. The location was good and we were able to walk to Double Six Road to nearby shops and restaurants.This resort made our holiday in beautiful Bali extra special and I look forward to returning next year . Look no further than the Double Six Resort !

I have recently sent an email direct to the Double Six Hotel on their contact us section to enquire about rooms upgrades and in particular their private pool rooms. As I was looking to purchase an opening special price through Luxury Escapes and it was important for me to know if we could pay to upgrade to another room when we were ready to make a booking. It has now been 4 days since I sent the email and still no response. Unfortunately the special deal that was on offer through Luxury Escapes has now lapsed and is no longer available. I understand that this fabulous looking resort will be inundated with visitors in its early days but as a regular visitor to Bali it would have been great to experience this new hotel however if the communication between hotel and client is not; â€¦

I have stayed in several hotels in Seminyak over the last 5 years and Double Six is by far the best hotel in Seminyak! The accommodation and room layout,amenities and Butler service and fantastic. What is extremely impressive is the service and attention to detail. The staff record your preferences and and special requirements so that all staff are aware of what you require so that they are always 1 step ahead. The a la Carter all you can eat breakfast is sensation and no request is to difficult for the staff. If they do not have something you request, they will do their best to get it for you for the following day. All the staff are extremely warm and friendly and do all that they can to make sure you have a great stay. I canâ€™t recommend this hotel highly enough and; â€¦

I have traveled the world and stayed in some amazing hotels - but this hotel is without a doubt one of my favourites! The rooms are absolute luxury! The attention to detail is first class - the hotel offers ample complimentary water, delicious complementary fine teas, a turn down service - where they even pop your slippers beside the bed with a bath mat, a king size bed with luxury pillows, there is even a television in the bathroom near the free standing bath! I could go on! This is only the room! The staff - from check in, housekeeping, poolside and the restaurants were all amazing! The service was first class. The hotel's dining and spa experience were also fantastic. Oh - and you need to check out the roof top bar! Thank you Double Six Luxury Hotel for an amazing holiday!; â€¦
title: Great roof top bar - average Italian restaurant

text: I haven't stayed here yet, but felt compelled to write a review of the excellent service I have received so far. I also purchased a 8 night luxury escapes voucher. Upon receiving the voucher I emailed the reservations team email address exactly as advised per the voucher. Initially I received an automated reply saying they would respond within 48hours. I have booked for dates next year and was very delighted when I received confirmation back of my booking within 24 hours. I have found the service to be excellent and they were most helpful with my questions via email. If you have a voucher and email Double Six reservations as per the address provided on the voucher then you should have no issues. Just be patient as I'm sure they have been been super busy with the voucher; â€¦

I honestly couldnâ€™t recommend a better hotel to stay at! The rooms were immaculate, the staff so very polite and helpful. My partner & I stayed for 5 nights, the buffet breakfast was the nicest weâ€™ve ever had. Location is great, perfect if you want a relaxing holiday you have everything you need at the hotel. You donâ€™t have to travel far when looking for places to eat - the Plantation Grill located at double six is where I experienced the best beef fillet I have ever eaten! The sunset roof top bar is the perfect place to sit back and watch the sun go down sipping on cocktails & eating some delicious food! Great location, restaurants and small strip of shops are only a 3 minute walk. Perfect for some light shopping & thereâ€™s a minimart right on the corner! Plus donâ€™t forget; â€¦
title: First time foray to Bali

text: I just got back from three days at the stunning Double Six hotel. I booked in for a few days before heading off to a retreat and happened to be there for my birthday. The facilities are stunning - my room was HUGE with the most wonderful bathtub and view of the ocean. Going to sleep each night listening to the Seminyak surf was a dream. Service from the airport transfer to the front desk to room service couldn't have been more attentive and friendly. I had quite a long treatment in the spa and that was pure bliss. My only complaint is that this is quite a PARTY hotel and best if you are looking to drink and have fun. It is NOT great for relaxing. The hotel is located on the beach and each night I was there there was a VERY loud (though very good) band that played from maybe; â€¦

I really enjoyed this hotel! Huge interconnecting rooms for 5 of us with great bathrooms. We loved the breaky everyday and we could order as much as we wanted. We had two meals at the italian restaurant which were very nice, especially the italian donuts! The pool was beautiful and shaded by trees in the afternoon, and beach easy to get to as well. Would definitely stay here again.

date post: Jane P wrote a review Aug 2014
text: I recently stayed at Double Six, Bali, Seminyak for about 17 days. I have never experienced such luxury, comfort, courtesy and pleasure. The rooms are immaculate, the staff are so helpful and they all go to great lengths to make you feel welcomed and comfortable. The inclusive breakfast and the culinary experience is exemplary. You tell them at breakfast what you would like to eat, and, as a vegetarian, I have never felt so satisfied Max Lynch
title: Would give 10 stars if I could!

text: I recently stayed at the double six hotel in Seminyak for my first overseas trip & I couldnâ€™t possibly recommend this place more! The hotel itself is immaculate, the rooms are spacious & comfortable & the views incredible. The highlight for me though was the hotel staff - so kind & caring & helpful - all knew us by name & were overly accommodating to our every need. The manager â€œClaraâ€ & the pool waiter â€œApriâ€ made our holiday that much better with their service - be sure to give them a cuddle!

date post: Carlita G wrote a review Jan 2015
text: I recently stayed at the Double Six Luxurious Hotel with a friend for 8 nights, yes it is extremely luxurious,the rooms are beautifully appointed, the amenities were fabulous, the Day Spa awesome and the staff could not have been more helpful. The deal we had was great. Unfortunately that's were the good bits end. The noise and music from the surrounding beach bars and clubs is never ending, music is still playing at 6.00 am most mornings, when I mentioned this I was told that the Hotel had agreements with them to finish playing by midnight, I am guessing the agreements are not being adhered to. I would suggest requesting a room at the far end of the hotel. Breakfast disappointing, the staff could not have been nicer but the service was extremely slow, I asked for a juice 5; â€¦
title: Outstanding, as always!

date post: Theresa C wrote a review Oct 2014
text: I recently stayed at the Double Six Luxury Hotel in Seminyak, the rooms are large and beautiful, the hotel is very clean and stylish, the staff are very attentive and polite. the place is tyled to perfection so everything is very nice. Maybe too nice.... If there is such a thing, I just felt the hotel lacked soul and the bali experience, I felt I could have been staying in any quality hotel in australia. It does not have Bali inspired decor or garden that usually induce a feeling or serenity and harmony. I cant pcik anything wrong with the place except that it did not inspire me to want to spend time thier during the day.
title: Absolutely Amazing

text: I recently visited double six luxury hotel seminyak and must say out of all my worldly travels it was by far the most luxury stay I have had . Planning my trip to bali I only initially booked for two day and was not sure what to expect , wow has this trip blown me away now I have stay at double six luxury hotel for a total of six weeks just never wanted to leave . what more could I ask for the amazing room and gigantic bathroom with a 24 hour room butler , the service is friendly the food is exceptional and the reception staff were so friendly no stop smiles fluent English and simple go to all lengths to make my stay enjoyable . On every level this hotel is great and will recommend to everyone I know and will surely be back at double six luxury hotel this year , Thank you to; â€¦

I stayed at the double six hotel with my wife for 7 nights commencing 20th ocober and we were overly impressed with the friendly and smiling staff, the facilities were first class and not to mention the restaurant seminyak Italian. Breakfasts were delightfull all food had imagination and great taste. Needless to say the dinner food were of such a high standard that this was a highlight of our stay. The rooms are spacious and large bathroom with separate male female vanity with a bench separating.The room was on the ground floor with a sweeping view of the pool and overllooking the beach, sitting on the private veranda was relaxing and watching the sunset. The only down size was the pool design needed steps to enter the pool as persons with injuries would and did have; â€¦
title: Simply Superb!

date post: Deearne B wrote a review Nov 2014
text: I stayed at the lovely Double Six Luxury Hotel from 29th Oct - 7th Nov. Oh what a dream. I had upgraded to a lovely room facing the ocean, my only complaint would be the noise form the restaurant in the evenings as we were right next door, but easily solved by closing the door! The facility was "A Grade" with beautiful Hermes products to use in the bathrooms, oh and the bath with TV over was ooooohhh lalaaaa.... The breakfast menu, where do I start with a journey around the world for breakfast, I went to a different place every day, and the service was consistently wonderful and full of smiles. I love it when the staff look and act happy in their work! The pool was everything I dreamed and I spent many an hour lazing in there, it was honestly a shame to go out to; â€¦
title: Amazing

text: I stayed at this hotel with my family in Feb. Pros There are so many, it really was a nice hotel and not somewhere we'd normally stay so was a pleasant change. -The staff in all circumstances were fantastic. Little touches like putting our two rooms as close together as possible (1 was a pool view, 1 wasn't) Check in and check out were super easy, bar and restaurant service was great -The breakfast is standout. They have a huge free menu with all kinds of different options as well as many drinks and coffee it was delicious -The rooms are HUGE and all the amenities and more. (need to find out where that duvet was from it was next level.) Cons -Location was a bit of a pain. If you are an explorer this really isn't ideal. To be fair it's only a few dollars in a taxi to get; â€¦

I stayed by myself at this great hotel and it was perfect! Stayed in many 5* hotels, but did not experience this service level anywhere! From airport pick up to checkout, all 5*! Breakfast was delicious and fortunately not a buffet. Only on Sunday there is breakfast buffet and that is the only thing that could have a bit of upgrade with the setup and food quality. Location, rooms, pool all great and very well maintained. Furtheron, cannot wait to get back here! Hope to visit next year again.

I stayed here for 2 nights and I wished I stayed there for longer. The junior suite I stayed in was spectacular 5 star all the way. The customer service from the time you check in till the time you Leave is exceptional. All the staff there are polite and very welcoming. The hospitality was amazing and the breakfast was delicious from different varieties. The spa was so relaxing and the massage Was definitely 5 star. The rooftop bar is spectacular to watch the sunset with a panoramic view. The beach is right across the road which was nice to go for a evening stroll. I want to say a big Thank you to all the staff and will be recommending your hotel to my friend and family.

i stayed here in December for 5 nights. I am a travel agent, and I have visited Bali many times. This is by far the best resort I have stayed at in Bali, and probably close to the best resort I have ever stayed at. The quality of the rooms is outstanding, so spacious and comfortable. Staff so friendly and professional, and location near impossible to beat. definitely a 5 out of 5, and I hope to stay again.
title: Stunning Stunning Stunning!

text: I stayed in this hotel for 5 nights. Nice hotel with lovely helpful staff. Rooms are huge and beds are comfy.The Plantation Grill restaurant located within the hotel is very good, I would recommend it. Buffet breakfast is really good, however only served on two days a week. On the other days the hotel offers an al la carte menu with significantly smaller portions. The location of the hotel is okay. This hotel isn't really 'luxury' as I found the pool lounge chairs to be very dated, the hotel/bathroom area smelt like sewage. The beach area is terrible, it's a small area located across a very busy road on a very busy public beach. Overall it was a good day, purely because we were busy exploring Bali 90% of the time, so the hotel served as a good base.
title: Great Hotel and service

text: I stayed there in August for three nights, the resort was relatively new, I guess around two months after the opening. I loved the lay out of the room and the interior, the suite is very spacious with a huge bathroom and a nice balcony area. They use hermes for the bathroom amenities which is really cool. However, the setback of the room is that the human sensor in the room was too noisy for a light sleeper person like me, I complained to the management and they fixed it but it was only temporary and i could hear the annoying noise every time i was in the room for my whole stay. The resort is too modern for me, no balinese touch at all but location wise is not bad and it's within walking distance to la plancha and champlung on the beach where you can chill out and listen to the; â€¦

date post: Tanya B wrote a review May 2019
text: I think the final moments in a hotel truly sums up the service they provide so I will start at the end... After checking out at 12 noon we were taken to a very comfortable, air conditioned owner's lounge to relax and wait for our taxi. Staff were on hand to assist and serve complementary drinks and snacks. Bearing in mind that we were staying in the hotel on a bed and breakfast basis this is exceptional service and far different to most hotels who just move on the the new customers once you have paid your bill. Our stay throughout was superb. We had a suite which was gorgeous with big bathroom and very comfortable super sized bed, breakfast was as much as you wanted but served to order which gave a better quality of food and less of a canteen feel in my opinion. We ate both at; â€¦
title: Beautiful Place to Stay

date post: Alan W wrote a review Feb 2015
text: I visit Bali at least 4 times a year, this is our 3rd stay at the Double Six in 6 months .The 2 Restaurants they have are The Seminyak Italian and The Platation Grill , they would be by far the best Restaurants in Bali . Double six provides many category choices of room types and every room type is very spacious .You can not fault the staff in all areas they are helpful and friendly . We have traveled all over the world and stayed in many 5 star hotels and the Double Six is up there with the best in the world .
title: Super Service from Hotel Staff

text: I visited hotel with my wife in April it is the most stylish hotel in seminyak. The room was very luxurious and everything was there is double they've also welcome you with a special drink the check-in process was very good the most interesting part is our room is Ocean View it was amazing to stay here. The team was very cooperative and the staff is very excellent thank you very much for making our holiday memorable

I was a bit nervous booking this hotel as when I did there were no reviews available as it hadn't even opened yet. Well booking Double-Six was the best decision. Location was between Seminyak and Legian which was very convenient. Firstly the staff were amazing! They always said hello and gave you eye contact with a smile. The manager greeted us a number of times to check all was well. The room we had was beyond my expectations. Definately go for the Ocean View room and specify you want a room furthest away from the neighbouring hotel the Coco Club as they have annoying loud music playing every afternoon. Our room (320) was great. In room wifi was excellent - my husband said it was quicker than what we have at home. The restaurant - wow! Beautiful breakfast each day - the; â€¦
title: Simply Suberb!

date post: dave c c wrote a review Apr 2019
text: I was catching up with friends from the Uk and the Double 6 was our choice for a fantastic 3 night stay. Masses of space,large balcony and a great A la carte brekky menu opposite the beach and a short hope to Seminyak sq. Would recommend this to all my friends and Family and will be back again soon!
title: a fantastic holiday at double 6

text: I was fortunate to have stayed at Double-Six in June during the pre opening period and have this weekend returned for a 2 night stay. The points that make Double-Six stand out from many hotels is the enthusiasm of all the staff, from your personalised butler on hand to help with any request, to the buggy boys that drive you along the beachfront to Chez Gado Gado, The Breezes Spa and Ku De Ta - great fun. I really enjoyed the food experience at Seminyak Italian Restaurant for both breakfast and dinner.... with breakfast included in my rate you were able to enjoy fresh a la carte experience - freshly made fruit and vegetable juices and entre's you would expect at a health retreat, to a variety of great main courses.... I had never tried 64 degree eggs before...a must. You can; â€¦
title: Great Luxury Escape Value

text: I was lucky enough to experience Double-Six Luxury Hotel before opening and when still under construction - I was a member of the first group to stay at this amazing property. Staying with a group of friends, we enjoyed experiencing the Deluxe Pool Access Luxury Suites which front onto the 120mt swimming pool. To have your own butler there to assist with any need you may have was a delight however the suites were amazing and I would rate as the "best value" suites in Bali. Great size, extremely comfortable (you dont want to leave your room), beautiful large bathroom (nearly as large as your bedroom area) with flatscreen TV so as you can watch 62 channels whilst enjoying a luxurious bath in your deep bath tub. To wake up in the morning and to be able to look out over the ocean; â€¦

I went for a weekend by myself and felt very comfortable here. I loved my room, it was 3rd floor with (slight) partial ocean view. I did not pay extra for full ocean view, donâ€™t need it. Had a nice balcony with cool furniture on it. Make sure you stay on the side of the hotel that is not next to Cocoon hotel, it blares music like a nightclub. Itâ€™s not beach-front, there is a small (but busy) road between the hotel and the beach. If beach is really important to you, this might not be your favorite place. There are lots of little bars/clubs on the beach, which also play loud music until about 10pm (no big deal). The pool is adequate and there is an outdoor bar with VERY good poolside service. Concierge arranged a day trip for me to Ubud, worked out great and reasonable price. The; â€¦
title: Wonderful experience

text: I will stay here again! I didnt want to leave! the staff were so helpful and friendly. the ocean view was to die for and the rooms themselves were so clean and luxurious. The location is perfect and close to the markets!
title: AJM

date post: Adriana M wrote a review Feb 2015
text: I work for flight centre and went for a work trip this place is sensational on every aspect all the lead in rooms come with TVs in the bathtub and all have balconys I have stayed in many nice places around the world and this is at the top of my list not only was the resort beyond amazing the staff where absolutely incredible in every way possible I will be recommending this propery to my clients and any other reading this review if you plan a trip to Bali stay at the double six I promise you will not be disappointed.
title: Absolute Luxury

text: I would highly recommend Double six the staff are friendly and make you feel at home. Traveling with my family who are Gluten intolerant the Double six was amazing offering plenty of Gluten free options nothing was to much trouble for them , the hotel was very relaxing and we loved our stay here
title: Honeymoon

date post: Ryan R wrote a review Jan 2015
text: Iâ€™ve been lucky enough to stay a couple of times for work and decided to finally have a holiday at Double Six over the break. Travelled with my partner, mother and some friends for 10 nights. Without exception all were thoroughly impressed, which was a big tick considering the diversity of the group. Mum and her mate seemed to get to breakfast earlier and earlier â€“ I didnâ€™t realise that it was humanly possible to consume an eight plus course breakfast â€“ but heh, they were happy! A girlfriend who initially took some convincing to travel to Bali is a complete convert and will definitely be returning to Double Six, no doubt with entourage in tow. For myself, I know itâ€™s all be said here already, however the staff, the rooms, the location, the facilities, the sunsets, all; â€¦
title: Exceeds expectations! Luxury at its best.

text: Iâ€™ve visited Bali many times and I had no idea about this hotel - I thought it might be a little too modern and cool for my family holiday. Wow we were impressed. From the moment we arrived we were treated like VIP guests and this continued throughout our stay. There is no waiting in reception to check in, this is done in the privacy of your room. The butler arrived a short time later with our welcome drinks and optional shot of vodka. The butler helps unpack bags, takes your ironing and is there 24/7 on call - we really only used the service when we needed it for towels, food, ironing and to have our room cleaned. The atmosphere is great, down at the pool music plays all day (nothing offensive) it was only my 12 year old son and I staying. I could watch him surf with the surf; â€¦

If you are looking for a 5 star hotel experience that satisfies your every desire on vacation, look no further than the Double Six! ~ Personalised and professional check-in service upon arrival in hotel room eliminates queues in the lobby ~ A large resort style pool overlooking the beach, with easy pedestrian access if you prefer a beach stroll or swim instead ~ The standard leisure suite is amazingly SPACIOUS! Plenty of room for two with twin bathroom basins ~The view of the beach from the balcony was breathtaking ~The twice daily turndown service was a treat with toiletries and water bottles replenished ~ Breakfast was included as unlimited 'a la carte' - all freshly made to order ~ The staff were attentive, well mannered and nothing was too much bother. I was pleasantly; â€¦
title: Great hotel

text: If you see my previous reviews I have never given 5 stars anywhere but this resort deserves it. From arrival (registration in the room) the impression given is that nothing is too much trouble. The breakfast is excellent, the resort has a very nice pool and the food quality is very good. The cocktails (happy hour) use local spirits so a marguerita will use tequila made in Jakarta not blue algave Mexican tequila. To have this it is full price. I suggest it is a place for couples rather than family and I recommend a room looking over the sea to the west. Rooms are excellent . Top marks to the management, chefs and staff.

If your going to stay in Seminyak stay the here. Very happy with service everyone was nice and helpful. We didn't have any noise issues in fact some music by the pool would have nice. Rooms where great I recommend the Ocean view swim up suite. Breakfast menu was outstanding.

I'm not easily impress and it's very difficult for me to be speechless but overall from the guys who pick up us from the airport, the professionalism, attention to detail, friendly staff ( actually probably the best customer service I ever had ) then the food, the bar, the rooms!!! Everything it was perfect and very family friendly property with only one purpose, be the best of the best and give you an unforgettable experience! Already talk into a few siblings and a group of friends to spend their next holiday there, they already book and can't wait to live it all at double six!!!
title: Memorable and looking forward to visiting again

text: In July 2014 we booked a Deluxe Suite , Pool access, ground floor ocean view based on the pictures advertised. We got a room on the ground floor that did not have direct access from the balcony. It was quite a few meters back and had a couple of deck chairs between us and the pool that were always occupied by families as it was close to the shallow part of the pool. We also paid three times the price that is being advertised currently and the resort was only half completed. Only one restaurant available and the spa was not working. The front reception staff could barely speak fluent english and could not recommend a Japanese restaurant to dine at. We forgot to collect our car keys from the safe on departure and emailed the hotel manager. He initially said they could not; â€¦
title: Fantastic stay

text: Initially on arrival we had a few issues such as construction noise in the evening (some nights until 8pm), however we were soon helped out by the wonderful staff (Juanita and Erickson) By the next morning they had moved us to an ocean view suite which was amazing. Very large rooms, beautifully decorated, nothing to fault. Despite the music coming from the beachfront until late every night, I actually enjoyed the ambience it provided on our balcony. Some may not appreciate it? Much better than the very loud thumping music which comes from the cocoon side of the building, although I'm sure certain ages would prefer that. Demographics I found were mainly mid to older couples and a few families with kids. Not too many younger people or groups of singles. The breakfasts every; â€¦

It begins with the airport pick up after an 8 hour delay, which was much needed since it was my first time in Bali (no way I was going to be able to navigate my way to Seminyak on my own). We were greeted very nicely by management, which were aware of our names and delay, they accompanied us to our fabulous oceanfront room where we were explained everything we possibly needed to know from services, amenities, to any other question we may have had, all in very good English I may say. The suite was immaculate, from the lighting to the bed to the balcony, the bathroom felt like a spa in itself with double vanity and soaker tub. I couldn't have asked for more. Breakfast was definitely incredible with the freshest of fruits, and an impeccable setup of buffet tables offering just; â€¦

It is difficult to find anything bad about this property. In fact, one can say the rooms are not big enough, but then you get what you pay for! If you happen to be in Seminyak, this is a great place to stay (that is, if you are in the luxury market).
title: Great hotel but too noisy

text: It is hard to begin to describe the amazing experience that we had at the new double six luxury hotel. 5 extraordinary nights! From the moment we arrived we knew we were in for something special. The hotel is very cosmopolitan with all the comforts. Our room was spacious and beautifully appointed by the pool and with ocean views. All the amenities were catered for and with butler service and the best room service we did not want to leave. Breakfast in the morning from the Robert Marchetti designed menu, (included with the room) was a great start to the day. The staff were absolutely incredible and we can no thank them enough for the memorable stay. We will be back to experience the day spa and roof top bar next time. Special thanks to Yuannita leading the team at reception and; â€¦
title: Best hotel in bali

date post: Lisa W wrote a review Feb 2020
text: Itâ€™s all in the name...Double-Six truly is a luxurious oasis. The hotel room itself, the massive swimming pool, the food and beverage options, and especially the butler service really provide for a great experience in which we felt like VIPs. The staff is so accommodating and especially friendly across all aspects of the hotel.
title: Spectacular excellence in customer service

text: it's a coincidence that i stayed here, but it was definitely best choice i've ever made! The room i stayed had a private pool which a blessing in times like this (pandemic). The staffs were vey nice an helpful, breakfast was nice though it was same menu everyday (because of the pandemic) The health protocol were great, felt very safe wherever i was in the hotel. Definitely come back again!

it's a coincidence that i stayed here, but it was definitely best choice i've ever made! The room i stayed had a private pool which a blessing in times like this (pandemic). The staffs were vey nice an helpful, breakfast was nice though it was same menu everyday (because of the pandemic) The health protocol were great, felt very safe wherever i was in the hotel. Definitely come back again!

Its very overpriced for Bali standards but we just wanted a couple of nights of pure luxury. These rooms are WOW!!!!! Location - the only positive is that its on the beach (unlike most villas/hotels in seminyak/legian which have no views). Having all of the "beanbag' restaurants on the beach in front of you is very handy. Just head down at sunset - nice easy walk. But its not near any shopping. Maybe most people don't mind the long walk to street shopping but it was too hot for me. Lobby and reception are underwhelming given the epic interior decorating at the other 5 star resorts. If you arrive before check in there is an owners lounge. all you can drink! such a great idea. we loved the massage chairs! Don't stay here if you can only afford the lead-in room as the; â€¦
title: Enjoyed our stay

date post: Sue D wrote a review Jan 2015
text: Its very spacy room will keep you all day inside. Their huge TV provides not only with cable TV, but lots of entertainment. Music and movies that you could choose by the genre. Will glue you to the bed or the sofa, you could choose since the Tv could easily be turned. Their Not So Minibar is very cute...the miniature of known alcohol is perfect friend to the tropic weather in perfect volume for me. Not to say their choices of TWG tea. I just LOVE it!
title: Trendy Funky & Fun

date post: Enza C wrote a review Aug 2014
text: I've emailed on three separate occasions this week and have yet to hear back from anyone regarding a stay in October - November. Email is just as important as phone calls and a basic way of business in this day and age so to not get a response is very frustrating. I hope this lack of reply does not reflect your overall service and offering.
title: Amazing Resort

text: Just back from staying at Double Six, the most modern resort we have ever stayed in!! The staff are so friendly and will do anything to make your stay enjoyable. Our room was amazing (Pool Side) it was modern,clean and very spacious, we could literally jump into the pool from our room. The day spa was out of this world, ultra modern I had 4 massages the therapist Ayu was just so beautiful, I felt like I was greeted by my daughter every time. We hope to go back..
title: Double Six - pure luxury

text: Just checked out of this amazing hotel!!! Didnâ€™t want to leave! But we stayed here for 4 nights on the start of my two week 30th birthday holiday in Bali! There is so much to say... Double-Six hotel is absolutely amazing!! What a wonderful location hotel being right on the beach. The decoration interior/exterior of the hotel is just beautiful and so clean! The staff are just so so incredibly wonderful! Always happy, smiling and canâ€™t do enough to help you whether it is by the pool, your room, lobby, restaurant or even the lift ðŸ˜Š Honestly the staff make this hotel. They are amazing people each and every staff member who are just lovely and make your stay perfect! The pool is stunning and the bar alongside is lovely with plenty of drinks and the bar food is great! Again the bar; â€¦
title: Outstanding

date post: RAJEEV GUPTA wrote a review Jul 2019
text: Just got back from a trip to Bali which 3 of the nights we stayed in the Double Six Hotel. From the moment we pulled up in the cab we were greeted and immediately checked in and taken to our room. We was then shown around our room and explained to about the services in the room and hotel and offered a complimentary drink. Our room was very spacious and luxurious, we stayed in the Deluxe Suite Ocean View. The check in lady and the butler made us feel overly welcomed and very much looked after. We then went up to the rooftop for drinks and to watch the sunset which you SHOULD NOT MISS, its a beautiful view from the rooftop bar. I truly cannot say anything negative at all about this hotel. It is all around beautiful, from the decor to the rooms,to the pool, to the beach and; â€¦
title: Amazing stay at Double Six Hotel Bali

text: Just had a10 day stay in room 411 with a beautiful pool & beach view, Felt like We had won lotto with the quality of the room size and furniture The Bathroom was equally as impressive felt like a movie star wow factor Sunset drinks on the balcony most enjoyable with space and quality furniture Rooms resort and staff all faultless A visit to the Aqua Spa is a must do, along with the very impressive roof top lounge bar Swimming pool area was very upmarket & difficult to leave the serenity, the pool.staff where a stand out ensuring you where happy with sun lounge towels and of course delivering the pool side drinks with such a friendly manner You know the advert on TV when you feel you have hit the jackpot well look no further and that's the feeling you will get upon arrival; â€¦

Just had the pleasure of 8 nights at Double Six, a very new resort, and it was truly exceptional. Yes, everything you have read about it is actually correct. We took advantage of a deal through Luxury Escapes which gave us a magnificent 80 sqm luxury suite which was kindly upgraded to an ocean view room on arrival. Check in was done by one of their lovely staff in our suite and we were given an overview of the resort. Breakfasts are ordered from the alacarte menu rather than the usual buffet and was absolutely first class, and I surprised to meet several senior staff who mingled with the guests at breakfast time to gather feedback about their experiences. Their Italian Restaurant is first rate and their Spa.........wow! - what a fantastic experience. I must say I found the; â€¦

Just home after spending 5 nights at Double Six. Just wanting to say thank you for such a wonderful stay from start to finish. On arrival we were upgraded to pool access. We were met by Dheeraj, Hotel Manager, Clara from Reception and Wahyu one of the many butlers. Our check in was seemless in our room no less, paperword complete, signature cocktail in hand (devine) and suitcases emptied and wardrobes filled. On day two we asked for the same cocktail at the pool bar but it was not on the menu, I asked the staff to find out how to make it, off he went and landed back with the F&B Manager with 2 Signature Cocktails in hand. A lovely guy but sorry cannot remember his name. The breakfast every morning was wonderful with something to suit all tastes and great to see so many healthy; â€¦

Just returned from 10 day stay at Double Six Luxury Hotel. Seminyak was our preferred destination as we love to be near the ocean and where the action is. The location of this hotel is great, we were walking on the beach every morning and after having a dip in the pool we would have breakfast at the Italian restaurant with magnificent view of the ocean. Service was great and so was the food. Staff is extremely friendly and accommodating as well as personal. Once they talk to you they remember your name as well as your likes and dislikes. General manager Mr.D and his assistant Erikson are the best assets to this hotel, they take time to speak with their guests and treated us with Balinese hospitality rarely found anywhere else. We celebrated our Wedding Anniversary and my; â€¦
title: DoubleSix - Wow

date post: Brenten M wrote a review Dec 2014
text: Just returned from a recent stay at the double six hotel, and strongly suggest it to anyone travellling to Bali. It is located on the Double six beach in Semiyak and is chic and contempary in design. The hotel is modern and striking with gorgeous and very spacious rooms. We had an ocean facing suite and they seem to be well worth the upgrade from the standard ones. There is an a la carte breakfast, but its actually an a la carte buffet as you can order as many things as you would like from the menu, but be warned, the portion sizes are generous! Everything that I tried was great! And recommend the espresso granita to coffee lovers.. The hotel has an ATM in the basement for convenience and a rooftop bar with stunning sunset views. As much as the hotel itself is wonderful; â€¦
title: Luxury!

text: Large and spacious rooms, good view of the beach. The staff is fantastic and extremely helpful; the restaurant plantation is v good! Down side is the congestion getting in & out of the get to, and its a bit away from the hustle of Seminyak.

Last week had the opportunity to stay at Double 6 and enjoyed the whole experience. Seminyak offers a more mellow experience than Kuta and the Double 6 property was a great place to base ourselves for our family week away. The Double 6- The Plantation Grill Restaurant- is a must do- one of the most upmarket settings I've experienced - well done to the restaurant manager on creating such a dining offering... To all of the staff from the rooftop bar, to the Italian Food offering and the reception staff- well done on bringing such a fantastic service ethos all day- everyday... For a high end holiday this is the place to stay...Double 6 has a great offering and thanks for a great holiday ...our family will be back- see you next time!!!

date post: Sue T wrote a review May 2019
text: Let me start with the warm welcome that we received upon arrival.We were there for 8 nights and the room was clean, modern and very luxurious. It was also very spacious. Drinks with a view on the rooftop bar is a must. Prices were fair and reasonable and the Views are the best bali have to offer. If your not staying here come and have drinks here its worth it. (sounds like an Advert sorry) Breakfast was always quick and friendly any request including vegemite was not a problem. The food was always served with a smile and it was very tasty. The choices were vast and we never lacked choices. We noticed that the management team was always on hand to ensure service was exceptional. After a few days we met the Manager Selva and were very impressed with him and his team. Overall a; â€¦
title: Excellent service.....but very noisy room

text: Like everyone else on here, I've been mesmerised by the accolades that reviewers have been dishing out to Double-Six & it's giving me butterflies for our impending arrival in two weeks time. We purchased a deal on the net (like many others I'm sure) & to be honest, I would not have been at all surprised if the level of service was on the average side but it's actually far better than I have ever received from a hotel where we paid full price & with less to offer. I have received such amazing service already from the team at Double-Six, specifically Putra & Dheeraj & we haven't even arrived to the hotel yet. They have both been so prompt with their email replies & have gone out of their way to assure us that our stay with them will be one we will always remember. I want to; â€¦
title: Definitely worth booking - don't hesitate!

text: Located on Legian side of Seminyak. Rooms are very large with massive bathrooms. Broken views of the beach on level 3. Rm329. Balcony was nice at night after sunset but could hear and see into private areas of those below.Service was exemplary. Butler service was very very good and non intrusive. Nothing was too much trouble, including daily bucket of ice for our mixed drinks. :) Breakfast inclusion was al la carte. Try the pandan pancakes filled with coconut and banana with coconut cream on the side. A number of international cuisines included for breakfast to please most. Sling, rooftop bar is a must for sunset. Note, 750000IDR (AUD75) minimum spend if booking a pod. (Pod is like a sunken spa booth with water pond around. You use stepping stones to get to your pod that; â€¦
title: Us plus a baby

date post: Alastair S wrote a review Apr 2019
text: Love this hotel! Location and outlook are perfect There are some places that are polished a little better in that end of the market but are at least double the price. The hotels plantation grill and the Italian restaurant are brilliant ! Not to mention the room service menu Hotel staff are happy helpful and make your stay what it should be Highly recommend
title: Great Venue, Guest Management Needs Work

text: Loved everything about my stay at the double six! The location was awesome, the food was delicious and the people were amazing! Great service made for a wonderful time, I highly recommend and will definitely be back! Canâ€™t wait for the next trip

Loved the Hermes products & the massive bathroom & bedroom. The unique check-in service was very special. Showed you all the funky mood lighting & explained the concept of the hotel. We went to the rooftop bar WOW. Great staff trendy hotel loads of fun. Definitely going back & telling all my friends about it. The only thing was they need a few more sun lounges & attentive staff around the pool. Wish I had tried the Spa maybe next time. I was there with my husband in December for 5 nights. Also the airport waiting room with showers free snacks & drinks fir the late flights. Sue

date post: Carron W wrote a review Oct 2019
text: Loved the service, rooms, breakfast, staff, the beach attendants, the service at the beach, the beach was fabulous, the fantastic sunsets, from our balcony and the Roof Top bar and Agus the waiter at the bar made our night to remember. The Owners lounge and Radna made our late departure a pleasure And the day spa was unreal. Thank you Double Six for making our first Bali experience unforgettable. Cristina
title: Absolute luxury

text: Loved this hotel. Welcome drink on arrival was a great touch and pool room was amazing. Staff couldnâ€™t do enough for you. Rooftop sunset bar was amazing and having Sunday breakfast there was a great touch. Would recommend to everyone
title: Good Hotel for the price and claims!

date post: D. Silverman wrote a review Aug 2019
text: Loved this place! We had the most amazing suite with fabulous views of the ocean and the beautiful sunsets. Everything was superb from the really friendly staff who could never do enough for you, the delicious a la carte breakfasts to the perfect location right by the beach and surrounded by a lot of bars and restaurants, Mr Silva the General Manager is doing an excellent job. He was also kind enough to allow us to return back on our last day in Bali to use the Owners lounge and facilities before our flight home. Much appreciated..., We hope to return at Christmas.
title: Great location in Seminyak

date post: Sandy E wrote a review Jan 2015
text: Loved this place, great location, rooms was massive and really nice. The service was the best though, my girlfriend got sick during her stay and she was looked after so well. Every staff member enquired about her health and did everything they could to help out. Will definately come and stay here again!
title: Not worth the money

text: Lovely hotel with fabulous rooms, food, setting and staff. Well worth trying. Located right on the beach which is lovely, but after each tide there is lots of litter and plastic, work crews are always there trying to keep it clean. The local town is typically Bali character.

Lovely hotel, great service, wonderful staff - canâ€™t say enough good things about the hotel itself however... the hotel is close to the beach and there is so much noise particularly on Saturday and Sunday nights that you canâ€™t use the balcony in the evenings and itâ€™s hard to sleep. He biggest problem is that there are at least 3 different sources of music that all conflict! I wish it wasnâ€™t the case but I would struggle to recommend this hotel for anyone wanting a relaxing holiday! It is also a little bit out of the main shopping and dining areas of Seminyak and because the traffic is so bad, a taxi ride can take 30 minutes to get to the cool restaurants!

date post: Juan G wrote a review Nov 2014
text: Lovely hotel, staff very friendly and helpful, Italian restaurant delicious. Only complaint was lack of steps and hand rail to the swimming pool. Very difficult for disabled or not so fit people to enter and exit the pool.
title: Wow!!!

date post: Elodie H wrote a review Sep 2014
text: Marble foyer, wide open spaces, incredible pool. Friendly staff, immaculate. Very large rooms with all you need. 24 hour butler service that we didn't use. Very comfy bed. Actually felt a little out of our depth with the extravagance. Breakfast on the second floor overlooking the beach was a treat, the pastries were melt in your mouth. Very handy position... Down the steps and across the pathway and straight onto beach for long walks or to relax and watch sunset. Plenty of restaurants, bars and cafes close by, shopping just up the road, easy taxi drive to Seminyak central, tour operators, ATMS, massages, handy mart all around. Very busy area but safe. The constant "doof doof" music from hotel next door was a pain but we had an incredible roo with our own pool on ground floor on; â€¦
title: Honeymoon Elodie & Alexandre Babilotte

text: Maybe the best hotel we've stayed at in Asia. The staff are so helpful and the hotel is beautifully appointed. We had dinner in both the Italian and Plantation restaurants, both were superb with the Plantation exceeding anything we have had. Loved the Roof top bar with the snack foods, and again all reasonably priced. Great location to the nearby restaurants and bars with plenty of shopping for the ladies. We'll be back.

Me and my boyfriend stayed here for 4 nights at deluxe room with ocean view. The room was fantastic, very spacious, modern. The welcome drinks were very tasty and the staff was very helpful. We liked the breakfast concept that two times a week there is massive breakfast buffet and for the rest of the week they have a la carte breakfast (order as much as you want). Plenty of healthy options too (if you avocado on toast fan). They also have an amazing western restaurant with a great vibe. The downside: very small number of beach beds and the cocktails in the rooftop bar were the worst we had (no taste at all). Go and enjoy rooftop, but cocktails do need to improve. Overall, this is a hotel I would recommend to my friends.

date post: Ned P wrote a review Feb 2020
text: Me and my friend stayed in this hotel for 11 days. Stunning hotel, great location, staff so friendly and helpful and welcoming I can not praise them enough! During my stay I celebrated my 40th bday and I was spoiled by the attention by staff members. Lovely gesture! The Plantation grill on 4th floor...- put it on your must visit list and thank me later! Just beautiful!! I must agree with some other comments - you can hear loud music from surrounding areas but that stops around 10pm/10.30 pm. We didnâ€™t find it off putting though - itâ€™s all part of the hustle and bustle of being on holiday.... We kept walking the streets on Kuta and Seminyak and even though weâ€™ve seen some lovely hotels, we kept thinking how perfect the location of ours was. You can sit by the pool all day and; â€¦
title: Amazing resort

text: Me, my husband and our 7 month old daughter stayed here for our honeymoon. Absolutely beautiful. The staff were so kind and very polite. They made our stay very comfortable, adored our baby and made our first time visit to Bali an awesome one. We had a sea view deluxe suite, which was perfectly set up for us and our daughter, which we thought was a bonus. Everyday we'd come back and our romm would be cleaned. We look forward to future stays at double-six. Would definitely recommend to everyone we know.

Modern,lovely facilities with beautiful suites and excellent service. We had a suite with a plunge pool which was lovely - though not entirely private as people on upper floors could look down to the pool. Suites were amazing, king bed, lovely tea and coffee facilities in room, music station for iPhone etc. Large tv in both bed and bathroom and the funkiest lighting choices out! Fresh fruit every day and generally lovely amenities. Room was well serviced, restocked and cleaned. Breakfasts were very good - lovely to be able to choose from an a la carte menu - certainly some stunning choices with a gourmet flair! Thanks to Harry and Max in particular for assisting us - especially bookings to a number of top Seminyak restaurants. This hotel is very new and still under; â€¦
title: Superb experience

date post: Sue C wrote a review Dec 2014
text: My boyfriend and I discovered Double Six Beach Hotel on deals.com and we decided to book our selves an impromptu pre Christmas getaway. Initially we were concerned that spending 8 nights in the one spot would be a little to long but it turns out we could have easily stayed another week. There was not one aspect of our stay we could fault. Upon arrival we met the hotel manager Dheeraj who had kindly upgraded us to a beachfront suite and it was beautiful. Not only did it have a huge balcony over looking the beach, a bathtub with a plasma screen tv and a every toiletry a girl could dream of but it also featured the comfiest bed you will find in Bali, I donâ€™t think either of us have ever slept so well on a holiday. We were thrilled with our room and Double Six continued to impress.; â€¦
title: Loved it!

date post: James P wrote a review Feb 2015
text: My expectation from trip advisor reviews were way up there !! It's a beautiful hotel , beautiful rooms , the rooftop terrace is amazing just a shame you have to spend $100 to have an exclusive pod but without a doubt spectacular !! We forked out and had a lovely evening but struggled to spend the $100 needed for the privelidge !! Definitely a couples hotel, yes definitely pay for the ocean view upgrade otherwise lots of building views going on !! Don't bother with the complimentary breakfast at ku de tah , at least until renovations are complete xx
title: Luxury hotel that makes you feel like family not guests

text: My family and I spent chinese new year break her. The place is very beautiful. The food was amazing and the staffs are indeed very beautiful. We were entertained and served politely. My children love the pool area. Safe and secured!
title: Great location

text: My family and I visited the roof top bar with my sister and brother in law whom were staying at the resort. Amazing views looking out over the beach. Stunning location and top shelf service, the food was tasty and fresh. I will be back for sure when next in Bali.
title: Would definitely recommend and stay again

text: My family had 7 great nights at the hotel. We had a 2 bedroom suite over looking the sea. The room was very clean and was serviced twice a day. The hotel is almost finished - but this didn't effect our stay. The breakfasts were excellent - with a wide variety of choices. The staff were always keen to help and assist. The Italian restaurant was ideal for dinner - which I would recommend. The hotel arranged for a day trip around the island which I would recommend too. Once the top level area is completed - this will be a impressive hotel. However - it's still great now.

My fiancÃ© & I had the most amazing stay at Double Six. We went with another two couples. As soon as we entered we were welcomed with smiles. The hotel is beautiful, super clean & all in all stunning! The breakfast was a big hit amongst us all. All the staff at Double Six are so friendly, kind & always know how to make your morning. I will be highly recommending this hotel to all family & friends as I can't speak highly enough of it. A big thank you to the general relations officer Dede, who from get go was simply outstanding. Kind, helpful & a beautiful person. Highly recommend this place for anyone planning on going to BALI Seminyak & will definitely be returning.

My fiancÃ© gave me 7 nights at the Double Six Resort for my Christmas present and it was nothing short of exceptional. I loved every minute of my stay here and I wish that it could have been longer. The experience made my first trip to Bali memorable. Positives â€“ the welcome and check-in we received from the assistant manager and butler was fantastic and they left nothing out. Upgraded to an ocean view room as we had also just got engaged (Thank you very much). The room itself is massive and has everything in it that you could possibly require. Breakfast â€“ absolutely spectacular and YUM (the best I have ever had at any 5 star resort). The roof top bar is amazing with fantastic views. The day spa is wonderful and I had the most relaxing massage ever there. The location is; â€¦

My first trip to Bali and my husbands second. It was a beautiful stay, fitting for our honeymoon. The room was spacious and gorgeous. It did overlook Cocoon Bar yet was not too noisey. We noticed ear plugs were within the toileties provided by the hotel. We didn't need them at any point. Nor did we hear much noise from the workmen on the scafolding on double six near our room. The staff had been amazing all the way through our stay. Our mini bar fridge was found to not be cooling drinks, it was quickly and effortlessly switched with a new one. The spa is worth the extra $ for its level of fitout and quality of treatments. We did have treatments at another spa yet could not fully relax like I did here. Relax is what we came to do, We work in hospitality so are always rushing; â€¦

date post: Susie M wrote a review Jan 2015
text: My friend and I booked a last minute quick visit to Bali staying at Double Six. From the moment we arrived we felt absolutely spoilt. From the unique in-room check-in (which we were kindly upgraded to Ocean View), to having a Butler that was at our door with a smile whenever required made us feel like royalty. Sunset drinks on our balcony overlooking the pool bar and the sound of an acoustic musician playing from the beach made us late for dinner every night as we struggled to pull ourselves away from the balcony. Our rooms were serviced twice a day, with fresh towels, as well as having our beds rolled down every night made us both smile everytime we walked into our room. We also made use of Acqua Perla Spa where we both had an hour massage and a 2 hr indulgence package; â€¦
title: Perfect luxury!

text: My friend and I had a girls week away in Bali staying here. It was total luxury. The staff were so friendly and helpful, the rooms were lovely and serviced twice a day, the pool was just gorgeous and the restaurants had the most beautiful food! We didnt want to leave! The hotel was the highlight of our holiday, and the spa was also fabulous. We even purchased one of their pillows as they were so comfortable! I recommend even if you dont stay here, check out the Plantation Restaurant,Swing bar and the Italian rerestaurant. Fantastic!
title: Loved it!

date post: Katia P wrote a review Oct 2019
text: My friend and I stayed at the double six on the 30th September for a week and we were astounded by the exceptional service and attention to detail from the moment we were picked up from the airport, upgraded to a pool suite, check in inside our room, yummy and eye catching welcome drink, amazing pool service, tasty food, cleanliness and the turn down service every night. Everyone remembered our names and suite number from the breakfast staff to the concierge, the rooftop bar staff and beyond. I cannot wait to return for the most relaxing, recharging and exceptional holiday that was exactly what I needed. Thank you Double Six.
title: VERY SPECIAL RESORT!

text: My friend I stayed here mid June and I have to say it was an exceptional hotel. The room was spacious and always clean, bathroom was huge and had two separate wash basins in it which was so convienant. The staff were beyond helpful. As we checked in we were greeted by one of the managers who showed us around the room along with the butler. We were given some lovely welcome drinks as we were given the tour. Breakfast in the morning was also fantastic as it was all freshly made to order, there was a menu however you could pick and choose what you wanted. Hotel has a lovely pool area, which is monitored at all times by staff who were on hand to take food and drink orders....I could not fault the service. As you came out of the pool area you could find yourself on the hotels; â€¦
title: WOW! What an experience!

text: My Husband & I recently visited Bali & chose to stay at Double-Six Luxury Hotel in Seminyak, Bali.We have travelled extensively over recent years, And without a doubt this Hotel is the BEST we have stayed in. We were upgraded to a suite with a private plunge-pool ,wow, we could not believe it! the rooms are immaculate as is the service each day to your room. The Breakfast is a-la-carte,so nice to sit & enjoy the food & the beautiful sea-front view. We lost our Debit Card whilst there(a first and last time!) however the Staff at Reception Desk,rang our Bank in Australia,we were on the telephone for quite an extended period sorting through the problem,when I asked how much for the call,I was told compliments of the Hotel, very appreciated. Hopefully one day we will return to; â€¦

My husband & I stayed at Double Six for 8 nights. It was our first trip to Bali, so we wanted to stay in nice accommodation. We were not disappointed. Our experience at Double Six from the time of check in to departure was excellent. Couldn't fault a thing. We were looked after. We dined at Plantation Grill twice (very nice). Buffet & a la carte breakfasts excellent. Rooms luxurious. Definitely a must stay hotel.

My husband and I chose Double-Six for our honeymoon in Bali and we couldn't have been happier. We stayed in a Deluxe Suite with private plunge pool. The room was large and spacious, the decor luxurious and the service of the hotel staff was second-to-none. We enjoyed breakfast at Seminyak Italian Food (one of the restaurants at the hotel) daily and were very happy with the quality of the food, although the coffee wasn't quite up to my caffeine-loving standard (I think their milk is different from ours). We also had dinner there a few nights. The food was amazing and fresh and I enjoyed the wine selection. In terms of location, I couldn't be happier. We were across the road from the beach and a short walk from many restaurants, markets and convenience stores. Free wifi in; â€¦

My husband and I have just returned from a 10 night stay at this wonderful hotel. We originally booked 7 nights, then extended our stay. From check-in to check-out our stay went superbly, the staff at this hotel are all highly trained and speak perfect english, which made our stay hassle free. We were fortunate enough to get an upgrade upon arrival and our room was outstanding overlooking the beautiful pool and the ocean. The service is second to none, from the convenience of checking-in in the comfort of your own room, with a fabulous cocktail and the choice of a vodka shot or not from your personal 24hr butler. The amenities are absolute luxury in the bathroom (Hermes, Paris), as are the choice of teas (TWG) being one of my favourites, mini bar (including mini bottles of; â€¦

My husband and I have stayed at Double-Six several times over the last few years and we always enjoy ourselves. By far the best hotel breakfast we have had anywhere in the world. The rooms are large and the beds are comfortable. I wouldn't change a thing and highly recommend staying at this property!

My husband and I recently enjoyed an 8 night stay at Double Six. Upon arrival we were greeted by friendly happy staff who were very proud to show us the features of the hotel. We were delighted with the Ocean view room located on the 3rd floor. We loved all the facilities of the hotel with our favourites being the roof top bar, the massage / spa facilities and the restaurant. The hotel is located in a prime area allowing easy access to the beach, restaurants, bars and shopping (if you like to barter). The pool area was very impressive with only negative being the lack of sun lounges, staff were happy to take your room number and supply one when it became available. The staff throughout the hotel were always curious, polite and obliging, special mention to Erickson for; â€¦
title: All Class

text: My husband and I recently spent 4 nights at the Double Six before heading to Ubud and had the most amazing time. As soon as we arrived we were treated like royalty by the staff, they were all so beautiful and helpful. They upgraded our room to an amazing pool villa, and welcomed us with a nice drink on arrival. We completed our check in in our room which was a wonderful touch after spending time travelling to get there, much nicer than standing in reception! The butler and our personal concierge (Made & Lauren) showed us all of the features in our room and how to use them, even offering to unpack our bags! The dayspa and gym were the best ive seen at a hotel so as gym junkies we were very very pleased. The pool is beautiful as is the foyer and dining areas. I thought the; â€¦

date post: Gail P wrote a review Jul 2019
text: My husband and I recently stayed at this amazing resort! We were greeted with a sincere welcome and treated exceptionally from the start to the finish of our stay. The staff were professional, well trained and genuinely appeared happy to be at work! We took advantage of all the facilities on site which made our stay super easy to relax! We enjoyed the expertise of the Chefâ€™s culinary skills in both The Plantation Grill and Italian restaurant - on site superb! Not to leave out the roof top bar and breakfast experience. All in all the Double Six exceeded expectations and we would encourage anyone to enjoy the hospitality offered by this luxury hotel. Thankyou ðŸ˜‰ Loved it!
title: Best hotel in Seminyak

text: My husband and I spent 5 days in double6 in January 2015, stayed in room 123 with private plunge pool. From the time we arrived, we loved everything. The concept of checking in your own room is excellent, because the last thing you want is lining up and waiting. I was just amazed looking at the hotel, the design and the outfits they all wore, so different and very modern. We checked in with cocktails and cool towels in our own room upon arrival which was very nice. We also were introduced to our E-butler in case we needed anything. We dined at the Planation Grill on the day of our wedding anniversary, the food is amazing and I highly recommend this. Itâ€™s a must if you are staying in Bali.!!! We The only I found a bit odd is that we had our private plunge pool, but it wasn't; â€¦

date post: Paul B wrote a review Sep 2014
text: My husband and I spent 8 wonderful days at the Double Six in Seminyak. The suites are spacious, beautifully furnished and we had a plunge pool to add to our experience. The bathroom was abosolutely out of this world, with even a TV mounted on the wall at the end of the full size bath. Adequate water was delivered to your suite daily, fresh fruit (again daily) and two separate floral displays during our stay. The breakfasts were absolutely fantastic with everything being freshly prepared. A tip - try the fresh orange juice, but without ice (so delicious). All hotel staff extremely courteous and were obviously happy in their jobs - not one unhappy face did we see (from the staff) Any problem was dealt with promptly. Would love to come back again soon and experience the; â€¦
title: Five star luxury hotel by the sea

date post: Ika P wrote a review Jan 2015
text: My husband and I stayed at Double Six for 3 nights at the end of a 2 week stay in Bali. It was definitely the highlight of our trip and despite being more of a Thailand fan I would go back to Bali just for Double Six. The staff could not have been more professional and helpful, nothing was too much trouble for them. The decor and styling of the hotel was very impressive, and each restaurant had its own individual theme. The breakfast was probably the best hotel breakfast I've ever had, being able to order as many dishes as you wanted off the menu was brilliant as there was so much choice and the food was delicious. The roof top bar was very impressive, although does have a bit of a pretentious feel, we were questioned about why we were going up there and we did feel under; â€¦
title: A new concept of luxury

date post: Andrea Aprillan... W wrote a review Dec 2020
text: My husband and I stayed at Double Six for our honeymoon and we were so happy we did. Being our first time in Bali, it exceeded our expectations and we will definitely be coming back! Double Six picked us up from the airport, provided a unique check-in experience with a tour of the room and welcome cocktails and really made sure we were looked after throughout our stay. The daily all you can eat breakfast by the pool rooftop was exceptional, as was the rooftop sunset bar and the Italian restaurant on level 2. We also had massages at the hotelâ€™s spa, which were easily the best massages we have ever had! I highly recommend Double Six resort to anyone going to Bali, great location, excellent service, and overall a fantastic holiday experience.
title: Luxury Room in Seminyak

text: My husband and I stayed for a week for our 20th anniversary. A beautiful accomodation, the foyer upon arrival is magnificent and the staff so friendly and helpful. The large room was fancy, spacious, cleaned twice a day,had a very comfy king bed and was quiet. The only downside was that it faced a large wall, so we didn't use the balcony however we spent little time other than sleeping, in our room. The pool was lovely and we used it daily, The pool side service was wonderful- as was happy hour. We also lived the double six private beach lounge area. The buffet breakfasts were amazing on the roof top with magnificent views and staff. The counter staff were fantastic and helpful in arranging taxis, changing money, the hotel buggy and other bookings. Highly recommended.

My husband and I stayed here for 1 week 1-8 July 2014. It was a really good experience, definitely 5 star, even though the complete hotel was not open yet(roof top bar and other restaurants). We were upgraded to an ocean facing room (219) which was just terrific. We found the room to be well appointed and had every thing you could possibly want. We dined in at the Italian Restaurant twice and had lovely meals. The breakfast provided was "Made to Order" and consisted of items like : "Black truffle scrambled eggs with grilled asparagus", Eggs benedict, smoked ham organic spinach & hollandaise (my favorite)" and of course the Full Steam Ahead..."Scrambled organic eggs, garlic mushrooms, asparagus, tomato, grilled bacon, chicken & pork sausages". whats more the Fresh Juices; â€¦

My husband and I visited Double Six for the first time this week for our honeymoon and it has been a perfect stay!! Everyone from the general manager, through to the butlers, waitress/waiters to cleaners are truly focused on satisfying the customer experience and are always available. The daily breakfast provided is also a standout and I would have to say one of the best in the Bali. Rather than having buffet breakfast you are served a la carte and I can assure you the choices and quality of the food is by far a better option than buffet. The Italian restaurant is a must, had we gone earlier probably would've eaten there every day!! Even if you are not staying at Double Six I suggest eating there for either meal- you won't be disappointed! From the meals we had at breakfast, to; â€¦

date post: Tracy C wrote a review Nov 2019
text: My husband and I were very impressed with the double six. We spent 5 days being spoilt by the wonderful and friendly staff. The hotel is amazing and the location fantastic, in walking distance of everything needed. We will definitely be returning.
title: Our stay at Double Six

text: My husband and I were very nervous about out first trip to Bali. Even though we have 5 children and have traveled overseas before, we had reservations about staying in Bali. To celebrate our Wedding Anniversary our travel agent recommended the Double Six Hotel. From the moment we arrived at the Hotel we knew we had made the right decision and relaxed immediately. This hotel has changed our opinions about Bali as a holiday destination! We arrived at 8:30am expecting to be passing over our bags and returning at check in time. But instead... we were greeted with a warm welcome, a complimentary breakfast and refreshments and an offer to relax in the lounge area. The staff were so friendly. By the time we had finished breakfast we were shown to a room by 10:30am! We were also; â€¦

date post: David M wrote a review Jan 2020
text: My husband booked us a 5 night stay here just for a chill out to break our journey up back to the uk. The hotel is lovely and the staff canâ€™t do enough for you. The only problem is that we have only ate in hotel and both of us have been ill. On speaking to at least another 10 guests around pool who have also only ate in hotel they have all been vomiting and diarrhoea. Not a great end to my once in a lifetime holiday. I thought paying a lot more money for a quality hotel that it would be a better quality.
title: Great place for couples and families

text: My husband, our eighteen month old son and I stayed at Double Six Luxury Hotel for our honeymoon. Service was friendly, prompt and accommodating. I did like that check in was completed in our room, and we were also greeted with an array of little cakes and welcome cocktails for our honeymoon. We initially stayed in a deluxe suit ocean view, located on the second floor (room 219). The room was lovely, spacious and had a nice view of the pool and ocean. It did however, have a musky smell and at night across the road there was a restaurant playing live music that played late, not ideal when you want to sleep. We were moved to a same style room located on level four towards the end of our stay (room 409). This room had a nicer view and no smell. The hotel pool is relaxing, long; â€¦
title: Wonderful Resort

text: My partner and I ended our 2 week Bali trip with a 4 night stay at Double Six. From the moment we arrived, we were impressed. The lobby is very grand and open and the staff welcomed us by giving us a tour of the hotel. We were then taken to our room and served a bubble drink. The staff were so polite and friendly and treated us like old friends. The room was huge and the bath was one of the best Iâ€™ve ever had! We enjoyed drinks at the rooftop bar one evening and had dinner at the plantation grill. Both were brilliant. The grill is quite pricey but in my option, definitely worth it. Breakfast was good with plenty of variety. The cherry on the cake was when we went to check out and got told we could use the lounge until we left. I was expecting a sofa in a room and; â€¦

date post: Abes H wrote a review May 2019
text: My partner and I ended up coming to Bali one day earlier than expected so we booked the Double-Six on the day we were arriving and I'm so glad we did! I hadn't had much chance to research the hotel (I literally booked as our plane was taxiing the runway from Brisbane) but I had heard it was luxurious and it certainly was. From the moment we arrived staff did their very best to assist us. Check in was done in the room, and then our butler came and introduced herself and gave us welcome cocktails. The room and bathroom were huge, modern and clean and we had a great view over the beach. Service by the pool was great and they have a happy hour with two-for-one drinks from 4-6pm. It's within walking distance to plenty of restaurants and shops. We ate dinner at one of the beach; â€¦
title: Absolute luxury
