text: My partner and I had a holiday booked there in July 2020. Due to COVID our trip was cancelled because of border closures in Bali and Australia. At the time our trip was cancelled the hotel promised us a refund. It is now February 2021 and we are yet to see a dollar. They took $2400 Australian dollars for 6 nights accommodation we never had. They are no ignoring our emails. The last reply in January stated they had no update on refunds. The hotel is open therefore making money. This is a hotel that uses the word 'luxury' in their name. In my opinion they are a bunch of thieves. Please don't give them your money as they have ripped many vulnerable customers and taken their money. We are now out of pocket and have our own financial struggles. They have caused so much distress for; us.; â€¦
title: Can't wait to come back!

text: My partner and I had a holiday booked there in July 2020. Due to COVID our trip was cancelled because of border closures in Bali and Australia. At the time our trip was cancelled the hotel promised us a refund. It is now February 2021 and we are yet to see a dollar. They took $2400 Australian dollars for 6 nights accommodation we never had. They are no ignoring our emails. The last reply in January stated they had no update on refunds. The hotel is open therefore making money. This is a hotel that uses the word 'luxury' in their name. In my opinion they are a bunch of thieves. Please don't give them your money as they have ripped many vulnerable customers and taken their money. We are now out of pocket and have our own financial struggles. They have caused so much distress for; us.; â€¦
title: Can't wait to come back!

text: My partner and I have just returned from our trip to Bali and our stay at the Double Six. We went for my 50th birthday and to start with we got a room upgrade to a Deluxe Suite with Private Plunge Pool which was fantastic cos it was school holidays so the main pool was pretty busy at times so we could go to our room and sunbake on our deck and jump in the plunge pool it was great. I loved the breakfast being a la carte intead of buffet everythhng is made to order and very fresh i went through the whole menu and loved it all. The Italian Restaurant is beautiful, we had my birthday dinner up there. The rooms are to die for very spacious, great bathroom and the most comfy beds. The staff were very helpfull always and spoke good english. I couldn't have asked for a better 50th The; â€¦

date post: Jayne S wrote a review May 2019
text: My partner and I just returned from spending 8 nights at the beautiful Double-Six Resort in Seminyak. The staff are extremely attentive - very professional and we were taken care of very well with any requests we had. Special mention to our Butler, Santana, who couldn't do enough for us and had a great sense of humor! Thanks Santana! Facilities are fantastic - A huge pool and plenty of sun loungers with a great selection of drinks and poolside menu - Aung was always on hand to take our orders and keep us hydrated! The restaurants are beautiful - especially The Plantation Grill and Swing Bar - a very swanky 1920's themed experience. We had a lovely meal here and plenty of tasty cocktails a few nights! So overall we had an amazing time and can certainly recommend for anyone; â€¦
title: Outstanding

text: My partner and I recently stayed at the Double Six for the first time and must say, it will not be the last. From the moment we arrived the friendly staff set the tone for our whole experience. Our room was beyond my expectation with an amazing beach view and generously sized suite. The hotel facilities were also amazing whether it be the pool, bars and restaurants. Overall there were so many things that made this Hotel a class above many I have stayed at around the world. I would highly recommend Double Six to anyone that visits sunny Bali.
title: A Beautiful Place, Beautiful People, We will be back!

text: My partner and I stayed at the Double Six Seminyak for 6 nights. As a travel agent, I have sent guests previously and always wanted to stay there. I can say I was very impressed. The rooms are very spacious and modern and the balcony was very big and comfortable. View is stunning. The rooftop bar is incredible, we spent nearly every sunset up there and it is one of the best sunsets we have ever seen. We were there for our first anniversary together and we were greeted with some gorgeous flowers and little cakes. All of the staff were lovely and very efficient, very quick service and when we first arrived we were shown around the resort and our room. Meals and drinks are delivered very quickly. One of the nights we had dinner at the resorts Italian restaurant, they; â€¦

My partner and I stayed here for 10 nights, from the minute we arrived the staff were incredible, they could not to enough for your comfort. The hotel itself is stunning, so clean and welcoming. The restaurants are beautiful especially the buffet breakfast at the rooftop bar. There is certainly a little bit for every one wether you want to relax or like to party, by far the best thing about the hotel is the service closely followed by the atmosphere. Highly recommend staying here, we will be back again !

My recent stay at Double Six was my 3rd since it's opening in May 2014. Again, I can't recommend the hotel for its amenities and outstanding service enough, this is luxury at its finest! I had an amazing room (was in a suite with a plunge pool), amazing 24hr butlers and amazing amenities. I did get sick during my stay (had the flu and then got a stomach bug) and the hotel staff went above and beyond to ensure I was looked after with healthy food and drinks at all times. The staff also checked on me when I stepped into the Lobby to ensure I was feeling better and if there was anything they could do for me to make me more comfortable. Personalised service is key and makes you feel right at home! I know I'll be back, and again can't recommend the hotel and its amazing staff enough!; â€¦

date post: Debbie W wrote a review Feb 2015
text: My room was just gorgeous. Very large with fantastic facilities overlooking the pool. Loved the coffee machine too. The pool area was lovely and I particularly loved the restaurant for breakfast where you could chose a la carte from a varied and unique menu. The staff in all areas of the hotel were exceptional and couldnâ€™t do enough for us. The rooftop bar was beautiful and full of surprises. Try and book a table and lounge at sunset for spectacular views. The whisky lounge was very cool and 1920's style. The coffee martinis were awesome. I really cant wait to go back for a luxurious weekend in the near future.
title: "SECOND TIME STAYING AT DOUBLE SIX AND EVEN BETTER"

text: My son and I stayed at double six Seminyak hotel for our first time and were overwhelmed by the excellent service we received the amazing welcome drink while you check in at the comfort of your room a butler service who is always ready and willing to assist you in every way and such wonderful staff especially at the buffet and a la carte breakfast which was fantastic with lots of variety and being vegan and gluten free was a bonus we wanted to thank each and every staff for their exceptional service with a friendly smile and location was great across from the beach and good massage places close by Thankyou for making our stay welcome and fulfilling and assisting us in every way highly recommend your hotel and definitely come back lisa and reiss Melbourne Australia
title: Luxury!!!

text: My wife and I checked into this beauty for the last two days of our honeymoon. Our only regret was we never found it earlier! From the moment you arrive it feels very special, the rooms are modern like the hotel and the staff are a class above. Fantastic location from a short walk to pubs and restaurants. Phenomenal roof top bar to watch sunset and very reasonably priced for what you experience! We took advantage of the members lounge on check out, this was a fantastic area for us to spend the last few hours after check out. When I return to Seminyak it will 100% be to return to this hotel. We checked out early from a 5 star villa in this area, it wasnâ€™t for us and we never wanted to end the honeymoon on a low, this Double Six was the best ending we could wish for.
title: 6 star Resort

text: My wife and I have just returned from 7 nights at Double- Six Luxury Hotel. The hotel is very impressive with nice large rooms and all the amenities you will need. A must see is the roof-top bar - It is very classy and has a magnificent outlook! We also had a massage at their "Aqua Pearla Spa" which was very flash and good customer service. We found all the staff to be very helpful and the majority of them had very good English. A major benefit for us, as we had a late afternoon flight is that the hotel has a 'departure lounge' that we went into once we checked out of our room. This offered showers, massaging chairs and complimentary food/drinks! The location of the hotel has pros/cons. As a positive, it is right near the beach (straight across a small road) and the traffic is; â€¦
title: Treated us like Royalty!

text: My wife and I really enjoyed our stay at Double Six Hotel, staff were very professional and friendly, very nice people. The food at the restaurants was absolutely delicious and very clean and well priced. Rooms are luxurious and spacious, and you get a 24 hour butler service. You really feel like you are living in luxury. We will be staying here again without a doubt.

date post: Christine S wrote a review Sep 2014
text: My Wife and I spent 14 glorious days at the Double Six in Seminyak, The suites are very spacious and very well equipped,The pool is equal to the best in the world, and the service in every part of the hotel is first class. I would like to make a special mention to Kiki and thank her for looking after us so well at breakfast. I would also like to thank Dheeraj the hotel manager for his assistance in making our stay a memorable one, and also a thank you to Erickson for looking after our every need. Dheeraj, you have wonderful staff and it is a credit to you that they all work happy and eager to please the guests with any requests. See you soon!! J&K
title: LUXURY IN EVERY SENSE

text: My wife and I stayed at Double Six from 7th June for 15 days. From the minute we arrived we were looked after by the very friendly and efficient staff who will do anything to help and always had time for a chat. Our butler ,Ricardo, saw us walking in Seminyak one day and stopped his motor bike to see how we were going. Our room overlooking the pool and beach was huge. Very comfortable bed and lounge. Nice balcony for those afternoon drinks. Bathroom has twin vanity basins, big shower and a nice deep bath. The room was attended to twice a day by the very friendly cleaners. Breakfasts are great and the food at the Seminyak Italian Restaurant was amazing. Apart from the fridge not being cold enough we could not complain about anything. That was our thirteenth visit to Bali and; â€¦
title: Serenity, luxury and service.

text: My wife and I stayed here for a week in Feb 2015, and could not fault anything. The staff, the service and the facilities were nothing less than excellent. Rooms are so spacious, with huge bathrooms, dual vanities and full size bath with TV over it. Attention to detail all around this hotel was exceptional. It really made our stay feel very special. Would definitely return to this lovely hotel.

date post: Tracy S wrote a review Aug 2019
text: My wife and I stayed in an Ocean View deluxe room which was fabulous. So clean and enjoyed the 24 hour Butler service. We ate at the Plantation Grill, Italian,Lagoon pool bar and rooftop breakfast on Sunday morning. Also had a couple of meals in our room. The quality of food is excellent. A free drink at the wonderful Sling bar. The staff are so friendly and helpful, special mention to Agung at Lagoon bar for your assistance . I would highly recommend the hotel and we will return. Stephen Cummins
title: Amazing customer service, beautiful hotel and great location.

text: My wife and I went to the rooftop bar here and it was excellent!! Very classy indeed with views to die for. The rooftop bar was very upmarket and trendy and the service slick with a great wine list. We then went to the Italian Restaurant downstairs, it was average service at best, trying to read menus from two almost flat book lights was a joke and the food was bland and tasteless. You get shown the salami room upon entering the restaurant which looks impressive and mouth watering, upon ordering the platter of salami and meats the salami was paper thin, greasy and tasteless. They may have home made pastas etc etc but there was not a hint of flavour or spices in my marinara, no plate for the shells, it was an imposition to ask for grated Parmesan!!! This was just an; â€¦

date post: Brendon D wrote a review Feb 2015
text: My wife and I, thoroughly enjoyed our recent holiday in Bali and were most impressed with your lovely 'fresh and clean', Double-Six Luxury Hotel in Seminyak. We have since talked to other family members and told them how delightful your Hotel was so, there is a very good chance in the future, there could be 'more of us' likely to stay at Double-Six! To you and your Staff at Double-Six Luxury Hotel, very best wishes and continuing success. Paul & Marie, Perth
title: Amazing

text: My wife and me have visited some truly magnificent hotels in the world and the Double-Six can hold up with the best of them. The rooms, the staff, the on site restaurants have taken care of a truly remarkable experience and one that we will absolutely remember. The rooms are large and very clean, breakfast offers a very nice blend of local specialties and international dishes where everyone can find someone of their tasting. Twice a week they offer a more traditional buffet at the rooftop bar, which give everybody the opportunity to select themselves what they want. Staff is trained locally I understood and you can tell, they go out of their way to help and make every stay a special one. Around the clock butler service, take away breakfast if you have an early departure (for; â€¦

my wife bought me a four day holiday at the double six in a luxurious suite for my birthday. from the moment we arrived the staff looked after our every need even upgrading us before we even got there.the whole venue is outstanding from the attentive staff at the swimming pool through to the concierge and butler services right up to the roof top bar amazing. the restaurant was outstanding for breakfast lunch and dinners. all the staff took a genuine interest in where we came from what we were doing and if there was anything they could do to make our stay better. i would recommend this hotel to anyone. we had an absolute ball so thanks guys cant wait to see you next time.
title: Double Awesome

date post: Michael N wrote a review Oct 2014
text: Myself , Husband Mother and Father stayed here for 7 days. We did get one of the awesome deals they had advertised and was looking forward to going .Although tried not to have too many expectations as it did sound too good to be true. The hotel exceeded all expectations.We will be staying there again.The rooms are just beautiful. The Staff are just beautiful, the pool is huge and very well kept. I am not a pool person but was in there most mornings.We got room service twice a day,6 bottles of water a day and top ups of the coffee pods that was with the coffee machine in each room.The bathroom was huge The bath was well and truly deep enough to fit even the biggest of people in and has your own TV above. The rooftop bar was worth a visit but beware its quite expensive. The; â€¦
title: Happy campers

text: New to the Seminyak Hotel scene and sure to be a worthy contender for one of the best. The Double-Six was something special for sure! From the moment you arrive, the staff could not be more welcoming from the in-room check in team, to the restaurant and pool staff. All were so attentive and could not do enough for you. Great pool (with shade fortunately, great for us whitey's!), luxurious well appointed rooms, large practical bathrooms (complete with Hermes products!) and the overall comfort was exceptional. The complimentary minibar (topped up daily) was also a nice surprise, and great to enjoy a beer on the terrace in the afternoons. One of the top features of the hotel (besides the awesome spa, which really SHOULD be on everyone's "to do" list when staying inhouse) was the; â€¦

Nice and clean Pool Plunge room with colorful light. HermÃ¨s bathroom amenities. Nice atmosphere. Great service. One of the best welcome drink, Vodka Mint Pineapple Granita ! A la carte breakfast are good.
title: Superb! Luxurious perfection

text: No better service and personal care by the Management & staff of this hotel would be possible Everyone from the top down is focussed on your needs. Food drink and atmostphere in the new plantation restaurant is as good as anywhere in the world. Absolutely the best in quality taste & service We felt individually care for all the time

date post: Phil H wrote a review May 2019
text: No where near as good as the first. Food and beverage staff were probably the nicest but forgetful. The Plantation Grill was great on all levels. The hotels hostess type staff were somewhat arrogant and rude. Building externally Needs maintenance as looking tired and pool needs a good clean. TV reception terrible, pillows dirty. Will not be going back.
title: great stay

text: Number one really, absolute perfection in every aspect! From the suites to the staff, from the food to the service and the place overall. Best venue in town! If you're going to Bali this is the Hotel to chose.
title: Great hotel

text: OMG I thought I had died and gone to heaven. We had two fab weeks at this hotel and I cannot praise it enough. The staff went out of their way to help and would especially thank Dheeraj, the manager,Erickson, Nita and anastasia, they made our holiday perfect. Hope to return next year.

On the surface this place is breath taking ,but just don't look to close ,all staff were wonderful ,I think management needs to keep a eye on thing as staff are very young and lack experience in all areas from breakfast waitresses to the welcoming staff overall nice but too expensive until the service is up there .....small tired places with great service are better .I found the air conditioning very loud
title: One of the best!!

date post: Helen D wrote a review Dec 2014
text: One of better hotel in Bali, ......Uncomparable luxury room, bathroom is fantastic, excellent services and warm welcome from all staff, nice breakfast... Could be better can suggest recommended meals, number 1 location at beachfront of seminyak.... I will definitely come back as my first choice to stay in Bali......
title: When Can We Go Back!!!

text: One of the best hotels in Bali every thing is near to you mini markets barber shop and evin pharmacy,great service and friendly staff and great view of sea from room + they have night club for people that like to party.

One of the best hotels I've stayed at in South East Asia. Check-In: done in the room, very smooth and quick, butler also goes through all the room amenities. Room 1: Ocean View Suite - great size room, love the mood lighting, plenty of complimentary drinking water, extensive minibar, TV in living area and bathroom, lots of bathroom amenities too. Room 2: Pool Access Suite - same as above, on the edge of the pool so can walk out onto your balcony and into the pool. I would book this room over the Ocean View as it also has the same view, just great being able to walk straight into the pool. Lobby - clean, large and open space with attentive staff. Restaurant - only dined for breakfast in Seminyak Italian and it was one of the best meals I had while in Bali. The Eggs; â€¦

Only here 3 days and this is a hotel above the rest ! Room is breathtaking . Staff are faultless . Resort Devine . Breakfast the best I've tasted in the world . So far it's a little piece of heaven and I do not want to leave !!!! Thank you double six I love it !

Opened in August 2014, this upmarket resort is trying hard to establish brand awaress and appeal to a wide audience. Staff are everywhere, very well trained, attentive, responsive and superbly presented - and all young!! (do Balinese ever reach middle age?). Rooms are spacious, very well appointed and come with your own Butler. There are a couple of potential floor hazards (grade changes and 20 cm level changes that are unheralded) which will no doubt be altered once the owners are sued by an injured client!! The property looks out over beautiful Double Six beach, is well patrolled and secure. This place is luxury on a stick but makes the same mistake as many other properties; there is insufficient reference to their own culture and cuisine, with the various menus being; â€¦

Opulence and Indulgence are the two words which I would use to describe my stay at The Double Six hotel in Seminyak Bali. Situated next to the beach and fanned by the warm gentle breezes of the Indian Ocean the Double Six Hotel commands a prominent position in Bali. From the moment I walked into the foyer I knew I was in for something special. There was an air of contentment that made me feel that I had made the right choice. The staff greeted me with smiles and with a kind of attention more like I was a returning resident, not just another holiday maker. Formalities were kept to a bare minimum and within minutes I was whisked off to my room where a new and different experience was to greet me. The room was bold in design yet quietly comforting. I was given a grand tour of the; â€¦
title: Opulence !

text: Our family is currently enjoying a magnificent , relaxing 8 day stay ! We had some minor issues with our room but the management team very capably led by Selvarjoo Munisamy promptly stepped in and resolved our problem. The standard of service is this hotel is exemplary . Breakfast is a wonderful experience and the spa and massage service well run and tranquil. It enjoys an incredible position with amazing views and what surely must be Baliâ€™s largest pool !This is our 3rd stay at Double 6 in 2 bedroom apartment accomodation and we highly recommend . Talk to staff about locations of rooms because there are differences . Find out what works best for you ! Once again thanks the service from your team Selvarjoo !!
title: Excellent service, fantastic food, outstanding staff

date post: Melanie L wrote a review Mar 2019
text: Our first visit to Bali and couldn't be more satisfied with choice of hotel. From airport pick-up to check-out we were treated like royalty. This hotel is set in the heart of Seminyak, which although is rather busy, you will be in the midst of calm and relaxation once checked into Double-Six hotel. Everything is clean, neat and the corridors have a beautiful fresh fragrance as walking through. The service is truly 10/10 from all employees from front desk, to bell boy, to waiters, to managers. A special thanks to Lina who made our stay comfortable - all concierge staff spoke English very well. Thanks to hotel manager Silva who constantly made conversation with us and ensured we were enjoying our stay. The waiters during breakfast and at the pool bar were polite and always had a; â€¦
title: Double Six Bliss

text: Our fourth visit to the Double-Six Luxury Hotel was faultless!! It was lovely to see and be remembered by many of the staff from the previous year, and to be genuinely welcomed back. All the staff cannot do enough for you, nothing is too much trouble. As always, we enjoyed the a la carte breakfast at the Italian Seminyak. This visit they added a buffet breakfast two days a week at the rooftop. This has been done very well - so many choices and a fabulous view! We also ate at the Italian Seminyak twice for dinner - lovely food and good service. We thoroughly enjoyed the Planation Grill - it is a beautiful restaurant, the food and service exceptional! It was so good, that we went back a second night for dinner. We spoke to the manager Mr Selvarajoo Munisamy on several; â€¦

date post: bruce b wrote a review May 2019
text: Our second time Bali, we wanted to spend it luxurious. And this hotel really made that happen. All the staff are very friendly and helpful. The rooms are large and beautiful. You can call the butler for anything you want. The breakfast is to die for. The pool, which stretches from one side of the hotel to the other side, is great. You can cross the pool by bridges, walk down the steps, cross the quiet road and you'll be on Double Six Beach. The staff from the Lagoon will also bring your drinks to you, when staying on the beach. The only downside was that everytime you order something, they ask you to write down your name, roomnumber and signature. You can't open a 'tab'. Untill 22.00 there's live music on the beach. Ask the staff at the front of the hotel to drop you somewhere; â€¦
title: Top class in all aspects

date post: Anuj P wrote a review Feb 2015
text: Our second trip to the Double Six and we cannot wait to return. Mr Dee and his crew are amazing, always smiling and every aspect just kept getting better! The restaurant 'Seminyak Italian' is great and the whole place is just tops, the service, the food, the ambience- the staff go above and beyond to ensure your holiday is wonderful. Double-Six is the place to stay. Love the beach area that is exclusive to the Double Six. Spa is divine,special kudos to Ms Daisy for her fabulous treatments. Will be back as soon as possible.
title: HONEYMOON SPECIAL

text: Our stay at Double Six via Luxury Escapes was immaculate, from the unlimited breakfast to see us through to dinner, to the stunning yet peaceful accomodation, to the views from the balcony. This new hotel is fantastic and allows easy access to the must see sights of Seminyak.

Our stay at Double-Six was nothing short of breathtaking! The service is beyond describable. Every staff from reception to security treated us like family. Many would go out of there way to come say hello to you everyday. One particular member Clara went over and above, from making sure we were taken care of during our honeymoon, booking tours for us after hours, to arranging 4am breakfast packs before our early flight home. The design and menu at Double-Six is truly unique an memorable. A must stay!

Our stay at the Double-Six was wonderful. Good food, great staff, beautiful facilities. The room we had was magnificent with the sea views and space for the whole family. Highly recommend this hotel for a break
title: Beautiful Hotel

text: Our stay was wonderful in all respects and we basked in magical Bali at this hotel which offered a haven away from the bustling streets whilst overlooking the beach. All positives as already mentioned are confirmed. The one issue, and they are dealing with it, is getting a lounge chair to bask next to the pool. Dheeraj Bagai and his wonderful team , congratulations to you all

Our week stay at Double Six booked through Luxury Escapes was truly amazing. The staff were always friendly and professional. We stayed in a Ocean View Suite which was big, clean & stylish with a very comfy king size bed. Included breakfasts at the Italian Rest and the Rooftop bar (twice a week) were fantastic and my gluten free diet was always catered for. Loved the happy hours lazing by the pool (buy 1, get 1 free), drinks with a fabulous view in the Rooftop Bar, delicious food in Plantation Grill & much pampering in the Acqua Perla Spa. The Owners Lounge at the end of our stay was the best. Our friends were staying at a more expensive resort and they didn't get this amazing perk. Highly recommend & will stay again...
title: So Luxurious, we were made feel so special.

date post: Sharon P wrote a review Sep 2019
text: Our week stay in Bali for a wedding was made extra special when we were upgraded from Blue -Zea Resort to their sister Hotel Double-Six Hotel for two nights. We were treated so special, from the moment we walked in the door. Breakfast, lunch & dinner were all to a high standard that we could not fault. A day relaxing by the pool and being waited on by the friendly and ever obliging staff was more than we expected. Our room was large, clean & modern with a large balcony to relax on. How lovely to come home late from a long day to find our beds pulled back, the clothes we left on the floor folded and bottles of water on our bedsides. My only wish was that we could have stayed longer. Thank you to all the lovely staff at Double-Six for making us feel so special and for giving us; â€¦
title: Fantastic!

date post: Bec B wrote a review Oct 2014
text: Overall a lovely, 10 night, family stay in a new  property settling and finding it's feet. It is difficult to review this hotel as expectations can vary so much depending on price paid for accomodation- we booked several months ago so didn't get a super cheap deal but on arrival were upgraded to an Ocean facing suite ( down the Cocoon club end of the property.) The hotel is edgy and modern with sea views rather than lush gardens- it is in no way traditional Balinese style, plays funky music and has very modern fittings. I spoke to some guests who split their time between Double six and a more traditional quieter Balinese style hotel-depends on what you like.  The location is truly lovely facing out over the ocean ( note there is a laneway used by golf buggies and; â€¦
title: A luxurious place to stay

text: Pictures of the resort donâ€™t do it justice. Staff great, menu is amazing. If vegan or vegetarian you have amazing options!! There is clearly lots of talent in the kitchen to extend on the vegan menu further. Go for it double six! Rooms well appointed so donâ€™t bother to bring shampoos, creams, mouth wash, dental tape, or toothbrush. They have it all arranged and in the room ðŸ˜. Roof top breaky was picture worthy and the best Iâ€™ve had on any island resort; and Iâ€™ve experienced plenty. Pool bar drinks and menu well priced and quality of food great. I didnâ€™t like their cocktails but the bing tang lemon beer was to die for - and I usually hate beerðŸ˜‚. Happy hour of course but there is a â€œquicky martâ€ down the road if you have some duty free on board you want to mix ðŸ˜‹; â€¦
title: Pure Luxury

text: Plenty has been said of the aesthetics and facilities of the Double Six - and they are all wonderful, however, I'd like to comment on the staff. We spent 13 nights over Christmas here with our extended family. As is the case in any family getaway there were a few mishaps. It was in these moments the staff of Double Six shone. My girlfriend broke her collarbone at Waterbom Park then got struck by some reasonably severe gastro. Everyone at the hotel from the front desk staff, the restaurant management and staff, the bellboys, the butlers and the cleaning staff went above and beyond to be helpful, compassionate, considerate and were proactive in assisting us. There empathy and assistance will be long remembered. Warmth has always been a key character trait of the Balinese and in; â€¦

date post: Paul Johnston wrote a review May 2019
text: Really can't say enough good things on how much we enjoyed our stay at the Double-Six in Seminyak. The staff are really so supportive and attentive for our every need. I highly recommend this hotel. Thank you. The on-site Plantation Grill a 1920's style bar and eatery was just like the Ivy in London but better. Live jazz or opera on different evenings. Amazing food and ambience.
title: Treat yourself to a stay here!!

text: Really enjoyed our stay here - the bed was huge, a huge bath and lovely bathroom, the view fantastic, the pillows were the best I've ever slept on! The staff were really helpful and friendly. The breakfasts included in our stay were a la carte and everything we had was delicious. Highly recommend the french crepes! Would definitely stay there again.
title: Absolute favourite

text: Recently my husband and I had the pleasure of staying at this hotel in Seminyak. From the second we arrived and were welcomed by the lovely Anasthasia we realised that we had come to the right place. As we were privately checked in (in our room might I add) and then introduced to the other staff we would interact with during our stay it became apparent that this establishment prided itself in developing personal and lasting relationships between themselves and their clientele. The rooms were magnificent, spacious, private and with all the comforts you would expect from a high end hotel. But when it comes down to it the winning factor here was the staff themselves, from our personal room butler Ardi, to the head butler himself Erickson, they were attentive, friendly and could not; â€¦

Remarkable! Our stay at the double six was fantastic. We arranged a plunge pool room for 4 nights. The luxury starts with the relaxing in room check in process which set the tone for the remainder of our stay. Eying the vegan menu was a delight for our stay. Vegan dishes were available in room, pool side & at both the breakfast buffet and the Ala carte breakfast. We experienced both styles of breakfast during our stay and we both preferred the Ala cart. (It offered more vegan options then the buffet) The only minor downside would be that 2/4 nights during our stay the roof top was closed for private events and during the second closer of the rooftop the other bar & restaurant was also closed for a private event. As well beach access from the pool was blocked. Slightly; â€¦
title: Not so luxurious

date post: JUSTICE JAMES ROSH wrote a review Mar 2019
text: Second time in Bali and me and my friends stayed at this lovely hotel to celebrate the birthday of one of our diva friends ( cause i have more than one diva friend) The hotel pool is beautiful as are the rooms with the balconies. All the staff are very nice and helpful. i love that they have butlers. My fabulous friends got the penthouse and I stayed in the second bedroom with my childhood bff. we were both very pleased with our stay.
title: The Double Six Luxury Hotel Seminyak ( BALI) is one of the finest, paramount hotels in Seminyak ( BALI) offering all as

date post: Chris Jacob wrote a review Jul 2019
text: Seriously great hotel! Loved the extra attention and unique check in experience and those welcome drinks... so cool! Enjoyed the theatre of dry ice! The food was just excellent, a la Carte breakfast is the best and pool side snacks were great. Every single staff member we came across was an absolute delight! Rooms were enormous and so clean. Fabulous music in all the common areas. Havenâ€™t been to Bali for years and we were astounded at how modern itâ€™s become, with honestly some of the best service we have seen in a while!
title: The Best Hotel In Seminyak And The Most Professional And Courteous Manager I've Ever Met!

text: Service canâ€™t be faulted from the moment you arrive they are prompt, polite, informative and you get an introduction to everything straight away and then checked in, in your room. The hotel is in a great location right on the beach and has all the amenities we were after.
title: Great location, excellent coffee!

text: Situated right on Seminyak Beach, handy to shops, bars, food outlets and spas this is a top location. The 120 m infinity pool is the best I have enjoyed. It is easy to actually swim lengths unobstructed. Staff were exceptionally helpful and smiling. Our room was huge with a good view of the beach and pool and very comfortable. Breakfasts were extensive with an eat all you can policy. Food presentation was not always what one expected but enjoyable. Service was invariably smiling and efficient. we enjoyed our dinners but would not rank in a luxury class. Compared to many this hotel provided remarkably good value.

date post: Cristina Castro wrote a review Oct 2019
text: So disappointed!! ðŸ˜” Was supposed to be staying at Double six for 5 nights, checked out after 2 â˜¹ï¸ Wouldnâ€™t say Double six was a luxury hotel at all, although it carries a luxury price tag. I would say itâ€™s more like a travel lodge. A lot of the areas were covered in damp patches, paint peeling/bubbling of the walls Rooms are very basic, no luxury to them, not even a sofa to sit on. Staff are miserable, very fake not interested in helping, would rather try to avoid you. Breakfast was average. Appeared to be freshly cooked. The Plantation grill was awful, and expensive. We ordered the rib eye, very fatty and asked for well done, brought to table rare and bloody. Ordered drink, specifically asked for no ice, they removed the drink that had ice from the table and tipped it into; â€¦
title: Great experience at Double Six

date post: Brendan M wrote a review May 2019
text: So I donâ€™t normally write reviews until I leave a hotel , however this hotel is beyond amazing , we arrived a little early and was greeted by the most beautiful friendly staff members , taken to the owners room where we got to relax and have a complimentary drink , our room was ready short after , again taken by a friendly staff member and shown the room , which is soooooo good ask for room 508 , beautiful view and design and also great shampoo !!! Then we had a friendly butler arrive and give us a drink which was so awesomely delicious and it smoked , wow also went to the pool , again the most friendly staff and great swimming pool, this is the first luxurious hotel where I have felt special !!! Wow done
title: Great Hotel, Great service, but......

text: Spacious, luxurious rooms and the staff are super friendly and service is first rate. Great pool that never seems crowded and just across the road from the beach. Breakfast was a highlight with a la carte most mornings (order as much as you like) and buffet on Wednesdayâ€™s and Sundays. The use of a lounge on check out day makes this resort a stand out from others. You can relax in air conditioned comfort with showers and free drinks provided until your pick up arrives for the airport. We were able to use the resort facilities and lounge until departure time of 7.30 pm. The staff at this resort are outstanding, always pleasant, helpful and genuinely happy people. I rate this as one of the best resorts I have stayed at.

Staff are amazing, always prepared to assist and so very helpful, kind and happy. Food was great, especially at the Plantation Grill. The pool was exquisite, and the room, divine. This trip was heaven because of where we stayed, and we are so very thankful. (ps, everything is super clean. All. The. Time.)

date post: Lanaa ãƒƒ P wrote a review Dec 2019
text: Stayed 3 Nights in Ocean View Room! The check in process and welcome drinks were amazing which set the tone for the rest of our stay. Room was beautiful, staff beautiful, and amenities beautiful!!! Have been coming to Bali for many years and Double Six would have to be the most amazing and welcoming stay we have had. A big thank you to all the staff and the management team for your exceptional work.
title: Stunning

text: Stayed as a couple, mid January check in was great. First room was great until it was dark, after having a long flight we wanted to have an early night and good sleep, this was impossible all of the hotel waste water runs through the ceiling or walls of room 127, the light's even when switched of were flashing along the walls combined with a room sensor that flashes a red light in the centre of the room, which switches of the air conditioning and power to charge your phone etc. to there credit they sent a maintenance crew pretty well straight away and disconnected the flashing light's. The next morning we were met by "Clara" at reception who without being asked informed us she had a different room, would have power on all night and would be ready after breakfast, which we; â€¦
title: Never again

date post: David H wrote a review Nov 2014
text: Stayed at double six for ten days in November, bought a deal from luxury escapes, should have bought two for next time we go, rooms were fantastic, staff were fantastic no trouble with anything you asked for, always asking you if you needed help, breakfast at the restaurant was the best i have had in Bali a great variety to choose from, pool goes around the front of the hotel and is a great view to the beach, great cocktails by the pool, roof top bar is great to see the sunset, how ever to sit in the seats at the front you have to pay $100, this is ok if there is a group but a bit expensive for a couple, the Aqua Pearl spa was wonderful, found myself going to sleep with a foot massage, only one bad thing i could say about 66 is the fridge in the room does not keep your drinks; â€¦
title: Best staff ever

text: Stayed at Double Six in a 2 Bedroom Oceanview Suite, and had a wonderful experience. From the moment we arrived we were greeted with attentive and friendly staff. I commend the hotel for it's variety in breakfast options, and particularly liked the fact it is a la carte (except Sundays when it is buffet). No option was too hard and the coffee was excellent. I will be back
title: Great Location.cant wait to go back!!

text: Stayed at Double Six in an Ocean View room and it did not disappoint. The views are amazing overlooking the pool and beach and the rooms are very spacious with all the little extras you do not find in other hotels. From the moment we were picked up from the Airport by the Hotels transfer service (our driver was Gede Astawa, friendly, professional and informative) to arriving at the Hotel to check in we were greeted by exceptional friendly staff. We ordered dinner at 11pm when we arrived and it was served to us within 15 minutes! Food was amazing, we also had dinner at the Plantation Bar & Grill and enjoyed the local lobster at an extremely generous price!! Breakfast buffet was beautiful with an enormous range and the daily breakfast menu was an awesome selection. We enjoyed most; â€¦

Stayed at the Double Six for a week and had an absolutely wonderful time. Started with the smooth check in which occurred in the suite, the welcome cocktail brought in by the butler was really yummy. The room was huge and had the best view of the ocean, even when we're lying on the bed. The bathroom was so spacious, well designed and the Hermes products were well appreciated. We dined at the Plantation on our first night and we were very impressed with the choice and quality of the food, it had a very romantic and luxurious atmosphere. We had dinner at the Italian restaurant with friends, it was one of the best Italian meal we've had. The best was the breakfast menu, so much to choose from. Overall the service and friendliness of the staff were outstanding. We enjoyed the; â€¦
title: Wonderful 20th Wedding Anniversary Celebration.

date post: Jason H wrote a review Apr 2019
text: Stayed at this hotel for 7 nights. Amazing service. The Plantstion Restaurant is a must. This hotel will not disappoint. This location is the best. Rooms are lovely Ammenities are fantastic. Service is very quick.
title: 6 star experience!!

text: Stayed at this Magnificent resort by accident really after usual place was booked out - Phenominla experience. Greeted by friendly, efficient staff who could not do enough to satisfy any request. The hotel is only new and is still under going work to a roof top restaurant. Due to be open in August 2015. The rooms are spacious and extremely well fitted out. Extra touches like mood lighting to rooms and under bed led lighting. Extremely well fitted out mini bar, bathroom accessories. This resort has a 120 metre lap pool encompassing the resort from one end to the other and is beach front. The in house italian restaurant is already rated among the best in Bali. The breakfast in this restaurant was to die for. Would stay there again in a flash cant speak highly enough of; â€¦
title: How can you review a hotel if you haven't stayed there?

text: Stayed for 7 days with a friend, on arrival we said we had landed in paradise. The rooms are amazing and pool area fantastic. But after the first night of very loud music coming from Cocoon next door till 11pm, then very, very loud music coming from the bar over the road till 6am, we were considering going back to the hotel we had just stayed at for 4 nights in Kuta. The next morning we discovered ear plugs in the amenities box and had to sleep with them every night till we left. We made friends with ladies around the pool who asked us if we were going to Happy Hour that night, they had a flyer in their room (we didn't get one) we met them at the Italian Restaurant at 6pm and discovered only us four and two other people were their also. Information from the hotel is very poor; â€¦

Stayed for 8 nights in late October/early November and would be back tomorrow if we could. From pick up at the airport to the in room check-in. From the hugely impressive suite with its heavenly bed, gorgeous balcony and sea views, to the trendy and well managed spa. From the excellent and friendly staff to the incredible "order ANYTHING" breakfasts. This hotel is just wonderful. Superb position, cool and trendy, beachfront, incredible rooftop bar, I could go on and on and ON!!! It was the perfect getaway for a couple needing some quality time. We won't stay anywhere else next time in Bali. Keep up the good work all you lovely peeps at Double Six!!!

Stayed here as a family of four for seven nights in December. We all loved this hotel and would definitely recommend it. We travel frequently and have visited Bali itself over twenty times and so I can say that the service, rooms, food and cleanliness here is as good as it gets. The hotel wasn't quite as large as I expected...which was a good thing, however the hotel rooms/suites themselves are very spacious and well appointed. The food at Seminyak Italian is great and the ala carte breakfast served there each morning is absolutely excellent. The spa is exquisite and has a wide range of treatments. The pool is big and despite the hotel being fully booked, we never experienced trouble getting sunbeds. The location is also great; on the Seminyak/Legian border. A bit of a hike; â€¦

Stayed here for 3 days with 2 kids (3yo & 8yo). Minimum facilities, additional USD50 for kids above 3, no grass field or playground for kids even 1sqm. Near the beach, room is clean, view facing wall, staff is attentive, breakfast on Wed & Sun are great, the rest is a la carte. Conclusion: too expensive for such facilities and totally not suitable for family vacation.

Stayed here for 4 nights in April 2019. The check-in system of doing it within your room is brilliant and feels very personal. The facilities of the hotel, pool, roof top, restaurants are all brilliant. Staff tried their best to be helpful and normally were, however we had a couple of issues which stopped us from rating this as 5/5. We were in a suite on the top floor and the A/C was not great, even on Maximum, the temperature never got below 25 degrees C. Coming from Hong Kong, we're used to the heat, but even we struggled to sleep. The staff tried to be accommodating, by giving us a different room but the rooms were either very loud (next to the beach clubs) or were damp inside. It was annoying as we had to explain the situation to multiple managers who didn't seem to pass; â€¦

Stayed here for 8 nights , the hotel is clean and busy ... But what a joke the service is .. Over 60 minute wait for cold food followed by cold toast 10 Minutes later to follow the food sent back to be cooked as requested ...one time you forgive but everyday you Rembrandt , it isn't cheap, they say 5 star .... So where is the service that you should have, people get up and leave ...they can't wait all day for food ... A joke !!!!
title: 6/6 FOR DOUBLE-SIX!!!!!

text: Stayed here for a week and was blown away by the attention to detail, from the check in carried out in our suite, to our personal butler who catered to our every need. This place exudes a 'yes we can attitude' and nothing is too much trouble. The restaurant, Seminyak Italian has a fantastic menu with well trained staff. The Rooftop bar is an incredibly well designed space which takes advantage of the setting sun. The pool and beach club are the envy of many. The staff are so genuinely engaging and interested in the guests, because that's exactly how the General Manager and Guest Relations Managers are. Well done to everyone at Double Six, thank you and we will definitely return.

Stayed here n November . Great location on the beach and close to good restarants Room was amazing and we were up graded which was lovely . However feel there is a few teething problems . I was there for 7 days and each day I found it hard to get a chair by the pool The pool guys were very accomadating mand did try there best At all times but there was just to many people and lack of chairs . At 9 00 am you could sit in the restarant over looking the pool and see most sun chairs all had been taken with towels on them but hardly any one in the pool .. This I find very annoying .. breakfast was not your normal buffet . Alcarte .. The food was ok but some mornings we waited over an hour for our breakfast and it was really very hot at times .. Bread was 3 choices white ,; â€¦
title: Outstanding

text: Stayed here to try while this place was getting built (some rooms are ready spa and gym ect aren't ready yet) This place is amazing, and it's going to be so much better once finished!! Like no luxury we've ever had and we always stay in nicer hotels. TV in front of the bath, use of hermes soaps/hair product, movie selection on tv. Complementary bar fridge that refills every day. Mood lights. List goes on! The staff couldn't do more for you, and I felt like they were very genuine and excited to look after us. Spoilt rotten. Felt like royalty. We came here with family (kids are teenagers) and they had a great time. Very good location too!! At the same time can't hear a thing in the rooms, must be sound proof! Can't wait to come again!!

date post: Lou P wrote a review Sep 2019
text: Stayed in the penthouse for two nights as a celebration and it was well worth it. The penthouse had two levels, first level for bedrooms and second level for entertainment area and balcony with jacuzzi. Amazing sunset views from the balcony as you are looking right over the beach. Breakfast was served in the main hotel restaurant with unlimited service. We got room service quite often as the food was very reasonable priced for a 5star hotel and we thought it was actually going to be more expensive. A negative thing to comment though is that we called at 11.02pm for a pizza and she said the pizza was unavailable as of 11pm, I thought that was a little silly, so we just had burger instead. I would strongly recommend to book the penthouse even just for one or two nights to; â€¦
title: SERVICE PERSONIFIED

date post: Sam Hardy wrote a review Feb 2020
text: Stayed seven nights at this hotel, lovely rooms with an ocean view which was great to wake up and sit on the balcony with a coffee in the mornings. Pool was great, hotel very clean and tidy, staff fantastic, restaurant food magnificent, ate at the Plantation Grill one night which also featured a Soprano singer strolling through the guest while they enjoyed their meals, nice touch, would highly recommend this hotel
title: Absolutely amazing

text: Staying at the Double-Six in a plunge pool room with butler service is an amazing experience. Services are impeccable, staff is warm and kind and professional at the same time. Facilities are outstanding, have a drink at the rooftop bar and watch the sunset. Plantation Grill restaurant serves delicious food. The vegetarian/vegan room service menu is the best I have ever seen and tasted. If I return to Bali I will certainly stay at the Double Six again.

date post: Samantha Z wrote a review Sep 2014
text: Superb rooms, facilities, pool and features such as good size balconies. Perfect aspect on the beach shaded by trees. Flawless staff and service. Fabulous roof-top bar, perfect for sunset. The big let-down is the filthy, foul smelling canal that runs behind the property directly into the sea. This means a real danger of dengue and other mosquito-borne diseases and staying in this area means constant vigilance to make sure every part of the body is covered by repellent. This gets to be a bit of a pain after a while. The owner/developer has many properties in the area and it would be in his interest to make a socially responsible commitment to the locals and guests to help clean up the canal. It's certainly do-able. One other mild criticism is the noise (and I mean noise!) of the; â€¦
title: WOW Factor!!!!

text: Thank you Double Six for making our holiday to Bali so memorable! When we first arrived our butler informed us that we had been upgraded from an Ocean Facing Leisure Suite to a Pool Access Leisure Suite. Now ...that was worth it! Our suite was stunning. It had a comfy king size bed, excellent bathroom amenities (one of the best we have ever encountered), big bath with a tv, mood lighting, excellent sound system (just plug your iphone into the speaker system and instant music) and modern decor with block out curtains. Whilst at the Double Six, we enjoyed everything that they had to offer - massages at the Aqua Perla Spa - they even let us pool our 15mins a day (which was included in our booking) into one big 90 min massage. Loved the massage and the experience of the day; â€¦
title: Perfect!!

text: Thank you for making our honeymoon special, thank you Dheeraj Bagai for the wine and the romantic dinner on the beach, we will remember our honeymoon forever. Special mention for the great breakfast i recommend for the future guests and honeymooners, the room with the ocean view is just fantastic, the tendant service of the room twice a day is very nice after a long day at the beach. In conclusion we had a great time in this hotel!

The amenities, service and all staff could teach a few new ways of providing outstanding service to a lot of hotels on the planet. from breakfast, to the team at the pool bar and the crew in the spa and each of the superb eateries in this hotel.... i tip my hat and congratulate the management team for putting together a group of caring individuals that meant nothing was too hard and the butler service was a great addition to the level of the overall experience. yes this is a beach front spot and having the water view allowed us to witness glorious sunsets. the beach here is not clean enough to swim. the sewer outlets are close by and the sand is black in spots and even when the waves roll over you can see the sludge and filth. put this hotel on a pristine beach with a beach; â€¦

The best service you could have, staff were friendly and tentative, careing always smiling, great facilities very clean and tidy hotel. We enjoyed food and friendliest breakfast staff (Linda) we will recommend Double Six to all friend's and Family. Thank you kindly
title: Absolutely great!

date post: Pieta F wrote a review Jan 2015
text: The best service! And the place is awesome! Cannot recommend highly enough! Upon arrival we were upgraded to poolside room. The rooftop bar, plantation grill and Italian restaurant were all top class! Not to mention the departure lounge they provided after check out!
title: Amazing!

text: The Double Six Luxury Hotel Seminyak ( BALI) is positioned just at the most central point to all amenities, restaurants, shops, shopping villages, a long stretch of beach with magnificent views, so breath-taking. The poor is extremely long and great for lap swimming or just relaxing and having a drink, food or cocktails. The staff and management go above and beyond the call of duty to make you feel so comfortable, happy and gain maximum return on your holiday investment. This hotel offers a variety of in-house restaurants, dining choices, room service with a 24 hour butler service. The bath tub was my ultimate relaxing task at the end of the day... The Double Six Luxury Hotel Seminyak ( BALI) is one of the finest, paramount hotels in Seminyak ( BALI) offering all; â€¦

date post: Dean G wrote a review Jul 2014
text: The Double Six Luxury Hotel was just that... luxury in every way! This new hotel which is situated next door to the Cocoon Club and where the old double six club once stood is truly amazing. We were upgraded to a bigger suite on arrival and treated like royalty. The staff and general manager did all they could to make sure our stay was the best it could be. We were traveling as a family of 4 (5 year old and 1 year old included). Beautiful breakfasts and always served with a smile. My children loved the staff and they treated them like they were part of the family, so kind and gentle and nothing was too much trouble. They have buggys ready to take you to the kids club at Breezes (one of their sister hotels) or to breakfasts and dinners at the famous Ku De Ta. Baby sitting; â€¦
title: Absolute luxury

date post: Sam B wrote a review Feb 2015
text: The Double Six was amazing. The minute you arrive where you are greeted by name by the concierge, given a quick tour of the resort by the manager and taken straight to your room. The staff are extremely friendly and very helpful especially at The Italian the hotel restaurant. The food at the Italian was the best we had during our stay and the order all you like breakfast was a highlight of our stay. The pool at the resort is huge and the pool staff are also very helpful when ordering drinks or food. The spa hydro trail is very unique and relaxing and even though that's not normally my thing I really enjoyed it. The rooftop bar is the best I've ever seen and if I didn't have my new born with I would have spent a lot more time there. The views are amazing and so is the snack food; â€¦
title: Definitely going back!

text: The Double Six was excellent from arriving and being given a personal tour of the facilities and our room to the roof top bar with it's amazing views. The staff were very, very attentive, couldn't do enough for you and were always happy and friendly. Eateries were amazing with selection and presentation. Also as a bonus to those of us who have to fly out late at night, there is an Owner's Lounge which you can use until pick up. It includes showers etc, complimentary drinks and allows you to use the facilities e.g. pool, restaurants until you need to prepare for departure. We have been to Bali many times and stayed in some wonderful hotels but we couldn't find fault with anything here.

date post: bec p wrote a review Jul 2014
text: The ease of the in room check-in, the luxuriously appointed 2br accommodation, butler service, luxury Hermes products, polite and helpful staff, a-la-carte breakfast, staffed gym, gorgeous steam room with bucket shower, amazing Aqua Perla Spa treatments to pamper yourself, absolute beachfront where you can sit by the pool and watch the waves crash onto the beach. This place is amazing! Would not recommend to travellers with young children. More suited to families with older teens and couples.
title: Wonderful Rooms, world class service, beautiful food!

date post: Michael M wrote a review Nov 2019
text: The hotel is amazing! - The staff were fantastic as were the restaurants and bars. We loved the rooftop bar and also happy hour at the lagoon bar by the pool. We ate at the Italian and the plantation grill, which I must say was up there with one of the best steaks Iâ€™ve ever eaten! Breakfast was always perfect. The Hotel is on the beach with beach access but the pool is so lovely itâ€™s hard to leave! We enjoyed the location - shopping in walking distance with nice restaurants and bars along the beach. Such a relaxing holiday so happy with our choice - we will definitely be back!
title: Fantastic Hotel in Beautiful Location

text: The hotel is beautiful, i feel a bit bad about 3 stars. Great pool, staff wonderful, and right across the street from the beach. Sit in the sand all day, then have a sunset dinner at any number of restaurants on the beach, reserve a spot at the hotel's roof restaurant, or hang out at the pool bar and have a chat about life with Adi. We will be back here for sure, and a longer stay next time. Enjoyed it very much. I want to give this place 5 stars, and the facilities most certainly deserve it, but the room layout isn't great. We went all out for a very large suite with direct access to the pool, it was not inexpensive. The layout of the room was horrible, and we won't do that again, not worth the money. The room door enters to the bathroom. Yup, you're standing in the; â€¦

date post: abdullah M Alghalib wrote a review Jan 2020
text: The hotel is beautifully presented and the rooms were lovely. The welcome/ departure lounge is a great idea. The food was nice and all the staff were accommodating and polite. The only drawback was the surroundings, which sadly were so noisy and the sound is at a all time high, even with doors closed. So it was not relaxing - but Iâ€™m sure it would appeal to students and party goers. It was a shame as the hotel and amenities were lovely. If I could add video you would be able to hear the level of noise. Also on another note- not everyone wants loud music round a pool .
title: Beautiful place

text: The hotel it clean, comfortable, and the staff are very accommodating. The highlight was the unlimited a la carte breakfast served in the mornings. Amazing food! Highly recommend this hotel to anyone!

The hotel was luxurious and clean. Staff were friendly and helpful. We could not fault this hotel. Centraly located for beach, restaurants and shopping. Plantation Grill and Sling Bar were our favorites. We will definitely be back.
title: Mr and Mrs D mifsud

text: The resort is in a great location, next to the beach, amazing views from your room and the pool area.The rooms are immaculate, spacious and comfortable. The breakfast is excellent and the welcome drinks are a treat. There's a 2 minute shuttle to and from the shops if you wish. Also plenty of restaurants on the beach to eat at. This is one of the more expensive places to stay but you get what you pay for.

The resort was amazing with staff and room being just perfect. The service was excellent, the food in the Italian restaurant was excellent and pool side service was fabulous too. We will definitely be back. Thank you to the Double Six for making our holiday just perfect
title: Next level amazing

text: The staff are beautiful,friendly people who cannot do enough for you, and always with a friendly smile. I felt like a Queen and didn't want to leave. The food was great, with super foods offered on the menu. I especially liked the a la carte breakfast. The spa was amazing, the view is amazing, the rooms are amazing. I loved this hotel.

The staff, the food, the rooms, the service, the pool. They all held first class quality. The ala carte breakfast was superb!! If you are looking for a fresh elegant hotel. This is it! You got access to Kuta Beach and if you wanna hang at the pool and sip great coqtails it's alright too :-)
title: First class hotel with excellent service

text: There are far better hotels to stay in at Seminyak. Hotel very noisy ,is not on beach but across the road therefore constant traffic noise. Pool area average . Room ok though had to leave door open due to damp musty smell so then had street noise & music from surrounding bars . Might suit younger people but if wanting quiet relaxing holiday I advise to choose elsewhere .
title: Luxury Hotel

date post: ricky f wrote a review Jan 2015
text: There is only one place to stay in Bali and its DoubleSix! Dheeraj and his team provide an experience which you will remember for a lifetime. The Rooftop for sunset cocktails looking over DbleSix beach is an experience to behold. Going over an above for there guests is an understatement....
title: Stayed 20 nights - overall very good but unlikely to return.

date post: Treat Me Sweet wrote a review Aug 2019
text: There isn't anything negative I have to say about this property. My room was spacious and comfortable, breakfasts are generous and cater for all tastes, the rooftop bar has 180 degree views of the beach, and the pool area is relaxing and well serviced. Staff are friendly and attentive, nothing is too much trouble. If you want a bit of luxury in a perfect beachfront location, I recommend Double-Six!
title: Best hotel in Bali

date post: Christine W wrote a review Jul 2014
text: There's certain things you expect when booking a 5 star resort but it is the extra details that really make something special and here they have nailed it! From the moment we checked in all the staff were amazing, some how it seemed like all the staff knew us by name including our little girl who was treated like a rock star the whole time! They offered to hold our youngest one while we ate and would dance and play with our older girl to give us a break so we could enjoy a meal. Truly amazing service that they should be proud of. The breakfast was amazing and so was every meal we ate there, so much better than your normal resort menu. Location great, pool amazing, I can't speak highly enough about this place. Once the rooftop area and the Plantation grill is completed it will; â€¦
title: A great place to go

date post: Giacomo H wrote a review Apr 2019
text: This beautiful hotel is right opposite the beach and well worth upgrading to an ocean view room. There is a butler service available, a choice of restaurants and a great pool. The rooftop bar affords a great ocean view
title: Roof-top bar is lush

text: This has to be the best hotel I have stopped in All staff are very helpful and friendly and made our stay fantastic This is the 2nd time we have stopped here And will be staying again Thankyou to everyone at the Double Six

date post: John H wrote a review Jan 2015
text: This hotel advertises 5 star, we would say 6 star. On arrival we were informed we had been upgraded to an ocean view room, what a start. 10 days of the friendliest loveable kind staff, food fabulous admenties fabulous, do yourself a favour and stay here!
title: Upmarket Offering - Fantastic Staff

text: This hotel delivers on everything it promises. From the in-suite check in on arrival until the owners lounge (if required) on departure it ticks all the boxes. The facilities are all excellent and the staff are a credit to the hotel. Nothing seems to be too much trouble and everything is done with a smile. The hotel has beautiful rooms which are kept incredibly clean and serviced twice daily. The pool is excellent and the Italian Restaurant serves breakfasts which everyone raves about and superb dinners in a great atmosphere. The new Plantation Grill restaurant is due to open in early December which will then offer another in hotel dining option. The hotel is also in the process of setting up a Beach Club directly opposite the pool area which will be perfect for people who may; â€¦

date post: Susan J wrote a review Oct 2014
text: This hotel has a lot in its favour - in particular, the fabulous restaurant which served us the best breakfasts that we had ever experienced. Well done to the chefs and staff - food and service was amazing. The hotel staff in general were very welcoming. The pool is a good size but the area around the pool was quite cramped; on a number of occasions there were no sunbeds available. The one thing overall that spoiled our stay was the fact that we had booked a hotel room with a plunge pool. (Seminyak side of hotel) - as a special luxury for ourselves - which turned out to be very disappointing. Reading the hotel information, there was no indication that these rooms backed on to a building site - where the hammering and drilling meant that we were never able to lie on the otherwise; â€¦
title: Beautiful stay at Luxurious Double Six.

text: This hotel has a lovely pool-110 meters long I believe and not too deep. Plenty of sun lounges and also an area that belongs to the hotel on the beach with lounges. The gym is well appointed. The breakfast is excellent- both the a la carte ( which I preferred and was very generous) and the buffet. The food at the Italian was nice- great place for dinner before the flight home!! The roof top bar has a lovely view for sunset drinks. We had an hour free flow - this was a limited menu but the staff were attentive and generous. All the hotel staff were delightful - they couldnâ€™t do enough for you. I had the beach facing room- so lovely to sit and enjoy the view. Check in was actually fun with the signature cocktail- check in can be a pest at some hotels as you just want to relax; â€¦

This hotel has very high standards regards cleanliness and there excellent staff always friendly and there to help. If I returned to Bali would definitely stay again! Rooms were spotless and huge.all public areas were cleaned regularly. Security at hotel was good. Missing this place already!! The only thing I would change would be breakfast needs to be in roof top bar every day as views and atmosphere much better as only available twice a week currently.

This hotel is by far the Best in Bali!!!! If your looking for ease, relaxation but close to the action, this is the place!!! The rooms are spacious and beautiful, the staff are amazing!!! Lovely big pool, lovely space on the beach to relax on comfy beds. The dining at the rood top bar is amazing!! The best views of sunset! Cocktails are so tasty! All reasonable price for the comfort and top quality service you receive! Special thank you to Yunita who was happy to help us take pictures and reccomend tasty cocktails! Also a Huge Huge thank you to Elainia (not sure spelt correct) at reception for all your help with check in & trying to get our bank card back! Highly reccomend this hotel!

This hotel is fab, great location, right on the beach, clean and the staff here really make the stay a perfect one, they are fast and officiant, very friendly and great with kids, we upgraded to a beach view which was lovely you have to pay extra on arrival for this, food was amazing specially the breakfast, did find drinks a bit expensive but all part of staying in this hotel, pool is beautiful with views of the beach, make sure and go up to the rooftop bar the views are breathtaking and visit the plantation restaurant the prawns are beaut.

date post: lauren t wrote a review Dec 2014
text: This hotel is lovely. We had two plunge pool rooms. The rooms were really gorgeous. The pool water never got warm so we only got in if it was super hot. They have no views and the upstairs rooms look into them so not really private. The staff were awesome and very helpful. There was no 'room information' so you have to use your butler which we never did (not really our style). Free Wi Fi was awesome and great for booking tours. The fridge was warm and had no way of making cold. Loved the coffee machine. Breakfast was great and lovely staff. Restaurant good and rooftop bar fun. Hotel a long way from central Seminyak shops and bars so taxi ride each time. Spa was amazing - must do even if not staying there.
title: Excellent Service!! Beautiful Room

date post: Kris M wrote a review Feb 2015
text: This hotel is truly amazing. Having stayed at many 5 star hotels the Double Six provides everything you could hope for. Great location, beautiful well appointed rooms, outstanding food and staff that are always smiling and happy to help. The Rooftop Bar is spectacular and a must see, as is the Plantation Grill. We can't wait for our next visit to Bali so we can return to the Double Six Resort!
title: Beautiful

date post: Loren P wrote a review Jul 2019
text: This hotel was outstanding! 1. Check in & check out We were offered an early check in when we turned up. When leaving, the flight was late & they put us up in a cozy ownerâ€™s lounge. 2. Service Just outstanding service. From the butler to the waiters, everyone was keen to make our stay nice. If you asked for one coffee, they came with many! 3. Location Spectacular location right on Seminyak beach. Views from the room were stunning. 4. The suite The ocean suite was splendid, spacious with coffee machine, 3 TVs, etc. The mood lighting was exceptionally nice. The balcony was great! 5. Facilities All excellent! Ã€ la carte breakfast was a pleasant experience. They even offered complimentary packing services. I canâ€™t recommend this hotel (esp the Ocean suite enough!)
title: Divine

text: This is a beautiful hotel with fabulous views of the ocean, just across the road from a great beach with fun bars & restaurants. We had a deluxe suite with a view of the pool & ocean which included a full breakfast. The Plantation Grill restaurant was excellent & the Sunset Rooftop bar is a lot of fun. Everyone is very helpful & service oriented. We would definitely recommend staying here.

date post: Karen Rudolph wrote a review Apr 2019
text: This is a fantastic hotel.From the moment we arrived till the moment we left, the service was the best we have ever experienced in a hotel and we are well travelled.We had a plunge pool room which was amazing.The butler service was superb.We will recommend this hotel to our friends and family. we also will be back :)Thank you to everyone at Double six.
title: Our Double Six Holiday

text: This is a great hotel and a great staff to match we could not fault anything or anybody during our stay at double six we had stayed there 12 months ago on a Manchester reunion When we arrived the manager Siverajoo welcomed us back with a genuine friendliness as got out of the taxi I have never experienced that at hotel I have stayed at The management and staff became more like friends with smiles and can do attitude. Breakfast at the Lagoon Restaurant was a la carte again a fantastic breakfast menu and staff overlooking the Ocean. Dinner at experience specialPlantation Grill in the hotel on several occasions was a delight with a great menu and maÃ®tre d in Derek and again staff always willing to make the . Roof top bar with Billy and Katana was a great welcome Cannot give this; â€¦

This is a great place to stay in Bali because of employees and the location. It starts at your arrival where they offer you a cocktail and a refreshing towel as welcoming. The staff was always courteous and friendly, always ready to help on what ever you need. The rooms are big and very nicely decorated, and the breakfast serves are very generous and full of variety. The in-house massages are performed by real professionals and on a beautiful dÃ©cor. The location is perfect, you just have to cross the road and you are on the beach and you are also very close to main shopping streets. They still haven't finished the full complex but it's already great and I am looking forward to go back when it will be done to see the improvements.

This is a lovely boutique hotel where you don't get lost as you would in a hug resort with a larger number of rooms. Unfortunately, we were involved in an accident in the hotel on our first night. However, we were so amazed at the attention, support and service the hotel Management and staff gave us through this incident and for the remainder of the week. Nothing was too hard for them. The accommodation was excellent, the location amazing and the service outstanding. We cannot fault our stay and time at this lovely establishment and the culture it has created for its customers. We will be back!!

This is a new hotel with a very modern minimalist feel. The reception on arrival was amazing and we were shown directly to our room for check in. We had been upgrade to a pool side suite which was incredible. All the facilities in the room and bathroom were first class . The hotel staff could not have been more helpful. Breakfast (included ) is a al carte with a wonderful selection. The restaurant is on the first floor and overlooks the pool beach and ocean. The hotels location is excellent being beach front and close to shops restaurants etc.
title: Magical Double Six â˜ºï¸

date post: Deepal S wrote a review Dec 2019
text: this is a pure blue blood luxury resort ,with fine service excellent food and cuisine delivered at the highest standard luxury room great dining and pool very knowledge team and a great GM who is always on call with his guest beter then the branded properties i have visited
title: Great hotel right on the beach!

text: This is a trendy beach front hotel. Our 8th trip to Bali and we had just come from the Grand Nikko Club at Noosa Dua so our expectations had been set pretty high. The staff fall over themselves to be friendly and helpful. The suites are a fantastic size and you can sit out on your balcony and watch the world go by, the ocean roll in and listen to a kaleidoscope of music competing for 1st place from late afternoon to around midnight. They have a trendy rooftop bar which offered some tasty snacks and gives you great views over seminyak. You have to be very careful, the main design flaw in the hotel is that it is not disability friendly and there are steps that are hard to see on the pool side entrance and main entrance. People have to constantly be told to mind the step.; â€¦

This is a very modern and luxurious hotel. But when booking, make sure you are not allocated a City Facing Room or any room on the Legian/Kuta side wing of the hotel. On arrival, we were allocated a fabulous Ocean Facing room with a very large balcony on the Legian/Kuta side and were initially very excited by the luxury and size of the room. However, there are a number of bars in the vacinity including the Cocoon Club as well as local sea-side bars that play loud music well into the night on most nights. We arrived on a Saturday night and the Cocoon Club had loud thumping music playing well into the night. On the 2nd and 3rd night, we experienced fireworks and very loud live bands and 'techno' music from the bars opposite (until nearly 2am on the third night) and by that; â€¦
title: Enjoyed our stay

text: This is a wonderful place to stay, it has everything going for it. The location is perfect, close to shopping and restaurants, right across from the beach, where as well as the pool, you have private beach access. The rooms are beautifully appointed, very modern, the pool area is very relaxing, with staff in attendance to cater for your every whim. The breakfast is the best I've had anywhere in my travels and is served overlooking the pool and ocean. The rooftop bar is stunning as are the views, and the restaurants serve scrumptious food. I use the gym, which is fully equipped, with all the latest workout machines. I have stayed here twice, returning in August and booked again for next year, you can't beat it!

This is my fourth stay at Double Six and I must admit that hotel is getting better and better and always exceeded my expectations in terms of service and food .. Service is excellent and nearly 6 star and the breakfast alacarte is to die for... Oh I forgot - spa is amazing and make you sleep during the treatment Last but not the least - tell he staff if you need anything and they will make it possible for u quickly.. I will be back soon... Justin

This is our 5th visit. We stayed in Ocean view suite, 518. The room is huge and well appointed with an amazing view. The facilities are great: huge pool, lounges always available. Great spa at a fair price. Good gym. Breakfast brilliant. Very cool Rooftop bar which people come to from far and wide to enjoy sunset.
