Not cheap, but well priced for a 5 star hotel on the beach with great service.
title: An impeccable Holiday Stay

date post: Katie W wrote a review Mar 2020
text: This is our 6th stay at Double Six Seminyak. Every time we arrive we are greeted with family friendly faces, and our experience over the last 6 years has been an experience. Service improving every time and excellent security and such as safe place to stay. Beautiful staff, friendly and awesome location. The roof top breakfast are to die for, and love having a cocktail at the grill cocktail bar. Food always amazing.
title: It just gets better every stay!

text: This is our second stay a year apart , from when you leave your transport to the end of your stay itâ€™s close to perfect,staff are great nothing seems to be to much trouble,pool side food is excellent other resorts could learn from , noise from beach bars dies out at ten , really not a issue, this is my wifeâ€™s happy place go and enjoy

This is our third stay at this Hotel. Once again, the experience from check in until check out was a pleasurable one. I take my hat of the the Management of this Hotel who clearly work hard to ensure the standards of the premises and staff are consistent with a luxury experience. Since our first visit three years ago, this place continues to impress. We had a second floor room overlooking the beach. I have read other reviews from similar rooms that have complained about the music coming from the beach bars. We actually quite enjoyed it and feel it adds to the experience. The music does not usually go beyond 10 or 11 p.m. and the hotel does provide earplugs if it is an issue for you. The quality of room and amenities was as usual top notch and the bed was probably the; â€¦
title: 6 nights in this glorious place

date post: Hugh M wrote a review Jun 2019
text: This is the 2nd visit to Double Six, we chose what room we wanted this time and we were not disappointed. Fabulous access to the pool. The food in all areas is excellent from the pool area to the fine dining,
title: Top hotel in Bali...Book it NOW

text: This Luxury hotel is amazing! I stayed 3 nights, the rooms with amenities are beautifully set out. Twice a day room cleans and amenities top ups. Wet bag, laundry bag and even thongs provided if you forgot to pack them! The level of care and attention to detail by the staff, from the concierge to the pool staff is second to non. Amazing roof top bar and Plantation grill is def worth a look. Double six beach is literally out the front of the hotel,(100mtrs). They have afternoon entertainment from the beach bars with Bean bag setups, all ready to enjoy the arvo sunset. You wont be disappointed.

This place goes above and beyond! The breakfast itself is worth the nightly charge it's the most unbelievable food I have tasted not some dirty stale buffet it's freshly cooked to your order! The cafe granita is a must! Pool is amazing and it's 10m from the beach where u can lay on bean bags and watch the sunset, it I'd rather pricey for bali but you pay for what get

This place is amazing! The plunge pool room was fantastic and the staff were great! I have just finished reading the negative reviews and realised that most of the people writing them were professional complainers who wanted to stay for free. The butler service is awesome, and the chief butler is a wonderful, extremely helpful lady. My only complaint would be that the gym is WAY too hot and no matter how hard we tried, we couldnâ€™t turn the temp down either in there nor in our room (the room was comfortable enough). Buffet breakfast is Sunday and Wednesday mornings, and half price cocktails on Thursday evenings (the cocktails and views are outstanding from the rooftop bar!!) DEFINITELY STAY HERE IF YOU GET THE OPPORTUNITY!!
title: Amazing Hotel and Staff

text: This place is everything you can imagine & more. The staff, the location, the rooftop bar, Seminyak Italian Restaurant, the pool, breakfast, the list goes on. This luxury hotel has found a niche all of its own. Nothing is too much trouble. The staff are genuinely interested & engaging. The GM & Guest Relations Manager make you feel very special & are always enquireing if your stay i going well. the butlers, valets, pool guys & bar staff are so efficient & friendly. If you are after a holiday experience of a lifetime then Double Six Luxury Hotel is for you. Thank you to everyone at Double Six for an absolutely unforgettable holiday. Can't wait to go back.
title: Still needs work from management

text: This place was amazing with all the staff so friendly and helpful they couldnt do enough for you. Had a ocean view room and it was lovely to sit out and watch the sun set every afternoon. The room was beautiful and clean.

This property blew us away from the moment we arrived... super friendly, helpful and attentive staff, amazing breakfasts, stunning and spacious rooms, Beautiful pool area, elegant Plantation Grill Restaurant with melt in the mouth meals.. the list goes on. Thank you so much to all the staff for making our holiday an amazing one! We hope to come back again :-)
title: Amazing layout and Creature comforts

text: This property is perfectly situated, has great views to the beach and has a fantastic pool. The stand-out for us at this property was the exceptional service by their friendly, attentive staff. We were treated like royalty, and they genuinely were happy to help with any request. The pool and lagoon bar staff were awesome, and were always so happy to help with towels, pool chairs and drinks. The â€œall you can eat, A La Carte breakfastâ€ was awesome, and the rooms felt really luxurious. The bed is probably the most comfortable bed I have ever slept on! We absolutely loved our 7 night stay, and we would definitely stay here again. Thank you so much to the team at Double-Six for making our stay so enjoyable.
title: Amazing first class hotel

text: This really is a wonderful hotel. Firstly the staff were outstanding, from the day we first arrived to the day we left we were truly spoilt. Nothing was too much trouble. The breakfast every day amazing. The Plantation Grill is one of the best restaurants you are every likely to visit. The food was outstanding. Unfortunately we only visited the rooftop bar once and it was very quiet. The views are stunning. This was our first visit but we will definitely be back. From the managers down each and everyone of you made our holiday perfect. Thank you

This resort is by far the most amazing i've every been to in my life. After a 15 hour flight all the way from Amsterdam we arrived late evening. Greeted by the wonderful Clara at front office. She took us on a tour and explained everything in the resort. The suite with private pool was amazing. With a butler on call 24 hours the luxury was completed. The private beach part with the beds and service or a day at the pool with staff so friendly and there for all questions is unbelievable. Quickly in the nice shopping streets in front and behind or to the famous beach clubs all is within 30 minutes of the resort. The breakfast every morning with an amazing view and the sun roof bar for the sunset. It is a shame that the roof top bar is empty after sunset. The bar is beautiful and; â€¦
title: A bit of a let down

text: This review begins at the Departure Lounge! Never, ever have I experienced such a warm feeling of attention when departing a hotel. I almost changed my mind and stayed another few nights! The Departure Lounge which is incredibly generous in size & comfort ,offers refreshments, snack foods and service - provides massage recliner chairs (similar to those in Business Class on a 'plane) TV and an atmosphere of calmness - all with no charge to the guest. I thought the Arrival procedure was incredible when I was warmly greeted by professional, immaculately groomed staff and ushered through to the pool area while my luggage was taken directly to my room. No big desk with tired travellers waiting in line for service - boring - gone at Hotel Double Six. I was totally captured on; â€¦
title: Double Six is the whole package

text: This review is a little late but our family of four (2 boys aged 14 & 10) stayed here for 7 nights at the end of September 2014. For a start, we arrived and were upgraded to a beautiful 2 bedroom ocean view suite, having booked a city view room on Luxury Escapes. We were blown away, the suite was amazing. We were concerned about the noise after having booked, with 2 children, but early requests for a quiet room were fulfilled. The ocean view room we stayed in was brilliant, overlooking the pool & beach, the balcony was the biggest we had come across at a hotel. The suite itself was massive with free wifi, the biggest bath I had ever seen & numerous other things that added to our lovely stay. We enjoyed the pool & all the hotels facilities. The spa treatments we had were very; â€¦
title: Believe the hype!!!

text: This was my first international holiday with my daughter. The staff were very friendly & respectful. We were lucky enough to have a ground floor pool access room (106). The room and grounds were very well maintained. The Italian restaurant - food, in one word YUM (Loved Jamie's Minute steak). Staff - All the staff were very accommodating when it came to modifying the menu (as I can't eat fish) The Acqua Perla Spa - Thank you for such a relaxing and enjoyable time. The Pool - Chrystal clear & beautiful. The hotel is with in walking distance to a number of market stalls and is also directly opposite the beach. where there is plenty of ways to entertain your self Beach front bars,surf lessons etc. Hopefully we can make it back again & try out the new bar & grill once that has been; â€¦
title: Jewel of the beach strip

text: This was my second 10 day visit to the Double Six and apart from the stunning rooms the staff here make you feel very special. I would like to make extra mention of beautiful Lina the best concierge in Bali and Clara for her cheeky smile and sense of fun. I will be back next year!!!

This was our 3rd stay at Double Six Hotel - is the best hotel we have stayed at in Bali - rooms are luxurious - nothing is too much trouble for the staff to may your stay enjoyable. Breakfast options are amazing and the introduction of twice weekly buffet is a wonderful opportunity to sample a wide range of cultural cuisines. Special mention for the friendly Muliati who went beyond expectations in assisting us with our needs. Fanatstic position - we will certainly stay there again
title: Double six

date post: Lynda B wrote a review Nov 2019
text: This was our first short trip to Bali and wanted to stay in a beautiful hotel right on the beach with beach views and this hotel delivered it all. Our room was just amazing and the view was just fantastic & the sunsets are extra special. The hotel is awesome in every way! The staff were beautiful & friendly. The food at the Italian restaurant was very tasty, unfortunately didn't get time to eat at the Plantation Grill restaurant and that is a must do for our next visit. The rooftop bar is amazing the sunsets are out of this world as was the view from our balcony over looking the pool and beach. Happy hour at the Lagoon Bar by the pool was a must do. Breakfast was always perfect and the buffet breakfast twice a week at the rooftop bar is just amazing! The hotel is located right; â€¦
title: REST AND RELAXATION

text: This was our third stay here and it was an absolute dream stay. From the moment we arrived we were treated like VIPs. It made no difference that we were on a special package deal, the hotel staff and management value that you are a return customer and reward you for that. Our room was beautiful, luxurious, well equipped and no detail was left wanting. Rooms are serviced twice daily and the turn down service ( though not something we feel a necessity for us) was nevertheless a lovely touch down to the foot mat by the bed. All staff from meet and greet, entrance, buggy, front desk, restaurant, bars, poolside and cleaning ( and any I forgot to mention!) are absolutely amazing and go above and beyond to make you feel valued. Nothing is too much and as I mentioned before make each; â€¦

date post: Guy R wrote a review Sep 2019
text: This was the best hotel I have stayed at yet. Such a great atmosphere all around and the people are so lovely and go out of their way to make you feel very welcomed and make sure you have all that you need during your stay. Definitely will come back here and stay longer! Such great views with having the beach just in front and the poolside area is just stunning, could spend all day here. The aqua spa was so clean and fresh and the gym has plenty of equipment for your workout! The sunsets are amazing from this hotel ðŸ˜Š
title: Double Six Hotel Seminyak - Still ticking all the boxes.

text: This week we have the pleasure to stay at what they call a luxury resort.THEY WERE RIGHT. Can't believe our luck. We are staying with friends who are in a pool side room. We have enjoyed their company and the hotel. Today was my husbands birthday which we celebrated with the help of our wonderful Max the man at the front desk. Nothing was too hard for him to try and organise thus we had dinner at the excellent Italian restaurant. Our waiters Praba Wati did everything in her power to make this night memorable she is a treasure KEEP HER! In our room we had a surprise of a happy birthday desert. Enjoyed by all. That's not all. The vouchers that we received on our arrival have surpassed any of our expectations. Treated like kings and queens. It doesn't happen very often; â€¦
title: Close to perfect!

text: Thoroughly enjoyed our 7 nights here. Suite was spacious and very pleasant. Bathroom excellent. Staff very helpful. Breakfast amazing. I have run out of superlatives for this hotel. Hoping we return soon.
title: Great potential - but be honest!!

date post: Pieter a wrote a review Oct 2019
text: To all the Staff at Double-Six, You have been so kind to us. From the moment we arrived we felt right at home.Our introduction to the hotel and our room was done by Ima and Wah Yu. They are both true professionals at their jobs. Amy from housekeeping deserves to be mentioned. Again, professional, kind and courteous. In fact you all were. Loved the Sunset Bar for spectacular views, cocktails and upbeat decor. And the Plantation Grill, stunning decor, food and service. Thank you Nigel and Team. Massages were wonderful. Thank you for a truly memorable stay
title: A truly marvelous experience - flawless

text: To the wonderful double six hotel and staff, I would like to take this opportunity to thanks all the wonderful staff each and everyone of you no matter which department or restaurant staff . You all done a great job and effort , I feel the warm welcome and respect from the from desk once I check in the hotel , thank you for letting me to check in early as per request although the check out only can be donâ€™t the lastest I can at 1pm . During my stay on 22-25th May 116room at the luxury pool access ocean , I really feel so comfortable and relax, how I wish I could stay longer! No words can really explain how much I love your place! Double six hotel youâ€™re bless to have such wonderful and courtesy staff in your team . I really appreciate everything you have done for the little; â€¦

Today our young daughter fell by the pool (her own fault) and hurt herself to the point that we were worried she had broken her leg. The staff were brilliant. Their kindness and professionalism were simply stunning, and they were incredibly reassuring. I was waiting to write about how super special the hotel is, but I think it even more important to highlight how super special the people at Double-Six are. Thank you, thank you, thank you.

Trendy, Fabulous, with world class service and amenities to top are the amazing staff, always ready to help and assist you ...accessible to everything (Shopping, restaurants, Pubs, BEACH). It made my Bali Vacay this year unforgettable.

Truly amazing. My husband 23 yr old daughter and myself went for drinks before going else where for dinner. It is just beautiful and certainly worth even one drink up there just for the atmosphere. Drinks aren't cheap for Bali but you do pay just for the experience. Service was wonderful and the view is fantastic. I must if you don't mind spending a bit of money.
title: Hard to fault......simply stunning

date post: Elizabeth Q wrote a review Nov 2014
text: Unfortunately I haven't had the pleasure of staying at the Double Six (yet!!!!) but I was lucky enough to inspect the hotel as part of my job over the weekend. Pure luxury is the phrase that comes to mind when I think of the Double Six. The work and effort that has gone in to this incredible resort is mindblowing, the staff are just wonderful, the rooms are exquisite, the pool area is amazing and the rooftop bar/area boasts the best view in Bali!! Please do yourselves a favour and have a meal at Seminyak Italian Food, amazing meals and awesome atmosphere. I would have no hesitations recommending the Double Six to my clients, I will most definitely be staying here on my next Bali trip! Thanks Kiki and Ega for showing us around this stunning property!
title: Nicest resort I have stayed at....

date post: Jade Jaggle wrote a review Feb 2020
text: Upon arrival the concierge immediately grabbed our luggage to be delivered to our before we even got to the room. We were allowed to wait in a private waiting area off of the lobby and have a few beverages before our room was ready. When they took us to our room, I was truly in awe. Spacious and spa like - huge bathroom and bedroom area. And the welcome beverage complete with smoking dry ice and a moist towel to freshen up with was just over the top. The next 4 days we were there was met with beautiful weather - amazing spa treatments - wonderful breakfasts and dinners and a super relaxing pool area. The bed was more comfortable then my bed at home and the staff was exceptional at bringing us extra ice and waters. I can't say enough good things about this hotel. The; â€¦
title: Amazing as always!

text: Very nice hotel, pool is fantastic as with the rooms could joy fault, breakfast was excellent and the staff were friendly and welcoming. Being a short walk of taxi to most amenities of Saminyak, I would highly recommend to stay as we will be back

date post: Mike V wrote a review Nov 2014
text: Very nice new hotel with a first class fit out and huge rooms and lovely bathroom. Nice outlook to the beach and just a little road in front with mainly motorbikes on it. Luckily it was hot but being on the beach had a nice breeze all of the time. Restaurant/breakfast staff sweet but not particularly efficient. Certainly not the standard of a five star hotel but friendly and helpful when asked for something. Just not big on initiative. Noise: yes if you are away from Cocoon that is good but you do get the 3 different music types coming at you from the restaurant, cocoon and the beach band. It seems to all go off at about 1030pm though and is not overly loud. No room would avoid all 3. Taxis: Get concierge to order a bluebird taxi for you and wait at the hotel. On the; â€¦
title: The best service I have ever experienced

text: Very nice place! Located right on the beach. We had a room overlooking the ocean. The breakfasts were delicious and we had lunch and dinner at the beach restaurants. The area around is busy but in fact, if you donâ€™t plan to go anywhere, just stay at the hotel and relax on the beach, this is a great place!
title: Best hotel in Bali!

text: Visited the roof top bar for sunset drinks. The decor is tropical, although Palm trees are fake, modern and fresh with private booths for small groups situated along the perimeter for optimum view of the sunset and the coastline. These booths have a minimum spend of $90!!!!!! The staff were friendly, attentive and helpful. the drinks prices were premium and I would expect at these prices to be offered a glass with my beer or at least a stubby cooler. Also with drinks at these prices I think we should not be charged expensive service tax on top. that was a definite negative, especially when Beers were more than double the price of other places, so be warned, tax, tax tax!!
title: Converted.....

date post: Alex S wrote a review Aug 2014
text: We (family of 4) stayed a week ago for 10 nights at the double six. We had a lovely holiday in Seminyak. All of the staff are geniunely friendly and helpful. We had an oceanview family leisure suite, which had plenty of room. We loved the a la carte breakfast, pool, spa,and we had the best weather :) The ocean breezes were beautiful. The butler service was fantastic, all of the girls in reception so lovely, and we had 2 day trips in one of the hotel small vans which were terrific. Thankyou to all of the staff at Double Six Luxury Hotel for helping to make our holiday so lovely! :)
title: Pure indulgence and excellent Italian food

text: We (My Wife & two daughters aged 22 & 21) recently spent 7 awesome nights at Double Six Luxury Hotel & just loved every minute of our stay there. The moment we arrived at this Hotel we were greeted by Gedy he gave us his card & told us to contact him if we had any problems but of course "we did not". I would like to thank him again for our "awesome upgrade to room 405. What a awesome room, huge balcony over looking the pool & beach,loved the music from the Cacoon Club.The a-la-carte breakfast is of high quality & delicious, also we ate dinner at the Italian restaurant nearly every night & that was also of high quality & amazing taste. The rooms are "awesome" the best we have ever stayed in!!. We had our privacy & so did the girls, as the rooms are spacious & luxurious,the beds &; â€¦
title: Luxury without a soul

date post: Terry S wrote a review Jan 2015
text: We absolutely loved this hotel. Best service, very friendly staff, amazing location. We didn't even want to leave the hotel, other than cross the small service road in front of the hotel to get to the bar on the beach for drinks and an amazing acoustic band. The rooms are huge, the bed is extremely comfortable, there is a great lounge to snuggle up and watch movies at night time, perfect for honeymooners like us! You can hear the music at night but it didn't bother us in the slightest because we really liked the music that was being played! The bathroom is huge, very clean, modern and new. The spa and gym facilities are fantastic, we had a 1 hour balinese spa and we were in heaven. We cannot fault this hotel and have already recommended it to our friends and family. We are; â€¦
title: Best hotel ever

date post: Debbie A wrote a review Oct 2014
text: We are fortunate to have had a holiday at Double Six Hotel and from the moment we arrived in Bali at the Airport we have been treated exceptionally well. We were greeted at reception and taken directly to our room that has a breath taking views of the beach and a wonderful sunset. Management and our butler explained the depth of facilities and features on offer and processed our paperwork. Our room has direct access to the pool. The food has been of such a high standard and the Italian food on offer is fabulous considering my family is of Italian background. The internet service that I need to access regularly for our work has not faulted once. The AFL Grand Final was celebrated at the roof top bar that overlooks the Indian Ocean with heaps of televisions set up to view the; â€¦
title: Most amazing stylish resort imaginable!

text: We are from Melbourne and booked for 12 days. We have 3 boys 11,17,18. The rooms were impeccably clean and new. We stayed in double rooms on the 4th floor and later in one of the penthouses on the 5th floor. Both sets of rooms were great. The penthouse is something that one must experience at least once in their life. The staff and management were caring and very professional, we could not have asked for more.The breakfasts are something to look forward to with the chefs able to concoct a delicious themed (by country) breakfast treat in a short time. Our boys tried a new style every morning before settling on a favorite. My wife was partial to the Japanese breakfast. I was happy with good old bacon and eggs. The beach is just across the road and is quite safe, I hired the local; â€¦
title: Another five star gourmet restaurant is born in Bali -Plantation Restaurant - 66 Hotel

text: We are only into day 2 of our 8 day stay but feel it doesn't get any better than this and want to rave already. On arrival we were upgraded to an ocean view room. The suite is large, well planned and comfortable. A huge balcony overlooks the pool and ocean, friends are staying in a pool side room with direct access to the pool - this may be perfect for families with pool loving (and good swimmers) in their family. Personally we love being a little higher. Access to the beach is excellent,, restaurants and shopping are all within a small radius. Breakfast. I am not a huge fan of buffets as we seemingly fill up our plates with a multitude of food varieties that don't go together and often you find yourself hungry in an hour. The choice here is a la carte and caters for every; â€¦
title: 6 Star!!!!

text: We are two guys from the UK on day four of our honeymoon and feel that we need to publish our review before our trip finishes. From the moment we were picked up from the airport by Yogi we knew we were in for something special. We were met with a member of staff who explained how the hotel worked and then completed the check in in our room. We were served cocktails in our room and the hotel had flowers and cakes to welcome us on our honeymoon.....great gesture and thank you so much for that. This hotel is fantastic, the staff go out of there way to help you and they are a credit to the hotel. Breakfasts are amazing with so many choices. The hotel location right on the beach is superb, the pool and roof top terrace are amazing......make sure you do the terrace on a Thursday; â€¦
title: Amazing

text: We Arrived at Double Six just as the world started to close down due to Covid19. We couldnâ€™t have been in better hands. While we were anxious about what was happening (and how weâ€™d get home), we were still able to have a wonderful time. The hotel staff must have had their own anxieties but they never allowed them to impact how they were with their guests. Nothing was too much trouble and they were all super friendly and Iâ€™m very grateful to them for that. The hotel is superb. Bedroom suites are fantastic and extremely clean and comfortable. The restaurants and bars are excellent and weâ€™ve never had better breakfasts. The location is great too. We didnâ€™t get to see much if Bali due to the circumstances but we will be back and we will hopefully stay at the Double Six; â€¦
title: Loved this place, terrible room layout

text: We arrived to our room to a gorgeous fruit cocktail & met with our butler who explained all the services they offered during our stay. Our room was very spacious with a very large stunning bathroom. Bed super king & pillows exceptionally comfy From the moment we arrived we were very welcomed by all the friendly staff, nothing was too much trouble, clothes picked up for drying,bottled water readily available Breakfast was surely a highlight,fantastic a la carte menu every morning,loads of variety,coffee great. Plantation Grill resturant outstanding ! food divine, great service, fantastic ambience,excellent music highly recommend a visit if you get the chance Rooftop bar awesome view,good vibe & first class breakfast served every Sunday Would definitely revisit again Great having; â€¦
title: A wonderful 50th wedding anniversary

date post: Owen R wrote a review Aug 2019
text: We booked an adjoining room for 2 adults and 2 kids. We ended up in level 5 in very nice rooms. The 24x7 butler is a nice treat. Included breakfasts were great - especially on the buffet mornings. The beach across the little road was great and the special hotel area a nice touch. Security was good, hotel restaurants good and we couldn't fault the hotel service. We hadn't taken the kids to Bali before and it had been about 18 years since we were there and Double Six was perfect to encourage us back.
title: Impressive hotel with everything you need

text: We booked the Family Suite which consists of 1 main bedroom with very spacious bathroom, 1 living room and 1 smaller room with twin beds with smaller bathroom + a very large balcony with a beautiful view of the ocean & the very large swimming pool. It was a pleasant experience for us to stay at the hotel. The services were good, the breakfast was nice, the welcomed drinks by the pool were various, tasty n fresh.
title: Loved it and smitten

text: We booked the Family Suite which consists of 1 main bedroom with very spacious bathroom, 1 living room and 1 smaller room with twin beds with smaller bathroom + a very large balcony with a beautiful view of the ocean & the very large swimming pool. It was a pleasant experience for us to stay at the hotel. The services were good, the breakfast was nice, the welcomed drinks by the pool were various, tasty n fresh.
title: Loved it and smitten

text: We booked this hotel to get pampered and have a nice relaxing family holiday. The room was nice and also the 24 hr butler service which came with it. The breakfast is twice a week buffet and the rest a la carte. It was nice except Eggs Benedict, which is served inside a massive bread roll. Hardly anybody finished it, as the bread content was overwhelming. However, Bali is getting really busy and the music from nearby bars was competing against each other and blasting straight in to the room every night until late. On top of it the management decided the best thing ever is to turn the pool music on at 7 m. So, you are paying $100 extra for the ocean view room to be exposed to the constant noise. They even have ear plugs in their vanity kit as obviously we weren't the first ones; â€¦
title: Seminyaks best hotel experience.

date post: Melissa A wrote a review Sep 2019
text: We came here for a week on advice from our travel agent as wanted somewhere nice to celebrate an anniversary. The facilities are great but the service/staff were tops. The breakfasts especially the buffet were out of this world and the owners lounge when we left was great. I recommend this place for the traveller who wants something special. Thank you for making our celebration so much better
title: Best hotel in Seminyak

date post: Lisa L wrote a review Jul 2019
text: We came here for the last night during our honeymoon. It was such a great experience, we loved this place! When we stepped out of the taxi we were immediately approached by the manager who explained us where breakfast, spa or rooftop bar is (during this time our luggages were taken to our room), all the good to know things. Than he showed us our room and told us that our butler will arrive in a couple of minutes with our welcome drinks. (Which looked really great!). Our butler was really kind, told us to reach out for him 0-24 if we would need anything. Actually we needed ironing for a shirt for the dinner and he helped immediately. The rooftop bar is huge and has a unique atmosphere, really worth a try. The pool area is really nice, being taken care of. The breakfast is; â€¦
title: Mrs Lisa Luxa

text: We came to Double Six to celebrate my husbandâ€™s 40th birthday. From the welcome lounge, to the welcome drinks, in room Check-in to the personal butler, this was such a great experience! The hotel management team went to special effort to make my husbandâ€™s welcome even more special with fresh flowers and birthday cake! They explained everything so well. The hotel is very clean and they have made every effort to make the room very comfortable. The restaurantâ€™s in this hotel is top notch. We enjoyed a romantic birthday dinner for my husbands birthday. The breakfast options that vary every morning is also great. The hotel is situated quite central at the beach with great views every morning for breakfast and also near other restaurants and shopping area. The staff is very friendly; â€¦

We came to stay here in a leisure suite (2 adults 2 teenage boys) for 6 nights in July 2014. It is in an interesting spot and will probably be pretty good when its finished - but it still has a way to go! And even when it is finished it will still be on a section of beach right next to and down wind/current of a pretty grubby open outfall and opposite very noisy beach warungs. Double 6 is still associated with and inhabited by pool party dance clubs, event though this hotel replaced the most famous of them. On arrival we learned that the hotel was still in the process of being built and that the rooftop lounge, bar and pool was not opened and not likely to be until at least the end of August. There had been no obvious warning of this at any stage before arrival although on; â€¦
title: Excited about staying

date post: Trish S wrote a review Oct 2019
text: We decided to spend our family holiday at Double Six for 12 nights. Best decision ever!!!! Our arrival welcome was personal and we were treated like royalty. Our 2 bedroom leisure suite was exceptional, clean, open, airy and always stocked with whatever we needed. The facilities were amazing, the staff were friendly, polite and went out of their way to make our stay PERFECT. They were always smiling and welcomed you each day as if it was the first time they were meeting you. Maylina, you were our angel. Always greeting us with your beautiful smile, always going out of your way to organising a taxi for us and making sure it was on time . Marx, you are an absolute gentleman, always willing to suggest a restaurant and asking us what we thought the day after. Mattie and all the; â€¦
title: Amazing

date post: Jenny C wrote a review Jun 2019
text: We enjoyed a 12 night stay in this wonderful resort. It was our 10th trip to Bali, we have stayed in some beautiful resorts before but Double Six has been the best so far. This hotel strives to be individual. It was modern with no hint of the traditional Balinese architecture or regular music. It was unique & different for Bali. I thought it was a pleasant change!! The location was perfect, the buggy service we found very useful & the drivers were always so happy! Daily breakfast was great, the juices were the best. Our room was on the 4th floor, with amazing views along the coast & overlooking the brilliant pool. The Ownersâ€™ Lounge clinched the stay for me, a wonderful hub to relax on your last day. What a marvellous idea! ALL staff were polite, friendly & professional. The; â€¦
title: Birthday holiday

date post: Joseph J wrote a review Oct 2019
text: We enjoyed every little second staying at double six. The staff make sure we had the best holidays ever. Being vegan food is always limited but not at double six! Many many options. That was definitely Vegans heaven!
title: Double Six - Doubly Great

text: We experienced the very best service & pampering during our 9 nights at this stylish resort. They have set a very high bar for others to step up to in Seminyak, actually for anywhere in Bali as this is a awesome " experience" from the time you arrive, everything has the wow factor! breakfast was delish, I couldn't wait to try different choices each morning. The Italian Restaurant was also very special, I could go on & on, the music was fantastic giving an ambience that set the mood for a great night out, it's very stylish & cozy! The resort is beautiful to be in, a lot of effort has gone into all the little details that make a holiday extra special, everything from the funky clear thongs ( beats wearing slippers) through to the range of products in the bathroom. We arrived a; â€¦
title: Absolute modern luxury by the beach

text: We had 7 nights at this great hotel. The staff were always smiling and very helpful. The food in the restaurants was excellent and the spa treatment was very relaxing. But the extra special addition was on our 50th wedding anniversary we received flowers and tasty little cakes in our room after we returned from a swim. Following dinner at the Plantation Restaurant we again received chocolates and an anniversary message, which made it a very special celebration for us. Thanks so much for a very memorable and relaxing time.

We had a fabulous 11 day stay at the Double Six. Arrived exhausted, stressed and desperate for an escape. We are seasoned travellers, doing 2 or 3 overseas trips every year and have been visiting Bali regularly over the past 25 years. We always stay in high quality accommodation so we have been conditioned to have high expectations. Our booking at Double six was made on the recommendation of friends. Double six is a relatively new hotel in Bali and as it normally takes a long time to settle in staff and iron out the bugs, we had some concerns prior to arrival despite the favourable reports. Against this background, we can only describe our stay as perfect in every way. Every staff member from room cleaners, receptionists, waiters, the bellboys, the IT Mgr- YUDA ( who fixed my; â€¦
title: Holiday

text: We had a great holiday at double 6 luxury hotel it was very clean the pool access room was beautiful just like photo the staff couldnâ€™t have been more accomodating I highly recommend this hotel we will be back thanks again

date post: Denise B wrote a review Apr 2019
text: We had a great time at double-six, stayed for about a week. Nice range of restaurants and bars, staff were great and super helpful. Location is good, but can be hard to get a taxi to go elsewhere (not that we wanted to)
title: Bali Holidays with friends

text: We had a nice time overall but it was too expensive. We were also very confused about what kind of style the hotel is. The welcome â€˜tourâ€™ was over the top and latest about an hour; having spent the past 27 hours travelling all we wanted to do was get in our room and chill. Shortly after that was over we got a knock at the door asking if we need new towels. Weâ€™d only be here for a couple hours. On the other end of the spectrum, which we very much enjoyed, their teenage waiters were dressed like minions. Overall, the staff were pleasant, the food wasnâ€™t great, there was very little entertainment, and it was way too expensive.

We had a wonderful 3 night stay at the double six, we enjoyed the plunge pool suite, it was very comfortable, the bathtub was a real treat and the plunge pool was great for both morning and evening dip. The butler service was impeccable and the staff were all friendly and always so polite. The breakfast is delicious with an all you can eat off an ala carte menu. Double six offer drop off to the main street in Seminyak. I would highly recommend double six if youâ€™re planning your next bali holiday in style.
title: Amazing Experience

text: We had a wonderful 5 night stay at double six. Rooms are amazing, the view is to die for, especially watching the sunset from your balcony. Staff are all very polite. The resort does lack the Balinese soul, but thatâ€™s the style of resort. We had dinner one night at the plantation grill and all I can say is wow!! Amazing food and even more amazing atmosphere. The lady singing opera just makes it! A couple of down points that did disappoint me during our stay: We booked and pre paid for our room months ago using one of our credit cards, we did not bring this particular card as we travel primarily with a travel card and my husbands credit card. Upon check In they wanted to see this credit card. I explained we didnâ€™t have it with us, but had another one we could use as a hold; â€¦

We had an amazing stay at Double-six and could not find fault with anything. Quality all the way. The service from the moment of our arrival with the in room check in to our final moments in the Owners Bar was outstanding. Loved each of the places we ate, the Lagoon Bar, the Rooftop bar and the Italian restaurant for breakfast. Perfect beachfront location. We live Double -six and will be back.
title: Nothing that the staff could not do!!!!

text: We had one night at the double six in a plunge pool room,the room was very well appointed large and very spacious nothing lacking, the bathroom was beautiful, I would have to say probably one of the better finished hotels in Bali. The bed was very comfortable also the pillows. The hotel is not yet finished but the hotel manager took his time to welcome us and show us around the property. The main pool area is very different a long winding pool with space for everyone to enjoy without being overcrowded. The staff were amazing so friendly with a smile to greet you where ever you are within the hotel and it's grounds. The spa looks out of this world and I will definitely use this facility should we return. The roof top area is still being completed but will be very unique indeed; â€¦

We had spent 4 nights in Bali before we checked in to this absolutely amazing hotel!! Coming from another totally unforgettable 3 nights previously in Taro, which I was so sad to leave - I have to admit - when we arrived I was totally blown away!! This was our first trip to Bali - and wow - what a welcome to Seminyak!! We had booked a Leisure Suite but to our VERY pleasant surprise we were upgraded to a suite with pool access and ocean view due to building works. OMG - the room was magnificent - the staff and service even better - I cannot fault anything!! For breakfast I ordered Eggs Benedict on the first morning - the best I've ever had!! Dinner that night from the restaurant was amazing - a culinary delight!!! My only regret is we couldn't stay longer!! 2 nights was; â€¦

We had the best holiday here. Can't fault anything The staff were so friendly and helpful. The food choice and dietary needs that were all available was excellent. The rooms were spacious and spotless and the butler service very useful. We will definitely stay here again & recommend to others.
title: Great choice 1st time in Bali

text: We had the most awesome time at Double Six Resort.From the beautiful welcome on arrival to the time at departure lounge. The staff,food,rooms were 6 star if not more. Thank you to all the staff at resort for a wonderful time and the service you provided.

We had the time of our life staying at the Double-Six. The staff were so friendly the best people I have ever had the pleasure of meeting. We have a lot of new friends in Bali but the 2 best Bar tenders I have ever had the pleasure of meeting were at the Double-Six and really went out of there way to look after us and make us feel so welcome. Komang Manik Mertayasa (Manik) and Murja Putra (Urja) look them up great people.
title: First Bali Holiday

date post: Karen T wrote a review Jul 2019
text: We have been in and out Bali for 6 years now. Stayed in many different types of accommodations on the island. Double six hotel sits at the top of the list. The rooms are fantastic, and the breakfast offerings were outstanding!
title: Great location, fabulous rooms and exceptional staff

text: We have been in Doulble Six for 4 days and are checking out tomorrow. In these last 4 days we have experienced excellent service from the word Go. The Friendly Staff, World Class Service, Immaculate extra modern rooms with fantastic views. From the unique breakfast( not the common buffet type) to servicing the rooms twice a day which too is not common, was very special and quite personal. We will definetly be coming back as Double Six has made our Bali experience even more memorable and unique. Dipak and Nina
title: Lux property with amazing views

text: We have had the most amazing honeymoon in Bali, staying in the Double Six Luxury Resort. Every staff member was so helpful, polite and friendly as they accommodated to our every need. We will certainly recommend all of our family and friends to come and experience the unforgettable Double Six for themselves. - Ryan & Trey

We have just come back from an 8 night stay at the Double Six Hotel in Seminyak. The hotel is new and everything is still shiny and fresh. The service was excellent. The breakfast really innovative and enjoyable. The rooms were spacious and well appointed. The only flaws were in the design, walking through the bathroom to get to the rest of the suite was a little odd, and the reception can only be accessed by walking up the long driveaway or by a bridge over the pool. Other than that, It is a hotel that I would recommend to any lovers of Bali.
title: Perfect family holiday

text: We have just had 10 wonderful nights at this outstanding hotel. From the moment we booked we have had such an impressive luxury holiday. As a family we were travelling with 2 children - one a toddler with special medical needs and the hotel management and staff went out of their way to make our holiday so memorable taking into consideration our circumstances. The hotel's GM Mr Dheeraj Bagai personally greeted us and we so frequently saw and spoke to him around the hotel - nothing was impossible for him and his professionalism and kindness amazing! We were provided an upgrade to a 2 bedroom master suite with superb ocean views. One of the most amazing modern and luxuriously appointed suites we have experienced on our frequent travels to Bali. The breakfasts were to die for, the; â€¦
title: Fully encompassing and welcoming service!

text: We have just had six wonderful days at the Double Six hotel. I have stayed in some fabulous hotels before, but Double Six surpasses all others! The room was beautifully designed, with stunning views over the ocean, and we could sit on our balcony and watch the breathtaking sunsets. The service was exceptional - the staff, especially our butler, could not do enough for us. Thank you all! The breakfast, with its a la carte menu, was simply the best ever! I would award this hotel 10 stars if I could. The best place we have ever stayed. We will DEFINITELY be back next year!!
title: Communication just not happening

text: WE have just returned from a fabulous stay at Double Six. We have stayed there on many occasions and the place just gets better and better. From the greeting on arrival to the farewell on departure we could not have asked for more. The service was great the rooms fantastic and the location just super. The beach across the road is clean and there are some great restaurants in close vicinity. Great time had.

date post: Bernard M wrote a review Sep 2014
text: We have just returned from an 8 night stay at the hotel. Our experienced was mixed. Firstly the staff. The staff service was excellent - from the front desk staff to the restaurant staff to the pool guys and girls. We were met by the manager and had the in room check-in. All staff we had contact with were very helpful and anticipated when help was required. At check in, time should be spent showing guests how to work the TV and air conditioner. Secondly - the Italian restaurant. This was a highlight - with top quality fresh food and superb breakfast choices. Prices are as expected - with $5 for a 330 ml Bintang. Once again the staff were excellent. Thirdly - Hotel and location. The picture used to advertise the hotel does not show the real picture e.g. there are no; â€¦
title: Excellent and getting better

text: We have just returned from an incredible family holiday at Double Six, Seminyak to celebrate our oldest son's 21st birthday. Our stay at Double Six was 'a little slice of heaven'. We had two Ocean view rooms on the second floor where the views were spectacular.....I imagine they are even better from the higher floors....sitting on the balcony relaxing each evening, sipping a drink whilst watching the sunset over the 120 metre infinity pool and sparkling ocean...in a perfect climate....what's not to love? It is impossible to fault this hotel....beautifully positioned overlooking a gorgeous beach....stunning views..fairytale suites...INCREDIBLE STAFF....easy walking distance to everything......impeccably clean....helpful and friendly management and a 'to die for' spa; â€¦

We have just returned home from a wonderful holiday staying 10 nights at the Double-Six luxury hotel in Seminyak. The staff were extremely helpful and friendly and always greeted us with a smile. In particular, thank you to Dheeraj Bagai, hotel manager and Gede Suwendrayana, assistant front office manager for being so helpful during our stay, you must be very proud to lead such an outstanding team at the Double-Six. To Rini and the team at the Aqua Perla Spa - thank you, the massages, hydro trail, hammam and daily workouts in the gym were awesome. Thank you to the pool guys, staff on reception, staff working in the restaurant/rooftop bar, butlers, porters, cleaners and chauffeurs - all who provided outstanding service during our stay. Our ocean-facing room was spacious,; â€¦

We have just spent the most amazing 12 days at this hotel! The rooms are spacious and clean. The staff are very friendly and helpful. Pool is amazing although it's hard to get a lounge if you don't get down there early. The breakfast was nice, the coffee was awesome! The Aqua Perla spa massages were the best massages we had in Bali, it's a must visit. The view from the roof top bar is wonderful especially at sunset. The food was very nice also.

We have loved every moment from the time we have arrived. The suite fantastic with views of the beach and sound of the waves. The pool is beautiful. Who can beat Mood lighting for something extra special. Butler service - Just by picking up the phone. We will definitely be back.
title: A paradise indeed

text: We have recently returned from a wonderful holiday at The Double Six Hotel. From the moment we arrived we were treated like royalty. Our suite was absolutely beautiful, very spacious and comfortable, with an incredible view over the pool and beach. The breakfast menu is great, we never found anything we didn't enjoy. The staff at this hotel are extremely helpful, friendly and polite, the service is excellent. We would like to thank everyone for a very memorable, relaxing holiday. The hotel is very modern with an international flavour, if you are looking for the typical Balinese hotel you may be disappointed. We can't wait to go back.
title: Perfection at the Double-Six!

text: We highly recommend Double Six. The hotel is large, luxurious and has absolutely everything you want for a holiday. The suites are huge and absolutely spotless. Breakfast was amazing and the range of food was actually overwhelming. The buffet and a la carte menu caters for every taste imaginable. The staff are amazing. Nothing is too much trouble and the service is very prompt. The nightly turn down service was a lovely surprise. The room always felt so cosy and welcoming when we returned from dinner each night. We have never experienced this level of service from staff anywhere else we have stayed around the world. Our stay was indeed luxurious and very relaxing and we will never forget the wonderful, friendly staff at Double Six

We holidayed with our family over the New Year period at the Double Six Luxury Hotel for a couple of weeks and our stay was superb. Thanks to the hotel manager Mr. Dheeraj Bagai and his amazing staff they could not have been more helpful or charming. They always helped with a smile and a warm greeting, getting to know us by name. Max and Keday were always ready to lend a hand and were so considerate. Our suite was large, modern, very comfortable and beautifully decorated. Some family members had outstanding ocean views and pool views, which they enjoyed immensely. Bathrooms were extremely generous and plenty of room for the girls. There was an array of quality Hermes products and bathroom accessories, everything one could need. Each morning we dined at the Seminyak Italian; â€¦

date post: Ebony Links wrote a review Feb 2020
text: We just got home from a one week honeymoon at Double Six Hotel in Seminyak. WOW! What a beautiful place. The staff were awesome, so attentive and professional and always happy and smiling. The food, cocktails were on point and cannot say enough ebout them. The rooms were stunning. We had an ocean view on the South end of the building and it was on the second floor over looking the pool and of course the beach. It was massive, luxurious and at least 5 star. I read some of the reviews and quite honestly there are some whingers out there! This place is magnificent! We were spolit from start to finish....Cannot praise the place, the staff of the facilities highly enough! Well done Double Six, we will be back.
title: Amazing

text: We just had the most amazing time at Double Six Hotel! The staff are beyond beautiful and will do anything to help and ensure your stay is fabulous . We loved Ima on the front desk as with all the staff, you even gave your own Butler ! The bed is super comfy the best Iâ€™ve ever slept in. The rooms are super clean and the brekky is fresh and delicious . Canâ€™t wait to return for my 4th time! Loved it all ðŸ’–Go there you wonâ€™t be disappointed ! Mel Langdon

We just returned from our second stay at the Double Six Hotel in Seminyak, Bali. This was only a short 6 day holiday solely to bring in 2015 with close friends. We all stayed in an ocean facing third floor two bedroomed apartment. As on our last stay the room was clean, spacious and elegant. Our balcony was a prime vantage point to view the New Yearâ€™s fireworks which started about 7ish on 31Dec2014 and seemed to continue without break till the early hours of 1Jan2015. Albeit only 3 months since our last visit it was good to see the hotelâ€™s standards in cleanliness and hospitality hadnâ€™t changed. That said, we did notice improvements by way of a new restaurant (called The Plantation Grill) and new bar (called The Sling Bar) having been recently opened. The restaurant has a lovely; â€¦

We just spent 7 nights at the Double Six from October 22. The service was spot on from the get-go. The pickup at the airport was smooth and trouble free. The car was perfectly clean and cool. Plenty of room for our luggage with cold refresher towels and cold water provided. We had an excellent driver who was very well spoken. As we had arrived early we were shown to the private Owners Lounge to freshen up with free drinks and snacks. I must admit that this was a first for us at any hotel. We have experienced Club Lounges previously, but this lounge was for every guest who needed to kill some time, either on arrival or departure. There are massage chairs, very comfy sofas, TV and a bar area for smokers. Showers are also available if you have a really long wait and feel the need; â€¦

We just spent 9 nights in Bali on a last minute holiday. Stayed 6 nights at Ramada Camakila and then decided to spoil ourselves with 3 nights at the Double 6. We walked through Double 6 on our last visit and were very impressed. We were met at reception and given a quick tour of the pool area and then showed to our suite (114) where they did the check in in the room. nice! The staff were fantastic and the service could not be faulted. As for the room, Amazing room with access to the pool straight out the front and ocean views. We had breakfast in the restaurant where we had Eggs Benedict one morning (fantastic) and then pancakes and the Bircher the next. We also had dinner one night in the Italian restaurant where the spaghetti Vongolli and rib eye steak were fantastic. We; â€¦

We love Bali, and our week at the Double Six in late June was our 17th holiday there in 30 years. We always try to ensure each visit is at least as good as the previous, so it becomes difficult as time goes on. We thought we took a gamble with the D6 because it was so new and we couldn't get referrals from any of our friends. However, we hit the jackpot, because from the moment we arrived until the time came to leave we felt very happy, comfortable and safe. The staff are well trained, extremely helpful and very friendly. The room design is faultless in all aspects, layout, outlook, comfort, colours, size, and amenities. The Italian restaurant was perfect, breakfast, lunch or dinner. Food quality and choice is amongst the best we have ever experienced not only in Bali, a; â€¦

date post: Jean M wrote a review Feb 2020
text: We love everything about this hotel. It was our second time here and definitely we will come back if we go to Bali again. The personal is so kind, they help you with all you need. Rooms are also perfect, refreshed 2x per day. Food is delicious and they also offer gluten free pizza which I have to say was the best I have ever eaten even in Europe. So I would definitely recommend this hotel to all going to Seminyak.
title: Love this Hotel

date post: Geoff N wrote a review Oct 2014
text: We loved Double Six from the moment we arrived and were checked in in our upgraded suite until we left after using the complimentary lounge. The Deluxe Ocean View Suite we were upgraded to was extremely spacious and well appointed - the huge balcony was a bonus as we spent time there watching the world go by, listening to the music from the beach bars and marvelling at the sunsets. The breakfast menu was a delight - lots of healthy choices and a great outlook over the pool and ocean. All staff were polite and friendly, every staff member looked you in the eye and spoke to you if you walked anywhere near them. Things that could be improved - There is not enough pool lounges - the staff do everything they can to find you somewhere to sit but there is a limit to what is available; â€¦
title: A resort in the Honeymoon stage

date post: Dawn C wrote a review Aug 2014
text: We loved Double-Six Luxury Hotel. Our family group of 11 (6 adults + 5 children aged 8, 10, 17, 19 and 21) stayed from 1-11 July 2014 and were made feel so welcome for our entire stay at this brand new stunning hotel. The rooms are perfect in every way. Spacious, clean, comfortable, chic and luxurious with incredible views and include a wonderful array of amenities, fresh flowers, daily fruit, bottled water, kimono and beach bag. We thoroughly enjoyed and made good use of this hotel's spa, gym, pool and delicious a la cart italian restaurant. Soon to open will be a roof top bar, silent cinema and another sophisticated restaurant. Can't wait to return and indulge again. Their website says it all - create, play, lounge, splurge. The choice is yours to be home away from; â€¦
title: ONE WORD - OUTSTANDING!!

text: We loved everything about Double Six and staff could not do enough to make sure we had everything we needed. Lots of great vegan choices and the Tequila and guava slushies by the pool were the best way to recover from a hot shopping trip. The breakfast choices and coffee were the perfect way to start the day and a trip to the Day Spa is not to be missed.

date post: Dejan J wrote a review Feb 2020
text: We loved everything from our two stays there - the amenities, staff , location and restaurants and the pool. We were there twice last year for a week for both times and would recommend it to anyone. We all loved the food and restaurants and best resort to stay at if you're a vegetarian/vegan. Awesome options. Going back in May
title: Awesome experience

text: We loved our stay at the Doublesix. The rooms were extremely comfortable and the staff were incredibly professional, efficient and they provided wonderful hospitality. The breakfasts were absolutely delicious and I think the best I have ever had - definitely recommend the Mie Goreng and Pandan pancakes. The view of the ocean from the rooftop is spectacular. Thank you to everyone at the Doublesix for making our stay so comfortable.

We purchased a 'Luxury Escapes' deal a few months ago & took advantage of a friends birthday to use it. Value for money all round. Requested an upgrade to an ocean view room, no problem. Nothing was too much trouble, the best stay in Bali we have ever had. Gorgeous hotel, attentive staff, amazing meals. Bali was going thru a 'quiet' phase when we visited so it made it even more enjoyable 5-15 Dec. Doubt i would stay during peak time as the pool area not quiet if filled with kids.

date post: Colin F wrote a review May 2019
text: We recently returned from our third time in four years to Double Six and still nothing has changed.. this is the most amazing place.. What makes Double Six so outstanding is the people and the genuine warmness extended by the staff. Thank you Selva for another amazing stay. We were fortunate to witness the once a year celebration of dance and festivities which all of the staff voluntarily participated in.. truly a once in a lifetime experience The food is still amazing and the breakfast bar overlooking the pool and beach is spell binding. Bill, Lyn, John @ Di Stayed rooms 329/330 march 16-23
title: Too expensive for a what it was

text: We recently spent 7 awesome nights at Double Six Luxury Hotel & just loved every minute of our stay there. The moment we arrived at this Hotel we were greeted by the manager Dheeraj Bagai he gave us his card & told us to contact him if we had any problems but of course "we did not". I would like to thank him again for our "awesome pool access room". The a-la-carte breakfast is of high quality & delicious, also we ate dinner at the Italian restaurant & that was also of high quality & amazing taste. The rooms are "awesome" the best we have ever stayed in!!. The rooms are very sound proof so the music playing on the beach which we enjoyed every evening on the balcony we could not hear in our room. The staff are all very helpful & prompt with their service. Great location, we are; â€¦

we recently spent 8 days at this luxurious hotel, from the moment we stepped out of our limousine we were pampered till the day we left . Staff are very well trained and cater for your every request. Breakfast is fabulous, even though it is Ala carte we were able to chop and change to our liking . The rooms are big and tastefully furnished. Hotel has a buggy to take you to their other restaurant's nearby . Spar treatment is one of the best I have experienced, this hotel has it all just sit back and enjoy,don't forget the Roof Top Bar The departure lounge at the hotel is the final touch, we spent 2hours relaxed and enjoying a chat with the staff and other departing guests sharing drinks and canapÃ©'s while we waited for our transport to take us to the airport, all provided free; â€¦

We recently stayed at Double six on our honeymoon and had the fabulous time. Check in was as quick as ever seen direct in the suite with the butler waiting outside with a welcome cocktails and cold towels - we enjoyed a lot sitting in our balcony over looking ocean, restaurant and breakfast was great so as the service all over the hotel which shows that level of service is very high end..Thank you Double Six for making our honeymoon special and next time we will be back for long

date post: Anthea H wrote a review Jan 2015
text: We recently stayed at Double-Six as a couple and had a relaxing stay. The driver was awaiting our arrival as planned, and our room was ready. The in-room check-in was efficient, although there were some initial problems connecting to wi-fi. These were resolved and wi-fi was readily available throughout our stay, although you had to keep logging in numerous times. The rooms were a great size and kept very clean. The positioning of the bathrooms to the entry took a little adjusting, and it is still something I would change in the design. The balconies are a great size and we had one with great cover from the rain, which kept persisting throughout our stay, unfortunately. Facilities were well appointed, rooms serviced twice daily and any problems were followed through. The manager; â€¦
title: Plantation Bar and Grill Robert Marchetti

text: We recently stayed at the Double Six for our second time and this place just gets better. Since our last stay there they have improved many things that guests have requested like grab rails in the shower recess and steps in the pool .So they are listening to the guests suggestions and also doing something about .Also the new Plantation Grill and Bar "wow" What a amazing place but most of all the food is 1st class and also the Roof Top Bar which we had been to before but had to go again, it is the best ever. The Manager Dheeraj and staff are so wonderful and nothing is too much trouble, I emailed before leaving and requested the same room we had before and that is exactly what we got. We brought friends with us this time and they just loved it. We all cant wait to go back for; â€¦

We recently stayed at The Double Six Hotel in Bali for 7 nights. Our stay was absolute luxury from the moment we arrived to the moment we departed. We loved everything about this hotel. The location, facilities, service, restaurants (you must try The Plantation Grill) and the staff who always went above and beyond for my husband, son and I. Missed the previous Hotel Manager Dheeraj but he always recommends us to book beautiful Double-Six Hotel, We highly recommend this hotel to all!
title: Best Check in Service

text: We recently stayed at the Double Six hotel. All the staff were very welcoming and helpful it was a relaxing and welcoming respite from the xsmas holiday period . Every last detail was thought of in our room including ear plugs which I certainly needed when the new years day party started and I needed to sleep.
title: Top quality straight through!

text: We recently stayed at the Double-Six Luxury Hotel for 11 nights and had the most wonderful holiday! The entire Double-Six team make you feel so special from the moment you arrive. The Butler service was fantastic and so helpful for arranging dinner & tour bookings etc â€“ thanks Erickson! The Concierge team led by Max were always there to assist and the restaurant & pool staff were just lovely. We were very impressed by the friendly and always happy nature of all the staff at the Double-Six â€“ they were all friendly, helpful and professional â€“ we felt like celebrities! The facilities are fantastic â€“ the pool, the Aqua Spa (great massages!), the Seminyak Italian restaurant for breakfast, lunch or dinner and the rooftop bar. We made use of the Departure Lounge on our last day and the; â€¦

We recently stayed in the Double-six for 9 nights. When we arrived (after trying to get across to the taxi driver that the double-six was a new hotel and not the beach TIP: if you are getting a taxi from the airport, get the address of the hotel to give to the driver) we were greeted and shown around the pool and then shown up to our room where they checked us in rather than having to wait around in reception (I always hated that!). So far so good! After having the assistant manager, our own butler and the head butler personally check us in to our room they then whipped out an amazing sugar cane cocktail after which the butler showed us the features of the room. The room was possibly one of the nicest we have ever stayed in, it was huge! Shower was amazing, the bath was lovely; â€¦

date post: Chloe L wrote a review Jan 2020
text: we spend our honey moon at this place and honestly it is worth every cent we spend, book an Ocean view so you can enjoy the sun set from your bed :). staff are really gentle and kind , you have complementary water and drinks , not to mention welcome drinks, pool is really clean and nice the location is brilliant, you wont regret it.
title: Best hotel in Seminyak! Look no further and book this hotel!

date post: Ash G wrote a review Mar 2019
text: We spent 5 nights there. The location is good, close to the beach and little shops. a bit far from nice restaurants but we were catching taxis to go for dinner every night so no big deal. Our room was amazing! big, comfortable, wonderful bathroom with loads of space. The staff was super helpful and friendly, pool was great too. Recommended for sure!
title: 5 star all they way!!! Incredible service and attention to detail

text: We spent 6 nights at Double Six with friends. We had a wonderful time staying there. The rooms were huge & luxurious. The staff were excellent, so friendly & couldnâ€™t do enough for us. Happy hour around the pool every afternoon is one of the many special extras we enjoyed. I would thoroughly recommend staying at Double Six.

We spent an enjoyable 8 nights at the Double Six Luxury Hotel in in May while the hotel was having its "soft opening". The hotel is modern and the rooms (we stayed both in a room with plunge pool and a room with an ocean view) were very luxurious - spacious and well appointed with lovely Hermes toiletries. The service was excellent and the staff were friendly and went out of their way to help us. The a la carte breakfast menu was a delight and the scrambled eggs with black truffles and roasted asparagus was one of my favourites. We were disappointed that the gym and spa were only opening after our departure as they sound amazing. If you are after a luxurious hotel experience, try the Double Six, however be aware there is construction next door so make sure you request a room; â€¦
title: SPA GETAWAY AT DOUBLE-SIX LUXURY HOTEL

date post: Monique A wrote a review Mar 2019
text: We spent few nights there. Booked because of the location, close to the Double six beach. Difficult to catch online taxi but local taxi is available. Great breakfast and spacious rooms. Overall good experience.
title: The most beautiful wedding we could have thought of!

date post: James T wrote a review Sep 2019
text: We spent nine amazing nights in this beautiful hotel. It could not have been better! The room was spacious, clean and super comfortable. The food was fantastic breakfast, lunch or dinner! The service was the best I have encountered anywhere. From the second day, they knew our names, room number and food allergies. The Balinese are friendly people but these staff were the next level all together. We really could not fault anything at all and will definitely be back for another stay in the future.
title: Double Six hotel Seminyak Bali

text: We started at The Breezes Bali Resort & Spa... stayed one night and were upgraded to Double-Six (a sister hotel) for the rest of our stay in Bali (7 nights). The hotel itself is impressive but the staff are exceptional! 24hr butler service and an a la carte breakfast menu that breaks from tradition. It's still new with some teething issues to sort out but definitely worth it!
title: Excellent!!!

date post: jithu cheriyan wrote a review Jun 2019
text: We stay for 2 days, the process of check in is convinience by the receptionist but its take time to listen the buttler explain everything that takes 10 min of our restimg time... Actually the room is nice & very spacious. But the room smells damp & musky. Little complaint on breakfast menu which is a la carte but all not my kind of breakfast that i expected in this luxurious hotel. All service is good but only the concierge guy is not nice when we want to take a cab and asking if we already book the taxi & why not using hotel taxi. I think its not polite because as a guess we should free to choose what kind of transportation we take.
title: Feel the best luxury hospitality with the Double six luxury hotel.

text: We stay here just after the Hotel Reopen due to the pandemic. The hotel is still well maintained and clean. The service was also quick and excellent. Minor issue was breakfast quality and the pool guy allowed people swim with their full clothes on , they should pay more attention to it.

We stayed 4 nights at the Double Six Hotel. I enjoyed the 4 days here, the staff were lovely. The room amenities were great and the bed, pillows and linen were all of a high standard and very comfortable. I loved the unlimited made to order breakfast, especially the fact that drinks - barista coffees, juices, tea were all included. Each breakfast I had was top quality. What disappointed me and I cannot seem to move on from, was that when we checked in, we were taken to our room (237), it was half the size than the Leisure Suite as shown on the Double Six website which is what we had booked. Part of choosing to stay at this hotel was the huge suite style rooms, with a couch as per all of the pictures on TripAdvisor and the website. I was really puzzled and once the check in; â€¦

date post: Bren K wrote a review Dec 2014
text: We stayed 4 nights at the Double Six, and had an amazing time. It's hard to find anything wrong with this hotel, the location is excellent, the views are great, the rooms are fantastic, the staff is wonderful. The breakfast is included and is top notch.
title: Wow

date post: Dave B wrote a review Jul 2019
text: We stayed 7 nights at this lovely Hotel and really enjoyed our stay. Staff were friendly and helpful. Rooms were very clean and a good size, with balcony. My husband enjoyed the coffee machine in our room and access to the Gym. Location was great, right across from the Beach with the Hotel staffed 'Beach Spot' with chairs. Our package included breakfast, which was a la carte, all you can eat, and delicious. A definite highlight for our teenagers. Two mornings, breakfast was in the Rooftop Bar, where we had the most spectacular international buffet. They were able to cater for our daughter's gluten free dietary requirements well. The pool area is large and comfortable. Security guards at both entrances made us feel safe. We would definitely stay at this Hotel again.
title: PERFECT

text: We stayed as a family of 2 adults and 2 children in a suite facing the pool and ocean. THE GREAT/GOOD: * The staff have been trained to a very high professional standard. I challenge you to walk past a staff member in this hotel without getting a smile or a greeting. Staff are everywhere and there is a very high staff to guest ratio so you can always get help when you need it in every corner of the property. In room check-in was also a nice touch and fast! * The pool, at approx 100 meters is terrific. Minor feedback is that on some days the temperature was a little cold (perhaps by 2 degrees or so). * Fantastic rooms - very comfortable beds, a really cool Klipsch hi-fi unit that allows you to connect your own music from your mp3 player / phone. The IPTV is nothing special -; â€¦

We stayed at Double 6 for just over a week. Our room was well presented and romantic, we had a garden view on the 4th floor and it was still just as beautiful as the ocean view. The amenities were luxury rated and the hydro experience at the spa was awesome. The staff go above and beyond for you from greetings to requests. I suffer from allergies so travelling can be very stressful but they looked after me beyond my expectations. I will be back to stay again and would recommend double six 5 star
title: Fantastic Hotel

text: We stayed at Double Six 4 nights from Dec14-18 in a 2 bedroom ocean view suite. The rooms were large modern and clean. The view was amazing from the huge balcony. Breakfast is buffet at rooftop couple of days in the week which is a treat. The hotel pool is so beautiful we luved it. The staff are great always try there best to solve a situation. The ocean view room are close to bars first night was bit loud they stopped playing by 10pm. Its a great property we enjoyed our stay at Double Six.

date post: Amanda N wrote a review Dec 2014
text: We stayed at double six as it was marketed as a family resort This was not the case as it more designed as a hotel for couples with no or older children The pool area cannot cater for families and the noise level and small grounds are more appropriate for those needing a boutique hotel The staff did what they could to cater for us But as we often holiday in Bali as our family holiday wouldn't stay there again as cannot really cater for the needs of large families The breakfast was great as was the dinner at restaurant Really should have invested in double glazed windows that may have reduced noise a little
title: Pure Luxury! WOW!

text: We stayed at Double Six for 7 nights with two children aged 6 & 8. Prior to our arrival we had requested a room in the quieter part of the hotel. When we arrived we were delighted to discover that we had been allocated a 2 bedroom ocean view room - it was amazing. It is huge and the kids had 2 double beds and their own bathroom facilities. Our room was fantastic too with a king sized bed, lounge and massive bathroom. The bathroom was bigger than most hotel rooms in Bali! The beds were extremely comfortable and we all slept really well. We had a great stay and the staff were always friendly and attentive. Special mention to the delightful Apri who was always quick to greet you at the pool and find you a pool lounge. We dined at Seminyak Italian and it was delicious - the; â€¦

We stayed at double six for 9 days. I could not fault this hotel. Staff were very friendly and nothing was a bother. Food and drinks not badly priced for a hotel. Room was very spacious and the bed was comfortable. Pool was enormous and you would well and truly get your exercise swimming a few laps of this each day. If I ever came back to Bali I would stay at Double six again.

date post: Donna B wrote a review Feb 2015
text: We stayed at Double Six for a six night getaway last week. On check-in we were surprisingly upgraded to a two bedroom master suite, which oozed a luxurious feel and was fitted out with first class finishings. From our suite, we were given unobstructed views to Bali's magnificent sunset and sunrises each day and our butlers (Ardi and Franz in particular) were always happy to attend, helpful and pleasant. I mentioned to Ardi on check in that it was our 20th Wedding Anniversary and on return from our evening walk, our sheets had been turned down, the room lighting set to feel very ambient and on the coffee table was a heart shaped bouquet of flowers and a chocolate mouse dessert with two spoons with "Happy 20th Anniversary" written on the plate. You could not wipe the smiles; â€¦
title: Wonderful service in a luxury environment

text: we stayed at Double Six Hotel for 2 nights during our trip to Bali.It was an amzing experience. The rooms were very clean, the roof top Lounge and the staff were great. The Spa was much much better than a lot of places i have been to. THe beach was just fifty feet away. i would recommend this Hotel to everyone who wants to have a vacation in Bali.

We stayed at Double six hotel for 5 nights to have our wedding there. The moment we booked the events coordinator Fegy emailed to help me plan everything (as I was in Perth, Western Australia) . Fegy went above and beyond to make all our dreams come true. It was the most perfect day. Thankyou to all the staff at Double Six hotel for making our wedding a dream come true. We canâ€™t wait to return for our next holiday!
title: A great stay at the Double Six

text: We stayed at Double Six in a beachfront suite and had an absolute fantastic experience. The staff and facilities are exceptional. Ten days of pure pleasure, will definitely be returning. Highly recommend it. One minor issue is that if you want a spot by the pool then best get down there early as the sun beds fill up quickly.
title: A nice stay but could be better

text: We stayed at Double-Six for 8 nights during August. This hotel is amazing and the wonderful reviews that you will read below are correct. Rooms are huge & nicely appointed.
