text: Omg what a beautiful resort an amazing infinity pool with swim up bar only opened in February 2016 had a great package deal from padma 3 nights Ubud 4 nights Legian . Friendly staff amazing food and the club premier room overlooking the pool worth the money will be coming back here loved it so peaceful and quiet
title: quite place for gate away

text: one of the best hotels in bali. the place is beautiful, the design and the service were both excellent. The food at Puhu is good but maybe they could improve the breakfast as the food is not so good. Love the yoghurt, fruits but when I ask for half boiled egg, it was perfectly hard boiled egg. besides the breakfast, I think this place is a must stay!
title: heaven

text: Our family of two adults and a five year old stayed at Padma for two nights and it was sensational. Our only regret is that we didn't stay more than 2 nights. When we first took an exploratory tour of the Resort we were blown away by how beautiful it was. The large infinity pool with swim up bar is the stuff holiday dreams are made of! Indeed swimming up to the bar and ordering a Mojito was the first priority when we arrived. The Resort is located at Puhu which is about 35-45 min drive from Ubud. We did a day trip into Ubud using the Resorts complimentary shuttle bus which was a fascinating drive in itself. Ubud is a crazy little village and after visiting there for the day I'm glad my wife choose Padma Resort for our stay in this region. So much more tranquil and pretty. The

Our family(2 adults,2 kids) stayed in Suite for 7 nights. By a lots of excellent reviewsï¼Œour expectation was so high! Room was wonderful with outside jacuzzi and very spacy und comfortable. The staff are very friendly with big smile, but we started to feel tired and uncomfortable during our stay. 1,Free transport Our package was included free airport pick up and return service.We asked to be picked up by hotel instead of airport and price was 67$us. Our previous hotel send us padma for only 22$us. So we refused Padma's offer. Padma ubud - Airport is about 55km by car. Our Previous hotel-Padma ubud is 45km. We wonder why is it more expensive to drive shorter way. 2,Wi-fi didn't work first day In our Suite, wi-fi didn't work first 24hours. Technician often came to our room to
title: 5 star facility, 3 star service....

text: Our recent stay at the Padma Resort Ubud was exceptional. Our accomodation was excellent, staff and management were wonderful. A beautiful site with stunning views, gardens and an amazing pool area. It's so peaceful, tranquil and definitely the place to entirely relax and be spoiled. Loved it and will return.....
title: Brilliant Location & Amazing Resort

text: Our room was spacious, clean, warm and immaculate. The resort Manager miss Deasy managed to put lovely birthday cake for my wife and daughter. She welcome us with flower leis, big smile and warm hug for my wife. My wife has accute astma, miss Deasy made sure our room was free of dust, bug spray and air freshener. Food and tea times were fantastic, smiley faces from staffs, what can I say? Our family love Padma Ubud
title: No words to describe

date post: Ashleigh C wrote a review Dec 2016
text: Our stay at this resort was nothing short of exceptional. We stayed for 3 nights at the beginning of December. We booked directly with the hotel and opted to book the grand opening promotion, it was great value for money, as it included airport transfers, afternoon tea and dinner. On arrival, we were blown away by the views. The hotel is set in a tranquil setting, surrounded by a rain forest. The bedroom were exquisite. The heated infinity pool was amazing, the swim-up bar just added to it. There is various activities organised by the hotel, we did yoga and our Butler Yosef organised a trekking trip to climb the volcano Mt Banur. Staff were extremely friendly and couldn't do more for us!Food was amazing, breakfast had a great selection and the view from the dining area were
title: Amazing!

date post: Nina T wrote a review Nov 2020
text: Our visit was during the covid period, so the hotel was very quiet, as it just reopened. The kids club was still closed, which was rather disappointing but understandable. However they have an animal garden that was great to visit. The property was massive so there were plenty to do inside the hotel. I went for the yoga classes, which were held at the bale bamboo, truly a serene setting, our instructor, Pak Budi, was great. Everything was sanitised, down to the pens you use to sign at check ins, with sanitizing stations everywhere. Breakfast was great, they had the normal buffet setting, but the staff would serve it to you. Also they have complimentary afternoon tea, which was really nice too, served as a high tea. The pool was massive and nicely heated. Also went for a
title: Beautiful hotel with very friendly staff

text: OVERVIEW: My earlier frustrating encounter with Padma Resort Ubud didn't go beyond their voice reservation in March 2016. I made another attempt using the resortâ€™s website and booked the Grand Opening 4D3N offer which had inclusions like return airport transfer, a set dinner and a spa session for 2 persons, daily buffet breakfast and afternoon tea. The website listed several room options; booking process was relatively easy. THE JOURNEY TO UBUD: The driver explained that the journey to Padma Resort Ubud will take two (2) hours. Options of taking the toll road or non toll road were given to us. We opted for the toll road, detouring away from the city's heavy traffic. Be ready to pay the IDR11,000 (~<usd1) toll fee. stopped for local sim: we asked the driver to stop at a kiosk

date post: Ezra H wrote a review Nov 2020
text: Padma has MTB tour twice a day inclusive of the stay. We had a very memorable experience cycling with the guides Bli Agus and Bli Fiska, in the farmlands and forests around the hotel. Make sure to ask for some off-road rides for extra adventure!
title: Excellent free MTB tour

text: Padma is approx 40 minutes from the main town on Ubud; but it's worth the extra drive. This is paradise. The staff are all very gracious, warm, friendly and courteous and well trained in their chosen positions. The rooms are spacious and modern and have everything you could possibly desire, the view from building C overlooked lush green gardens lit by fairy lights at night. We took advantage of the free activities offered like bike riding through the local area, walking/jogging on the private track, village visit and regular shuttle to Ubud city centre. Had two beautiful treatments at the Day Spa and they were amazing. The heated infinity pool looked fantastic in all the travel brochures but wait until you see it for yourself. Afternoon tea was served each day and this was

Padma is easily the best hotel I have ever stayed in. The staff are all brilliant, the rooms are large, clean and the beds are incredible. The bathroom was amazing and featured a large walk in shower and bath. The resort itself has an incredible infinity pool which is kept just warm enough so you can swim in the evening and soak up the jungle in the dark. The resort is set in the jungle and rice fields with incredible views, especially from the restaurant where you have breakfast. Our booking also included afternoon tea which we had in the restaurant between 2.30 and 4.00 which was nice to keep you full until evening. Our booking included free airport transfers but as we were travelling around Bali they helped organise our transfers for us. The staff could not have done
title: Heaven in Ubud

date post: Wayne B wrote a review Apr 2017
text: Padma Resort is located about half an hour from Ubud and the midst of a tropical rainforest. The location is so tranquil. The most stunning feature of Padma Resort is the enormous, heated infinity pool that overlooks the jungle. Even when there are a lot of people in the pool it is never crowded and you never tire of the view. The pool bar and happy hour cocktails are an added bonus. We found every member of staff at Padma to be very professional as well as friendly. They just made you feel so welcome. I don't normally mention individual staff members but it would be remiss of me not to mention a few who went above and beyond. Komang the Assistant Butler was ever helpful, Daesy at the pool let me know when some lounge chairs became vacant, Reza was so positive when cleaning our
title: Simply Superb.

text: Padma Resort is the ideal location for an indulgent and luxurious holiday while absorbing and experiencing an extraordinary culture. The jungle setting is nothing short of magical. The resort is set within a traditional and functioning village community that the staff explore with you by bike through picturesque rice fields. The rooms, bedding and service are amongst the best I have ever experienced. The food and cocktails were outstanding and exceptionally good value for money. The spa experience was truly exceptional and also very economical for a 5 star facility. Yoga classes in a jungle setting with experienced teachers were transcendental. Night swimming in the heated pool with the nearby fire pit and spa while sipping cocktails from the poolside bar served by the most
title: Magical 5 Star Luxury Escape!!!!!

date post: Shane Bridgette K wrote a review Apr 2017
text: Padma resort Ubud is a beautiful relaxing place in the mountains surrounded by jungle. Great facilities and activities ie yoga. My only criticism is it is a long way from Ubud town (30 to 40 minutes drive).
title: Relaxing resort

date post: Mel J wrote a review Jul 2016
text: Padma resort Ubud is absolutely stunning. The Forrest surrounds are beautiful, and the hotel itself reflects this. The staff are so wonderful and friendly, and will go above and beyond to ensure your stay is unforgettable. I can't wait to return
title: Stunning

text: Padma Resort Ubud is in the middle of Nature and is so wonderful. The View from The Breakfast Restaurant is amazing and so nice. The Buffet by the Breakfast is rich and varied The Staffpeople is very friendly The Room is large and very clean. The Pool very Lage and so nice. The Shuddle Bus to Downtown Ubud have Wifi on Board ðŸ˜ The Holiday in Padma Resort Ubud was perfect.
title: Amazing Holiday in Ubud

date post: Serjon Y wrote a review Jan 2017
text: Padma resort ubud is perfect to escape from the city life. Its surrounded with jungle. Take a deep breath and relaks. I love the infinity swimming pool! I think it is the only one swimming pool with heater in Bali! And the view is awesome. Feel like swimming in the middle of forest. And I like the spa, completely with sauna! Perfect !!! I enjoy to the maxxxx!!!
title: Wow

text: Padma resort Ubud sitting on the top of a ridge in the Ubud rainforest. This is one of the best hotels we have seen on Bali. Everything from the views, the pool, the service, the room and the food was excellent. The rooms are large, modern and open. Nothing really negative about this place. Highly recommended!
title: Best resort ever

date post: Hizkia Jevon wrote a review Dec 2020
text: Padma resorts gives a very good impression to me as a first time visitor. The resorts is equipped with various of activities that can accomodate visitors from different age groups. The staffs are also very friendly, Mr. Agus Mikadana in particular. Being in charge of the activities session, he does his job very well in welcoming the visitors, conducting the activities, etc. Overall this hotel is a must-try to all Bali visitors. Great Job!ðŸ‘
title: Resorts review

text: Padma Ubud is a place of tranquillity and totally a place to unwind relax and enjoy. The rooms are amazing and as per the Padma theme the staff are all exceptionally fantastic and are there to assist in any way possible. A home away from home with plenty to do or just nothing. Deasy, Gary Reza and the whole team are just the best
title: Time Out

text: Padma Ubud is a very beautiful resort. Beyond that, I think how great the resort is depends on the kind of holiday you're looking for, because we've found that the remoteness of its location (Padma Ubud is *far* from the Ubud Center) kind of required us to make either/or choices. If you're looking for frequent walkabouts around the heart of Ubud, this resort is probably not what you're looking for. If you're looking for trying out different restaurants in Ubud, this is probably not what you're looking for as well. If you're looking for a secluded holiday from the crowd, though, then yes, this place is great. Great pools, great views, great jogging track. If you are travelling with young kids, while I think Padma Ubud's Kids' Club's team is great, the hotel and the general
title: A very beautiful resort. But not so good for a family with young children.

text: Padma Ubud is absolutely amazing. Whilst the resort itself was luxurious and spectacular, it was made even better by the staff. The staff were extremely friendly, helpful and were always available to help with anything. Resort highlights: The pool is phenomenal, and enjoying a cocktail at the swim up bar whilst enjoying the breathtaking views was a wonderful way to relax. The food was amazing. There was a great variety of Indonesian cuisine along with more western tastes. I recommend sticking with the Indonesian food, it is unbelievable. The fruit and herb garden is unique and a great idea. The rooms are gorgeous, comfortable and relaxing. The bathroom was fantastic, the rooms were well stocked and the beds were extremely comfortable. The mixology class is a 'must do'

Padma Ubud is absolutely lovely and we enjoyed our four night stay immensely. It is isolated, so it is best if you are looking to relax and unwind; taking the shuttle into Ubud every day would get tiresome. We went into Ubud twice in four days and that was enough; the shuttle takes 35-40minutes each way. The facilities are superb, from the rooms to the pool, and the service was top-notch at every turn. Every employee we encountered was friendly and helpful. Our only complaint, and it is a minor one, is that the food is inconsistent. This is important only because you have no other options because of the location. -the breakfast buffet is amazing and we have only good things to say about it. It was perfect. -we ate dinner in the restaurant twice: the first time was just ok,
title: Great Resort

text: Padma Ubud is an amazing resort located in a secluded part of Ubud. The infinity pool is defiantly my favourite part of the hotel and provides great views of the green rainforest. I had a club room, it was large and had views of the pool from level 3. The breakfast buffet is 10/10 just like Padma Legian, and dinner is also great with a large menu featuring a wide range of foods. The only disappointment would be the club lounge, staff were attentive but often did not know types of drinks and service took awhile, I was expecting the lounge to be more like Padma legian but it was a different experience. Overall the 4 night stay was great and defiantly will be returning.
title: A Very Good Hotel in Ubud

date post: Eric Prawiro Susanto wrote a review Dec 2020
text: Padma Ubud was nothing short but awesome. The hotel facilities were adequate and they have tons of activities suitable for all ages. I read that this hotel has one of the best services and they proved it right. From the exceptional attention they had to details and the lengths they went to accommodate our needs, I was pleasantly surprised at their top-notch service that set the bar even higher for the hotel industry. Arriving in mid-December means a lot of the time it would be raining with dense fog around the area. This was the limiting factor to the otherwise fun and diverse outdoor activities they have. But this condition also brings out its own charm, especially for the mountain person, since Bali is quite hot and humid around the lower altitude area during this time of the
title: Honeymoon Holiday

text: Padma ubud! Hands up for all health protocol holiday feels fun yet safe. The resort activities like archery makes us enjoy staying around the resort. The coach, bli MADE was so patient. I highly recommend you to stay here with children, families, or just a short friends getaway.
title: Hands up for padma ubud's activities!

text: Padma was such a great place to stay with friends and family. It is a little further away from Ubud central but not so far that it's a problem. My husband and I had a friend join us and we thought at first we may need a 2nd room. All 3 of us fit very comfortably even with the rollout bed. We ate several times there and the food was good but going out in the evening for dinner can seem a little far to the center. The grounds are kept in great condition and the pool is incredible (largest infinity pool I've seen) we will definitely be back.

Pool bar is soo good but expensive you can visit here but drinks are expensive but you can enjoy the view of the jungle the workers Are so kindly and speek english very well imean better than other hotel workers
title: A Fantastic Find

date post: citra m wrote a review Jan 10
text: Quite n lovely place to stay with family,,good infinity pool,,good food n excellent services from the staff,,,the room is very clean,,still has an iron n d table meanwhile some fivestar hotel dont provide it,,,i love stay in padma ubud,,,it was such a lovely place to stay in bali
title: Hidden paradise in ubud

date post: Mackster Z wrote a review Apr 2017
text: Rather new hotel with true 5 stars service. Spa is great. Infiniti pool is amazing. Food is excellent. Service the best. Breakfast is huge. Too many choices :-) Only downside maybe is that it takes around 40 mins to get to Ubud. With the free shuttle that has Wifi. We would definitely go again. Had a wonderful stay
title: Paradise

text: Really enjoyed our 3 night stay in this hotel, The hotel is perfect, with load of activity. For kids they have outdoor activity and my son is really happy to join, Breakfast menu are great, also enjoyed dinner food at Puhu Restaurant The location are quite far, but they provide shuttle service to ubud center which is very helpful. Definitely will come back again if visiting Bali.
title: Amazing Hotel, Many Activities and Great Staff

text: Recently stayed with my partner and 3mnth old. What an amazing resort! The staff were so helpful and we felt like we were the only ones there. The hotel is a decent 45min drive to Ubud centre so keep in mind but shuttles run on set times. Some awesome paved running/walking tracks around the hotel and there is always something to do. However lazing by the unbelievable infinity pool for hours on end is hard to beat. The rooms are appointed with quality fittings and having your own espresso machine had me hook, line and sinker. Anything longer than a week would be a little too much if your into getting out and about. Definitely go back.
title: Amazing hotel, spectacular scenery!

date post: kevin s wrote a review Nov 2020
text: Recommended place to stay with family because padma get so many activity that make you dont need to go outside Thanks to activity instructor Sundana, Made to make my visit unforgetable. One of best resort in Bali
title: Nice hotel nice activity

text: Relocated to the Padma Resort from another hotel in Ubud for 2 nights, which turned out to be a blessing as what a wonderful resort with the most breathtaking views. Pool area, room and gym beautiful and views from every angle of the property. Wide selection of food which was all good and nice breakfast buffet. Shuttle bus to Ubud for those wanting to explore. Club suite and lounge also worth the upgrade. A big thanks to the management (Reza and Hendy) and staff for the perfect service from our initial late in the evening arrival to our departure.

Reservation Team was very flexible and fast response to change our reservation date. Check in was hendled by Debby, it was very quick and informative. All areas applied high standard of health protocol for covid-19. There is hand sanitizer everywhere, thermogun, and they provide disposable mask as well. The room was clean and tidy, there is a sign on door knob "this room has been cleaned and sanitized" The sweetest moment when we enter the room and we surprised by decorated bed with swan towel, flower petal, and also they give us a complimentary honeymoon cake in the fridge. We have a free afternoon tea with stunning view at The Puhu Restaurant. The pool was amazing. 89-meters infinity pool make it the longest swimming pool in Ubud. It is HEATED ! Warm water, jaw breaking
title: Jungle Trekking on Padma Ubud

date post: Paige F wrote a review Nov 2016
text: Room smelt of mould, being stuck in the middle of a jungle is not my idea of fun. There concept is you are here now we can CHARGE you 5 star prices for 3 star service. Example, had a massage included in package electronically but still needed a paper voucher,coulded be bothered in the end. Very expensive to get to Abud by taxi, the only saving grace was the food was of a 3.5 out of 5 standard. Cheers DM
title: Must stay romantic retreat!

text: Room: Excellent. Spacious, with balcony and pool view. Club lounge: Literally spent 10 hours a day here. Kind of crazy amazing views of the pool and forest, great service, amazing smoothies, good internet, plug for your laptop for work, just overall really relaxing. Location: Far from center (25 minutes). Good to get away though, once you're there you don't really want to leave anyways. And they have free shuttles to town throughout the day and evening. Dining: Excellent. Like, really good food, Flavours on point. Great variety. Best juices and smoothies i've had in months (and I had quite a few). Amenities: Gym is small, but sufficient. Has showers etc. Only gripe of my whole stay was that they played weird beach music in the gym. Asked to change it a few times but not

date post: Diana V wrote a review Nov 2016
text: Service is Bali is good, but these guys take it to a whole new level. I have TO commend the level of hospitality and service of every staff member we met, they were incredibly polite, efficient, meticulous and thoughtful. Some examples - Yogi from the top floor restaurant escorting us personally all the way to the poolside cafe just to show us the correct way. The waiter Slam who noticed we didn't finish our salad and bringing out two different dressings without being asked for. Service aside, the view is RIDICULOUS. The infinity pool is amazing, with the backdrop of the jungle, fog, and birds gliding playfully across the water. The gardens were incredibly lush, well kept and vibrant. The only thing to note is that this resort is literally in the jungle - it is not near Ubud
title: Honeymoon

date post: Marius C wrote a review Jan 2017
text: Set in a lush valley, with beautiful forest surroundings, this resort is a jewel. The heated pool overlooks a deep ravine, filled with bamboo and palms, where it is also possible to wander. A heated pool in Bali? Even on the sunniest days, the warm water is welcome, as the resort is quite high up, and evenings/early mornings can be cool. Buffet or a la carte meals in the main restaurant were varied and excellent. Music and Balinese dancing are provided almost every night. Although the food is generally westernized, brilliant chef CK will arrange authentic Balinese dishes, and even a full-scale rijstaffel at a reasonable price. Staff in general are wonderful here -- not just the legendary Balinese smiles, but genuine helpfulness and kindness. Resort experience manager Deasy
title: Idyllic up-country resort for scenic beauty, peace and quiet

text: Since I was solo traveling, i always tried looking for small boutique hotels. So for me, this was an unsure call.. i'm happy to say now, that it was for sure a right call! The room was spacious with a balcony and the best green views. The staff were SUPER friendly and helpful! The spa is something else outta this world. And finally the pool? I could stay there forever. Haha! They also offer free shuttle transfer to town, as well as activities such as yoga, cycling and others! Make sure you ask the reception to know more!
title: A Room With A View

text: Sitting in the rain forest with Magnificent views and gardens surrounding this hotel their gardens are great for an early morning or evening walk. They also have a vegetable and fruit garden for hotel use, I was very impressed with this. The hotel give guided tours through them, worth doing. Also a walking/ jogging track. Though we are unable to do this our selves Ive been told by other guests it is one of the best as it goes through the rain forest. We stayed in the club room suites, and the room was extremely well thought out. One thing that impressed us was all the switches for lights etc had names on
title: Our Honeymoon Resort in Tropical Paradise

text: So I stay here for two nights. From the beginning, the hospitality are great. Especially the activity division. Theyâ€™re very kind and always care with their guest. Lastly, shotout for one of the butler named agus mikadana for teaching me how to fishing there. :)

date post: Julie P wrote a review Sep 2016
text: So impressed with this new resort outside of Ubud. First impressions are 'wow', what a magnificent foyer and reception area with beautiful landscaping and even a couple of trendy vertical green walls. It's inifinity pool is just amazing if a tad too warm and service very good particularly the guys at the swim up bar. This place is for rest and relaxation. We had a lovely massage which came as part of the package deal. It's quiet and peaceful as it's half an hour out of Ubud in a bamboo forest. That distance from Ubud means you have to be content with hotel food, and it was good, but if you are staying for more than three days you may want to taxi into a Ubud restaurant. We did catch the hotel shuttle during the day to shop in Ubud and were glad to escape the chaos and noise
title: Wow!

date post: Cynthia K wrote a review Jul 2016
text: So today is my birthday and my boyfriend surprise me with lunch at parma and the view was so awesome! and i've meet the one who helped my bf her name is anita cicilia she's so nice and helpful! love her! for the food , appetiser not so good but for the main course so good! love it! the room so cozy and nice LOVE IT!
title: i'm impress , for real!

date post: Steven K wrote a review Dec 2020
text: So we stayed 2 nights in Padma and did the Archery Activity on the last day. Pak Made was very nice and patient with my group, so the whole family ended up having a blast in this free of charge activity. Thank tou for the good experience.
title: Outdoor Archery Activity was FUN

text: special thanks to all the team, for the pool staffs and everyone! trying their best and greatest infinity pool and trying the food in the pool restaurant, everything is excellent! special thanks to mr.putu, who recommend this place. service was amazing! thanks to mr.koka, rizkia, I kadek slamet, ilham and catur. wow! I remember their name, it's because they're doing their job very good! so memorable! and also, the food, its good, I mean, for nasi goreng is a good portions with the condiments. and also, crab salad, so fresh! I'm here with my friends, which is, they are on holiday, and they want to spending their last day in beautiful place, and voile, they are really happy! again, I will recommend this place to another my friends, relatives too. HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PLACE!
title: June 2016

text: Staff very committed. Hotel top quality. It's a bit isolated but there's free trips to town and back. The pool is excellent - v warm and great bar. The food is excellent too. The organic garden is worth a visit. Our room was phenomenal. The bathroom was designer. The hotel is only a couple of years old and all the fixtures and fittings are brand spanking new. Go there. You won't regret.

date post: Michael T wrote a review Jun 2016
text: Started the holiday off with a bang! The hotel transfer was great, very friendly and happy to talk while on the decent drive to Padma Ubud. Once there greated with smiles and amazing service. We were in our room and shown around with 10min. Pool is amazing!! And warm even when slightly cold outside for Bali. Swim up bar was great and the service around the pool was outstanding. I would highly recommended Padma Ubud for people who want to get away from the typical busy Bali to unwind and relax. Amazing!
title: What an amazing way to start our holiday

date post: Erlin tirto wrote a review Nov 2020
text: Stay for 2 nights in Padma Ubud, likely the other Padma hotels I ever stayed,I love the most is Padma Ubud, the weather,the room,their pillow menu,we tried free Yoga and cycling program its very nice. The room was very clean.the breakfast had many various menu and fresh juice. The most favourite things is their pool and tried practising Yoga in their bamboo nest.All the staff was very friendly and helpfull.
title: Hidden gem in Ubud

text: Stay there for New Year's eve with friends. Plus: The rate really worthed for New Year's eve. The room was so clean. Give refill for mineral water. The room was really clean. The waiter still tried to accomodate the need even when the resto was so full. Love the guy who escort us to the room and explain the room functions. The Housekeeping who can explain what to do and to see in the resort..... 2 thumbs up.... Love the way the staff, even the managerial level to greet the guests upon arrival and leaving the resort.... Never see things like this..... Small attention but really bring big impact. Minus: The Sofa in balkon not really clean. At first thought that the new year's eve will be average or boring. But the staffs who really made the events Happening. The hotel design
title: Nice Hotel for escape

text: Stayed for four nights at Padma Resort 14-18th February 2017. This was our first time in Bali and Padma was our first 4 nights with a further 6 in Seminyak. We booked the hotel through the Flight Centre as part of a 3 stop package so i'm not entirely sure of the price we paid for this resort (it was worth it whatever we paid anyway) Our transfer took around 90mins from the airport. (it takes 2 hours to transfer to Seminyak). We did not use the hotel transfer service from the airport as we used Buffalo tours as our transfer provider (found to be a very good in Kuala Lumpur, Singapore and now Bali). We arrived late into the resort and although it was very quiet we were welcomed by staff and provided with a refreshing drink. Check in process was simple and quick. We were
title: Paradise in Heaven

text: Stayed here (1x person) in march 2016 and used there special openingsoffer. Stayed 3x nights in a Premier Room incl bfst, high tea, dinner and massage. As they only had this offer for two persons in a room... They gave me 2x dinners and 2x massages. I would give 5* for the location and the crazy beautiful infinity pool! If you want to relax by the pool or enjoy the fantastic scenery, this is the place to go. It is far away from everything and it will take a long drive to Ubud. If you need some action or want to go shopping, I suggest you request a free ride to their sister hotel in Legian and make you're own way back to the hotel. Lots of guests divide their stay between the two hotels so a few times a week they will drive to Legian. Do participate in the free cyclingtour
title: What a view...

date post: keava h wrote a review Aug 2016
text: Stayed here for 3 days, wished it was longer, loved the seclusion. Free Shuttle into busy Ubud and return 3 or 4 times a day. Rooms big and well appointed. Great bathrooms. Good wifi throughout. Good food and service. Will return. Clean restaurant and service around the pool was very good.
title: 10/10 amazing visit, everything about it is perfect. Great get away abit far from Ubud maybe 30 minute drive

text: Stayed here with my girlfriend over her birthday and what a place to stay. The quality of the rooms are second to none and I don't even need to say how amazing the pool is. I think a lot has to do with the staff at hotels on the overall experience and Padma Ubud has without question the best hotel staff I've experience. Super friendly and went above and beyond when I was feeling sick.

Staying 4 days in kuta with fun and hassle make me think to decide for a relaxing time in ubud... Too many hotel in ubud but my eyes locked in to padma ubud. A bit nervous because the hotel is new and far from city but hey, it is just a perfect place for me. To make my adventure complete, I decided to drive by myself there, it was long but fun drive. When I reach the hotel entrance, greeted by the security and continuo another 5 mins drive to reach lobby, reaching reception and she knows my name.. Yes, it calls 5 stars service. Room is amazing, with balcony and OMG the bathroom, I just can't believe the space and design. Jump into infinity pool while sipping padma belissima is just a good starting. Breakfast is wonderful.. Too many food.. I gave a try for a village tour, it was
title: Don't want to leave!!!!

date post: Steanley S wrote a review Nov 2016
text: Staying at this resort during my holiday in July and November. This place is amazing with the infinity pool facing the jugle the view was so peaceful. Clement as a new duty manager was so friendly and professional. Fiska as a staff is also so helpful and polite. I will definitely come back again in the future. Thanks Padma!
title: Amazing Resort.

text: Stunning resort with amazing grounds, rooms, facilities and staff. The infinity pool is not only beautiful to look at but is the perfect temperature for swimming. The spa is top notch international quality. The food and beverages are all delicious. The staff cannot do enough for you. We cannot recommend Padma Resort Ubud highly enough!
title: Perfectly placed retreat

date post: Adi Ze bali wrote a review Nov 2020
text: Sudah ke 3x nya visit tempat ini dan tetap ingin kembali lagi to chill and having fun with fam, 20 nov is my bday, so i spend all day with fam by the pool ... good atmosphere, tasty food, best service we ever had.. specially thank u for mr Trio and Slamet for great and superb hospitality selama kami disana ðŸ™ðŸ¼, kids was happy and enjoy at kid pool area.... recomend and for sure we will be back again in very soon... cheers âœ¨âœ¨âœ¨

text: text
title: title

text: Thank you for the Hotel staffs who always accompanied my and my son and wife during each of us and family activities, enjoyable and remakable stay @ Padma Hotel in Ubud for my family due to its good facilities and warm treatment from its managment and staffs. It's our 3rd to visit and stayed to this Padma Hotel in Ubud besides visited and stayed in Padma Hotel in Bandung. My wife has manicure and padicure and scrubbed for her self i the Ubud Hotel Spa. For my self, without my knowing,it turns out that now they already have a driving range so that I
title: Very enjoyable family and me time for each of us

text: Thank you Padma for sharing this magical jungle retreat with us tourist. Be prepared to be gobbsmacked the landscapeing adds to the natural beauty. The young vibrant staff are so helpful and friendly. The view from our balcony was so serene felt like we where soaring above the trees The way you designed the pool ponds artwork are amazing can't wait to return. Pool bar coctails and food in pool restaurant were delicious.
title: Mrs Grace

text: thank you Padma Ubud for the amazing service and experience. 2020 is a difficult year.. so me and my husband squeeze a short holidat to bali, to kick-off 2021. We choose padma ubud, because we wanted a nice relaxing stay.. and we could not have made a better decision. The hotel location is further than what we had expected, but the air is so much fresher and the view is so much nicer comparing to the ubud places that we have been before. The hotel itself is well built and maintained... They successfully capture the essence of Balinese architecture. Its beautiful, not in the glamourous sense, but in the most subtle and graceful way. The room is huge with breathtaking view of Ubud lively forest and wild lives. The bathroom is to die for.. but thats not the best thing about
title: Amazing experience in Padma Ubud

text: Thanks Padma Ubud for the excellent and valued hospitality that you have provided to me.The hotel is comfortable, the service of the staff is amazingly friendly and helpful. The management of the hotel is doing its job very well. Breakfast and afternoon tea opportunities are high quality and delicious. Will definitely stay here again when in Bali. You should absolutely try the indoor/outdoor activities of Padma Ubud. Mr Sudana who assisted me during trekking/yoga was super helpful, funny and friendly. I have spent an unforgettable, spritual as well as safe trekking experience with him. He always care with me for my safety first. Appreciated his efforts and welcoming attitude during my stay in Padma. I would like to mention one of the hotel staff, Mr Kayan as well, he was the
title: Unforgettable Holiday

date post: Joe M wrote a review Jan 2017
text: The amazing pool with warm water and jungle view. it make me so relax. large and clean room. perfect. Arya as trainer at the gym was great and smart, he assisted and gived me an exercise that i need. So helpful
title: Amazing day

text: The best experience so far!! All the staff and crew especially Bli Tama and Bli Tenu a.k.a Mr. Lee they are doing extramile and very supportive during all the activities. Thankyou so much padma ubud see you not a goodbye.

The best service in the best resort. Very beautiful room with big and luxury bathroom, cleaned two times a day. Very nice infinity pool, many activities for guests, everyday yoga, free shuttle to Ubud, afternoon tea, tasty brekfast. Everything was awesome. The lobby si very beautiful built in traditional architectur. People working in Padma are very very friendly and helpful.

the best stay so far, the spa is so relaxing, the quality of the restaurant is good, the breakfast quality is excellent, aktifitasnya banyak banget jadi betah nginep. I love the yoga session with Mr. Lenu Jumata. The golf and archery session is fun too. Would definetly come back to stay here again!
title: I love it!

text: the best stay so far, the spa is so relaxing, the quality of the restaurant is good, the breakfast quality is excellent, aktifitasnya banyak banget jadi betah nginep. I love the yoga session with Mr. Lenu Jumata. The golf and archery session is fun too. Would definetly come back to stay here again!
title: I love it!

date post: Martha L wrote a review Sep 2016
text: The club lounge problem The price difference between premier room and premier club room is about 60 USD a day, but the club benefit is absolutely worthless. Canafes with cocktail is the residue of afternoon tea, and the taste is horrible, because the snack with afternoon tea itself is terrible. You can get 20% off from the Spa there, but the spa itself is very overpriced(you pay 100,000 more to get frangipani oil, which is freely provided in other spa place like Ubud Traditional Spa). You get 15% off from the restaurant, but the food is no good, considering the price. You can get soft drinks all the time while the club lounge opened, but it is painful to get in there; You should pass the big aisle of the Puhu restaurant and identify yourself overtime you go to club lounge.
title: FLAWLESS!

date post: Lidia V wrote a review Jan 2017
text: The hotel is amazing, the staff couldn't be more friendly and willing to help, rooms are great and quiet, food is fantastic and the pool - well there are not many places where you can sit all day in the pool enjoying views over the jungle and drinking your favourite cocktails. It is actually warmer in the pool than out when it's cloudy or in the evening so the pool bar becomes the perfect meeting/social place. There is little to fault this hotel "providing" it is what you are looking for, it is remote - the nearest town; Ubud, is 30 - 40 minutes away. We rented a motorbike which allowed us to explore the area and go to town whenever we chose otherwise you are reliant on the shuttle bus or taking a taxi. So if you are looking for that peaceful, relaxing, get-away-from-it-all kind
title: We are moving in!!!

text: The hotel is located near Kintamani, up higher than central Of Ubud. Its pretty remoted location is compensated by Great view of the valley and jungle equipped with perfectly built outdoor pool. Room is clean and facilities in are Good. Padma is Known with its breakfast food, dishes are tasty, well-varied. Unfortunately, jogging track and other building of the hotel are under Construction. Other downside is they provide a very expensive transport to the AirPort, so better prepare self-rental vehicle.

date post: Paul D wrote a review Mar 2016
text: The hotel is set in a beautiful landscape. The rooms are spacious, offering a jacuzzi tub and a shower room in the bathroom. You can have a selection of pillows and if you come with a big family, you can request rooms with connecting doors. During the weekends they offer free sunrise yoga sessions by the pool. The jogging track within the compound is nice and safe, and the swimming pool is heated so wont be freezing if you want to swim early in the morning. They also have a kids' club complete with beds for your tots to have a nap. They offer free afternoon tea, which is a serious affair complete with dim sums and cakes.
title: Amazing place, away from it all.

text: The hotel was great. I've never seen such a pool before with such a nice view. The staff is really friendly and helpful. The room was really big and clean. We felt as if we would have been on honeymoon. ;-) Daniela und Adrian Switzerland
title: Lovely stay

text: the infinity pool surrounding with stunning view is amazing... suite room with outdoor private jacuzzi facing the nature view... soooooo peaceful. they offer 24hrs private butler. if needed peaceful time, this place is the one .
title: Absolutely Lovely

text: The main reason we booked Padma was due it's huge infinity pool, wow, just stunning. The fact that it was heated was so handy when the temperature went down in the evening or when it was raining.. Staff was very polite at every step you made. Best food was served by the pool with an amazing view.. Have I mentioned breakfast? Superb, the amount of choices, would defiantly please everyone's taste. Room spacious, very quiet AC, perfect for light sleepers. ;) It was our engagement anniversary and we got greeted with a cake in a room, when leaving, plate with fruits. Amazing afternoon tea as well.. Maybe a bit more sour choices for vegetarians would be nice, on first day only could eat spring rolls.. :( As we were already staying in Ubud hotel was very welcoming and arranged
title: Just wow!

text: The marshall Agus Mikadana is excelent personality... the route he brought us to explore ubud was good... we went to ruce field..pura local temple ..he told us about every thing we passed... excelent... recomended activity at hotel padma ubud
title: Honest review

text: The nicest resort we have ever stayed in. It's only 12 mths old so still immaculately kept. The staff are incredibly attentive and nothing is too much for them. The views over the pool and from the dining room at to die for. It is about 30 min via car from Ubud. So it's a little isolating. But there really is no need to leave the resort. Highly recommend.
title: Outstanding

date post: Adam H wrote a review Mar 2016
text: The Padma is in Payangan about 40 mins outside of Ubud. The hotel has free shuttle service 4 times a day but if you wish to go out for dinner the transport arranged by the hotel costs 250,000 rupiah one way. We would have not mind the costs but the food at the restaurant is pretty average by Bali standards. The cocktails were very average and disappointingly the pool bar that was something we were looking forward to never had anyone to get drinks from. I don't see the point of that. The people who worked here were very friendly but sometimes getting simple requests across in English proved difficult which resulted in errors to room service. The rooms were nice and the pool lovely. I wouldn't recommend anyone to stay here currently although I do think the desire to make the
title: Not in Ubud

text: The Padma resort in Ubud is absolutely picturesque. Even though the hotel is large, you feel as if you are quietly nestled in the jungle. Whilst the hotel itself is beautiful, it is the staff that turned this holiday into the best holiday of our lives. Bima and Guna were the happiest and most caring butlers, and they greeted us every morning with a big smile and a chat. Bima helped us create an itinerary for our trip and organised trips to the zoo and drivers for us, which really made our holiday incredible. Koka made sure that every night we were happy in the restaurant and his service was absolutely amazing. Adana also made every meal enjoyable, whether it was room service or in the restaurant - his happy and positive attitude made us feel happy and relaxed. Mudana and Dedi
title: The most beautiful place we have EVER stayed

text: The Padma Resort in Ubud is one of the most beautiful hotels I have ever stayed in. Upon arrival we were given a room upgrade which was so lovely, and our room offered stunning views over the pool and neighboring rice fields and jungles. The staff were so helpful and accommodating, even with our midnight arrival. They offered us free airport transfers and were able to organize them last minute for us as we had a flight cancellation. The rooms were incredibly big and luxurious, with one of the most comfortable hotel beds I have ever experienced, and excellent air conditioning to combat the outside humidity. As well as all that, they also had the biggest range of food I have ever seen at a breakfast buffet. It was amazing!

The Padma Resort is a beautiful paradise. I've been to Bali a few times now, and I've stayed at different resorts all around the Island. Nothing compares to the Padma Resort in Ubud! Ever since my first stay at the Padma, I have never stayed anywhere else in Bali because I love this resort SO much. The Padma resort is much more than just a place to stay and sleep while on vacation. The Padma resort is an experience! I firmly believe that the best things in life are not things, but they're experiences! Padma Resort Ubud could also be know as "Heaven on Earth" or "Land of smiles" *The land that the hotel is built on is beautiful; full of colorful flowers, trees, and wildlife. The architecture of the building is stunning and very detailed. The views of the jungle, the sunrise, and
title: Wow, just Wow!

text: The Padma Ubud is amazing, always replaced daily are good quality shampoo conditioner toothbrush and paste also bottled water. Fantastic infinity pool staff are so kind. Food was really fantastic and they had lots of gluten free options. I would 100% recommend this beautiful resort 40mins from Ubud. The massage we had was 60 mins and was so good. See you again soon ðŸ˜€ðŸŒ´ðŸ¹ðŸŒº
title: Perfect Place to Relax

date post: Kerry C wrote a review Nov 2016
text: The Padma Ubud is soo visually stimulating it's something that has to be experienced. The buildings , rooms etc are a level above as is the infinity pool , surrounding gardens and hilltop jungle location . I just smiled as I strolled around . Because it's a little out of town 40 minutes by shuttle we where a little disappointed by the food & lack of alternatives for activities. But none the less thoroughly enjoyed our 5 night stay . Which was probably enough time ..
title: Fantastic !!!

text: The Padma Ubud was a fantastic, five star experience. The hotel is beautiful and very well kept, with staff that are constantly trying to improve the experience. We stayed 6 nights (I'll admit 6 nights may have been too much given we are younger and were looking for a social scene as well). The hotel is pretty far removed from town - 30-40 minutes north of Ubud; this makes for some beautiful untouched scenery, but as I said, not the most social scene. If you're up to it, I'd highly recommend renting a scooter in Ubud so that you have freedom to go to town whenever you want - the shuttle to and from Ubud doesn't run as often as I had hoped. Overall, an awesome experience. This was one of my most memorable experiences in Indonesia.
title: Incredible Piece of Heaven

text: The Padma Ubud was a wonderful, relaxing resort. The staff in all areas from front of house to the spa were amazing. The infinity pool area had a magical view, with a great poolside cafe. The breakfast variety and fresh juices were a standout. We stayed on level 2 which central to everything.
title: Rejuvenating Effect

date post: amanda d wrote a review Aug 2016
text: The place is very nice, peace and quiet. i stay there for 4 days and totally satisfied. the room very big, the breakfast was amazing, the view... fantastic, the infinity pool was great. the place i a bit far from Ubud Centre.. but it is worth it ! Love the morning view, all green, fresh air and feels we are in the middle of jungle. heaven !
title: Incredible!

date post: Sophie S wrote a review Sep 2016
text: The real reason for a stay here would obviously be the stunning heated infinity pool. It's views will not disappoint. Weather is cooler in ubud so the heated pool is a blessing! Rooms were standard, although the heated towel rails are a nice addition! Views lovely from the standard room type. Staff are lovely and helpful, however where the resort failed to gain 5 stars for me was their food and drink. Cocktails weren't great and food only so so. Afternoon tea disappointing. The resort is also a 40 minute drive from the town of Ubud so not great as a base I you wish to explore the area. Best if you just wish to lay back and enjoy the view. Kids were catered for, however it felt mainly like a couples resort.
title: Good for a once off visit

text: The resort is about 40 mins by car from Ubud. If you don't like stay in crowd town, it is a good choice to relax. It's quite large and beautiful. With its own pool and bamboo forest, you can spend time swimming and wandering. The spa is good, too. The staffs all are friendly and helpful. If the shuttle bus time could be more, the dinner choices more, it would be wonderful! In short, we had a great time!
title: As picturesque as the website photos

text: The Resort Was Awesome, Clean and comfort room, the staff are very friendly and helpful, warm hospitality, best service and many activities, we will come back again and for sure one night is not enough to explore the resort area, we will back for sure
title: Short escape

date post: Cheryl T wrote a review May 2016
text: The resort was beautiful and so peaceful. Waking up to the view outside my suite was such an amazing one, even with my private jacuzzi in the privacy of my room. The hospitality there was great too, when needed assistance, I could feel the sincerity. Thank you
title: Simply beautiful

date post: Imam H wrote a review Jan 10
text: The room was clean and large, activities are awesome, the view outside is good, breakfast was many various and delicious, staf was friendly, shampoo and shower gel was fragrant, the pool are unique and large with the maginifent view.
title: Staycation at Padma Ubud

text: The rooms are fantastic and the lobby has a good feeling resort ambiance. The infinity looking pool is awesome with the view of the greenery. In the evening the lights are beautiful lighting up at the bottom of Swimming pool. The sounds of the guests who are screaming while singing (out of tune) will be one of the matter which we'd love to stay away. We had dinner in the restaurant near the Swimming pool, it was delicious dinner. Our expectation was high when we were having dinner upstairs as it looks exclusive. Unfortunately, the quality of the foods did not match us. Our children ordered 2 hotdogs which took 2 hours Long. We kept on asking 5 waiters but we still have to wait until all of us finished the main courses and desserts, then 1 hotdog arrived. Fair enough, they did

date post: Viola K wrote a review Jul 2016
text: The scenery from the hotel pool and breakfast area is one of the most beautiful I've ever seen, overlooking rice fields with mountains in the back. Hotel rooms are very modern and clean. Staffs are all polite, friendly and professional. It is the perfect hotel for a city get away. Hotel also provides various free activities throughout your stay, including village visits, outdoor cycling, yoga and gym classes. I would say it is suitable for family as well as couples. Spa is wonderful, best to book one day prior as it is quite high in demand. The only thing I might critic on would be the food. Maybe best to stick with Westerb foods when you're there, as their Asian dishes could be quite dry.
title: Beautiful and professional

text: The second time we visited here. Its still amazing experience. The staff are top notch and our kids are very happy . The are mini zoo beside the garden. Our kids really like feeding animals, farming in the garden accompanied by friendly hotel staff
title: Amazing Place and Staff

text: The staff at Padma Ubud were fantastic, nothing was too much trouble, in particular Fariz the butler, Nico and Komang out front and in the restaurant. These guys made the trip and stay really relaxing, they are a credit to the Padma. The hotel was excellent the in house restaurants were lively,, with great food and service. Would go back anytime

The surrounding is just breathtaking, couldnt get enough The rooms are big with a nice balcony and view of the jungle There are plenty of activities, i did the cycling twice and loved it Shuttle to ubud (30-40min) is for free The pool! loved it! Breakfast couldnt be any better, dinner is also good In case you end up graving for some snacks they dont have at the hotel: there s a minimarket in front of the security gate ;)
title: Amazing

text: The view from the pool at Padma Resort Ubud was nice, staff was very attentive and helpful. the drink price was expensive, but the place was too far from the airport. overall was meet my expectations.
title: A true Bali experience at its best.

text: There is nothing i could say except This Resort was amazing place, i will come back again of course. Beautiful Pak and infinity pool was enjoy for relax, warm water and had a pool bar. Really wanna make u always stay in the pool haha. The food are soooo delicious have so many varieties western, asian, balinese. Jogging track, and so many things u can do in here there's yoga sunset, ahh i was so happy. If u want stay in here u must dont wanna go home. I would recommend this hotel for u all honeymooners ðŸ˜„
title: Amazing stay in Here

text: There's not much else to say besides what everyone else has written. Can not fault this place. Perfect staff, breathtaking setting, delicious food, so much attention to every single detail. I was worried the restaurant would be expensive being 5 star resort but the prices were still so reasonable but the food just amazing. Padma is truely for relaxation. We had an infant with us and visited the kids club-I have never been so impressed. All staff, especially Ita, were always so excited to see him and make him smile! The Spa is like an underground cave and I had the best relaxation massage and the best manicure I have ever had. The pool-heated and beautiful. Yes I believe Ubud centre is a little distance away but there is a shuttle but we had no need to leave the Padma. My
title: Highly recommend - staff amazing

date post: Ayu S wrote a review Nov 2016
text: This afternoon i stopped by at padma resort ubud to having light meal and coffee. We went to the pool restaurant and enjoyed the amazing view from our table. We ordered pizza, healthy juice and coffee. The food and beverages was awesome but the service need more improvement. The coffee came without sugar. I asked some sugar to the waiter but he didnt come to bring the sugar. I decided to took a bowl of sugar from empty used table. And at the end when i paid my bill the cashier didnt show any friendly smile to us. Overall i was really adore the ambience but the service was average.
title: Awesome meal but average service

date post: The Yum L wrote a review Jan 2017
text: This beautiful new property has stunning views out over the valley. The pool is one of the best we've seen in our travels - well worth getting up at sunrise to watch the mist rise over the mountains and get photos from the pool. It's about 40 minutes drive from Ubud, but there is a shuttle bus that makes regular trips to and from the township. With everything being new, the rooms are spacious and exquisite. When we stayed in April they had only been open for a short time and were still refining their food and beverage options. The owners clearly have a passion for art and the resort is filled with pieces by local artists.
title: Padma Resort Ubud

text: This being our fifth visit to Bali, we decided to stay somewhere different and thus chose Padma Ubud Resort. Stayed 4 nights at the resort. And I must admit this was possibly the best trip to Bali. My family loved the greenery and lush surroundings. The heated infinity is definitely the best attraction at this hotel. The view from our room and at Puhu restaurant was simply breathtaking. Rooms were clean and spacious. Bathrooms came with separate shower and bath. And quality of service from the staff was top notch. Thank you Padma Ubud for the wonderful stay.

This brand new resort has everything that you need for a family holiday. It has a complete range of facilities & amenities, including a very clean kids' club. It also has a walking/jogging track that goes down from the main swimming pool, all the way to a small river in the valley below, complete with a pretty interesting bamboo bridge. The surrounding views of the green valley & rice terraces are also an added bonus.

date post: Mimi M wrote a review Jan 2017
text: This hotel far exceeded our expectations. From the first minute we were greeted with smiles and a warm nature and this was prevalent throughout our stay. The rooms and facilities are world class and the activities provided make this hotel a place where you don't have to leave the front gates. These include daily morning yoga, a giant infinity pool, gym facilities, daily free cocktails from 4.30-6.30 in the club lounge and so much more... I strongly recommend the club lounge which gives your stay an extra exclusivity, where Debby and her crew will add the cherry on top of a truely beautiful hotel set amongst a breathtaking backdrop. We only stayed for 3 nights but really wanted to extend our stay for much longer.
title: Just WOW!

text: This hotel has the WOW factor amazing views, hotel has the modern rooms which are gorgeous but the hotel itself has the Balinese influence! Everywhere we looked was perfect Pool is amazing Food was beautiful the staff even catered for things that were not on menu Staff went way & beyond to please us! Special mention to Bima Tomo who was always checking on my girls & I Bima is very caring & goes out of his way he truly loves his job & being in the hospitality industry love u Bima I am sorry as their was 2 people from Management cannot remember their names they will know who were so very kind & considerate towards us BIG THANK U The staff at Padma Ubud are excellent at customer service & they are genuine its not just a job to them they love what they do & it shows we

This hotel have everything that u need. Many activities u can join for free. Excellent staff, nicest pool, nicest breakfast & afternoon tea. Especially thank you for Mr. Lee jari made my first aerial yoga class activity more enjoyable.
title: What a nice stay and alot of activities!

date post: Ridha W wrote a review Jan 2017
text: This hotel is amazing, nice room with large bathtube, great view from the balcony, delicious food (wa order beef kebab and pizza), breakfast. Warm and great services. Swimming pool is very clean and awesome. Very nice experience for us, will be back here someday
title: Babymoon

text: This hotel is beautiful! The breakfast buffet was delicious with many food options. The buffet is included with the room which is nice and it is located on the top floor with gorgeous views of the forest. The hotel room was very clean and nicely decorated. We also enjoyed a couples massage that was decently priced. You can also get spa treatments in the town of ubud for 1/8 of the price. But the town is a good 45 minutes away with limited shuttle times. We had to order a cab and a driver for each day to explore ubud. The staff was beyond excellent best customer service I have encountered (especially from being from the US). The reason I gave 4 star instead of 5 was because of limited transportation times into the town. The first being at 11, we like to explore in the morning.
title: A fantastic experience

text: This hotel is hands down the best hotel we have ever visited. As soon as you arrive staff are so welcoming and friendly and always do their best to make your stay as enjoyable as possible. We had some issues with the adaptors in our room which they sorted it out quickly. They even organised a breakfast box for us when we told them we were going on a sunrise mountain trek. The rooms are super spacious with lovely comfy beds and a great sized bathroom. Private balcony is also wonderful. All rooms come with a private balcony. The infinity pool is amazing, as well as the swim up pool bar. The hotel spa is top notch, and all the food is of a good standard. Love having the free shuttle to take us into Ubud centre as well. Please note that it is 45 mins away from Ubud centre so if
title: Amazing

text: This hotel is really something else. First of all they pick you up from and to the airport for FREE. Their check in process is something else and wonderful because it's outdoor check in where you can enjoy their welcoming drink with an amazing lemon grass. They smile all the time and they make you feel like home, the room is amazing and everyday they make a design of the towels ( elephant, crab and goose), the bed makes you don't want to get out of it, and also what I loved about their room is that they have a drying hanger where it will be hot and you can actually hang your wet clothes then early in the morning it will be dry. Breakfast is breathtaking because of the view over the infinity pool and the amazing nature. They have a shuttle from 6 am to 9 pm to ubud centre which

This hotel is very new (it opened in February '16) and located in Payangan village, about 40 minutes from central Ubud. The isolated location makes it an excellent place to just unwind and soak in the view of the surrounding jungle. Note that the hotel is on the other side of the main road, so it does not face the Ayung river (many of the other top luxury hotels in Ubud do). There is a small river that can be reached via the jogging track, and a nice bamboo bridge. The staff and service are very accommodating and friendly, always ready to greet you with a smile. Facility-wise, the breathtaking (especially when viewed from the lounge at 4th floor), heated infinity pool is the big drawcard here. There is a pool bar, but it only opens until 6 pm. The jogging track is also
title: Lovely, isolated location with excellent service

text: This hotel was everything I needed it to be. After a five day stay in Seminyak at a small and slightly claustrophobic hotel (nothing against the hotel, just not what I prefer), it was heaven. A beautiful hotel with lots of open space and attentive, but not smothering, service, it was an oasis. Set in the middle of the jungle, secluded, but five-star, it was perfect. A beautiful pool, lovely food, attentive service and facilities galore, it met every expectation. Of particular note was the bar attendant at the pool bar - Ecko. He was accommodating to our every need, as all the staff were, but he was real, authentic and professional. Our stay was enhanced by his mere presence. I cannot speak highly enough of his skills. As a worker in the hospitality industry at home, I know what
title: A big, open, regal hotel in the middle of paradise

text: This hotel was incredible from start to finish, checking in was a pleasure, reception is beautiful the room was spacious with a fantastic view, the restaurant served incredibly tasty food and the pool area was absolutely stunning for taking photos in the infinity pool. The hotel was quite quiet when we were there I suspect this won't last for long once the word gets out!!
title: One of the best hotels I've stayed in!

text: This hotel was just great ! it was our fist stay in Ubud Padma Resort, and we firstly got amazed with the situation of it, the Hotel is literally in the midst of the Jungle, with nothing surrounding it, just a long sandy track that allows you to get deep in the jungle. The pool was the most amazing pool we have ever seen, of course an infinity pool with the views towards the virgin Jungle. The food was pretty good with a large list of choices that you will get sometimes stuck, however everything you get will worthwhile. Traditional food and Occidental food are available any time you want. The staff main characteristic was its Kindness and predisposition to make your stay confortable and cozy. The rooms were towards the Jungle with outstanding views as well. We just have good
title: Lovely and quiet

date post: Sandip P wrote a review Apr 2017
text: This hotel was really one of the most hotel that I would recommend in Ubud. The suites are very good with your own jacuzzi on the balcony. Service were great and food was ok The heated swimming pool was marvelous Overall very good experience.
title: Really good

text: This hotel was very good, nice place and nice building hotel in ubud. text: This is a dream location, its not close to Ubud but a short trip away, just go here to chill eat and relax, take in nature and let the world go by. I would highly recomend this to any visitor to Ubud or even Bali
title: Heaven

text: This is a very amazing hotel. I stayed during my honeymoon and their room ambience and especially the services are simply the best. A lot of activities in the hotel, great food, friendly and helpful staff. I tried jungle trekking provide by the hotel, and it was very fun. Tried the spa too it was very amazing ad reasonably priced. And at last we had a degustation dinner, the food and the decor of our table, and the ambiance is very satisfying. Good job padma hotel ubud, we definitely coming back here.

date post: John D wrote a review Jan 5
text: This is a wonderful place to spend a long weekend. The staff are top notch, the food is great and the location is very peaceful and relaxing. Hanging out in the infinity pool while gazing at the view is just wonderful.
title: Really beautiful resort in the mountains with breathtaking views.

date post: Alex C wrote a review Feb 2017
text: This is already a 5 star resort, the photos speak for themselves. For us, what gave this place an extra star was the customer service: 1) I asked the head waiter to help me carry out a surprise birthday cake for my wife's 40th birthday, he came out with his entire team helping with the singing. 2) Koka, (the restaurant manager?) was very attentive, and noticed my order of steamed fish didn't smell right. So he asked the chef to taste test and they both agreed it wasn't fresh, so didn't serve it. They apologised for the delay and cooked me another dish with a much fresher fish. 3) My son had a high fever, so we called the onsite nurse to visit him. Not sure how news travels internally but the next morning (he was feeling much better), as we went downstairs to the lobby, we
title: 6 stars - please read on

date post: Clara M wrote a review Jan 2017
text: This is an amazing resort set in an amazing location. One of the best resorts we have stayed and nothing like its Legian counterpart. The staff, service food and amenities are of the highest standard. Whether or not you chose to come here for a short or long break, with family or an adults only get-away you won't be disappointed. The rooms are gorgeous and the grounds with their paved and well maintained tracks up and down to the river will make you feel relaxed and refreshed. The gym is adequate, but better to get out and have a run on the running track, which is about a 3km loop, than stay indoors. The climate here is mild compared to the beach areas and the padma has accommodated for the cooler climate by heating its gorgeous infinity pool just enough to make it pleasant.
title: Incredible hotel!

text: This is an excellent hotel.the hotel has a lot of good activity utilizing it great location in the middle of nature. The swimming Pool is very nice. They have one restaurant. The club lounge and the rooms for this level is great. Good benefits for club residents

date post: Miki T wrote a review Jul 2016
text: This is first time to visit Bali and We have a great honeymoon in Padma Resort Ubud, the resort so beautiful, Swimming Pool was wonderful! Especially the room #216 view was perfect, facing the Pool view, we love it and hope that if come back can have the same room again for next time. Spa message was great. Staffs was very helpful and nice. The Restaurant food was very nice, staff are very friendly. Thanks for arrangement, we will come back again.
title: Honeymoon Trip 14-17/Jul

text: This is my first time visiting Padma Resort Ubud, and I am quite surprised by the variety of offered activities throughout our stay. One of our favorite activities was Afternoon Archery class. This class was taught by Mr. Kayan. He brilliantly demonstrated us the basics and the guidelines thoroughly. His explanations were easy to understand. A very friendly and easy to approach teacher for us beginners! Will definitely take another archery class on our next visit!

This is new hotel full of good surprises. The rooms are simply amazing, as the area surrounding the hotel. The infinity pool is the A MUST see and use object with !!! warm water where you can lay down for eternity even in chilly evenings. It is huge and long and scenery from it is simply breathtaking. Personal is so helpful and polite, so nice that you feel like a star in the hotel. Feels like all attention to you alone, despite the other guests. Hotel features SPA, sport room, amazing restaurant on top floor with delicious food and service. All we tried was so good! Yammy! Also each day hotel organizes some activities for guests, like yoga, trecking, bicycling, etc. Hotel takes you from airport and will bring you back to airport free of charge. Also, it has free shuttle service
title: Best experience ever in the Bali

text: This is one of the top hotels I have ever had the pleasure of staying at. It's incredibly beautiful and everything is pristine. I've fallen in love with Bali because of the Padma. The food at the restaurant is sensational! Honestly some of the best food I've ever eaten. I give this hotel a 10 out of 10! We also enjoyed the couples massage and it was perfect! I will definitely be returning to the Padma ðŸ™Œ
title: Perfection

text: This is our 2nd stay in Padma Ubud, and this time is with our 2 grown up son & daughter. We again stay at 3rd floor Padma Club rooms (without club benefits) for 3 nights, which are very clean, have very comfortable beds and with a great view to the pool and forests from the balcony. The rooms have great layout and huge bathroom areas so they are really nice. Breakfast selections are excellent with a good balance between Western, Asian and Indonesian dishes, and taste very nice as well (even though some indonesian dessert porridges are little bit too sweet to our standard). We also tried their dinner buffett which also comes with very good selections and taste nice as well. Services are very nice, special thanks to their staffs and butlers (and to Daisy their nice Resources

This is our first family trip in COVID ERA and I would like to use this review to point out my appreciation to the staff at Padma Ubud. You all doing a superb job, making us guests feel safe and comfortable during our stay. From security at the gate, housekeeping, front lobby, mini zoo, etc, you all make us feel at home. I couldn't recommend more for people that are planning to stay in Ubud area to stay at Padma Ubud Resort. For all the facilities, dining experience, room condition is top notch. Couldn't ask for more.
title: First Class Service

text: This is our second time here. First in Aug 2019. Then Dec 2020 when pandemic strikes. So... i have comparison about their service before and at pandemic. I have to say i am impressed! title: Still most Fav in Bali

date post: Danielle L wrote a review Jan 2017
text: This is the 2nd time we've been here and absolutely love it! Can not fault it. Try the mixology class. We did it with eko and had a ball! You get to pick your own ingredients out of the beautiful garden for your cocktails. Was amazing.
title: Bliss!

date post: Dita A wrote a review Feb 2016
text: This is the first time my husband and I have stayed at Padma Ubud and we had the best experience ever during our stay at Padma Ubud, it is like small paradise in Ubud, the hotel room was spacious, the room view was amazing, fine dining and room service was excellent, infinity pool was beautiful. At this time I would like to say thank you to all staff there, especially to Deasy, Akbar, Ari, and Koka, they were so great and totally help me to arrange my husband's birthday surprise at Puhu Restaurant last Sunday. They always give the best service to us and know exactly how to pamper us. My husband and I was so happy. We really didn't want to leave and we hope to come back again, we couldn't have found a better place. W definitely in love with Padma Ubud!!!
title: Amazing honeymoon and husband's birthady at Padma Ubud

text: This is the first time we have stayed near Ubud. The Padma resort is approximately 30 minutes drive from Ubud itself thus making it 2 hours from the airport. We had booked to stay for 3 nights then move on to the Padma resort in Legian. I must say the resort is stunning. Set into natural bush and surrounded by rainforest it gives the place a very tranquil feel. As this is a new resort there were not many people staying. We were given room upgrades on arrival (room 217 looks over the pool area with a lovely view of the rainforest) The service from all staff was exceptional. This was partly due to the fact that there were only a handful of guests, but also it is a Padma resort, which are known for their service and attention to detail. One of the great things about this resort is
title: 3 day stay at Padma resort Ubud - sensational

date post: Richard A wrote a review Sep 2016
text: This Padma resort is relatively a new hotel and located in Ubud, Bali. We were staying at the middle tower facing the infinity pool, with a breathtaking view. The rooms are big, efficiently layout and comes with very good furnishing and quality workmanship. Beds are very comfortable, their spas are also very good. Restaurant offer good selection and taste of food during breakfast. Their infinity pool is very2 nice, and the water is also heated which makes it very comfortable in a chilled weather of Ubud. The only downside so far is their gym as it is very small and not equipped with proper gym equipment for hotel this size and quality. Their location is also pretty remote but hotel offers free & convenient shuttle service to Ubud central. We'll definitely come back.
title: Excellent Padma Resort

text: This place can be defined only in one word -Stunning!! Even better than Padma Legian (which is good too). We stayed at Padma resort Ubud for 5 nights. It's approx 35mins away from Ubud's craziness. We love peace and quiet. The valley view is just breathtaking. Kids club is entertaining. More toys and books will be a welcome addition. Kids club staff are gentle and beautiful. My daughter had a great time doing daily activities. She kept wanting to go back even after we had checked out. We got a room with a valley view and the infinity pool view. We took club premier room which came with club access. Breakfast was included. Fantastic spread. Mixed varieties for all kinds of tastes. Hot fresh food section was amazing. Staff were friendly and very helpful. Always with a

date post: Roger C wrote a review Oct 2016
text: This place has it all. It may be a bit removed from all the hustle and bustle of Seminyak etc but the service is beyond reproach. Nothing is to hard for them. Views and amenities are perfect. Wife has a gluten intolerance and vegetarian so when we had our meals they had prepared a special menu just for us plus they remembered the next day and asked how they could help again. What more could you ask for. Will come back.
title: Excellent Bali location

text: This place is AMAZING, The service is truly amazing, relaxing place to be. We stay for 3 nights and we will come back again for sure. Pak Reza is very attentive person and Ferdy welcomes us very well. The hotel is very nice and clean, the jogging track is good and Yoga everyday. Foods abudants for everyone to eat.

date post: Charlene X wrote a review Feb 2017
text: This place is incredible. The staff are to be commended for there efforts. The hotel is immaculate. Come here for a memorable and wonderful holiday. You will be impressed by the pool, the buffet breakfast, the yoga, the walks through the rain forest and of course the breathtaking view by sunset. Alone or as a couple this place would be sure to take your breathe away. Receiving a personal thank you from your butler also gives it a nice warm touch. Will sure be back when I come to Bali again. Thank you Padma for such a wonderful stay.
title: The best place in Bali

date post: Kat B wrote a review Nov 2016
text: This place was nothing short of INCREDIBLE!! First time staying in Bali and we were SO impressed! We only stayed 3 nights then headed into Nusa Dua (Nusa Dua accomodation was very disappointing by comparison) The most beautiful staff! Would ALWAYS be greeting you with a smile whenever they saw you. GREAT room!! So spacious, clean and luxurious!! We felt like QUEENS and would say everyone needs to add this one to there bucket list!! Location was BREATH TAKING!! Can't wait to go back!!!!
title: Amazing! Perfect!

text: This place was top notch... Never stayed at a nicer place. Staff was amazing, views are spectacular. Right in the middle of the jungle with sn infiniti pool overlooking everything. I can't believe how beautiful this place is. I will be back.
title: Stunning

text: This place was way beyond my expectations. Everything about it was fantastic. Amazing views, great food, friendly helpful staff. It felt like I was in another world. The hotel has alot of facilities, and an infinity pool that overlooks the valley.
title: Amazing stay

text: This resort actually blew us away. After staying at many resorts through Bali this would be right up there at the top of my list. Best staff we have ever had and nothing was too much trouble. I think the staff were actually what made our experience so memorable and we can't wait to return next year. Rooms were spacious, clean and new with a beautiful balcony overlooking the incredible infinity pools which are heated. The 1.5km walking track though surrounding forest was a great way to start the day and the gym was well equipped. The spa was stunning and massages were beautiful!!!
