A shuttle service runs to and from Ubud daily. The infinity pool - apparently the biggest infinity pool in Bali - was the bomb! So relaxing. Bar staff at the pool and everywhere else were super friendly and accomodating. The standout on our trip was GUS OKA. Super friendly and professional (and makes a mean cocktail!). The food was

We're still staying here as I write this, so this review is very fresh :) First-up this resort ISNT in noisy Ubud. It's in Phayangan, about 30 mins by car further north of Ubud. Which means it's secluded, quiet, and amazing. Yes you're not within walking distance of the hustle and bustle that is Ubud, but the resort offers free and regular transfers to and from Ubud, so you get the best of both worlds. We're staying here to enjoy a VERY belated honeymoon that we never had 18 years ago, and without kids in-tow for the first time in 15 years! Needless to say we're loving it. Why...? Well here's 10 reasons :) #1. Free airport transfer door-to-door to resort (yes it's a 2hr drive on typically narrow Bali roads, but the driver was fantastically knowledgable and we enjoyed
title: Not Ubud, but much better.

date post: Jake T wrote a review Dec 2016
text: We've just finished up our 3 night stay at Padma Ubud and we're already wishing we could've stayed longer! The resort is amazing and beautiful along with the very helpful staff! If you're looking for a great afternoon definitely book in to do the mixology class with Agus, he has a great amount of knowledge with cocktails and provides a very enjoyable experience :) Overall we could not fault a single thing and would recommend everyone should make a trip here x
title: Incredible experience and 100% must stay while in Bali

text: What a amazing resort from the time you arrive till the time you leave the staff are so friendly. The breakfast is very good as is the room service. We also had a free 3 course meal which was great. There is a free shuttle to Ubud which is about 40 minutes away. The pool is amazing also heated as it is a lot cooler up there. They even gave us a cake for our wedding anniversary. The only thing I would like to see is lounge mattresses on the sun lounges. Would highly recommend this resort to stay in.
title: Beautiful resort

date post: Matthew L wrote a review Sep 2016
text: What a beautiful hotel. Simply stunning. Beautiful lobby and landscaped gardens. Really nice connected network of ponds. The pool is simply stunning. Food is very good. Breakfast is great including fresh made coffees. Rooms are tasteful and spacious. All the staff were very nice and great with our kids. Our eldest son enjoyed the kids club. Will definitely stay again. Only critiques are: - on checkout they forgot we were waiting and left us for 20 minutes. Just a human error. - the hotel is isolated with a shuttle bus service to Ubud. Not sure how long it takes as we didn't bother leaving. - The food is reasonably priced but the spa is over priced, almost at Aussie prices. I paid for a 1 hour facial and was only in there 45 minutes.
title: Fantastic Stay

date post: Putri V wrote a review Nov 2020
text: What a great experience. We are strolling around ubud with bike, stop at rice field and took some pictures together. They provide us a mineral water, helmet and of course everything has been disinfected and Mr.Agus is the perfect tour guide for us, frIendly and fun! So happy today!
title: Cycling at padma

text: What a great place amongst the Bali jungle. Great service great food great staff Meeting fellow travellers by the pool added to the experience. Mr Ross a great tourist Great opportunity to see other parts of Bali. Rice paddies Volcano and village life, Can't wait to go back You get what you paid for and worth every cent. Ben. Mark Deb and ross
title: Well rounded amazing experiences!

date post: Arvin Setiadi wrote a review Jul 2016
text: What a wonderfull unique experience, from the moment we arrived, the security staff was so very helpfull and welcoming. We were greeted at the front gate and then escorted to the Reception for check in. Another stunning experience during our smooth check in process, that our room has been upgraded. The receptionist Miss. Alana was very attentive and details. Thank you for the clear information about the hotel. Mr. Satria also greet us with warm welcomed. We were accompanied by Mr. Pande walking to the room. He was professionally explain about the room and genuinely shows us each parts of the room. The room immaculate with a great view, well equipped, the ambience was so peace and quite, given that you are in the heart of Ubud. Stay for one night and took advantage of
title: A Hidden Gem in Ubud

text: What an absolutely stunning hotel! we stayed here for 3 nights in the 2 bedroom room. The rooms were beautifully layed out and the finishes were all new and clean. The location of the hotel is amazing you could sit on your balcony or poolside all day just enjoying the location itself its breathtaking. The food and drink prices at the resort were very reasonable and not what I would expect from such a new luxury resort, it was a pleasant surprise. The staff are all lovely and go well out of their way to be of any assistance. So relaxing and the pool itself is perfect sun or rain as it is perfectly heated. Definitely worth the stay the location, hotel facilities and staff make it truly a fantastic and relaxing experience. I cant wait to come back with my husband.
title: Girls weekend away

text: What you see in the website is what you get! Thoroughly enjoyed our 3 nights stay at this resort. Had to soak in the last few minutes we had. Was pretty sad as we were greeted and treated with awesome attention to detail. We had the most relaxing time at this resort. Service was 7 stars, facilities overwhelmingly over the top of its stars.we will definitely come back .
title: Amazing Honeymoon!

text: When i book this hotel i thought it is normal hotel in jungle but when i reach here i feel i am in heaven and staff are angels . They have unbelievable friendly stuff and best pool ever. You feel you are swiming in wild jungle They have small zoo and garden inside hotel too
title: Lovely Hotel in Heaven

text: When I originally booked this hotel I had high expectations considering the room price. They had great deals on and opening room rate specials, which led me to bite the bullet and splurge. I'm so happy to say that this place totally exceeded those high expectations. I booked one room (to sleep three), and that was definitely enough space for three, messy girls. The room was styled with timber and furnished with Balinese decor, and the bathroom had both a large shower and bath. Extra features including the heated towel rack and in-room expresso machine, gave the hotel such a personal and luxurious touch. The pool area and facilities took my breathe away. With a huge 18 metre long, infinity pool overlooking the Ubud jungle, it's nothing short of magic. The serenity of the
title: Wow..

date post: Mishka C wrote a review Nov 2016
text: Where can I start!!!! The welcome when we first arrived, checking in at 11pm at night, the fresh towel , ginger tea made the whole thing so smooth and enjoyable. The lovely OWEN at reception, was so helpful and ensured that all our questions and needs were catered for. The next day and days after that were even better!!! We had our breakfast at the CLUB LOUNGE, and met the lovely HELEN LEE who gave us OUTSTANDING service for the whole duration of our stay. Very Personalised service! Her vibrant energy ,smiley face and attitude toward service is very rare to find these days. Food is Amazing!!! Best crispy bacon we ever had ! , excellent mix of local and western food. The afternoon tea at CLUB LOUNGE is perfect. The POOL, awesome!!!!!!!!! The Room, PERFECT!!! Great size,
title: The Whole Package!!! Winning!!

text: Where to begin? From the moment we arrived, up until we left everything is beyond our expectations. We have tried several 5 star resorts but none like this. The staff has been very friendly and helpful throughout our stay. Actually before our arrival, the hotel has already enquired what our preferences are, and the execution was more than what we expected. The room is pleasant and very relaxing. The food - tastes really good (a little bit more local variety meals would be very nice to have. One more thing that all hotels must take note of, the staff treated each and every guest equally, there is no "bule" and "indo" treatment. In fact, I was pleasantly surprised that the staff were just as friendly to Indonesians as will as to Foreigners. Overall very nice indeed. For whoever

Words are hard to describe this hotel,we opted for the mountain and beach package,but now both my wife and myself agree we should have spent all of our time here.From the stunning scenery,the luxurious rooms,the delicious food and most importantly the staff are what make this hotel unforgettable,the staff really are beautiful people and we didn't want to leave them after just the three nights we were there.Thank you for making our stay there special!

Worth every penny! Paid on 131 USD for couples balinese massage, happy hour for two, two lunch meal specials, and full on bfast buffet. They treat u like royalty in this place! Rooms are hug and overlooking the mountains, several activities daily!!! Safe and relaxing environment.
title: Perfect Sanctuary in Ubud

text: Wow! What a resort. The design/layout, the infinity pool, the location surrounded by lush rainforest and the friendly staff all contributed to an amazingly picturesque, relaxing and enjoyable stay. 40mins North of the main street in Ubud, there are 5 free return shuttles per day into the centre which we thought was more than adequate (the earliest one 9am which is fine as we were never up early!) . We spent most of our time alongside or in the infinity pool taking in the incredible views and sipping delcious cocktails. Spacious and luxurious rooms, ours a Premier Club Room on the second floor with a balcony overlooking another aspect of the puhu valley and rainforest, was also utilized a lot. I don't think there would be a single room at this resort without an incredible

WOW! Where do I start? We got a great deal through scoupon for 7 nights in a delux suite (room 112). See photos attached. Only thing missing is an in house movie Chanel. But for AUD$1 you can buy all new releases from any market. We did a Kuta day trip that was dedicated to a dental visit (Bali 911 dental -$60 fillings!!! And very good. Pain free and friendly) Lots of shopping (Devine deva Seminyak for larger sizes) market stalls and dinner at Bridges in Ubud on our journey back. Check out the hotel pictures. They are as they look and better. The infinity pool is awesome! One thing that is the biggest stand out here are the staff. Always smiling. Always happy. Happy to help you in any way they can from the gardener to the GM and everyone in between. Today we did a cooking
title: Best Bali trip ever!

text: Wow. This is amazing hotel that i ever stay in Bali. Great hotel, great service, all food is delicious. Lagoon pool. Waw.... ðŸ˜ðŸ˜ðŸ˜ . We will gonna back here as soon as possible. Thanks for your service all of staff at Padma Resort Ubud.

Yes this hotel is all about their amazing pool with great views of the green valley. But there is more than the pool. The staff is super helpful and friendly and views from the room and the restaurant are amazing. Our room was at the ground floor I think but it had garden access so from our back door I could ran into the massive garden, which was overlooking the pool and the beautiful nature. The patio in the garden was perfect to hang out and even had an extra outdoor fan. The rooms were super spacious and so was the bathroom. The restaurant is on the top floor and is overlooking the resort and the beautiful surroundings. Equally stunning are the views over the volcano and the highest mountain in Bali: top location! The food is delicious, the pizza, the lobster and the steak
title: Best infinity pool in Ubud â€“ brand new hotel

text: Yoga was super great. Pak Made also very communicative and a good instructor . He taught us about yoga variations and Balinese culture regarding name hierarchy in traditional Balinese family. He inspire us to have a healthier lifestyle. Thank you
title: Yoga (Pak Made)

date post: Nicholas Adi wrote a review Nov 2020
text: Yoganya seru banget,mr.s was so good and kind Mr.lee was teaching flying yoga,cycle,archery very good and that was an epic â­â­â­â­â­the hotel service is the best ,all people so kind the spa place is nice and comfort
title: Great hospitality

date post: Januar Kurniawan wrote a review May 2016
text: You must try the infinity pool...the room is actually comfy until the noise from the roof and also be careful for bathroom door (my wife have injured her thumb)...the service is good, all staff and butler is helpful, for the breakfast buffet is meet up hotel standard..
title: Great hotel, view, pool, and pool

date post: Travel guy wrote a review Jan 2020
text: . The food was exquisite. Indonesian dishes were incredibly well prepared and flavorful. Western dishes surpassed the same dishes that can be found in upscale restaurants in new york city. 4/5 instead of a 5/5 because overall, there are many hotels and resorts in Bali that offer similar services and activities at slightly lower prices
title: Amazing hotel

text: 1. It was December 2014 (4 years ago) that I last stayed in Viceroy Bali. And, for the 3rd time I came back once again and enjoyed myself in The #1 Resort in the World by Conde Nast Traveler for 3 days 2 nights! Had an amazing 8-course dinner at their newly opened European restaurant, ApÃ©ritif Restaurant & Bar this November, 2018! and 2-hour Spa Treatment at Lembah Spa. 2. Upon arrival, amazing warm welcome extended to me and only after 10-minute check-in process, I was escorted to the villa with the Buggy service! 3. Viceroy Bali is just 5 minutes' drive from central Ubud and provides free shuttle services to Ubud Centre which are available by request! And, only 1-hour drive from Ngurah Rai International Airport (Bali Airport), 4. During my stay, I stayed at two (2); â€¦

date post: Joshua H wrote a review Jul 2018
text: A 20 hr journey from Europe is worthwhile when you step into this corner of paradise. From the moment you arrive until the time you leave you feel well looked after and at ease. The tranquil surroundings and attentive but never intrusive staff make this the perfect luxury escape. We stayed in a deluxe pool villa and were not disappointed, it was furnished beautifully, very comfortable and very private. The private pool with its own pagoda is beautiful. We stayed here for the first few days of our honeymoon and although it was clear there were a few other honeymooning couples there at the same time we were always given a very individual and personal service. All the staff are friendly and seem genuinely happy, always greeting you with smiles. Would highly recommend and would; â€¦
title: Your own private paradise

text: A genuine welcome, luxurious spacious rooms, friendly courteous staff, all in all every thing we wanted for this visit exceeding our expectations. The concierge and hotel drivers were terrific, with nothing too much trouble. The restaurant staff were very friendly and breakfasts were excellent. A very relaxing stay with plenty of time to relax and recharge.
title: Great service ..

text: A great first stop on our Bali honeymoon. Hotel provided a late night pick-up at the airport and we were wowed by our Terrace Pool Villa. As mentioned, breakfast is fantastic and we found all staff to be helpful. We were a little disappointed to arrive and learn the spa was closed but in room services did their best to make up for it. The new restaurant - Apertiff - was incredible. My only complaints / warnings (if you can even call them that): 1. Villa pool didnâ€™t heat very well and felt too cold for us to enjoy. 2. Room desperately needs a make-up mirror for women as dim lighting makes getting ready a challenge. A second shower head in the giant shower would also be a big plus! 3. While we loved the cooking tour booked by the hotel, be forewarned that the hotelâ€™s bike tour; â€¦
title: Beautiful hotel, amazing staff

text: A truly great resort. Small and personal. Attention to detail. We kept prolonging our stay. We enjoyed the Viceroy enormously. Thanks to the staff and Margareth for making our stay wonderful. Great restaurant too!
title: Awsome and a gem of a hideaway

text: A very nice hotel. The arrival wasnâ€™t brilliant as we drove ourselves and werenâ€™t met at the car by any staff. We brought the cases to reception at which point the staff realised they hadnâ€™t helped. It wouldnâ€™t take much for the security guard to notify reception of our impending arrival as there is time between security check point and the reception. The Villa was nice although the air con broke on the last evening. Also the staff need to pay more attention to the small details. Some of the lights were unplugged , the blue tooth speaker unplugged. I had to go looking for the wires and sockets to make them work. The dressing gowns werenâ€™t replaced and I had to call for replacements (only noticing when out of the shower ) All small issues in life but you pay extra for the; â€¦

Absolutely wonderful hotel with incredibly friendly, helpful staff and welcoming owners. Stunning location, with every amenity you could wish for to help you completely relax and enjoy a fabulous stay in paradise! Hugely recommended if you are seeking to completely get away from it all.

After a 14 hour flight from San Francisco to Hong Kong and a 4 1/2 flight to Denpasar, we were exhausted. We opted for the police escort from the airport to the hotel (arranged for by the hotel @ $175 US) and it was worth every cent. Denpasar at rush hour is the worst. With the escort with lights and siren, we saved at least an hour of agonizing delay. The hotel was everything that we expected visually but the delightful surprise was the staff. In all of our travels we have never been treated so well. From the check in to the cleaning and dining room staff and to the shuttle drivers, everyone was gracious without being obsequious.; â€¦
title: Paradis in the valley

text: After a great deal of research for the perfect Ubud hotel, we found it! Loved, loved, loved this hotel. We travel first class all over the world, and have not one criticism of this heaven on earth. The villa was luxurious and comfortable as could be. The 6 course dinner we had was one of the best meals we've had in our 6 decades on earth. The service was always with a smile, always a "sure" with any request made. We stayed for 5 nights and would have liked to move in. Andrea L.A.
title: SECRET TREASURES....

date post: Fendi Sondakh wrote a review Jul 2018
text: After a not so perfect wedding (due to health) we were very much looking forward to our honeymoon. To our surprise upon check in, we were upgraded to the Viceroyâ€™s Vice Regal 1. What an amazing villa. Extremely private and a very comfortable stay. From the king size bed to our very own heated pool surrounded by lush grass and tropical plants. Not to mention the water filtration system they have so thereâ€™s no need to worry about water contamination: cocktails with ice were enjoyed with peace of mind! Totally in awe of the beautiful surroundings this peaceful resort rests in. The staff are such beautiful people. Nothing is a bother and they are always aiming to please. Massages were ah-mazing by the very talented staff at Lembah Spa. The couples massage in our own villa was; â€¦
title: Heaven on Earth (Ubud)

text: After reading a lot of reviews on trip advisor and other pages, we finally decided to book our stay here. The customer service / phone booking already was very, very well done - mostly thanks to the great explanations of the British chap on the phone, whose name I forgot (unfortunately). we've spent a long weekend here and we have to say, that we have a rather mixed review of the place. Whereas, the hotel and it's rooms are superb and very modern / luxurious - other things were rather bothersome. Especially the construction around it - which will surely not be finished anytime soon, given that we could see villas being completely rebuilt, from ground up - I can only assume, but I would not expect this to finish anytime soon (as stated in other reviews before). the constant smell; â€¦

After staying 4 nights in Samaya Seminyak, we were thinking to go to Samaya Ubud. Then in Small Luxury Hotel's web site I saw Viceroy and after checking comments in tripadvisor, we decided 4 nights in Viceroy and it was a very good decision. If I write here, like some others, " this is the best hotel in Ubud ", it will not be fair because I did not see the others. But it is not also fair this hotel is in 29th place in Ubud tripadvisor.! It has to be surely in first 3. When you check in, you are welcomed with Balinese hospitality and till you leave you feel it. In every small corner in the villa or in the hotel you can also smell Balinese culture. Wood carving products, statues, all let you feel that you are in Bali. Also Perfect balance between privacy and nature. Deluxe; â€¦
title: fantastic although obviously quite spendy

text: After staying a few nights close to the airport at the Bali Ritz Carlton, we traveled to other islands and then, back in Bali, stayed at the VICEROY resort. Anybody who has known Bali for a couple of decades knows that there remain very few nice spots. Bali has been overbuilt in most parts of the island, and there are few beautiful places left. The Viceroy is such a place and in itself worth the trip, as few resorts in the world are. EXCELLENCE is the word that comes to mind. The owner is a very friendly Austrian married to a lady from Indonesia. Together, father and son own and manage a resort that strives to provide the best in accommodations and service. The food is spectacular, the views of the valley unforgettable. The individual pool inside the villas is a huge; â€¦
title: Unsurpassed luxury & service

text: After staying at the Viceroy in Ubud there would only be one word I could use to describe it. "Fantastic". Upon check in, we were greeted with friendly, well spoken staff who gave my wife and I leis made from frangipanis and a pleasant iced tea as a welcome drink. We were checked in with zero fuss and taken to our room by electric buggy. Our porter clearly explained the layout of the grounds on the way to our room as well as how everything worked in our room. We stayed in a Deluxe Terrace Villa (room 15), note if you are booking a Deluxe Terrace Villa, room 15 & 16 have completely unobstructed views of the gorge and river below. The room is above 5 star, extremely clean, very luxurious styled with a Balinese theme. It has a high thatched ceiling, ducted air; â€¦

date post: Amr Abou Hussein wrote a review Apr 2019
text: Amazing place. Super nice staff. Villas are huge, and you have your own private terrace with pool and a great view!!!! We went there on our honeymoon and they filled our bathtub with flowers and roses as a surprise for the last night. Hotel provides free scooter for travelling around Ubud, and free shuttle to and from town centre. This was definitely the highlight of our trip!
title: This is where dreams are made of...

text: Amazing. The location is wonderful. You think your in the jungle with the views. The pool overlooks the jungle. The rooms are great. We did not have any problem with any insects,or mossies!! The staff are the most friendly helpful and cannot do enough for you. The restaurant is a must. The breakfast can last you all day and the evening meal is exceptional.
title: Beautiful resort in Ubud

date post: Zenji & Kelly Ingham wrote a review Aug 2019
text: An amazing few days. The setting is truly beautiful and the level of service is second to none. The staff there literally could not do enough for you. There were a couple of small hiccups in our stay but management went above and beyond to ensure everything was resolved. Wouldnâ€™t hesitate to recommend if looking for perfection.
title: Honeymoon in Heaven

text: An excellent hotel. Wonderful staff who are extremely hard working people. We are leaving today and we loved our 1 week stay there. Only comments I have which are not negative by any means. Perhaps you can evaluate if itâ€™s worth your while to waive mini bar fees and breakfast delivery fee. I believe most of us who stay there will not â€œabuseâ€ the mini bar, we only consumed 2 beer there in one week. I think by providing these things complementary are becoming a trend in smaller luxury resorts and I think it will raise your standards. Well done!

An imaculate and beautiful collection of villas with the most attentive, kind and polite staff i have come across anywhere. We went for our honeymoon and they made us feel special from start to end. An incredible restaurant and bar to match the quality of the hotel. Although not in everyones budget for a holiday, if you are looking for that special getaway nestled on the side of the valley overlooking the beautiful forrest, there isn't a place i would recommend more highly. A massive thank you to all the staff that looked after us for our short stay there. We will be back for sure sometime soon.

and I say The Price is really annoyed but beside that all experience that i got there, is really amazing, beautiful view, you can see many amazing place there,, very very friendly staff, it so beautiful place to visit.
title: Excellent hotel

text: Another one ticked off the bucket list. We stayed for 3 nights but wish it was longer. The hotel very kindly upgraded us to the Viceroy Villa which was just wow!. Service was amazing all through the stay. No concerns or complaints about the hotel at all. There is some construction happening at the moment but the noise was not intrusive even though we were almost next door. The staff were all wonderful we felt very spoilt and a little sad when we left Hope to go back again soon
title: Exceeded All Expectations

text: As a travel blogger having traveled all around the world, and stayed at over 300 hotels I don't say things like this very often but "Wow!" I can easily say that Viceroy is the best hotel I've ever stayed at in the the world so far. I stayed at the Deluxe Terrace Pool Villa which is almost the size of my apartment in LA.:) It was huge and super comfy with a double king bed, a bathtub, a private pool with the best Ubud views and a cabana. The food was also amazing. The hotel also has a shuttle service to the center of Ubud which is very convenient when you feel like going out. I can't recommend Viceroy highly enough. I'm sooo looking forward to going back over there.

date post: Peter F wrote a review Dec 2012
text: As you pass the helipad you're greeted by a wide open lobby and smiling faces. Then you can call for a golf cart and driver that is happy to take you to your room. And this is where privacy & luxury meet. Your own private beautifully landscaped courtyard. A bedroom surrounded by glass on three sides opens to your courtyard. The bed is a grandiose oversized king fit for a fairy tale. The room is extremely large and spacious. Looking out at your own luscious courtyard with personal infinity pool is calming. Little hidden nooks of relaxation within the courtyard are everywhere. The entire bathroom area is outside, but still under the courtyard half covered roof. The actual toilet area looks through a glass area into a private atrium. The octagonal (big enough for 4 ppl) shower with; â€¦
title: Remote Paradise in Bali

text: Bali has been overtaken by sleek new, modern hotels, so it felt almost homely to land at the Viceroy in Ubud, set in the lush forest with rice field surrounds. The hotel is about 5-10 mins drive from the main center, which isn't a problem because the hotel car will drop off and collect from a couple of central points. Check in was fine, if not a little drawn out. The hotel room was fairly magnificent. So large, the bed was as wide as two beds long. The bathroom could shower an elephant. The private patio and heated pool was stunning and probably the highlight of the whole resort. It's exceptionally private and looks out to a view of endless green. It is a bit noisy, if you like to sleep. The overpowered Bose sound systems are risky and we were awake around mid night when; â€¦

date post: Stewart S wrote a review May 2019
text: Beautiful boutique hotel with wonderful staff and outstanding service. Suites are large and private and lack nothing. Food is wonderful. Quiet and relaxing. Five minutes from central Ubud, but fells like a million miles. Car service is always available to take you to town or restaurants.
title: Amazing all round!

date post: Fawnn B wrote a review Sep 2019
text: Beautiful resort in an incredible and natural setting in a Balinese jungle ravine. Service impeccable from absolutely all the staff to provide the very highest quality of hospitality. CasCades restaurant and bar offered great food and refreshments - donâ€™t miss breakfast! Deluxe Terrace Pool Villa was outstanding in all respects and left wanting for nothing. The spa was outstanding and simply unrivalled. Whilst the on site Apertif restaurant is expecting Michelin stars for sure. Very highly recommended for couples who are seeking the very best to celebrate a special moment together. Thank you to all at the Viceroy Bali.
title: Perfection

date post: Robyn P wrote a review Aug 2018
text: Beautiful room and serene location. Excellent and I mean EXCELLENT service So romantic and I can't say anything bad about this hotel. We stayed here for 3 nights and had an amazing time. I highly recommend this resort to anyone who is visiting the Ubud area.
title: Amazing Experience

text: Beautiful, quiet and wonderful food. Felt like I had the resort to myself - will go there again with my family!

Best SLH I've visited so far - everything has been thought of to ensure a perfect stay. It feels like you are alone in the hotel at all times, except the owner told us the hotel was full - the staff is always around but they are so discreet that the only time you'll see them is when they bring you a complimentary drink because they noticed you've been around the pool for more than an hour. Viceroy Bali sets the standard I now come to expect from all self-proclaimed luxury hotels around the world.

Both my friend and I went for a two night stay at the Viceroy and wished we could stay for another two weeks! The location is great and the food is stupendous. The staff is helpful and happy, always obliging. In fact I had an unexpected party and the hotel supplied the utensils and even picked up the food for us! The owner, Otto is great fun and a wonderful host. He took us around his property and made sure we felt welcome. Only one issue- the rooms are really not meant for friends who have problems baring their all i.e. going nude. There is no privacy afforded to those that need to change or shower in private unless you kick the other person out of the room or ask them to wear a blindfold. We stayed in the Garden Villa and all of the villas come with a private dipping pool; â€¦

date post: martin f wrote a review Jul 2012
text: Botom line heaven! Ubud is the Florence of Italy. It's a mixture of grace, gastronomy, talassotherapy ; spiritualism and art of life! The Viceroy represents this very well. Thanks you!
title: Amazing setting and views and so relaxing

text: Can quite easily say that this is by the far the best hotel my new wife and I have ever stayed in. We have just got back from visiting Bali on our honeymoon where we stayed at 3 different hotels during our trip. The Viceroy topped them all, including every other hotel we have ever stayed in, not just Bali! The accommodation is outstanding, the setting/surroundings is picture perfect, the food is out of this world and all of this is only further enhanced by the amazingly friendly staff and impeccable service. I cannot talk highly enough of this hotel and can only say that you will not be disappointed should you be fortunate enough to stay here. My new wife and I truly count ourselves lucky that we had the opportunity to experience 3 nights here and only wish we could have stayed; â€¦
title: Probably the best hotel in the world

text: Canâ€™t rave about this hotel enough. From the moment we arrived, we were greeted warmly with fresh flower leiâ€™s. Because of our status with Hyatt, we were upgraded to a Deluxe Terrace Villa. Our room wasnâ€™t quite ready, so we were seated at the bar with a delicious welcome drink. Our room was ready a short time after. It was stunning. Impeccably clean and over the top beautiful. The heated infinity pool really took it over the top. We used the private shuttle service into town. Our drivers were very friendly and easy to talk to. After a great nightâ€™s sleep, we went to breakfast. Everything was absolutely delicious. By far the best breakfast of our entire trip. Staff was friendly, professional and could not do enough for you. Viceroy Bali got every detail right, from top to; â€¦

Can't even begin to tell how great this place was! We had the deluxe terrace villa and it was stunning, breathtaking and luxurios. The restaurant food was the best we ate in Bali! The service was prestigious and you couldn't ask for better! Will be back here for sure! Wish it was a little cheaper but well worth it!

Can't say anymore positives, read all the perfect reviews from all the past guests then times 10+, the best part of the hotel is the owner who walks the property constantly and makes sure everything is perfect. Talks to every guest and even take pictures for them, my kids enjoyed talking with him, and the perfection of the property and staff reflects how he loves this property, if you visit Bali, you must stay here, my whole family fell in love with this place. Oh, I cannot close this review without mentioning the staff, again perfection.

Celebrated my wife's birthday in the Viceroy Ubud during a short stay (3 days) in January. The room, a Deluxe Terrace room, was quite luxurious and extremely tastefully decorated. With private pool, a charming private "Bale" with breathtaking jungle views and an open spacious bathroom. The Cascade restaurant, where we enjoyed a la carte breakfast and delicious food during lunch is a pleasure and so is - of course- the well known Restaurant ApÃ©ratif for diner ( a must!). The staff is extremely warm and the atmosphere and ambiance in general is soothing and friendly.
title: A welcome retreat in paradise

text: Don't be fooled by fewer reviews. This Hotel is small and very professionally run. Can't recommend highly enough
title: Beautiful Spa Hotel in Ubud

text: During a trip to Bali earlier this year, a family friend surprised us with a one-night stay here. I have stayed in a lot of top tier hotels during my business trips during my working days, and this place now joins the list. I didnâ€™t expect to have a private pool in the villa, which was a surprise. The shower and huge bath tub are separate so that was nice too. Breakfast is served â€œany time before lunchâ€ and we could have it in the villa if we didnâ€™t want to go to the restaurant. We really liked the mini coffee machine in the room, like those you see in the bar. This is not something you see often in other five-star hotels. There was also a mini chiller that had non-alcoholic drinks in cans and small packets of milk. The family who owns and manages the hotel were always around; â€¦
title: BE CAREFUL!! RESORT WILL SCAM YOU.

text: Enjoyed a great stay here and the room was stunning. The service and pleasantness of the staff was top notch. Anyone wishing to stay in Ubud would find it hard to find a better hotel. We will be back!
title: Stunning resort, best coffee in Bali, awesome DVD collection

text: Every other review has the long write ups with all the positives so I will write a short one instead. The privacy, the views, the immaculate rooms, the service and best staff, hands down the best food in Ubud (all from room service!), the concierge... Everything is perfect. You can't stay anywhere else. Don't stay anywhere else! Thank you for a wonderful trip
title: Tropical Perfection - A Stay To Remember

text: Everything about the Viceroy is stylish! It is built on a ridge overlooking a river valley covered with rainforest, with glimpses of rice fields in the distance. There are many superlatives for this resort: friendly, attentive service; very good food; a genuine interest in the guests from management and staff. The first impression is of the layout of the buildings on the site â€“ the architecture and the decoration of the public spaces and the rooms are of a much higher standard than typically encountered throughout Asia. The room we had was spacious, beautifully appointed and with its own private infinity-style swimming pool overlooking the river valley. Cascades restaurant was excellent, with a wide range of European and Indonesian dishes. The Viceroy is a smallish hotel; â€¦
title: Top resort

date post: Ralpo Stankic wrote a review Jul 2018
text: Everything exceptional, one of the breathtaking hotel views, staff extremely helpful and friendly, privacy and room view is perfect,amazing food, amazing hospitality me and my husband loved every single second
title: Divine and sublime

date post: Jean-Claude D wrote a review Sep 2019
text: Everything is perfect at the Viceroy. Honestly it is incredible, food - amazing, rooms - amazing, staff - amazing. If you get the chance to stay at this beautiful hotel you will love it! All of the room types are great, the lead in room is just as spacious as the deluxe - but the infinity pool in the deluxe room really does make it super special. I couldn't rave about this hotel enough in all honesty - perfection.
title: The best hotel we have ever done

text: Everything was just as it should be - great villas, nice pools, great views. Combine it with excellent food and with nice people around you and you are in the perfect place:). Its nice even if its raining (its possible to heat the pools)
title: Buffett meal

text: Exquisite would be the word to describe this resort. The location is stunning, the deluxury terrace villa is just to die for and the equipments (fitness center, pool, dvd library...) are enough to stay there forever and never go out. The quality and culinary knowledge of their Cascades Restaurant cuisine (where i tried the breakfast and lunch) are such delicatessens that you are almost ashamed to eat it and destroy its artistic and unique presentation. Please do not hesitate to accord you a gift with an experience at their Aperitif restaurant. The diner there deserve as much Michelin stars as there are on this planet. And please: if you book here, prepare yourself: you will be treated as a worldwide celebrity by each single person of the star of the hotel. And THAT is simply; â€¦

date post: Cliff K wrote a review Jun 2013
text: Firstly, I'd like to start with the staff. This is a wonderful hotel in its design, luxuriousness and many other aspects but it wouldn't be half the hotel it is if it weren't for their staff and I hope the owners know, respect and reward this. It is exceptionally rare that having nice staff goes beyond a small bonus but the service and friendliness from the Viceroy staff is second to none. In particular, Catur (or "Chess"), one of the drivers deserves special recognition. Always going above and beyond and one of life's good guys - he made our holiday at the Viceroy. Also very special was Agung, our waiter at Cascades restaurant. Friendly, funny, generous, knowledgeable.... Anyway, onto the hotel.... It is wonderful. We stayed in a 1 bed pool villa (room 15). We arrived by; â€¦
title: The beauty of the brochure photos are real!

text: For the second time this year I visited the Viceroy, in May with a girlfriend, and this time with my husband. We had a Garden Villa which was luxurious to say the least with all amenities you would wish. As yet again, the staff were very accommodating and respectful and the meals at Cascades were exceptional. This time we had High Tea which was extremely adequate and just enough for us before another delicious evening meal. Another massage was in order , which was enjoyed by both of us. The Hotel has such a calming and tranquil ambience, that we almost did nothing except curl up with some good books, enjoying our restful and relaxing surroundings. Will be back yet again,not even bothering to seek out other hotels.

date post: hello coffee wrote a review Jan 2019
text: For this review, in honour of the 2019 Travellers choice hotel awards, I thought id do a review on what I believe to be the best hotel in the world.. or at least the best one Iâ€™ve ever stayed at. When making my choice I thought about my favourite holiday destination an then thought about the highlight of that destination as far as hotels go.. and for me it was by far the incredible Viceroy Bali, located in the jungles of Ubud. Creating the perfect hotel experience is nothing short of impossible, its a delicate balance of every required element that an amazing hotel needs.. To be #1 at hospitality, as well as anything else is no easy challenge. To be the number one ranked resort, in one of the most tourist saturated areas, in a country where tourism is their #1 industry, and; â€¦
title: The most incredible resort!

text: Found the hotel through Small Luxury Hotels website. Stayed in Terrace room. Very comfortable and large bed. Great view from the pavilion at the swimming pool. Very luxurious and comfortable. Will come back again.

Four amazing days in the mountains of Bali at the stunning Viceroy. We had the pleasure of staying in the Viceroy Villa which was incredible. A wonderful location / attentive staff / World class food and am outstanding wine list. We cannot recommend this hotel highly enough if you want an unforgettable experience.

From arrival to departure this place was a joy. Great bungalows over looking the Vally Of The Kings with our own splash pool. Fabulous restaurant and Bar offering first class service. What can I say about the spar we loved it best I have experienced anywhere, A car and driver are available to take you in and back form Ubud as required. This place has it all for those looking for a quite 5 star retreat.

From our arrival at the hotel right until when we left the hotel staff are so helpful and so cheerful. Everyone greets you including the gardener whilst he is cutting the grass. The Reception staff make you welcome from the first moment you arrive. The restaurant Cascades is wonderful - the a la carte menu has a wide choice and, on some occasions they offer alternative menus. Some people only stay for a couple of days but, to be honest., unless you are a total beach bum, this is a better way to visit Bali. Although we were there during the rainy season it hardly rained and, although this meant the hotel was less busy, we were still made to feel important guests. The hotel also arranges day trips or short ones if you wish tailored to your interests. #there is the; â€¦

From start to finish, the Viceroy experience is amazing. From the driver that greeted us at the airport, through checking in at reception, to the amazing views as you enter the hotel, right through the hotel and then into peacefulness. Everything within the hotel is set up for you to have the best possible stay, the attitude and serviceability of the staff is absolutely world classâ€¦ donâ€™t even get me started on the breakfast - it was one of the best weâ€™d ever had. The shuttle into Ubud was a great use and you even had a handy number to call them to get them to pick you back up! I really canâ€™t recommend this hotel enough.
title: Perfect start to our honeymoon

date post: Stephan G wrote a review Jun 2011
text: From the minute we were picked up at the airport, to when we were dropped off at our next hotel (and what a mistake THAT was!), our time at The Viceroy, Ubud, was amazing! As a honeymooning couple, we couldn't have asked for more. Pure perfection. Service, facilities, and the surrounds! The setting of the hotel is just out of this world. We can't wait to go back!
title: Very nice, but ...

text: From the moment of pick up at the airport through to drop off in Seminyak the service received was exceptional. Nothing was too much trouble. We were fortunate to be upgraded to a Deluxe Villa which was huge and very well appointed. Great view across the valley and very private even though if you look at a plan the villas seem quite close together - probably because they are huge! One slight word of caution is that currently they are building another 15 villas and a new spa (to be ready spring 2019?) but in practice there was little noise and certainly not noticeable from our villa. The plus point being they now have a new restaurant Apperatif - reviewed separately. I cannot imagine returning to any other hotel in Ubud.

From the moment we arrived The Viceroy everything was perfect. It is about 6yrs old, and designed to perfection. We were going to stay at the 4 seasons but friends highly recommended we choose the Viceroy as its smaller and more personal, they were so right. We were ushered through Bali airport, visas processed in moments and then driven about an hour to Ubud. All the staff speak perfect English, know your names, and are very proactive in assisting with anything you ask. The hotels car is ready to take you into Ubud (5 mins away) and pick you up whenever you request it by phone. I had hurt my ankle and so the staff drove me in a golf buggy all around the hotel grounds and up and down to reception and the restaurant all week. There is nothing that could not be arranged,; â€¦
title: Heaven on earth

text: From the moment we arrived until we left four days later, we experienced great service and friendly staff willing to go out of their way to attend to your every need. From the drivers to the senior manager, all were genuinely nice people. The family owners have created the most tastefully decorated rooms, most with their own private pool. We will be back,,,,,

From the moment we were picked up from the airport we were treated like family! The level of professionalism paired with excellent personalization made our experience in Bali a dream come true. The fact that you have the option to have your personal driver to escort you around the island offered a sense of security you will need to explore the ends and out that Bali has to offer! When you book your stay ask for Katut the Driver...he is the best!

date post: Jon Jacques wrote a review Mar 2020
text: From the moment you arrive to your departure nothing is too much for the management and staff who make you feel like a VIP. We stayed in a Luxury Pool Villa which was spacious with its own pool. Everything you need is provided for. The super king size bed very comfortable. The food in Cascades Restaurant was excellent and delicious with the most courteous service. The infinity swimming pool was never crowded. The free shuttle service at anytime to 2 stops in Ubud was excellent and most welcome. The drivers were always on time for the return journey to the hotel. Thanks to Margaret, Jero and staff for a fabulous stay, we canâ€™t wait to return.
title: Bucket List Dream Come True - An Experience You'll Never Forget!!

date post: Janet K wrote a review Sep 2018
text: From the moment you first enter the hotel lobby, it feels like you are entering a different world and you are treated so very well. My husband and I stayed for 5 nights and it was a great time for us to reconnect. Bali is amazing, and to have such a luxurious romantic hotel in Ubud is over the top. The food was outstanding, honestly the best I have ever had. The drink menu, the spa, the room, everything was just fantastic. The hotel staff could not do enough for their guests, a truly remarkable experience. We are saving up to be able to do this again!
title: OMG

text: From the second we got in the Viceroy car at the airport to the time we checked out 3 days later, our stay at The Viceroy was nothing short of fabulous! To walk into our room and see the infinity pool steps away from the bed was wonderful. The views, staff and service is top notch! Our room was very spacious and was fantastic in every way. The staff was very personable and actually cared about the guests. They made you feel like you are a guest in their home. We had breakfast every moring at Cascades. I still dream about waking up and walking through the lush and beautiful property to the restaurant onlly to have one of the BEST breakfasts with the most amazing views! I can not recommend this hotel enough. It is truely a magical place and I want, need and dream about going; â€¦
title: The best service in the most beautiful and luxurious hotel

text: From the service, to the food, to the views and beautiful villas, everything was perfect! We stayed in Vice Regal Villa 1, the room was so amazing I didnâ€™t want to leave. The hotel itself is in a great area, close to many attractions including the monkey forest, and activities such as white water rafting, shopping, etc. The staff was so accommodating and friendly, we felt right at home. We enjoyed every moment of our stay and hope to come back again!
title: Perfect Honeymoon Stay

text: From the setting, perched on the side of a small mountainside/cliff with villas overlooking jungle and rushing river. To the incredible amenities, service and food and beverage program, this is one of the more amazing places I've stayed. Certainly worth the money if it's within your budget. They just opened their fine dining restaurant and it too is impeccably staffed with Michelin level service and mind-blowing digestion menu. Everything about the Viceroy was considered from the moment you step on the property until that very sad moment when you have to leave. Don't miss dusk by the pool with a cocktail watching the swallows and other birds playing in front of one of the most beautiful sunset views in Ubud.
title: Good, but didn't exceed our expectations

date post: Chris M wrote a review Sep 2018
text: Great hotel, villa's and rooms are good size and restaurant is very nice with good view. Most important staff are extremly helpfull and attentive and make you feel very welcome. One of few hotels offering helicopter pad, great option to see Bali from the sky.
title: LUXURY HOLIDAYS

text: Had a bit struck of luck, stayed in this amazing place for 4 nights. The place located near the valley very quiet and peaceful. The room itself is amazing, spacious and luxurious, the staff are very professional and really respect your privacy. The breakfast and dinner in Cascades restaurant, also delicious...the kitchen team definetly know what they do and it delivers fantastic :-) So if you want to really have an amazing memorable stay in Ubud, I definetly recommend this place.
title: The Viceroy Bali is heaven on earth and MUST to stay at and see.

text: Had a great 5 days in viceroy deluxe room, the view was perfect, food at both restaurants are delicious, staff were fully supportive and helpful, one of few hotels which had heated pool, last but not least they had in room dinning with delivery charges only (which we did not have in 2 hotels before viceroy) Thanks viceroy staff and management

Had an amazing stay here. Views overlooking rice terraces were stunning, villas are quite lovely and terrific service. Location was great too and just a few minutes drive to heart of Ubud. Would definitely stay again.
title: Fabulous if not for chain-saw guy!

date post: Mel Pople wrote a review Jul 2019
text: Hands down the nicest hotel room I have ever seen or stayed in. Beautiful private pools, beautiful views, very private. Got to watch monkeys jumping from tree to tree from our pool and cabana. The food and drinks were excellent at both of the on site restaurants. The staff was amazing and extremely friendly. Not a single con about this hotel.
title: another must!

text: Hands down, just blown away by this place. It's really worth every penny. Our villa was INCREDIBLE! So new, clean, modern and luxurious. We had our own private plung pool and cabana on our patio. We spent countless hours in our private infinity pool watching monkeys swing from branch to branch. The service was like no other hotel. They just always say yes. Regardless of what you want they just make it happen. The staff are so genuinely friendly and happy to have you. That is a beautiful thing about the Balinese people. Very close to town with a free shuttle for dinner or shopping. Just can't say enough great things. You'll love a honeymoon here!
title: Excellent hotel with excellent staff

text: Hands Down, my favorite Ubud resort so far. Words or photos don't do the justice, you have to go and experience it for yourself. Their villas are top notch! Super Zen place and indulgence of luxury at the same time. I definitely want to go back!
title: Paradise in the Jungle

text: Have you ever dreamed about visiting a boutique hotel where you will be in a permanent state of supreme happiness during your entire visit? Where your entire experience will be so blissful that you secretly wish to stay forever in that place? Where the entire team of hotel's staff members want to ensure that your stay is the most memorable experience...ever? Well, Viceroy Bali is exactly this type of hotel where you will discover what a true 5 star luxury experience is all about. I have recently stayed there together with my husband for 3 nights to celebrate my husband's birthday. We have stayed in total of 6 different hotels during our 16 day trip with the goal to experience different locations and various resorts. Viceroy Bali was something completely extraordinary and the; â€¦
title: A perfect and serene property in Ubud among ricefields

text: Having had an incredible experience in Malaysia at The Datai, I wanted a similar type of hotel in Bali. I was trying to book into the Four Seasons in Ubud but with no luck (thankfully) so started to look elsewhere. I was very nervous of the "advisory warning" but checked other travelers forums (fodors etc.) and there were glowing reviews everywhere. I was very nervous as to what i would find but from the meeting at the airport to our gracious reception and then our glorious villa that is something from a storybook it was perfect. It is small (only 11 rooms) and feels exclusive. Our own private villa looked the river valley. The plunge pool was perfect temperature and private enough to skinny dip. The bed was beautiful and so comfortable. all in all a magnificent villa. We had; â€¦
title: Viceroy Ubud, Wow!

text: Having read reviews on Trip Advisor, we booked the Viceroy as the reviews read very well. You always wonder if someone else's 'excellent' will be your idea of excellent too. We were not disappointed at all. The Viceroy is one of the best hotels we have ever stayed in and we've stayed in some of the best (The Ritz Piccadilly, The Waldorf Astoria, The Regent in Chang Mai to name but a few to give you the idea). The Viceroy left them all standing! The villa was divine, the facilities absolutely superb, the views breathtaking and the food really was exquisite (even the room service - something that most hotels struggle to get right). The spa treatments were amazing - after a couple of hours in Lembah Spa I was so incredibly relaxed, the ladies were ever so attentive and very; â€¦
title: Share Bliss

text: Having recently returned from 7 wonderful nights at the Viceroy, it certainly lived up to it's name. From the pick up at the airport we were greeted by our driver, provided with cold towels and cold bottled water for the long drive to Ubud. Paying US$25.00 was indeed handy for express immigration to avoid the queues at the airport. Contact the hotel in advance and they will arrange this for you and it will be added to your bill upon checkout. You are greeted by a hotel representative and escorted through immigration, luggage is then collected for you and then you are escorted out of the terminal to your driver. The deluxe terrace villa was beautiful, clean and modern with all amenities provided including robes, slippers, i pod docking station, lilly coffee pods for the; â€¦

Having spent 10 days at the fabulous Oberoi in Seminyak, the next part of our stay was 3 days at the Viceroy in Ubud. Look if your looking for a very good hotel, in a beautiful area,with good service, large rooms and a heated plunge pool, then look no further, but do be aware that you can get the same for less than half of the US$625 per night you will pay here. There are no luxury touches that one would have expected. Even though we were upgraded from a garden to terrace villa on an Amex deal, its still 50% overpriced( compared to other Ubud properties) We stayed in Terrace villa 3 The light fittings are by IKEA, and the light fitting in the alcove in the shower was loose ( see pic), the shower splashes here, so was concerned about electric safety. The balustrade around the; â€¦
title: Has potential to be a true 5-star Hotel

text: Having stayed at several hotels in Ubud and other parts of Bali, this is truly one of the best hotels I've ever experienced. The villas are fantastic and impeccably maintained, with every detail paid attention to. Each has a private pool and all the amenities you'd expect from a 5 star property. The food is amazing and all meals are served a la carte. If you prefer to use the main pool rather than spending the day in your villa, you will always find a spot there, too, even when the hotel is full. You can rent bikes as well as scooters to explore Ubud, or the hotel will provide transportation to and from the town center complimentary throughout the day. The entire resort is beautifully maintained and you feel like you're in a brand new hotel but with servcie levels you'd expect; â€¦

Here are the advantages and disadvantages of staying at The Viceroy. First, the staff are incredibly good and will put the best staff at some of the prominent 5 star hotels to shame with their exceptional unremitting service. From our driver Margi to the receptionist Tara, to Pushpa our baby sitter.. no request is big or small for them. Second, the attention to detail in the rooms from the ambience to the amenities is excellent. we booked the Regal 2 villa with a private pool and panoramic views of the adjoining tropical forest - amazing! Third, the food is scrumptious at the hotel and make sure you take the package including breakfast which is world class. Plus one can have the meals by the poolside or the cabanas. The disadvantage - you will get used to this level and; â€¦

I actually shed a tear when i settled in our second leg of the trip, what was special? The service is unmatched. Every staff member makes you feel like a king at home Everything is catered to your liking, however you like to do it they do it. The villa was next level, clean and cozy feel. Plunge pool was nice and warm. Couches comfy. Chef Wouter nailed it for us. Customized experience. We expected a 8 out of 10 experience. The experience was 15 out of 10, unmatched. Definitely a 7 star hotel hands down. Wished they had viceroy in other parts of the world. The only thing the hotel and every hotel in Bali can improve on is wifi in the rooms.

I am a seasoned traveller - please read my profile to put my review into perspective. I lived in SE-Asia for 6 years in the early 2000's and still come back lots. I stayed at the Viceroy with my wife for 6 days just before new year. For people less familiar with Bali, it is a high end Ubud boutique hotel; there are about 4-6 similar ones around Ubud, such as the Alila or the Hanging Gardens. Hotels around Ubud provide the rice terrace / mountain type holiday feel, whereas Kuta, Seminyak and most other well known suburbs in Bali typically are the more "Beach type" places. Make sure the mountains / rice fields is what you are after if you go to the Viceroy (or any hotel around Ubud) If this is what you like, then the Viceroy does a fantastic job, at a high end price. The rooms; â€¦

I am generally not a person for expensive hotels or posh resorts particuarly when staying in Asia as I prefer to be immersed in the local cultural but I have to say this place is an exception! :) We (myself, my husband and our young son) only stayed here for 2 nights (which was probably the perfect escape from reality time for us) as I got it as a mystery deal on Wotif.com for US $100/night. We actually got picked up from a cheap family run bungalow we were staying at in Monkey Forest road and were transported to the Viceroy in their luxury air-conditioned van. We had seen the pictures of the garden villa (the cheapest room) online, but nothing prepared us for seeing it in real life, my husband and I were speechless, we couldn't stop laughing and smiling like we'd won the; â€¦
title: Overpriced for Bali, but We Had a Lovely Time Here.

text: I am still dreaming of the smell of the room (what is that flower scent that is pumped in?). Just returned from a 4-night stay at the Viceroy to kick of our honeymoon and I don't even know where to start.... the grounds, staff, food, service, everything is over the top! Every staff member treated us like we were the only guests at the entire resort. The grounds are beautiful and the toughest decision we had everyday was whether we wanted to go out and explore Ubud or just relax and enjoy our private pool, as well at the main pool villa-- of course we recommend you do a combination of them both. The complimentary shuttle into town is perfect, as you can't really walk anywhere. It was super reliable! For an extra fee they will also drive you to places beyond their zone. I was; â€¦
title: Fantastic Holiday

text: I arranged a romantic dinner at the viceroy hotel for my girlfriends birthday, the staff were amazing at organising and personalising the experience. The staff were first class, the food was perfect and the atmosphere was elegant with a saxophone player, who performed happy birthday with the staff whike handing a birthday cake and chocolates over to her. Highly recommend this hotel it was 10/10! The manager was super friendly and accommodating through out. Thank you
title: Welcome to the Jungle!

date post: Jennifer H wrote a review Apr 2013
text: I arrived 2 days ahead of my wife and was immediately struck by the relaxed atmosphere. Within 12 hours of her arrival she also commented unprompted that the Viceroy was intoxifying n its relaxation and it was hard to think beyond just relaxing all day. Our free 2 hour session at Lembah Spa was wondrous, an eye opener even for my wife who knows her spas! The staff could not be more helpful or friendly, they are close to hand but not intrusive, extraordinarily polite and helpful. This was apparent even before my arrival in the efficient manner they took my reservation and answered all my questions. The rooms lack nothing and as a frequent business traveller it is rare to be able to say that. All the electrical outlets you could need, where they should be. Comprehensive; â€¦
title: Pure Indulgence

text: I booked a stay here through the Small Luxury Hotels website. Firstly, the actual view of the valley is more amazing than what the photographs show. Next, the villas are very spacious and private. We actually forgot that there are other villas next door. Third, the service is exceptional. I was particularly impressed by how quickly they set up their meeting room for me to take an urgent conference call in privacy. One staff member set up the conference telephone checked that my laptop had Internet access and adjusted the air conditioning temperature to my liking before leaving. They even supplied drinking water without being asked. It may not be a business hotel but the service was professional and prompt, and any travelling businessman likes that.
title: The Viceroy is "The PERFECT Destination" for a Honeymoon!

text: I came here with my girlfriend and it was fabulous. Can I start by saying the best thing about this place is its staff. They are an absolute credit to this hotel. From the greeting by the lady on reception, to the gardeners going about their daily business, everyone gave us a very warm welcome. Conversation was cheery and English was impeccable. They can not be faulted. The hotel itself is amazing. The way that the rooms were crafted is probably the most unique I've seen for a while. A personal pool in every room is just to be seen. The hotel is bijoux but you get the feel that it is organically expanding. You can see where it started and how it has developed with new villas being built now which will be finished next year; and why not. We ate mostly at the hotel and; â€¦
title: You can't put a price on a stay like this

text: I can call this place is number 1 in Ubud, great villas, super nice people work there and great fine-dining experience at the new Aperitif restaurant! Highly recommended to visit spa also and enjoy the infinity pool with best view ever. Garden villa is huge and has a good privacy!
title: Serene Bali

date post: Yasmin M wrote a review Sep 2018
text: I canâ€™t say enough positive things about my incredible experience at the Viceroy. We spent 5 nights on our Honeymoon with them and it was perfect. The hotel and grounds were breathtaking. The room was incredible, but even more important was the staff at the hotel. We felt at home the second we walked in. Everyone is so friendly, personable and the genuine care for their guests shines through. We spent time with the staff driving around Ubud and each one of them was so enjoyable to speak with and learn about. Jero and the staff made the trip that much better. I also canâ€™t forget about the breakfast which is a great experience in itself. Amuse-bouche for breakfast! - Donâ€™t miss out on this place. Its the best all around hotel Iâ€™ve ever stayed at.
title: Honeymoon in heaven!

date post: Elena Z wrote a review Nov 2019
text: I donâ€™t have enough superlatives for this hotel. We were truly cared for on our visit: Perfect people, perfect property, amazing food (ApÃ©ritif and cascades), great tours, wonderful spa, efficient pick up and delivery to dps, dedicated shuttle, greeted by name at very occasion. Other hotels should send their people here to understand what a 5 star experience really means.
title: Amazing honeymoon experience

text: I donâ€™t usually bother with reviews, but this is an exceptional place. I travel often with my wife around Asia, as it is convenient for us when we require a quick weekend break. A friend pointed out a review of Viceroy Bali in a magazine, and I thought it would be a lovely place to bring my wife for our 10th wedding anniversary. We are a couple who like nothing better than to lounge around the hotel when on holiday. We felt totally pampered by the impeccable service rendered, from the moment we stepped into the hotel until we left 3 days later. We could choose to dine in our room or eat at the restaurant. The food was delicious and they have such an extensive wine list, which is quite remarkable for a boutique hotel. We could soak inside our small pool in the villa, or use the; â€¦
title: Luxury - Perfect Romantic Escape

text: I dont have time to say too much but this boutique resort is amazing. Luxury all the way and excellent attention to detail. The rooms are huge with everything you would expect in a top 5* property and more. Complimentry cold drinks, coffee machine, slippers and robes, quality toiletries and more. The outlook is divine, there are 3 seperate chill out areas and a pool in the bathroom. I did not want to leave the resort. It also has a great gym, and a lovely restaurant and pool falling over the cliff. The staff a friendly and professional and they provided an excellent limo service to town. I have interior design background and work for a hotel group and all I can say is this resort is up there. I would ddefinately recommend it to anyone looking for quality, luxury and attention to; â€¦

I don't think that writing a review will show and express how amazed am I! My stay at The Viceroy was something out of this world. I really felt that I own the whole world. There was nothing in my whole stay that disturbed me or I found it inconvenient at all. First, my booking was for a honeymoon package in the terrace villa for 3 nights which I booked directly from the resort by contacting them by email (Nila was the one responsible for this, whom we found at the front desk on our arrival =) ). The first amazing thing was that Nila gave me a 30% discount so I got an awesome price! The package included a VIP immigration process, and it really was. When we arrived at Denpasar airport, an employee from the airport authority was holding a sign with my name, then he took our; â€¦

I had 2 times amazing experiences in viceroy Bali 1st one in 2018 and again on 2019, i still can feel the good vibes there starting from the private villa, breakfast, outside spaces and pool , two indescribable restaurants , the amazing staff from the reception, restaurants and room service. also a perfect preparation for my special occasions, i had candle light dinner , and spa services was very excellent especially their facial products and massage oils. last but not least also the touring services i had full day tour in a comfy , clean and excellent car and the driver was very helpful and gentle. If i could have a vacation 2020 definitely i will come again to VICEROY BALI. It will be the perfect choice and destiny to go away from daily stressful life and work.
title: Absolutely Stunning

text: I had a relaxing holiday. Most of the staff were very good. Two suggestions to the owner for his consideration. 1. Restaurant service varies from excellent (when few tables to service) to terrible when the restaurant is full. On my final day there was a dance display and the upper level restaurant was full. My table was in the lower level. Service that night was the worst I have experienced in any hotel anywhere. I explained everything to the F&B Manager. 2. A small section of the Restaurant ceiling is frequented by geckos. On the first night a gecko fell on my table. I was more concerned about gecko droppings falling on my food. I have explained to the F&B Manager a simple way to get rid of them. 3. There was a very limited selection of Balinese cuisine. I come to Bali to; â€¦
title: Great stay

text: I had high hopes after staying in another 5star resort recently and after reading all the amazing reviews. I think that at a place thatâ€™s rated #1 in the world for hotels you really shouldnâ€™t have to ask for the same thing multiple times, have to worry about allergens in your food, or be disturbed with an awkward conversation with housekeeping about whether I want them to turn down the room or not. First things first, the room is amazing. They decorated it nicely for our honeymoon with roses on the bed and a yummy cake. The cascades restaurant is also very good and we pretty much only ate there during our short stay. The only Problem was that on the papaya salad (which states it has peanuts in it) they decided to substitute with cashews without my knowledge (and which I am; â€¦

date post: Hamed F wrote a review Apr 2013
text: I had spent several days in Kuta and Seminyak and the hustle-and-bustle and tacky tourism that has overrun some of these locales wore me out. So upon arriving at this jewel of a hotel, I finally was able to relax and experience the rejuvenating powers of this magical island in a peaceful, serene setting. There is one thing that stands in my mind, more so than anything else, in describing the Viceroy and that is serenity. The lush settings, the warm and intimate staff, and the presence of other like-minded guests really add up to give one a sense of being in a time and space that transcends the sterility that sometimes permeates the usual five-star chain hotels. I didn't feel this way staying at the Viceroy. I felt as though I was being treated like a dear family member who; â€¦
title: Honeymoon in paradise

text: I have given a few 5 bubble reviews in my time because at the time, I genuinely felt they were worth it, then I stayed at the Viceroy which is worth 10!! Upon arrival, we were greeted with Leis which smelt amazing, check in was quick and easy and they offered us our welcome drink in the villa, we opted for the alcoholic choice which was a lovely Mojito. The room was just unbelievable, it was big, clean and we felt like royalty. We had a private pool with a beautiful view of the jungle and the whole atmosphere was private and peaceful. They offer a shuttle with 2 convenient drop off points which will take and pick you up on request, they also do the nicest little turndown service where they lay out your robes and slippers and leave a chocolate on your pillow!! I think the; â€¦
title: Simply Amazing

date post: Roman K wrote a review Jan 2013
text: I have never been compelled to review a place on Trip Advisor before but my stay was so amazing it deserves the praise after our 6 night stay. The Viceroy is where I chose for my honeymoon and it was absolutely perfect. I would highly recommend it for a honeymoon, getaway, or rejuvenation trip. - the property is stunning with amazing architecture and every detail thought through. - you are surrounded by tranquility - the food was amazing. We had reservations booked in Ubud but canceled all but one night because we enjoy staying on the property and enjoying the food. - the staff was extremely kind and accommodating. Wonderful service! - I am not positive but I think they said the place was 75% full and we felt like we owned the place. - we recommend the sunrise volcano hike; â€¦
title: One of the best in Ubud!

text: I have to admit I was extremely surprise - in a good way - by this property! The staff is impeccable, the room, hotel facilities, amenities, food, pool, breakfast and the view - oh the view - can turn your stay in Ubud even more special!
title: Honeymoon in Paradise!

text: I have visited this magic place in the heart of Ubud for dining - food and service just amazing. More over you will enjoy the best view. Highly recommend to visit, once you will be in Ubud. Itâ€™s 100% worth it!

I just had the most amazing stay at the Viceroy Bali in Ubud. My luxury villa had a beautiful refreshing pool and relaxing Bale with a stunning view of the tropical rain forest. So much room to spread out and relax in my own private retreat. Cascades restaurant is a must with the best Consomme I have had outside of Europe and OH the lamb chops are to die for :-) and then there's the wine list :-) The staff are so friendly and courteous. Lembah Spa has melting massages and devine facials. This was truly an experience I will never forget. Thank you Viceroy Bali, you are 10 Stars.

I just returned from a 4 night stay at the Viceroy and am already trying to arrange a time to return. This hotel is a perfect combination of a quiet retreat with fabulous food, services/activities and privacy, yet close to a bustling town and interesting sights that can be accessed easily (by private car + guide if you like) at a moment's notice for those needing a cultural fix. I can't say enough about the entire staff, from the front desk to the restaurants to the spa, who do everything possible (and also try the impossible!) to make your stay absolutely flawless. I came on my own after a busy 3 week dive trip and despite not being part of a "couple", felt comfortable dining alone and making use of all the resort offers. I think my blood pressure reduced by 20 points after; â€¦

I love how the design is so Balinese with the huts and everything. The staffs were very friendly to us too, they help us in our every needs. But what I love the most is the lounge/bar called Aperitif Bar. It is very nice and comfortable, the holy grail of bar in Ubud area. Plus they have this nice restaurant called Aperitif just next to the Aperitif Bar that serves delicious food. It's always a plus when a hotel has a nice restaurant and a nice lounge to relax after a heavy dinner for me :)

I planned an extended 5 week trip from NJ to London, then Singapore, Phuket, Bali then Paris before returning to my home in The Garden State. After a week at the W Hotel in Seminyak we headed to the Luxury enclave of The St. Regis Bali. from there we decided to change the scenery all together and spend 2 glorious nights high above the rice fields at the Viceroy in Ubud. The property shines with exclusitivity from the moment you approach the private road to the resort and pass the Viceroy's private helipad. Even though we arrived by private car service and not a Helicopter we were greeted with the utmost joy and courtesy. The extremely attentive staff and front office manger quickly escorted us to our villa perched high on a cliffside with dramatic views of the rice fields and; â€¦
I recently stayed at the Viceroy, Bali and can not imagine a more exceptional stay. The villas are incredible, the service is amazing and the property exceeds all expectations!
title: AMAZING! PRIVATE! TOTAL LUXURY!

text: I stayed at the Viceroy for two nights in mid January. Absolutely fantastic location, service and villa were luxury at its finest. Made new friends and left with a big smile. Highly recommend this magical place for its beauty, comfort, privacy and class. Cocktails and dinner at Aperitif and Cascades is a must. I honestly didnâ€™t want to leave. If you turn of all the lights at night you can see a canopy of stars and fireflies zooming by. Just magic.

date post: Ashley Hann wrote a review Mar 2020
text: I stayed at Viceroy Bali in March with a friend and had the most incredible experience. We stayed in the Deluxe Terrace villa and it was gorgeous â€” so spacious and luxurious, private pool & cabana, and the view of the jungle from the room were amazing. The food was excellent (do NOT miss a dining experience at Aperitif!! unforgettable!), the main pool was so pretty and peaceful, and the staff were exceptional. We were especially please with how well-trained and knowledgeable the staff at Viceroy was â€” along with being friendly and warm of course, they also seemed really confident and comfortable, chatting and joking with us, giving us tips on food and wine... we were constantly impressed. Felt like we were among friends & family. Would love to stay here again and can't; recommend it enough!; â€¦
title: An absolute dream...

date post: Ashley Hann wrote a review Mar 2020
text: I stayed at Viceroy Bali in March with a friend and had the most incredible experience. We stayed in the Deluxe Terrace villa and it was gorgeous â€” so spacious and luxurious, private pool & cabana, and the view of the jungle from the room were amazing. The food was excellent (do NOT miss a dining experience at Aperitif!! unforgettable!), the main pool was so pretty and peaceful, and the staff were exceptional. We were especially please with how well-trained and knowledgeable the staff at Viceroy was â€” along with being friendly and warm of course, they also seemed really confident and comfortable, chatting and joking with us, giving us tips on food and wine... we were constantly impressed. Felt like we were among friends & family. Would love to stay here again and can't; recommend it enough!; â€¦
title: An absolute dream...
