text: I stayed at villa 18 recently. The villa offered amazing views of the jungle and our favourite spot was the infinity edge pool where we would laze around to admire the jungle views. What sets this hotel apart was the TOP notch service from all the staff members. I dined at both the restaurants. Aperitif for dinner was amazing with very good food and cocktails. Really enjoyed the breakfast at cascades too.
title: Special, but needs some love

text: I stayed in villa 5 with my friend and upon arriving we were greeted in typical Balinese style , warm ,friendly with a beautiful Lei put around our necks and a lovely welcome drink in the lobby whilst our rooms were being checked.The villa was beyond our spectations and the view was truly magnificent .staff were on call to attend to your every need with a smile .The bar and restaurant overlooked the Forrest infact the Forrest could be seen from everywhere. This is definitely the place I would want to spend with someone special .the only downside is that it's not cheap !

I travel around the world and I found the most relaxing spa in Ubud! The Lembah Spa. It is not just relaxing but it is soooo beautiful. We went to the spa with my family. We were treated like royals. Everybody was very nice. They have one of the best view in Bali. I highly recommend the luxury treatments. You wont want to leave this place ones you are there. It still comes back in my dreams!
title: Great resort, superior service!

text: i traveled to bali with a friend and we split the responsibility of finding hotels. he booked us 2 nights at the viceroy. apparently there was some online deal but even so, it was $500US per night. i nearly passed out when i discovered the cost. having said that, it was lovely. our room was huge with a small private pool and a deck overlooking a valley and rice paddies. we loved the room -- absolutely no problems with it. the staff at the hotel were delightful, and they drove us into town on a couple of occasions. they are pretty strict about dropping people off at one of two places -- yes, i understand that ubud is becoming a huge sprawling town but honestly it would be nice if they would extend this service to more of ubud. (we were there during the low season, not; â€¦
title: Absolutely Beautiful

text: I visited Viceroy Bali on business for site inspection to host destination weddings and honeymoons for our clients. I experienced stay in Deluxe Terrace Villa with private swimming pool, Aperitif restaurant - 5 course dinner and much more. I did site inspections of several villas and all are great! As per dining experience Viceroy Bali can proudly boast on the best fine dining place in Bali - Aperitif restaurant - that is very popular among in-house guests as well as public ones. Chef Nick creates his magic and regardless how â€œspoiltâ€ you may think you are he will definitely impress you! This is the high level hotel for travelers who are looking for privacy, comfort and tailored service. I highly recommend this property for all travelers, including wedding couples and; â€¦
title: PERFECT

text: I visited Viceroy Bali together with my boyfriend, we wanted a romantic getaway! :) From the moment we entered the property we could feel the high standard of the hotel! Through the whole stay everything was truly perfect. Magnificent service, great villa, delicious food and of course the view over the main pool - ah, unforgettable! We would highly recommend you to visit Viceroy if you're looking for a luxury experience, but at the same time would like to feel that you are actually in the heart of Bali, surrounded by jungle and nature.

I visited Viceroy Bali together with my boyfriend, we wanted a romantic getaway! :) From the moment we entered the property we could feel the high standard of the hotel! Through the whole stay everything was truly perfect. Magnificent service, great villa, delicious food and of course the view over the main pool - ah, unforgettable! We would highly recommend you to visit Viceroy if you're looking for a luxury experience, but at the same time would like to feel that you are actually in the heart of Bali, surrounded by jungle and nature.

I wanted some place quiet and beautiful and I admit I was sold by the beautiful pictures of the villas. In reality, the entire place is that beautiful because of the nature surrounding it. If you are a nature lover, you will really like it here. It made you want to just lay by the pool or soak in the tub or sit at the day bed and read. Room service was available at anytime, which kinda made it hard for you to leave the villa as everything that you needed was provided for: food, water, tea, hot shower, tub, pool, and if you like Toblerone chocolates, they even have that in the mini bar. I had a great time here.
title: Wonderful resort, it was hard to leave

text: I would highly recommend this place. The place is amazing. This was our last stop on our honeymoon and it did not disappoint. When we arrived we were given a welcome drink and then shown to the bar to sit down for 10 mins while our room was finished. During that time we saw monkeys in the trees opposite. We were then shown to our villa and again this did not disappoint, it was amazing. The monkeys we saw earlier came closer but not all the way up to our villa. The food in the restaurant was great and the staff were fantastic. The spa was great. There is some building work going on but it does not disturb you at all. Wonderful place and would highly recommend. Thank you everyone at Viceroy Bali for making our trip so special.
title: 2nd time and still amazing

text: I would like to say a huge thank you to the whole hotel and their staff as our stay was amazing. The service that they provided us with was beyond anything we could imagine and I am very grateful for everything. Lastly, I just wanted to give one last mention and that is to one of the staff members, Citrayasa, he was so helpful, friendly and so kind that I would like to firstly thank him and say that he is a credit to the hotel. If it is your honeymoon Viceroy is the place to stay in Bali. No.1!
title: Honeymoon Bliss 5*+++++

text: If you are in Ubud, and looking for a luxurious stay with amazing hospitality and gorgeous surroundings, than thatâ€™s your place to go to. Weâ€™ve spent 3nights in the Deluxe pool villa. Itâ€™s huge with an outside infinity pool looking over the jungle. As soon as you step in you will be speechless how amazing it is from top to bottom. When you arrive at the resort, youâ€™ll be greeted with smile. We started the check in, when I realized, that all of my papers has been left in the cab. 2guys from the hotel didnâ€™t even hesitate to jump on a scooter and chase down the taxi, what left 10min ago, and they got it. Can you imagine how my vacation would be without my passport and all the other stuffs? Ruined. So many thanks for the hotel againðŸ™ You saved us a lot of headache. From check-in; â€¦
title: Ubud Perfection!

text: If you are looking for perfection! Then this is the place for you, from the moment you arrive you think you are in paradise. no need to go any were else, everything down to the last detail has been provide to the guest for there comfort, the staff are funny and effecticant the owners make you think that you have arrived in ther own home. If you want something special then do not by pass this resort.

If you need a private quiet place to retreat, then this is the one. I was there with mu husband about two years ago. The room was very luxurious. We had the pool terrace, it was beautiful. Up to now i am still amazed with their traditional roof made of leaves. I think it has a cooling effect and it is so thick that when the rain comes, it doesn't leak. Amazing! Anyway, i was taking a break from my hectic schedule and yes the resort does make me feel better. On the second day, i had a bad stomachache, they call a doctor straight away. It is part of their service in viceroy, free of charge too. Anyway, the doctor is very capable and professional. Being an indonesian myself, let's just say, i always do my medical in singapore. But this doctor, i have to say, he's not bad at all.; â€¦
title: Heaven on earth!

text: Immaculate, immersive, and impressive all around. The staff was so kind from the moment we arrived. The villas are each your very own personal hotel in itself. Private and secluded. The food and drinks were spot on as well. Get the french toast at Cascades in the morning, one of the best Iâ€™ve had ðŸ™ðŸ¼ thank you viceroy! - TR

In our 10-day honeymoon trip in Bali, we stayed in Viceroy Bali for 2 days. We had a great dinner in Cascades Restaurant in the first night. The food was great and better than I expected. The food I recommend is the lobster soup. It is the best one I tried ever. Though it is a little but expensive, I think the food quality and the staff service still worths it. We also tried breakfast, the set was tasty but just a little big in size, not sure if you could finish them all :D We lived in Regal Villa 1. I don't think I need to describe in details because everything is just perfect. I did enjoy naked swimming many times inside the villa. I am highly appreciated with the service provided. I could always have shuttle pickup within 15 minutes since I called for it and when I get back; â€¦

Is there a word or words that truly describe the sanctuary that Viceroy is? Absolutely, defiantly not. It has been twelve months now since my magical stay at the Viceroy, Ubud and magical it was. With no corner over looked, from the finest of fine dining, elegant and luxurious facilities, a truly breathtaking and unforgettable place. I really felt like it was something out of a fairytale. I just cannot forget how such a refined resort had me feeling like I was still at home. Staff we family not staff and always smiling. It was great to be able to be in such a luxurious place and not feel uncomfortable relaxing at the bar in bikini and towel, going to dinner in a little sundress barefootâ€¦. What a holiday should be, comfortable and relaxed. In my travels I have stayed in; â€¦
title: The Viceroy .. Masters of perfection!

text: It is hard to find new words from what it has been written by other reviewers. It suffices to say that the property deserves all the extremely positive and excellent reputation preceding it. It was an impeccable experience. Great rooms with particular well detailed ambience and devours. It had great food service. The western dishes are revisited in a very original way but they absolutely surprise you like all the every evening surprises we got in our room. Our son was so happy. The views are breathtaking. Lots of activities and plenty of refreshing and rejuvenating spa treatments to choose from. The full cost of our two night three days was absolutely an investment for our happiness.

It would be difficult to overstate our enjoyment with our stay at Viceroy. We stayed here May 31, and June 1, 2019 as part of our honeymoon to Bali and found Viceroy to be such a wonderful and charming resort with beautiful architecture and decor. The forest view, the villa, the pool, the food...verything about this place was absolutely exceptional and the overall attention to detail is extraordinary. The staff are all so very pleasant and the owners have done a wonderful job to create a great atmosphere. The villa itself was spacious, well designed, and comfortable. The pools provide a spectacular view of the valley/forest. The breakfast was quite good and offered a nice selection of items. My only complaint was that I found it odd there was a $5 fee to have breakfast in our; â€¦
title: Amazing!

text: It's a little bit scary wondering why Viceroy isn't #1 on Trip Advisors Ubud Hotel list. How could anything actually be any better than this lovely place? Is it because it isn't as old or established as some of the other resorts and therefore I should keep quiet so I'll always be able to book here? It was so wonderful I can't really keep it quiet, especially as the staff, facilities, rooms, grounds, view, day spa and restaurant deserve to have their excellent abilities commended to the rest of the world. We had the most perfect holiday based here. We were in a deluxe terrace villa and ensured we spent at least one day lounging by our own private pool and bale. We booked a day tour with the hotel and spent a fantastic day with Ruka our driver and guide. After which we were; â€¦
title: Heavenly!

text: I've been to Bali 4 times in the last year and stayed at many beautiful places but this was BY FAR my favorite... and that says a lot. The resort is absolutely STUNNING. I loved the Infiniti pool hanging over the depths of the Ubud jungle... it was simply magic. We had also had our own private pool villa which was an absolute DREAM. The service was also exceptional and we really enjoyed the restaurant. Overall, our stay gets an A+++. I will most definitely be coming back here and I cannot wait until I get to.

I've been to Bali 4 times in the last year and stayed at many beautiful places but this was BY FAR my favorite... and that says a lot. The resort is absolutely STUNNING. I loved the Infiniti pool hanging over the depths of the Ubud jungle... it was simply magic. We had also had our own private pool villa which was an absolute DREAM. The service was also exceptional and we really enjoyed the restaurant. Overall, our stay gets an A+++. I will most definitely be coming back here and I cannot wait until I get to.
I've never experienced this level of luxury at such a low price. Hard to beat.

I've stayed at the Viceroy twice and was even married on the grounds. It's the best place on the island.. It's such a private, relaxing and luxurious hotel.. I understand that everyone is entitled to their own opinion, but for those who have given the viceroy anything less that a 5 star rating... well they are just wrong. The whole hotel experience is flawless.
title: Absolutely Amazing!

text: Just 1 night of staying at this perfect hotel make a deep memory for us about our trip in Bali. Everything was perfect - caring staff, large and technically equipped room with pool and wonderful over-water pavilion, romantic restaurant with fine French cuisine. We enjoyed the jungle view from our villa and perfect massage at the Viceroy's Spa-center. Hotel also arrange for the guests free transfer to the center of Ubud and to the Monkey forest. Viceroy, we love you!!!
title: Beautiful Viceroy Bali

text: Just got back from a trip to Asia with the first stop in Bali. This hotel checks all the boxes for a five-star stay! The only negative comment that I would have about this hotel is the time that it takes to get there from the airport, but this resort has that covered too if you want to spend a little extra cash with a helicopter that will take you from the airport directly to the resort. If you can splurge I highly suggest doing so. We arrived at the airport in Bali with A driver from the hotel ready to transport us to serenity. The driver Angar Turned out to be the concierge that we would spend the entire next day with. After the hour and a half ride from the airport we arrived at the resort greeted with cool towels and a refreshing beverage. Our room was amazing with a private; â€¦
title: Best honeymoon stay imaginable

text: Just returned from 3 wonderful weeks in Bali. There just aren't enough superlatives to describe the exquisite Viceroy Bali, this small privately owned villa hotel is a member of the Small Luxury Hotels of the World.....and "luxury" is just an understatement when describing it. We had the feeling when we arrived that this special place was created by someone who has been to every purported "luxury" hotel in the world..and then really created the perfect one. The grounds are horticultural perfection amidst the surreal views, the staff so kind and caring, genuine and very committed to a perfect guest experience, hands on owners, a killer spa...and then there's the villas!!!! oh my!!! Heaven, heaven heaven, from the architecture to the furnishings....bliss PLUS fabulous amenities; â€¦
title: Absolute romance

text: Just returned from a 5 night stay with three girlfriends at the Viceroy. We each flew in from different parts of the world to catch up, relax, eat and be pampered with spa treatments. From the moment we all arrived, we knew this hotel was going to be special. The relaxed ambience, the wonderful Balinese service, the well-appointed villas and the fabulous view over the valley were just some of the Viceroy's finer points! I had the best massage I have ever had in my life (truly!) at the hotel's Spa and throughly enjoyed the cuisine. The degustation dinner menu together with the wine pairing is well worth sampling and the Indonesian menu is also good. The Viceroy is small and intimate and that in itself makes the hotel very appealing. We felt like we were the only guests staying; â€¦
title: Paradise in Ubud

text: Just spent a romantic weekend here with my fiance to celebrate our engagement. It was quiet and romantic. Everything in our villa was luxurious. When the staff found out about our engagement, they sprinkled rose petals around our table at the restaurant when we went for dinner, and even gave us two complimentary glasses of champagne. Totally unexpected but a wonderful gesture. We might come back here again for our honeymoon or for another romantic break.
title: A slice of heaven on earth.

text: Looking forward to a well earned break before the Christmas rush we booked into The Viceroy for 6 nights in early December 2009 into what we found out to be the best resort/hotel we have ever stayed in!(and we have stayed in quite a few) The Viceroy is definately Ubud's best! We were lucky enough to receive an upgrade to the Viceroy Villa which is very luxurious and includes marble floors, comfortable furnishings and our own villa pool - A real eye opener! The view over the rainforest ravine complete with a few shy monkeys provided us with a fantastic view. The CasCades restuarant is no doubt Ubud's best with a wonderful menu and prompt, professional service. The food is delicious and presented well. The wine list as expected was expensive but that is due to Govt taxes - but; â€¦

date post: Thomas Teissl wrote a review Apr 4
text: Love the services, ambiance and the super friendly staff. The room has beautiful jungle view and the pool is clean. The food at cascade is delicious and a few steps away, you have ApÃ©ritif! Perfect for your getaway!
title: Perfect Luxury Ubud Getaway!

date post: Thomas Teissl wrote a review Apr 4
text: Love the services, ambiance and the super friendly staff. The room has beautiful jungle view and the pool is clean. The food at cascade is delicious and a few steps away, you have ApÃ©ritif! Perfect for your getaway!
title: Perfect Luxury Ubud Getaway!

text: Lovely place to b in. The rooms r self equipped n very luxurious. The gazebo n the plunge pool area is the best of all. The only boring part is dat ders only 1 restaurant in the hotel n has got very limited things on the menu. However the staff is gud n ready to make things of ur choice. The idea of complimentary alakarte breakfast is really funny. Very very limited choice n very less quantityis provided. No pasteries n no cakes n very limited stuff.......badly Needs to improve on dat
title: A little bit of luxury to enjoy!

text: Lunched at Viceroy and what an experience. Staff extremely attentive. View beautiful and very serene. Restaurant decor superb. Food exquisite. All the trimings included.Aperitif to start, sorbet between meals to cleanse the pallet. Food definitely 5 star. Presentation outstanding. A very memorable afternoon and cannot recommend it enough. A truly wonderful experience and can't wait to go back.
title: beyond perfection

text: Me and my husband stayed at this hotel for 5nights for our honeymoon and can honestly say this is most definenetly the best hotel we have ever stayed at. The cleanest and views of this hotel are outstanding! All the staff were incredibly welcoming and professional and made this experience even more spectacular. Highly recommend this hotel if your visiting Ubad as itâ€™s not to far from activities and the market. Will most definitely be coming back here again!
title: 3rd Visit and STILL "WOW"!

text: Middle of the Jungle in Ubud with breathtaking views was a different experience and worth trying, We had a very nice stay and the staff were excellent trying to accommodate all our wishes, the food in cascade was one of the nice meals we had in Bali. The free wifi and complementary soft drinks mini bar was a nice touch, but overall this is more of a four star property. Beware you will encounter lots of insects being in the middle of the jungle so if you are not comfortable with this then Ubud is not the place for you.
title: I'm sure we'll come again

text: More than we expected Everything at this hotel is beautiful, it has the best accomodations in Ubud with very nice and carying owners and staff. Food is just unbelievable (Chef is 2 times winner of BaliÂ´s best Chef I believe) and the pool has amazing views to the forest. It is very peacefull and quiet and 2 minutes by car/motorbike to the center of Ubud. We stayed there 8 nights during low season and it was supposed to be monzon (lots of rain and thunderstorms), yet we had them they lasted only a while. We had rain only in the evening and enjoyed the lovely pool with spectacular views while enjoying the sun. Our room had a private heated swimming pool in our outdoor bathroom, which was pretty much a lounge same size as the bedroom. There are simply no words. You have to go there.

My 2nd time staying here in a private villa with small infinity pool overlooking one of the best views anywhere. Breakfast is nice, main pool is great. You get privacy, luxury, and attentive service. Take advantage of the private car and have them take you out to some remote places on the island. You won't want to leave your villa it is so nice, but you can feel a bit like a bird in a guilded cage as you are outside of Ubud itself. If you feel that Ubud is too commercialized and you are searching for that special feeling of discovery, take an early morning walk up the dirt road from the hotel and find yourself in the middle of rice paddies and small village life - priceless.
title: The Lembah Spa

text: My best friend and I spent 4 nights at Viceroy and this vacation turned out to be our best one ever. We cannot wait to go back there already. We were wowed as soon as we arrived at the lobby and front dest staff made us feel very special. The view from the lobby was breathtaking and the view from the pool area was so unreal. We kept saying it looked so fake that it was like we were looking at a huge painting. The villa was absolutely gorgeous!! Our villa was Delux terrance villa where there was a pool, big bathtab, 2 bathroom sinks, a big couch, tv and everything. We had breakfast at the bale and it was fantastic! All staff were very friendly and we appreciate their hospitality so very much. The stomospher at the bar was amazing and cocktails were delicious. We had an; â€¦
title: Great viewService was sub par

text: My biggest gripe with Viceroy Bali was that I needed to check out and go back to reality. It was a surreal experience, living in a spacious villa surrounded by natural flora whilst being treated like royalty by the friendly and professional staff. Having a fruit platter and smoothie every morning at the hotelâ€™s restaurant (CasCades) made breakfast something to look forward to since my wife doesnâ€™t do anything like that for me at home. Given that Viceroy Bali had everything on location from food, spa, and amenities, you literally never have to go into Ubud though the hotel offers a complimentary shuttle service!
title: Breathless in Bali

text: My boyfriend and I spent the first night in Nusa Dua and we got Viceroy to arrange to pick us up from Nusa Dua to Viceroy in Ubud. The journey took 2 hours and I'm gladded we are sitting in the comfortable Viceroyâ€™s Toyota Innova instead of some old taxi. We were greeted by the friendly front desk team and finally met Jero, the friendly front desk whom I had been communicating with thru email all this while to arrange the stay in Viceroy. The check in was so smooth that we had confirmed our candle light dinner to spa appointment in less than 15 min at the hotel lobby. We went WOW the moment we stepped into our villa, the view outside is simply amazing! The room is stunning and luxurious, with the Viceroy â€œVâ€ logo deco everywhere, felt like royalty living in the middle of the; â€¦

date post: Matthew Enderby wrote a review Apr 2019
text: My entire stay was magical while visiting the Viceroy in Bali, Ubud. The rooms are true luxury and spacious to say the least. The Viceroy Bali, Ubud represents true hospitality and they catered to all of my needs because Jero the manager. We had a minor issue with our room, and they went above and beyond to make my stay memorable at the Viceroy for the inconvenience. The private shuttle service is very convenient and super close to town. The spa therapists Tri and Lisa are true healers; the Four Arm Harmony Massage is a one of a kind experience. The breakfast was also another pleasant experience every morning overlooking the beautiful view from the Cascade's restaurant patio. The pool service from Baltik was top notch and thanks for making my time by the pool very relaxing.; â€¦
title: Amazing place

text: My family and I visited Bali earlier this year for over a week and had a amazing holiday. The staff were really friendly,polite and professional. We ate at the CasCade Restaurant frequently and the food was delicious and always to a high standard. We would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Ubud.
title: Honeymoon in Paradise â¤ï¸

text: My fiance and I stayed at Viceroy for four nights as part of a longer vacation we took to several countries in Asia to celebrate our engagement. This is an amazing property, and the customer service is on point. Once we arrived, the staff greeted us with leis made of jepun flowers and provide us with cold towels. As soon as we'd settled into our villa, they brought us drinks and a chocolate cake that said "Happy Engagement." They even gave us a gift - a small elephant figurine - which we thought was a lovely gesture since receiving an elephant with its trunk raised is considered good luck. Our villa was a deluxe terrace villa and was even more beautiful in person than in the pictures we'd seen on the website. It was extremely clean, especially the bathroom (we tend to gauge; â€¦

My friend and I have just returned from the Viceroy Ubud. We found the place was absolutely perfect. The staff were very attentive and polite and the breakfast and food all round was excellent and top quality. We had a Deluxe Terrace Villa with twin beds, a beautiful plunge pool, which was sometimes a little cold, but that was because of the month and the weather. The Spa was one of the most relaxing and the staff had great sense of humours, and very attentive and caring to our needs. . I would thoroughly recommend this Hotel to anyone who wants a relaxing and quiet time for their holiday. The carts were fabulous as the property is very hilly and they are at your beck and call 24 hours a day. I say well done to Otto and Margaret. They have indeed created a beautiful and; â€¦
title: World Class In Every Way

text: My girlfriend and I stayed at the Viceroy Bali and were absolutely amazed by the resort facilities, the food and staff. Everything was perfect! We stayed at the Deluxe Terrace Villa, which is absolutely beautiful and spacious. All the small details in the room really blew our minds. We enjoyed daily food at the Cascades, and as everyone else here also mentioned this already, it is super delicious! All in all it is the most amazing Ubud resort we've stayed at so far. Definitely will come back soon! Thank you so much for everything.
title: Couples Getaway

text: My girlfriend and I stayed at the Viceroy Bali and were absolutely amazed by the resort facilities, the food and staff. Everything was perfect! We stayed at the Deluxe Terrace Villa, which is absolutely beautiful and spacious. All the small details in the room really blew our minds. We enjoyed daily food at the Cascades, and as everyone else here also mentioned this already, it is super delicious! All in all it is the most amazing Ubud resort we've stayed at so far. Definitely will come back soon! Thank you so much for everything.
title: Couples Getaway

text: My husband & I were looking to mark our wedding anniversary with a vacation in Bali, and a friend recommended the Viceroy. Initially, we were a little undecided as I wanted to explore central Ubud and the hotel seemed a little off from there. However, it was an unnecessary worry as we ended up spending most of our five days in our Garden villa. We were given a Garden villa at a corner, so it was really quiet and we had a sense of being isolated, but in a good way. We love having the private pool in our villa and used it at every time of the day. What we especially love is the free Internet connection in the room, a convenience that we find hard to live without. We were always greeted with smiles and the staff all spoke wonderful English. This hotel is a family business, so; â€¦

My husband and I are currently staying here in a pool suite and having the most amazing time! Our suite was beautifully presented on arrival with flowers and a beautiful welcome message. Our pool is heated and the perfect place to retreat to, the shower is enormous and so is the bed! Every single member of staff is friendly and canâ€™t do enough for us. Iâ€™m so happy with our choice, best holiday ever!
title: Our Viceroy Bali Wedding - AMAZING!!

text: My husband and I decided to start off our honeymoon in a luxury hotel. Our honeymoon was three weeks so we couldn't afford to stay at luxury hotels our entire trip. What a treat it was to stay at the Viceroy Bali for our four days!!! Let me start off by saying from the begining the hotel staff was so accomodating and helpful. When I first saw the price of the rooms I was dissapointed because it really wasn't in our budget. I thanked the hotel for all their information and was surprised when they emailed me back and told me they would offer me the room for half price since it was our honeymoon! That's not all we also got free breakfast, free cocktails every night at the bar, 40% off any spa treatment to go along with our free THREE hour couple treatment when we arrived!; â€¦
title: The Viceroy - exceeded expectations

text: My husband and I have stayed in many 5-star hotels, however, this one have exceeded all of our expectations. Food is truly amazing, the best breakfast one could imagine. Staff is super friendly... day trips were fun too. We had no insects, which was a huge plus, considering that at the previous hotel in Semynyak it was a true disaster and I could not sleep at nights. This hotel had no such issues. The views from the room were breathtaking. So the bottom line is - this is a truly secluded and unique place perfect for couples and honeymooners. We loved it and will definitely come back as this place is a little piece of paradise on earth.

My husband and I just came back from a week in Bali, and our stay in the Viceroy was terrific. The hotel is in a beautiful area. The floor plan of the villa provided a spectacular view of the mountains. The staff was courteous and friendly; the service was impeccable; and the rooms were private and very much a natural part of the landscape, making you feel a part of nature. You will be pleasantly surprised when you get there since the website doesnâ€™t show the beauty of the place. It was hard to leave; the whole ambience had a sense of serenity that was so contagious. We live stressful lives in Los Angeles, but we were able to recharge just by been in its magnificent surrounding. It was total paradise!
title: The best in Ubud

text: My husband and I just got back from Ubud for our honeymoon and stayed at the Viceroy after reading some reviews on Tripadvisor. This hotel definitely stands up to the reviews. It is to put it simply, just amazing. From check in to check out 9days later, we were treated like we were the only guest there. The staff are so attentive and friendly and always ready to assist. We stayed in the Deluxe terrace villa which was actually a bonus since we got upgraded to this room free of charge due to being on honeymoon. The room is incredible with amazing views and the most comfortable bed. Very spacious and with all the latest amenities, eg large screen tv, ipod docking station, espresso machine and the most important thing free wifi with really good connection and speed. The infinity; â€¦

My husband and I just return fom Bali where we spent 6 nights at the Rtiz Carlton (see review) then 6 nights at The Viceroy. We got a great deal on Luxury Link and our expectations were exceeded. The viilas are fabulous and the service is top notch - the owner (an Australian orginally from Austria) and his son (the General Manager) have a very visible presence and are extremely willing to make your visit special. Their Restaurant (CasCade) is well known through out Bali and guests sometimes arrive by helicopter. The food is first class on an international level. The croissants at breakfast could not have been better if they'd been flown in from France.

My husband and I just stayed at The Viceroy during our stay in Ubud in the middle of November for our honeymoon. We initially had a pool suite which was wonderful. Having your own little pool is such a treat in the humidity of Bali. Upon our arrival, there was a personalized note laid upon our bed with red roses arranged in a heart and a small gift of an elephant statue. Elephants are my favorite animal so I was thrilled! In addition to the lovely gifts, we were given a welcome dessert on a plate with "Happy Honeymoon" written in chocolate and two welcome drinks. The next day we went to explore Ubud, and when we came back, the hotel manager, Jero, offered us a room upgrade for free! We then moved to a Pool Terrace room which had a private infinity pool and veranda that overlooks; â€¦

My husband and I recently spend a magical four days at the Viceroy Bali. From the first moment we arrived we were in awe of the attention to detail and the beauty of this property. From the fresh flowers at check in, to the cake they presented to us for our anniversary, we were in awe. I would make sure if you are really wanting to have the full experience to book the Terrace Villa. We loved the private pool and the terrace overlooking the valley. Breakfast was incredible. Unlike most places who do a buffet this is a seated (or in-room) experience including pastries, smoothies, fresh fruit, and gorgeously plated main dishes. The pool is lovely and includes a swim up bar area, great drinks and food and really comfortable loungers. While we were there we arranged an in villa spa; â€¦
title: Absolument Ã‰poustouflant

date post: Ruth Campbell wrote a review Aug 2019
text: My husband and I recently stayed here for 3 nights in July and had a wonderful time! A true 5 star experience with amazing staff and really delicious food at both CasCades and Aperitif. We were upgraded from a regular to a deluxe terrace pool villa, which was beautiful. Best part of our stay was the private heated pool. We also stayed at the Mandapa and St Regis during our vacation, which were also nice resorts, but this was our favorite resort (because of the aforementioned heated pool). Expensive but worth the value and probably the best hotel we have ever stayed at!
title: Perfection!

text: My husband and I spent the summer of 2017 and 2018 at this hotel and I have to say it was amazing, the location is beautiful and the staff treats you like family instead of a short term guest. The owners are wonderful and truly down to earth. Yes the hotel is a little more expensive than the surrounding hotels, but remember you get what you pay. the food is great and its a place that you can kick back and relax. One of my favorite places I have visited. Thanks Margret and Otto for a beautiful hotel.

My husband and I started off our honeymoon at the Viceroy, and it was the best decision we've ever made. From the moment we drove onto the grounds, we were welcomed with open arms (and flowers!). The staff did everything to make our honeymoon special. On our first day,, our room was set up with a dozen roses in the shape of a heart and a personal letter from the owner welcoming us and congratulating us on our marriage. All the staff greeted us by name and always double checked that we had everything we needed. They have a shuttle that takes you to two different stops in the heart of Ubud that are walking distance to the Monkey Forest, Yoga Barn and the Ubud market! Both shuttle stops are less than a 10 minute drive, depending on traffic. We used the shuttle to go out for dinner; â€¦
title: Cascadas , Viceroy

text: My husband and I stayed at the Viceroy for our honeymoon. We purchased the package on Luxurylink.com and it was the BEST deal. The resort is pure heaven... amazing staff, gorgeous views, great location (near the main part of town but not in the middle of it), and fantastic accomodations. We stayed in a Terrace Villa, and it was incredibly private and spacious. The breakfasts are huge, and the restaurant (while a tiny bit pricey) was great. On Wednesdays they have a traditional dance performance worth catching, and because I also spent my birthday there they created a wonderful cake presented after dinner. Overall, I highly recommend the Viceroy despite any poor reviews or warnings about false information from management. I was weary, but can honestly say there is nothing to; â€¦
title: A GEM

text: My husband and I stayed at Viceroy for 7 nights in September in Villa 27. We had the most fantastic time. From the lovely welcome with the flower Frangipani garlands, the decorations on the bed, the sweets in beaded pots at night, very warm swimming pool, cleanliness of all areas and, most importantly, to the friendliness of all the staff. We had a half board package so ate every night at the restaurant Cascades. The food was superb and Chef Miles and his staff accommodated my egg allergy with great flair and imagination. One night we had a Romantic Dinner which was set up by the main pool with lots of decoration with flowers. Chef discussed with us our menu and we had a excellent 5 course meal. We went to the Monkey Forest using the complimentary transport to Ubud. We also paid; â€¦

My husband and I stayed for 4 nights in Viceroy Bali for our Honeymoon. I was expecting a lot from this Luxurious 5 star hotel, however, I have to admit that it was not our best selection. I wouldn't say it was a total disaster, but there are many poor points that I need to point out. - We stayed in a villa called "Viceregal 2," but we could hear the TV noise and the conversation of guests from our next door villa SO CLEARLY!!! We had to call the recepetion to turn off the TV and stop talking every night we tried to sleep. It was around 11PM and I don't think the guests were too loud but every little conversation could be heard due to the structure of villa. So we were too scared to turn on the TV or make a bit of a noise because we knew that the next door would be able to; â€¦
title: Enjoyable company retreat

text: My husband and I stayed for 5 nights in a garden villa at the Viceroy in July. The rooms are beautiful, the staff is very friendly, the grounds seem like something from a dream. It was impressingly bug-free considering we are in the middle of the jungle. We turned our lights off at 10pm to decrease bugs in our bathroom. Our only negative comment about the room was that it would often smell like stagnant water or an old plant. As we had so many other issues (will discuss in section below) we chose not to tell the staff this and hoped it would eventually air-out, which it did not. But, otherwise we absolutely love the Viceroy and found it amazing. Connectivity to the outside world One of my husband's deals "blew up" during our stay and he ended up needing to call clients; â€¦
title: Paradise

text: My husband and I stayed here for 3 nights for our honeymoon. The views are incredible and the villas are incredible because their private, clean, and have almost everything you need to ensure you never leave. We also had a chance to eat at their beautiful new restaurant, Apertif. The food was incredible and Chef Nic and his team are really doing incredible things!

My husband and I stayed here for 7 nights. We chose the Viceroy for its quiet and stunning location and 5 star service and accomodation. Overall, we had a lovely time however there were a few things which I would not expect from a hotel which claims to be of such a high calibre. My husband and I have stayed at many 5 star hotels in the world and this did not really compare. I would recommend staying here for a shorter time (2 nights) to make the most of the location and then in a truely 5 star resort the rest of the time. The location, as other reviewers have suggested is stunning and makes a welcome change from staying by the beach, which is what most people expect of Bali. We stayed in a Terrace villa which was wonderful - spacious, nicely decorated and clean. The; â€¦
title: Great resort with stunning views

text: My husband and I stayed here in a Deluxe Terrace Pool Villa for 5 nights at the start of December for our honeymoon. It was just absolute heaven, where do I even start. Every single staff there will greet you with a big genuine smile, even when you just happen to walk past them within the premise. They are attentive and eager to help. Something that's important to me also is how organised and reliable they are - months in advance we pre-booked a hotel transfer to and from the airport, and a couple spa treatments at Lempah spa > firstly one of their staff, Ankga, picked us up, was on time and so friendly, and upon arrival at the resort, the resort manager, Jero, greeted us, re-confirmed all bookings including his recommended time of departure to reach the airport on time, and; â€¦
title: Wonderful Honeymoon Spot

text: My husband and I went there for a few days to take a rest and itâ€™s a perfect place for that! You feel so comfortable, the staff is so nice and helpfull! The room is very clean and cosy. They came everyday to prepare the bath with flowers! Thank you so much we will be back soon!

My husband I have had a tough year and before embarking on our next Expatriate assignment my wonderfully husband treated us both to a short getaway. With the help of a fantastic friend, a Trip Advisor reviewer and a lovely Travel Agent we came across the Viceroy Spa in Ubud. The scenery was lovely. The rooms were spectacular. We stayed in one of the Garden rooms which have their own plunge pool. Sadly the pool was very cold due to it not getting any sun. The staff at the hotel were so very helpful and were happy to change rooms for us. In the middle of it all the staff graciously upgraded us to a Terrace room that also had a plunge pool. This pool received quite a bit of sun together with some warm water coming through the fountain into the pool. All of the staff were; â€¦

My husband I spent 5 days at Viceroy, our first holiday away in a very long time. We could not have been any happier with our choice. The Garden Villa we had was immaculate, the privacy and comfort of the villa with its own pool was perfect, and the view across to the jungle amazing. The staff were outstanding, and really helped make our stay extremely pleasant and relaxing. Nothing was too much trouble, and any requests we had were met promptly. We enjoyed every delicious meal we had in the restaurant. We really enjoyed the peaceful and tranquil setting of the Viceroy, and the fact that it is tucked away. Perfect place to hide away from a busy life for a little while, and just relax and refresh the soul.
title: Beautiful secluded resort

text: My just teenage daughter and I along with good family friends stayed here for four days in February. On arrival, we were warmly greeted by the manager and later the owner. They went out of their way and to great pains to get our villa next to our friends. The villas were pristine, classy and comfortable and the setting serene, with the soothing sounds of the river down in the ravine and views of the hillside across with lush foliage and abundance of birds and other. The kids loved the pools, the room service meals and the dance lessons at the villas. If they had it their way, they would never have left the property! Breakfasts at the restaurant were included and were healthy, fresh and sustaining and the views and open air setting a nice start to the day. Everything here was; â€¦
title: The Viceroy is in a class of its own

text: My new husband and I stayed at the beautiful Viceroy for the first leg of our honeymoon. It was breathtaking, with its manicured gardens and impecable service. Being a small resort, we were greeted by our names and always made to feel special. The highlights would have to be our devine room. Immaculate and clean as well as cosy and romantic. The wonderful couples spa treatment that may well have been the best we have ever tried (and we have had a few in our time!), and the restaurant that served spectacular food every night. I would not hesitate to recomment this intimate piece of paradise..Thank you to our devine hosts at the Viceroy :O)
title: great service, luxury and time for relaxation

date post: Mark B wrote a review Jul 2018
text: My partner and I decided to change the hotel we where staying at to the Viceroy and wow we are so glad we did. On arrival the welcome was fantastic all the team there so friendly and welcoming. Our bags where taken to our room straight away and checking was a breeze. When we got to our room it was something so special. The lay our perfect and the private pool was beautiful. The view over the forest was breathtaking. A very intimate place with only 25 villas made it really special, all the team knew our names and we felt so at home. Breakfast was great, an amazing setting overlooking the forest. The food for dinner was lovely, we chose on our last night to speak with the chef and have a special 3 course dinner which he chose from what we spoke about our likes and dislikes.; â€¦
title: Stunning

date post: Ad van Maaren wrote a review Jan 2021
text: My partner and I had a wonderful 2 stay here. The hotel itself is charming, open, luxurious and inviting. The staff were incredibly helpful and attentive. Food was delicious at every meal. The beds were divine to sleep in and we woke up to lush jungle sounds, scents and views.
title: Stunning resort!

text: My partner and I stayed for 7 nights for an R&R Break from Port Hedland. We were so well looked after the minute we stepped off the plane with their VIP Immigration service that zipped us through past all the queues and then transported by "Made" our driver to the serene Viceroy. We were there in the wet season but the rain only made our stay more plesant. Our Villa backed onto jungle with a river at the base of the valley which you could hear through the buzzing of the jungle. We were lucky enough to see monkeys jumping through the trees on more than a few occassions. Our villa couldn't have been more beautiful what with the thatched roof marble bathroom, beautiful (larger than) King bed, and our very own pool. The staff were extremely attentive with speedy room service, a; â€¦

My room cost about SGD800 which I thought was quite costly but it was worth the experience! Awesomely spacious room with beautiful private pool and lounging area. Fantastic view of the forest. Quiet and relaxing ambience. Great for a yoga retreat as well!

My stay at the viceroy hotel was beyond amazing. Came for 4 nights and I absolutely loved every minute of it. From the high quality complimentary breakfast to the friendliest staff you could ever find

My stay at Viceroy in Ubud Bali was the the thing I was expecting! As a boutique hotel must , Viceroy gave me a chance to live in a nice villa which provided calm and relaxation wih the small pool and terrace. The quality of service and state of the facilities are superb. I enjoyed both my privace and a wonderful communication with the owners, a very distinguished family. It was both respectful and friendly at the same time. The service is very effective and polite. The villas are great. The hotel has its own shuttle which can take you to Ubud for shopping or to a restaurant, making it very simple to reacht the city. I was taken to the local market - and it was a great trip where my driver helped me as an enterpereter and showed me around. I was happy to tip for this! As a; â€¦

date post: John B wrote a review Aug 2013
text: My wife and I (living in Thailand) visited many different resorts in Bali (yes, we love Bali), but the Viceroy in Ubud is absolute our favorite. Beautiful rooms and bathrooms with stunning views over the valley. Everything outside is green. The morning breakfast is a la carte with very interesting healthy items. Top quality, lovely staff. Very romantic. For diner also great creative cooking, thanks for all the flowers around our table. The owners take care very well if everything is perfect........and it is! We come back soon! Aom and Fred Majoor
title: The Viceroy Ubud Bali Experince

date post: Brittany S wrote a review Nov 2018
text: My wife and I began our two week Bali honeymoon at the Viceroy and we wish we could relive every second of our experience there. From the moment our private transport picked us up at the airport to the moment we were dropped off at the beach to begin the next leg of our trip, the staff at the Viceroy exceeded all expectations. We were greeted with a genuine smile and were treated like family. Even though our travel plans had us arrive at the Viceroy after 1 a.m., we were met with more smiling faces, fresh flowers and juices, and were provided a thorough tour of our villa. 24 hour room service and a private heated pool didn't hurt either! Truth be told, I would normally provide the names of exceptional employees when I review, but there was not a single member of the Viceroy team; â€¦
title: A slice of heaven in Bali!

text: My wife and I decided to finish our trip in Bali with a couple of nights at the Viceroy. Having been recommended by family and with excellent reviews, we came with high expectations, and in the end, certainly were not disappointed. The hotel is relatively small, consisting of a number of villas, which was nice as it never felt crowded of busy. Always peaceful and small enough that you always end up speaking with other guests. There are 2 restaurants: 1 indoors with a very English colonial theme, and the other outdoors near the pool. We only are at the poolside restaurant where the food was always excellent. The main pool is fairly small and offers fantastic views. Being small is not an issue, as the room has its own private pool which is large enough. The bedroom was; â€¦

My wife and I decided to spend our honeymoon between Bali and Singapore and I wanted to start it in style, a few nights in a super luxurious hotel. After a long and detailed search on the internet the Viceroy Bali was the best choice. And now I can say it was absolutely the right choice. The honeymoon package they provide is quite amazing, weâ€™ve got free breakfast, warm flower bath on arrival, 2 hour SPA treatment for each one of us plus 20% off further treatments, a candle-lit romantic dinner, a brilliant honeymoon cake, a choice of cycling or trekking trip, return airport transfer. And because we stayed for 7 nights we only paid for 6! As soon as we got off the plane we were met by one of the hotel staff who sorted out the visas for us and helped with customs and introduced; â€¦

My wife and I found this to be a classy property with a great wow factor. The wows and grins keep coming from the moment you step out of the hotel MPV into the welcoming lobby and reception, through to the flowing lower lobby, dramatic infinity pool and marvelous restaurant and bar overlooking dense forest and a flowing river. The wows continued when we were ushered into the stylish elegance of our Deluxe Terrace Villa - huge room, soaring traditional grass thatched ceiling, delightful amenities like the illy coffee machine and B&W Zeppelin iPod player. The bath area (itâ€™s too large to be called a room) was simply marvelous. I enjoyed the huge long bath and big Grohe rain shower head. Step outside and you see the beautifully styled hanging pavilion or bale, next to the private; â€¦
title: Amazing is what I'd say about the Viceroy!

text: My wife and I had a lovely time at the Viceroy during out honeymoon. Unfortunately she got sick during our trip and we were unable to fully enjoy everything there. The view from the room, which we didn't really leave, was quite stunning. There is only one restaurant at the hotel and the food for dinner was just ridiculously overpriced.
title: Amazing views

date post: VIKA GAZINSKAYA wrote a review Feb 2011
text: My wife and I had one of the more personal and romantic stays at this hotel over New Years. The spa is very well done and not to be missed. The food at Cascades is good for dinner, not great, but the inclusive breakfast (get the benedict) with fresh squeezed juices and local coffee is outstanding. We did have one hang up, which was actually mentioned in a separate review, and that was the construction of two new villas on the property. Management responded stating that it was to be completed end of summer but this was simply not the case. We really enjoyed our stay and loved the two owners, who are actually onsite checking in on your stay throughout, but the noise from the work next door was overwhelming and took away from the tranquility of the setting. We want this; â€¦
title: The heaven of relaxation and calm in a place surrounded by beautiful nature.

text: My wife and I have just returned from a short 3 night break in Bali. We have visited Ubud before but this was our first time staying at the Viceroy. From the moment we arrived and looked out on to the wonderful vista from the reception desk, we felt relaxed and were treated to a brilliant experience. My wife chose a Deluxe Terrace Villa for our stay at the Viceroy. The Villa had everything you required, beautifully styled and outfitted. The King size bed was super comfortable and the shower had the biggest showerhead I have ever seen. We dined on the first night in Cascades Restaurant, a special meal and our table was surrounded by scattered flowers, very romantic. The food was superb, great flavours and presentation. Our package included breakfast each morning, plenty of; â€¦
title: Sensuous indulgence

date post: Michael B wrote a review Mar 2011
text: My wife and I highly recommend the viceroy. It is the ultimate place for rest and relaxation. I recommend staying in the Deluxe Terrace Villas once the construction is over as they are amazing. We were transferred to the Vice Regal villa due to the construction. The Vice Regal villa was not as modern but had a larger outdoor area with a garden. The food was great. I definitely recommend the chocolate dessert. We had it everyday. The service was phenomenal. They responded to our construction complaint very promptly. Although they could not get us an equivalent room, they upgraded our room to a larger room. The drivers were great and very knowledgeable about the area. We didnt have to worry about cabs as the hotel's car service dropped us off and picked us up when we needed; â€¦
title: Pampered in Luxury

text: my wife and i just got back from a stay at the viceroy. we would recommend this hotel unconditionally. it was probably the best place we've ever stayed. i can't say enough good things about it. the service, location, and facilities were incredible. a couple of experiences to highlight: dessert and drinks at the swim up bar under the moonlight, biking to ubud and the rice paddies in the dusk, breakfast and swimming in the villa pool, bathing in flower bath after workout
title: Gorgeous!

text: My wife and I just returned from our honeymoon in Indonesia. We have spent four nights in the Viceroy. I was a bit sceptic due the tripadvisor comment on the manipulation of the reviews. Anyway, we booked it and did not regret it. This hotel is fantastic. We had the chance to be upgraded to one of the Viceroy Villa because ours had a problem. We were stunned by the quality of the infrastructure, service, food, spa... Staff is friendly and helpfull. Also, don't forget that you're in the middle of the forest so don't be scared of the various insects you can find (we also had a monkey once in the garden !). Ubud is also an amazing area to stay. We also stayed in a hotel in the beach areas in the south of the island but you've regret it. If we knew, we would have stayed in Ubud. To; â€¦

My wife and I recently traveled to Bali for 10 days and stayed at three resorts (Viceroy, Banyan Tree-Ungasan, and Club Intercontinental). The Viceroy was a very charming small resort with beautiful architecture. The room we stayed in was the deluxe terrace sweet. This room was very nice, however the daily room cleaning service failed to clean the shower during our entire stay. On the last day of our stay I went to go for a swim in the pool and luckily noticed that it was empty. I notified management and they worked on fixing it however it had not fully refilled prior to our departure. The restaurant is over rated and over priced compared to what you can find in Ubud. The breakfast that was included is limited and a little disappointing. I felt lucky that I had received; â€¦

date post: Michael C wrote a review Oct 2012
text: My Wife and I recently visited Ubud Bali for the first time and stayed at this beautiful, tranquil most serene resort in the mountains. We loved the rooms, the food was amazing and the staff like your own family. The staff are so attentive to your every need without being invasive of your privacy and the rooms are beautifully furnished and maintained. The owners of the resort have made sure you feel special and after being out all day you come home to your resort feeling like you are back home. We would recommend this resort to anyone looking for the exceptional. Worthy of a 7 star ratin, we will definately be going back one day.
title: Truly Heaven on Earth, agree with every positive review.

text: My wife and I spent 5 night here on our honeymoon and we wish we could have stayed forever. We enjoyed an amazing breakfast every morning by the pool overlooking the ravine. The Elephant Villa room was spacious and very private. The staff knew us by name and were exceedingly friendly and professional. The food at both restaurants was top notch, with Aperitif being a dining experience on another level. The property is in a beautiful and very quiet area just outside the busy area of Ubud. The resort offers a free shuttle service to two central points in town and made it very easy on us to get in and out of town when we wanted to. We had massages in our villa and private yoga instruction in our villa. You want for nothing more when you stay on this place.

My wife and I stay at the Viceroy for our honeymoon in early June 2012. We had been recommended by friends and after reviewing the hotel online we decided this would be ideal place to stay for our once in a life time holiday. You could say our expectations were high. Well, our expectations were exceeded! It was the small things that set it apart, the extra touches, the thought and delivery were so carefully considered that our stay was made personal and special. So much so we are currently planning out return next year. In addition to the above, our time at the Viceroy was further enhanced by the owners Otto and Margret who kindly took the trouble to get to know us and ensured our every need was looked after. The Viceroy is a complement and credit to their passion and hard; â€¦
title: Absolutely Amazing!

text: My wife and I stayed for a honeymoon and it was hands down the nicest place we have ever stayed and probably will ever stay at in the future. The service provided, the villas, the food, the massages....every single thing was a 5 star experience. Highly recommend the multi-course meal at APÃ‰RITIF. The desserts were particularly noteworthy and they just didn't stop coming.

My wife and I stayed here during our honeymoon in Ubud. We rented a terrace deluxe room and it was beautiful. From the outside, the villa had beautiful views of the palm trees and rice fields that surround the hotel. From the inside, the room was well appointed with a king sized bed, Infiniti pool, gazebo and in room bath tub. We loved the free shuttle to/from Ubud center city and buggy service around the resort. We also had dinner at Aperitif, a new fine dining restaurant that they are currently completing. What an amazing meal! I canâ€™t say enough about the hospitality and quality of this hotel! We will definitely be coming back!

My wife and I stayed here in June 2017 in the vice regal villa. Everything about this resort is perfect, our villa with the private pool was beautiful, the spa was amazing and the grounds are immaculate. The owner introduced himself to us and bought us a drink, we had the tasting menu with wine pairing in the restaurant and again it was perfect. I have stayed in the best hotels around the world of which this is definitely one of them. What makes this place extra special is the owners and staff! Brilliant
title: Luxurious escape

text: My wife and i stayed in a terrace villa for 3 nights. The villas are as good as there is in Bali. We have stayed at the Banyan tree in Bali and i rate these villas against them. The pool may not be as big but the quality of the villas is as good. This is a boutique hotel and perfect for a short break for couples. As it is small it only has the one restaraunt which serves great food but i after a few days you are looking for something different. Not to take anything away from this place as it is the perfect place to start your holiday if you are looking for peace and quite while getting some of the best service in Bali. From the host to all the staff they make you feel like you are the only guests there. The hotel pool area is great if you want to leave your villa for a poolside; â€¦
title: a little piece of paradise

text: My wife and I went for a mini 5 day vacation to get away from the cold Melbourne weather and we are glad that we not only stayed at the Viceroy but also stayed in Ubud,The pools and the villas were stunning and so to was the massage (nice and deep)is what i requested and that's what I got. We were also glad to hear recommendations from the staff and management as to where to eat and what to experience.I didn't give it 5 stars only due to the fact that the slippers i had were a tad to small i am a us11 and if that was my only negative then we did really well refreshed and recharged and back to Melbourne the viceroy is total class..

My wife booked this via an internet deal, a package for 2, 4D3N at Deluxe Terrace Villa, 1 Romantic dinner, 1 couple spa, and airport transfers - for $1000. Viceroy Bali is situated not too far from Ubud town center (5 mins by car), surrounded by padi fields, and sitting on the ledge of a valley overlooking the other side - a great view, relaxing and undeveloped. It's a small boutique hotel, a fairly small swimming pool, one restaurant, a spa centre, well equiped gym, library with an extensive range of DVDs free to use in your room (if you find the time). I must say, the hotel is very well built, a lot of attention is given into the layout, design and decor. It's very tastefully done - made us felt really relaxed. It wasn't too crowded when we were there, and so it felt like we; â€¦
title: Beyond expectations

text: Myself and my fiance stayed in a Garden Villa for one week at the end of December 2008. The service was incredible, beyond incredible. The villa was luxurious with a huge comfortable bed, extra large waterfall shower, dip pool, large plasma screen and marble flooring throughout. I've stayed in some wonderful rooms around the world and the Viceroy is near the top of the list and it is in Ubud, Bali ! It is the perfect spot for a romantic getaway. If you want to impress your loved one, don't pass up the chance to stay at the Viceroy. The food was excellent and the owners, Otto and his son Anthony went beyond the call of duty many, many times to insure our trip was perfect.

date post: Lesly Damai wrote a review Nov 2018
text: Normally Iâ€™m a camper van, adventure kind of traveler but my husband and I decided on a trip this year that was a little more leisurely. We chose the Viceroy based on reviews and also the view of the pool overlooking the jungle which seemed tranquil. I was so completely blown away by the service and kindness of the staff at every turn but also the way you felt connected to the property, it has a real sense of place. This was one of the best experiences Iâ€™ve ever had and I would consider Bali again just for a chance to come back here. Thank you to the team for demonstrating such generosity of spirit. And one recommendation: pay the extra to get a pool in your room, it was incredible.
title: Complete luxury meshed with Balinese culture

text: Nothing more to say - friendly staff, rooms (we were upgrade to a Vice Regal room) were excellent with all facilities, The on demand shuttle to Ubud was helpful and quick when the traffic was light. There is some discrete building work going on next door (a new restaurant extension and some new bedrooms) but it wasn't a distraction, Hotel drinks/food/laundry etc are all very reasonably priced

Nothing short of spectacular - the beautiful grounds, the unbelievable views and the impeccable service make the Viceroy incomparable. My husband and I spent 4 days of our honeymoon here and it was heaven. Even at full occupancy, the experience is relaxing, quiet and romantic. The only minor let-down was that on check-in we were promised 'something special' in our room the following day (as they were aware we were celebrating our honeymoon), but that appeared to have been forgotten. It's neither here nor there for us to have anything special done, but it's hard to ignore after it was promised and unfulfilled. Breakfast at the hotel restaurant CasCades was included in our rate...and in a word: Wow! We also had dinner at CasCades on 2 nights as well and I have to say, they were; â€¦

date post: Mina Yassa wrote a review Jul 2019
text: Of all the resorts my wife and I have stayed at over the years, Viceroy Bali simply left us speechless. When you think it canâ€™t get any better, Viceroy will tell you otherwise. The food and drink selections are world-class in both taste and presentation. The attention to detail and level of service displayed by the staff of Viceroy was remarkable and something weâ€™re still talking about. During your stay be sure to strategically plan your meals to ensure you can taste everything at Viceroy ðŸ˜ Also, make sure you reserve the area youâ€™d like to have breakfast the night before as popular spots generally get reserved a night before.
title: Our Honeymoon

text: Oh, Where do I begin? Do I begin with how we met the friendliest staff ever? Or how we had one of the best services in a hotel? Maybe with the fact that every single minute you spend at Viceroy Bali is such a unique, unforgettable experience overall? So many things come to mind that no matter how much I write in this review, it won't do this place justice. This was our 2nd wedding anniversary and our first visit to Bali, so we decided to go all in with Viceroy, primarily given how everyone was raving about this place. But it's one thing reading amazing reviews, and its another thing truly experiencing a wonderful stay. We've been to so many great hotels worldwide that are arguably more luxurious than Viceroy Bali, but what this place had offered me as a guest is that luxury; â€¦

On a few counts, Viceroy is just brilliant, but there are ways to enhance the guest experience. Starting with the positives, The Viceroy provides most of the benefits of a large hotel, but an intimate environment with relatively few guests at any time because of its size - Bravo! Willingness and flexibility of staff - Bravo, just what you need when you are making things up as you go along (as we were) and do not want too much structure. WiFi included - BRAVO! But I still cannot work out why they were not at the airport when my flight, admittedly 15 minutes early, arrived and I was looking for the smiling face of Bali with my name card. Thank goodness (as my phone refused to work) the hotel agency at the airport kindly rang the Viceroy to shake things along and someone; â€¦
title: The best place to visit Bali

text: On the first morning I woke up I thought I had gone to heaven - it was that beautiful. The lush tropical vegetation, the mist, the dappled light on the plunge pool outside our room - it all added up to what one imagines heaven looks like. The hotel is only 5 years old and has been built with style and some beautiful details, like the carved scene of rice being plowed. The staff are extremely friendly, helpful and nothing was too much. There is a shuttle service to Ubud only 5 minutes to the centre of town. The restaurant is one of the best in Bali and the spa offers a variety of treatments. The hotel offers a number of excursions and I highly recommend the rice paddy fields trek. Like all popular tourist places (Ubud has become a big hit since Eat, Pray, Love became a; â€¦

One of the best locations and settings on the entire island, this hotel has it all, the viceroy restaurant is outstanding and superlative in modern cuisine. It sits on the top of a steep valley, with 2 tier eternity swimming pools projecting out into the open air overlooking the valley below. We had the 10 course taste menu and for Â£50 is the best money I have ever spent on the quality of food I was given. I was with my now wife, they have a grand piano and a pianist playing requests and general background music. Recommend 100% I give it 10/10 on price although high, all expectations are met.

One of the most amazing places we have stayed. We stayed in a deluxe villa ( 22 ) . It is a very special place, it feels like you come home every time you leave it and go back. We stayed for a week , I would say it is one of the best . We have traveled a lot and we would say it is right up there. Please take the time and try this amazing resort.
title: excellent and food intolerence friendly

text: Our 6 night stay at the Viceroy was a fantastic way to start our Honeymoon in Bali. Right from the first moment when we arrived, we were warmly greeted by the reception staff. The villas are very luxurious, spacious and well laid out. The private heated pool is a real treat! The main pool has lovely overlooking views of the jungle of Bali. All the food here is of very good quality - we really enjoyed breakfast. So many options and everything was really tasty. Table service too! We dined one evening at the famous Cascades restaurant - definitely has a 5* feel. One area we discovered a bit too late was Aperitif. We went there for a cocktail one evening. The bar is really impressive and has a fitting Colonial theme to it. All the staff at the hotel delivered a perfect; â€¦
title: Hands down the perfect vacation - thank you all!!!

date post: Jose H wrote a review Nov 2019
text: Our beautiful villa was huge, we stayed at many villa hotels but this space is big, we had a great view on the jungle from our private heated pool. The main pool is beautiful and the amenities are great. They have a shuttle service anytime you want to go Ubud. Aperitif bar is a must. Definitely the most romantic place in Bali. the most friendly and helpful staff who felt like family. Such a peaceful and relaxing hotel with amazing views. Wish we had booked our stay longer but will be back in a heartbeat when we revisit Bali! Thank you for having us.
title: Viceroy AMAZING!!!!

text: Our family of 4 stayed in the Viceroy Villa over the Christmas holiday for 5 nights. I wish we had booked longer as the experience at the Viceroy spoiled us for the rest of the trip which paled in comparison! This boutique hotel pays attention to every detail from the beautiful flower garland and personalized check-in to remembering our kids likes and dislikes and each of our names and inquiring about our activities we were planning or had done each day with. A genuine curiosity and caring. The people are the heart of this resort and make it even more special. The breakfast each morning was divine, again personalized with different house smoothies every morning and mix and match your own fresh juices. We did the three hour spa treatment and yoga in our Villa. Again, amazing.; â€¦
title: Amazing dining experience

text: Our first visit to Bali so wasn't sure what to expect. Read some of the previous reviews on this hotel and was a little troubled to hear about the building work going on. However, their website looked fantastic and it was the best looking of all the hotels we trawled through on the internet. So we decided to book a Terrace Villa away from any noise and received a reply from the hotel to say they would make sure we had such a villa. We need not have worried, there was little if any noise from the building work. On arrival we were taken to our villa, Viceroy Regal II; we had been given an upgrade. I wasn't too sure it I wanted this upgrade as we were at the bottom of the slope. However, there were buggies to take you to the restaurant on call any time; we walked up each day; â€¦

Our seond visit to The Viceroy and we were again extremely happy with the experience. The accomodation, setting, ambience are excellent and we enjoyed having superb breakfasts in the villa each morning while watching the monkeys and mist across the valley. Every meal at their Cascades restuarant was superb - the degustation meals that they offer are excellent. The spa staff provide the most relaxing treatments I have ever had and the setting is beautiful. We again used their VIP service which is well worth the extra money as you pass through the airport very quickly and hassle free. Look forward to another visit next year.
title: Now I know what relaxing is...

text: Our stay at viceroy hotel in Bali was one of the best experiences in our lives ever! The ambience, staff and restaurant was really really fantastic. It definitely exceeded our expectations. I give this hotel a 10/10! I canâ€™t wait to be back!
title: Amazing Honeymoon!

text: Outstanding! ---------------- The Viceroy Bali offers a VIP immigration service which is defiantly worthwhile, you are greeted by their representative as soon you enter the terminal who quickly & efficiently escorts you through immigration, luggage collection & customs avoiding all the queues & hassles. The Viceroy car & driver are waiting for you when you exit the terminal with cool towels & refreshments. The trip to Ubud takes about 45 minutes, the car is luxurious, comfortable & the driver explains many of the interesting things about the Balinese culture & lifestyle along the way. Upon arrival you are welcomed with flowers & mocktail, the check-in is effortless & immediately you feel like you are part of the Viceroy family. We stayed in the two bedroom Viceroy Villa; â€¦

Overall, we spend 6 nights at the Viceroy and we had a wonderful stay. We also considered to stay at the Four Seasons and the Cheddi Club before choosing the Viceroy. Once arrived in Ubud, we visited them all and considered the Viceroy to be the best of them all. My wife and I are used to stay at luxury resorts (e.g. Aman) and the Viceroy did live up to our expectations. Short summary of the Pros: - very friendly and helpful staff & management(e.g. room service, organizing day trips, arranging motor bike etc.) - Outstanding food (the french restaurant at the Viceroy could easily compete with the best restaurants in Zurich! It is strange to say but we had the best Foie Gras ever at the Viceroy!). Btw, we also went to the Mozaik in Ubud, but the food there could not compete; â€¦
title: BEST HOTEL I HAVE EVER STAYED AT

date post: Selwyn Brian K wrote a review Feb 2020
text: Quite peaceful and very private within the villas. About as secluded as you can ask for, but still very close to the main roads in Ubud. Close enough to the rice terraces and other touristy spots. Breakfast is amazing and the free shuttle is quite convenient. Service was amazing and they do a good job of going out of the way to make you feel attended to. Great view, both from the main pool and our private plunge pool.
title: Unbelievable 5 Star Luxury

text: Rooms are very spacious with fantastic views. However breakfast could be improved as portions are small and choice limited. Also disappointed with restaurant food: sky high prices but chewy waggu beef!!!
title: Romantic location!!!

text: So we went to the Maldives, Singapore, and Semniyak but by far Viceroy Bali succeded to amaze us in every single way! They upgraded our room which left speechless to leave this amazing room! The staff made it perfect, i have never seen such friendliness. I am dreaming of going there again. And i dont thing i would ever find such an amazing experience anywhere else! Thankyou so much!

Spent first part of our honeymoon here, it was amazing the hosts were excellent, the meals were succulent, blablabla... Worldclass brilliant! The personal attention to detail was incredible, I marvel at the quality of the villas, the views and the meals, we have stayed in near similar cost 5 star highly reviewed hotels since and have never had an experience like the Viceroy!

Staff Absolutely the best staff I have experienced at any hotel. The customer service is second to none. They cannot do enough for you. It made our honeymoon very special. The hotel offers a shuttle service into Ubud. The drop off and pick up is at any time you want which is great to allow you to explore in your own time. Food Breakfast has a wide variety of options which all taste great. The cascade omelette was my favourite each morning. The lunch options at cascades were brilliant and dinner was fantastic. It was the best food my wife and I had on our entire honeymoon. Room Huge! It really was a 'wow' moment when we opened the doors to our suite for the first time. Seeing the indoor heated pool we had, the bathroom area, the bedroom itself with the huge bed and; â€¦

Staff was very heartwarming and the room was great. We had the terrace pool suite and it was awesome. We ate at the cascades and had 3 courses which were great. I booked a seperate table and they put flowers around the table and made everything very cute(see pictures). Thanks for everything Best regards,Silas
title: Fantastic holiday and best food in Ubud,Bali

date post: Eylul S wrote a review Nov 2018
text: Stayed 4 nights at viceroy and wish to stay longer. The villa, the vibes, the staff and the food , everything was perfect. Everyone treats you like a royalty. I highly recommended viceroy for honeymoon, anniversary and also healing vacation (from stress) cause itâ€™s located in ubud which is little bit far away from main city of bali.
title: The Best Hotel Experience Ever
