date post: Javon Jack wrote a review Jun 2019
text: Stayed at the Viceroy Bali for 4 nights in the Deluxe Terrace Villa for our Honeymoon. The hotel is absolutely gorgeous. -Service: impeccable. Staff know our names and special requests by heart. -Facilities: outstanding. Both the villa and the common areas were very impressive. -Location: located only a few minutes away from the hectic centre of Ubud, Viceroy is a tranquil and peaceful retreat in the jungle with extraordinary views.
title: One of a Kind!!!

text: Stayed for three nights with my faience and it was more than I could have imagined! Complete luxury meshed with Balinese culture; slice of Bali heaven. Our stay was romantic and surreal. The jungle is lush and the amenities are impeccable. It's a few minutes outside of Ubud so not much around but the hotel has tons to offer!! Best breakfast ever, enjoy :)

Stayed here for 6 days in a deluxe terrace villa. Overall we thought that the hotel was great, there was a few issues but they resolved them quickly... Let me get the small issues out of the way first. On our first day the hotel had a construction crew working on an expansion, this resulted in a lot of noise in our villa. We was concerned that the noise would be with us all week and complained to the front desk. As soon as they heard this the noise abated and we didn't hear anything for the rest of the week. One day the restaurant had an issue with breakfast that led to them misplacing our order. We sat for a hour without breakfast while everyone around us was being served, the server did tell us they made an error, apologized and breakfast came out quickly after that.; â€¦

Stayed in a Vice regal Villa. Srevice was very good. Owners were most hepfull. margaret and her son, from Sydney I believe. Beautiful property, amazing location, total privacy, entertaining characters at nye dinner, sooo much fun. Nothing the staff would not do to acomodate any whim. however would have expected wifi and up to date top of the line audio visual gear for the price bracket. room service was a bit sloppy considering top prices charged. $US20 for a sliced banana. Transfers included. Not chargded for any vehicle transfers.....and we used the service a lot, all over ubud....even to our second hotel ritz carlton, a 50 minute drive. Would recomend to friends, esp couples. This review was a little late coming.......amazing hotel..... so much better then Amandari, chedi,; â€¦
title: A little bit of paradise

text: Staying in ubud is a must do for a Bali vacation. The viceroy was beautiful. We had villa #1 and it was so relaxing and peaceful. Our driver Muggy was so helpful and knowledgable and friendly. He took us to the elephant sanctuary and the rice terraces and the water palace temple and for a tour of a traditional Bali family compound. The cappuccinos at the Viceroy are the best I've ever had and the food is scrumptious. I really enjoyed sitting out in our outside room that floated above the water of our private pool.

Step into the Ubud jungle and experience the ultimate in five star luxury while enjoying the natural and traditional surroundings of Viceroy Bali. You feel right at home when arriving at the resort and are instantly transfixed with the tranquil and stunning environment. Their signature infinity pool is just as dreamy as it looks in the photos, making you feel as if you are swimming in the centre of the forest. We loved our private and serene Viceroy Villa, complete with two en-suite bedrooms, gigantic bathtub, outdoor shower, canopied beds and giant swimming pool with uninterrupted views of the lush green jungle. Service is discreet and personalized where everyone will remember your name and preferences.
title: Very Nice

date post: Sairoj M wrote a review Mar 2019
text: Stunning. Breathtaking, we were so warmly welcomed everything was carefully explained to us. My daughter and I were travelling together and it was wonderful to be treated so respectfully and with such affection. The view as you come into reception is out of this world. We were driven around the property and shown where everything was, followed by a delicious welcome cocktail in the bar overlooking the jungle. We were then taken to our room, fabulous, luxurious and so comfortable with our own pool facing directly on to the jungle. The attention to detail is what stays with you, from the wonderful body lotion provided in the bathroom to the exquisite flowers (frangipani) placed overnight on our pillow. The people working at this hotel are so attentive, kind and friendly,; â€¦
title: Amazing place

text: Such a beautiful place! Such a good restaurant! Such a nice staff! Such a lovely room! Calm, luxury, kindliness! I recommend particularly this hotel in Ubud, very well centraly situated to go and visit Ubud or other spots around. Particularly for honeymooners or even friends or families in Bali. Thank you very much for their reception.

Thank you to all the wonderful staff who made our Honeymoon an Amazing experience. We stayed in a pool villa and would definitely recommend everyone to have this fantastic experience. The view from our room or from the private pool was amazing over looking the Forrest we even got to see a few monkeys playing in the trees. The bed was sensational & we slept so well not like any hotel we have stayed at. The Food was an experience in itself complements to the chef! The overall property is Exactly as the net show it to be.......the manicured gardens, the infinity pools words cannot describe this picturesque location. The day spa facility was out of this world "The Cleopatra Treatment " was awesome! I cannot fault the Viceroy in any way all I can say is see you next your for our; â€¦
title: Perfect stay in a beautiful location!

text: Thank you Viceroy resort for making our honeymoon so perfect and luxurious with your professional staff , lovely romantic gestures , excellent 7-star service...the villa is beautiful , the view is magnificent and the pool is very clean and has warm water which you can order to extend .
title: Beautiful complex but not great

text: The deluxe terrace villa with private pool is very spacious and luxurious. The pool and villa overlooks beautiful green valley and it is very private and amazing to wake up to in the morning. I love the breakfast area, you can sit there and just enjoy the beautiful view. It is suitable for couples enjoying a romantic holiday or those traveling solo who wants some quiet and peace. Not recommended for kids as they don't have much facilities apart from the spa and area for yoga. What I like about the resort is that the staff is very friendly, top class service. The free shuttle to and fro Ubud town is a plus. The food served at Cascades is superbly amazing with generous portion and ingredients for western meals, but not so for local meals. If you want authentic local meals at; â€¦
title: A ravishing ravine in the Balinese forest

text: The fact that. I am writing this review from my sun bed on my private terrace at the Viceroy, on the sixth day of a seven day stay at the Viceroy, speaks volumes because I'm normally rather lazy about making contributions to Trip Advisor. However, this hotel is so fantastic that I have to share my experience with others. The problem I have is that this place is so great, I don't know where to begin! Firstly the accommodation is absolutely fantastic - as good, if not better than the photographs. We are currently staying in a Deluxe Terrace Villa and it is outstanding - the best Hotel room I have stayed in, by far. Our private infinity pool and terrace area is simply stunning and we have loved using it every day. Several contributors have commented that the pool was too cold to; â€¦
title: Stunning room.

text: The helpful and friendly staff make this place. The resort is as beautiful and tranquil as the publicity photos say and the rooms and private pools are very secluded. The hotel is undergoing expansion and there was some building construction noise which you could hear at breakfast but not at any other time. This is not a cheap hotel but the mini-bar unlike other hotels is not a rip-off, a beer is Â£3 The peace and quiet was only broken by swearing and cursing by one couple who rightly were very upset at another who used a drone to take video in contravention of the hotel written policy. Bring a camera but don't take photos of other guests and leave your drone at home! If we come back to Bali, the Viceroy would be at the top of our list although there are a lot of cheaper; â€¦
title: Stay At Viceroy bali

text: The hotel is located in a far flung area of Ubud which sounds very mystical and the Location certainly is different from seminiyak. I loved the hotel and the family which runs the hotel.it is built in a sort of a mountain resort with the entire hotel overlooking a valley which is very picturesque. The rooms are large and open baths and outdoor dip ponds and wooden cabanas to lounge in. I love the espresso makers in the room!!! Thank you. The food was fresh and filled with aroma of fresh herbs and vegetables!!!the air was clean and made u very hungry.... I'm certainly going back

The hotel staff is extremely friendly and helpful, the new restaurant and longe are amazing. We stayed at the Terrace Pool Villa and it was great in terms of size, cleanliness, facilities, and the view was just perfect. The only downside was the A/Cs in the hotel were split which is a little bit old/cheap looking. Otherwise, everything was just amazing. loved it!
title: A little slice of heaven

text: The location is beautiful, in the middle of rice fields but coming from Uma Ubud, we found a great difference. Our room was a garden view, with a nice "indoor pool" and an XXL bed. Apart on this the impression on the room is that it is much older than its six years. Not surprising, if you see how the owner (an Austrian man) is heading around dressing like a sloppy tourist. Same impression from the breakfast, served with paper napkins (at 600 usd a night???). Service was good but not excellent and the restaurant quite slow, especially for the breakfast. First day we were told bread and croissant had finished and they could serve only toasted bread (AT 600 usd A NIGHT???). In theory there is a complimentary van driving in and out from Ubud at no charge but if the hotel is full you; â€¦

The most beautiful hotel with the most stunning views! We couldn't believe it actually looks just like the photos on the website. The hotel is an oasis of peace and tranquillity that is lovely to come "home" to, after the bustle and noise of Ubud. Spacious, elegant rooms in immaculate condition, just like the test of the hotel and so many thoughtfully chosen 'details' in the decoration, design and the little extra touches provided. Wonderful restaurant with delicious, beautifully presented 'fine dining' food. I loved the daily breakfast smoothies in their rustic wooden bowls and loved the surprise of discovering what the flavour was for that day. But far and away above anything else, the staff here are the most friendly, helpful, attentive staff I have come across anywhere in; â€¦

The most luxurious and enjoyable hotel I have stayed at. We constantly commented on the perfect attention to detail from the moment we arrived. Beautiful decor and ambiance throughout the entire hotel. It was easy to see the staff loved working here and this was reflected in their service and smiles. Cant wait to return

The most outstanding restaurant & resort in Ubud! World class from beginning to end, staff amazing, food superb, service impeccable... A must visit, you wonâ€™t be disappointed!! My husband chose the Angus steak which he described as â€˜velvet to the palateâ€™ I chose the duck, smoked in earl grey tea and honey marinated, accompanied by the most delicious jus Desert was their Grand Mariner soufflÃ©, indescribable , totally delicious. Superb wine list accompanied our outstanding meal!

The only problem with the Viceroy Bali is that the minute you arrive there you wonder how you are ever going to leave this little slice of heaven! I cannot fault the Viceroy even if I tried as every small detail was taken care of and nothing was too much trouble for the wonderful, friendly and attentive staff. The position of the hotel is breathtaking, overlooking a gorgeous gorge/jungle and waterfall with monkeys swinging in the trees - so peaceful and tranquil. Our private villa with swimming pool was magnificent, spacious and spotless. Owners/hosts Otto, Margaret and Anthony are always on hand for a chat and run this stunning hotel with precision and perfection. There is nothing lacking - the gym was great, the spa was wonderful and the restaurant was fantastic. Every meal; â€¦

The rooms and views were breath taking! Absolutely amazing... But, the service was hirrible Breakfast servings were tiny. The crapes and pancakes were the size of 50cent coins Water for meals was charged at high prices even though the same bottles were available everywhere for free (the logic escapes me) The service is what you would expect from a 3 star place

The rooms are really big, the infinite pool a gem, the service impeccable, but the food at the restaurant was superb. We had an 8 course meal, every dish unique in taste and texture. Highly recommended for professional service from the moment you stepped in hotel.

The rooms are very clean and well equiped. I did not feel the "Bali design" touch... The room we stayed in had a plunge pool but it was TOO Cold... We couldn't use it. The restaurant is good but very quiet and the music in the bar is very limited.

The service in this hotel is out of this world! We stayed here during our honeymoon and were greeted with warmth from arrival to departure! The staff are beyond friendly and helpful from the front office, the shuttle drivers, and breakfast and bar area. We received a congratulations card from the general manager at arrival and got a flower bath as a surprise during our last night. Weâ€™ve never experienced such a service from a hotel and will remember it always! If youâ€™re looking for a break from reality with a family oriented hotel and staff look no further. These people know how to take care of their guests and it shows in every detail! Definitely coming back!

date post: Globe T wrote a review Nov 2019
text: The site seen was amazing. I never seen like that view. Absolutely awesome!!! I will go there again if I will have a chance to go. I will tell my friends to go there and enjoy the environment with their family.
title: 5 star honeymoon visit!

text: The unique feeling you get from the Viceroy and its wounderfull but almost invisable staff is amazing we often were left with the feeling that we were there only guests,such a luxury is very rare but also very pleasing 'you can spend three hours by the pool at the Viceroy alone doing absolutely nothing, and it will be the best thing you will ever do for yourself in your life' mcwhite
title: Heaven on Earth

text: The Viceroy Bali envelopes its' guests with warmth, luxury and comfort each moment of one's stay at this astoundingly beautiful resort. Upon arrival at the sweltering Bali airport, we were met by their driver, who immediately offered us chilled handtowels and bottled water (had we opted to arrive by helicopter, the Viceroy has a landing pad on sight). In fluent English, he provided us information about Ubud's history and Balinese culture. He could not have been more pleasant. The open-air lobby provided our first glimpse at the beauty and hospitality which awaited us. We were greeted with a refreshing glass of Balinese punch, and were promptly registered and driven by golf-cart to our gorgeous Vice Regal Villa 2. The Balinese stone sculpture and colorful flora en route was; â€¦

The Viceroy Bali is amazing! My husband and I spent part of our recent honeymoon here. The property is beautiful and very well-maintained. Our villa was spacious and luxurious. We loved our private pool and deck and its view of the jungle and a waterfall. It is tempting to never leave the resort because of the very good food and drink options at Cascades and Aperitif, the spa and the beautiful villa. We did venture out a couple times into the center of Ubud and appreciated that the hotel offered a complimentary shuttle to get us there. The hotel staff were all very friendly and attentive. They also gave us honeymoon surprises on our first and last nights. We will look back fondly on our time here in years to come and hope we can come back one day.

date post: Lora B wrote a review Sep 2013
text: The Viceroy Bali is the most beautiful Hotel I have ever stayed in. I have done a lot of travelling and visited many places around the world, but this hotel by far has to be one of the most magical places I have had the privilege of staying in. The privacy, tranquility and over all experience is truly perfect if you are in need of relaxation and pampering. Each and every detail of this amazing hotel is a credit in so many ways. The hotel has everything you could need, and your stay can be tailored to suit any wish or requirement. The restaurant offers exquisite cuisine, the spa offers beautiful treatments my massage was unbelievable. I organised a guided trekking tour, as well has having high speed wireless Internet through out the property, access to a gym, my own private; â€¦
title: Ubud Bali experience of a lifetime

text: The Viceroy Bali service was outstanding. Starting with Made, our driver from the hotel who met us at the airport with cool cloths to wipe our faces after the 28 hour journey from Chicago and continued to be our driver throughout our stay to Anthony the owner of the hotel and his son who would always stop by our table to see if everything was to our liking and converse. The villa we stayed in was fantastic, no attention to detail was overlooked. We enjoyed the outdoor bathroom that included a garden shower area, plunge pool, recliners, daybed and sumptuous bath. The food and spa were A+ as well. We left feeling very relaxed.

The Viceroy comes with so much prestige. Awards, reviews, celebrity fans. Theyâ€™ve got it all. And Iâ€™ve long wanted to visit itâ€™s lush jungle location. As I approached the hotel, I realised my expectations were extraordinarily high. My honest experience is that when faced with such a situation, Iâ€™m often left disappointed. But I neednâ€™t have worried. The Viceroy really lives up to the hype. And delivers by the bucketload. On arrival our deluxe villa opened out to a jungle facing infinity pool. Listening to the birdsong, and the sound of the lush green surroundings come alive every day were life affirming. Being immersed in that much nature should be prescribed for every single human being. The roomâ€™s biggest asset, however, is the level of privacy it provides. Outside of our; â€¦
title: Amazing Stay at the beautiful Viceroy Villas

date post: Sid B wrote a review Aug 2018
text: The Viceroy exceeded our expectations from service to room quality. It is an amazing gem in the hills above Ubud. The views are stunning, the food great, and the hotel impeccable. Stay here if you get the opportunity.
title: Welcome to Paradise

text: The Viceroy has it all...beautiful rooms, spectacular views, excellent service, amazingly friendly people, delicious food at Cascades restaurant. The local cultural experience just tops off an incredible overall experience. Thanks to all the staff at The Viceroy...we will definitely be back. Debbie and Johnny from Singapore
title: Live like a Queen (or King)!

text: The Viceroy Hotel in Ubud is unbelievable. We stayed in a Terrace Villa with our own infinity pool that looked across a beautiful valley. Although it wasn't our honeymoon, we felt like it was! The room (massive), service, food, staff, atmosphere were all wonderful. We stayed here because of a positive review we read on this site. The reviewing couple was right. If you are looking for a romantic hotel where you will enjoy absolute privacy and the very best of everything - this is the hotel. Can't recommend it highly enough.
title: As close as you can get to paradise - on earth!

text: The Viceroy is a bit pricey compared to other resorts in Ubud, but well worth the extra money. We chose this resort because it seemed to encompass everything that we were looking for. The resort is set in the beautiful countryside with the luxury of modern comforts and we were not bothered by any bugs at all, it is set in an immaculate clean well manicured environment. I was worried that the open bathroom would be covered in bugs, but it wasn't an issue. We went for a walk to Kamandula resort next door and were so glad that we chose the Viceroy, they are worlds apart in terms of quality, luxury and overall ambience. The hotel has a great shuttle service to and from Ubud centre, it's less than 10 minutes drive, and convenient to visit the lovely restaurants, explore the; â€¦

date post: Denise Z wrote a review Jan 2019
text: The Viceroy is a boutique hotel about 10 minutes driving from the center of Ubud. After some additions, the hotel will be less of a boutique in years to come. The hotel sits on a cliff edge, adding dramatic views to the walks around the property. A setting in the middle of a rice field also adds a wonderful morning walk as an option each day. On a clear day, Mt Agung is visible in the distance. The staff are amongst the friendliest and most professional I have ever encountered! I could not have asked for more!!
title: The Perfect Escape

text: The Viceroy is a really nice place to stay. The rooms are very spacious and well designed. The staff are very welcoming and helpful. Cascades restaurant has some really good food to offer. We occasionally visit the restaurant for events, like Christmas & New Years Eve, as well as other functions. This place is highly recommended.

date post: Carolyn S wrote a review Sep 2012
text: The Viceroy is a stunning hotel in every sense of the word! We stayed for an idyllic 6 nights at the end of August as part of our Honeymoon trip to Bali. The hotel itself is very elegant, the scenery is breathtaking and our villa was exceptionally comfortable. It was however the staff that made our stay truly memorable. Everyone was so friendly, nothing was ever too much trouble. For us the Viceroy had the perfect blend of grand luxury without being ostentatious or impersonal. For anyone looking for a hotel that's a bit special in Ubud then the Viceroy is the place for you!
title: over the top but in a good way

date post: Mc W wrote a review Jan 2020
text: The Viceroy is a stunningly beautiful Balinese oasis. We loved the plunge pool in our suit and the main infinity pool on the property was to die for. The food is wonderful and the hotel staff were incredibly warm, knowledgable and welcoming. To date I've never experienced better service in my life. Most of the staff have worked at the property for many years and have a sincere love for the hotel and the family who owns it. Thank you for such an incredible stay. We will definitely be back soon!
title: best of the best

date post: Lana Olifer wrote a review Jan 2020
text: The Viceroy is an amazing hotel in Ubud, far enough from the hustle but close enough to town for all the bars and restaurants. The hotel offers a free shuttle which is so helpful. Our Suite was beautiful, so clean, modern and luxurious. The private cabana and infinite pool were fabulous and so nice to have our own outdoor space completely private. The main pool was always quiet too and had such gorgeous views. The breakfast was delicious, so much choice and brilliant service. The staff were incredibly helpful, friendly and gave such personal service, they always remembered our names and all the requests we had regarding allergies and they were so wonderful in making my husband's birthday surprises so special. The housekeeping staff were the best; so helpful efficient & always; â€¦
title: Sophisticated and boutique hotel

text: The Viceroy is just pure perfection. Have stayed at some pretty plush places over the years, but this certainly tops them all, and by no small amount. First, the rooms are splendid, luxuriously appointed and completely private. Our private pool was sun soaked all days with incredible views over the valley and the lush jungle. Whilst only a few minutesâ€™ drive from the centre of Ubud, it is set back from town and there is absolutely no noise other than the teeming jungle. The beds are some of the best I have ever slept in and I slept better than I had in years. Second, the staff are incredible. They operate with near-German efficiency but are the warm and friendly. You likely wonâ€™t have any issues, such is the attention to detail, but if you do they will be dealt with promptly and; â€¦

date post: Martin Raviraj wrote a review Apr 2019
text: The Viceroy is located a little bit outside out of the busy ubud center. The property is currently expending with 5 extra rooms. You will enjoy a great view on the lush nature from your infinite private heated pool ...! Our bed with huge and very comfy! The style of the spacious rooms are more inspired by luxury palaces instead of bamboo constructions. The staff was simply charming. It would be a mistake to stay at Viceroy without experiencing their fine dining experience at their new restaurant â€œAperitifâ€. We had a excellent evening, really qualitative and impressed by their Belgian chef (Nik) and his staff. In a colonial style, we did enjoyed every bite ! I wonâ€™t be surprised if they get a Michelin star in the future!... they organise frequent complimentary Shuttle to go; â€¦
title: Incredible stay in the Jungle.

date post: Kim G wrote a review Oct 2018
text: The Viceroy is the most amazing and beautiful hotel that we have ever stayed in. Every element of the Hotel was luxurious and the customer service was world class we were truly looked after. We stayed at the Viceroy for 4 days we got married here, the day was completely stress free, the venue, flowers and decorations were superb!! I had the most beautiful day and I will never forget it THANK YOU. The food at the Hotel was stunning and we really enjoyed the evening entertainment of the traditional Balinese dancers. We loved our room, the amazing view, the cute visitors of the little wild monkeys now and then on our roof ..they are so cute and we loved them!! The heated pool was our favourite it was so so relaxing !! We also visited the temple lempunyang, the hotel arranged a; â€¦
title: Cascades restaurant

text: The Viceroy lived up to its name: regal, opulent, a bit colonial. In some ways it was a bit much for our style -- but we admit we really enjoyed it. Extraordinary (large!) villa, nice pool, simply magical views. The structure of the entry door to the villa was a bit treacherous and poorly designed-- an easy fix we hope they make! Easy to get in and out of town via their taxis; good food and nice people.
title: Simply Perfect

text: The Viceroy surpassed all expectations that I had. I had been looking for a 5 star hotel in Ubud and just stumbled across it. From the time I first contacted them to the time I left there was not one detail which didnâ€™t blow me away. We had arranged the VIP transfer so when we arrived at the airport there was no line for us! We just gave our passports and forms to a gentleman holding a sign bearing my name. He took care of the rest. We were on our way to the hotel in less than 30 mins from landing. I highly recommend this way of doing things! The actual hotel takes your breath away. Each room overlooks a valley which has a river at the bottom of it. Waking up in the morning and just looking out over it while breathing in cool, crisp air was perfection. The villas are of the; â€¦
title: Breathtaking

text: The Viceroy was a dream stay from the moment you arrive and you're greeted with the frangipani flower crowns to your last moments in the hotel. You won't want to leave! Everything was made stress free especially as we were travelling with our 4 yr old daughter. She loved the super friendly staff and the private pool was a real hit! We recovered so well from the jetlag thanks to the amazing bed and mattress in the room and the peace and quiet. The food was excellent too and the Aperitif bar is a must see! I wish we could have tried the food in the restaurant too. The daily Ubud shuttle was a real perk to go to town and shop/see the sights etc with the help of Tukies coconut ice cream sweetening the deal for our daughter. We would stay here again at the drop of a hat.

The view from our villa overlooking the gorge and within view of the rice fields, was stunning! The layout of the villa, with it's indoor dipping pool and reclining bed was fabulous. The resort is perfectly laid out along the edge of the gorge and the outdoor infinity pool, very inviting on a hot day. Service, from the moment we were picked up to the moment we departed, was polite and courteous. Recommendations for dining and shopping were informative and accurate. The complimentary transport to Ubud was always available and on time. We also spent a wonderful afternoon at the spa being pampered. The facilities and services were most satisfying. Definitely a place to remember and return to.

The villa is huge and the private pool is more than big enough for dipping in and out of. The hut over the pool is excellent for dozing during the day and for taking the room service breakfast under (at no extra charge).The reason for my trip was just to relax and unwind with my friend and we wanted to do this in a beautiful place. This was definitely one of our highlights of our Bali holiday.

The villa is maginificant with its perfect view, very clean and large villa. Also, the staff are so professional. It is so easy to transfer to and from the villa within Ubud area. The food here is so so so delicious. The infinity pool here is perfect. Also there is no mosquito inside the villa. I recomend this villa to everyone.
title: Paradise, with service and friendliness

text: The villas are modern and clean , the views are amazing with a pool overlooking the nature and you can have your privacy , the spa was excellent perfect for honeymooners . The prices are very expensive !!! the restaurant is not that great , the food is average and expensive. You have to walk uphill to get to the reception and restaurant which is exhausting .

date post: Ghassan O wrote a review Sep 2012
text: There are not many places where you find such a perfect balance between friendly service and perfect hotel infrastructure. The spacious villas offer all amenities you would expect. A private pool and terrace gives you the opportunity to relax very privately. We have never been in an Asian Hotel which was that clean and well maintained - a big praise to the owner family! But the best thing of all is the kind and friendly service of the hotel crew. They are there to serve, literally! They want to make you happy with all their possibilities. Great! A lot of hotels can cut a slice out of this! We can recommend it to everybody!
title: Perfect spot for honeymooners

text: There are reviews that go around and talk about places being heaven on earth etc. All i will say is that this place is a step ahead of what you want. They never lurk or badger you... it's just done. Its there. They make everything so easy. And you will want for nothing. I've stayed in a lot of really very nice place. This is the most wonderful place on earth. Worth every penny. Just trust me.
title: An Oasis in an Oasis

text: There are so many places to choose from in Bali, it is hard to make a decision...We feel so lucky to have found a place as wonderful as the Viceroy...actually, this is the first time I have ever felt compelled to make the time to write a review- it was that good. From the enchanting views, excellent service, impeccable food, and overall strength of its character- this is the place to stay...over and over again. Do not miss the set menu at the hotel- it is delicious and very romantic. This is a quiet place perfect for those seeking retreat from their demanding lives...it did the job and much more for us- I will definitely be back.
title: Excellence in BALI - Luxury in Ubud

text: There is only one thing better than spending a honeymoon (or any vacation for that matter) in Bali, and that is spending it here. The staff was excellent and they made our stay even more special than it would have been, going out of their way to do the little â€œextrasâ€. The location is beautiful, with great views. The restaurant was also very good. We fell in love with the view of the Petanu River Gorge from the Viceroy Bar as well.
title: Comfortable.

date post: Kubra A wrote a review Nov 2011
text: There is such an air of peace and tranquility about Viceroy Ubud. The staff are amazing and deliver impeccable service in an unobtrusive way. The Deluxe Terrace Villas are beautifully appointed and clean and the grounds are wonderfully maintained. All non-alcoholic drinks in the mini bar are complimentary which is a lovely touch. The food at CasCades is of an exceptional quality and we certainly enjoyed the fine dining experience during out stay. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this resort to anyone.
title: Pleasant stay at Viceroy

text: There really aren't enough superlatives to adequately describe the experience of staying at The Viceroy. The experience starts the moment you're picked up from the airport where once in the car you're handed a cool towel and bottle of water to refresh while being transported to the hotel. Every staff member we came into contact with during our brief stay was absolutely excellent, nothing was too much trouble. The villas are magnificent, with space a plenty and so beautifully furnished and fitted. The restaurant, with its stunning views, was superb with some of the most delicious meals I've had in many years. Everything about The Viceroy is FIRST CLASS! We were sorry to have to leave.
title: Spacious rooms, comfortable beds, amazing valley view

date post: Jenny M wrote a review May 2019
text: This has been one of the most memorable hotel stays Iâ€™ve ever enjoyed. Definitely consider staying here if you come to Bali, not just for the accommodation and service but also for the food at Restaurant Aperitif. The villaâ€™s sit aside a river, overlooking palm trees. Itâ€™s a beautiful view and whilst photos on a website are always designed to showcase the best of whatâ€™s on offer, they really do reflect the sense of ambience portrayed on their website. We stayed in a Deluxe Villa. It had a plunge pool outside and was large inside. I wonâ€™t go through the basic details because the photos on the web give you a fair idea, but it was a lovely room and the pool was private. We took the opportunity to enjoy Breakfast at Cascades as well as Lunches and one Dinner. The breakfast; â€¦
title: Wow

text: This hotel has to be the best we have stayed at and exceeded our expectations. Welcomed with flower garlands cocktail and friendly reception staff. The room had a heated indoor pool which was amazing, a walk in shower and a big bed. Came back one evening to a rose petal bath which was a nice touch. Always stocked with enough water bottles in our room. The outdoor pool with the most stunning views from the infinity pool, given cold water when near the pool area. We ordered food around the pool daily because of how nice it was - including the room service, amazing! Breakfast daily had a amazing choice. Sadhu and Balik's service stood out to us too with remembering our names when they saw us. The shuttle service into the center was really helpful too which made it easy; â€¦

date post: Mib B wrote a review Jul 2010
text: This hotel is a sparkling gem set in a beautiful setting on Bali. Form the minute you drive in near the paddy fields to the moment you leave, there is a very special air of calm and almost zen-like serenity. I stayed for just one night but will be back soon as it was a really special experience. Great, lavishly appointed rooms, superb food, a wonderful pool, a spa complex beyond description and a view that is just heaven. Can I say more - the setting and the tasteful way the accommodation, food and service have all been put together is just perfect. I met the owner/manager, Andrew, and he has dedicated so much of his personal energy to this family run business, it is a pleasure to see the success of this hotel. They even offer a free shuttle any time to the nearby town; â€¦
title: A little piece of heaven in Bali

text: This hotel is excellent! The rooms, facilities,restaurant, staff were exceptional. We loved our week here in paradise and look forward to a return visit.
title: Beautiful Hotel with Very Attentive Staff

text: This hotel is excellent. We stayed here for 3 days and the staff was friendly, helpful and nice. The hotel has a gym for those who like to exercise during your holidays like we do. The rooms are clean, comfortable and you have enough privacy. Donâ€™t take buggies they take ages to arrive to your room. Our friends had to wait 30 minutes for them. Weâ€™re game of thrones fans so we wanted to watch the episodes live on tv but all TVs weâ€™re not synchronized... the sound was delayed. But that didnâ€™t influenced our stay review.. maybe for some more picky guests it will be a bit annoying... The food is great!

This hotel is just a â€œ wooowâ€ for honeymooners Location is perfect as its not so far from ubud center by car . The room is so comfortable as its designed in a way that you will love it . The private pool with the room is amazing and it can be heated ! As you can ask the team to do so. I really was so upset to leave that place . We got married in the time of corona before they stopped all weddings in our country and we were the last day of weddings so we were so stressed and nothing released stress as this hotel did. Staff is so kind and lovely . I highly recommend couples to experience it .
title: The meaning of 'Paradise!'

text: This hotel is magnificent in every regard. We stayed four days in a deluxe garden villa and didn't want to leave. Cable TV, DVD player, iPod/iPhone connection boom box, wireless that works, a private pool, air conditioning, privacy, service that is always attentive to your every need. And the Cascades restaurant on site serving carefully prepared meals, and providing evening piano entertainment on certain nights. The food and beverage manager, Stephan, is so very nice and just sweet. The negative edge pool, spa, exercise room, all first class. Highly, highly recommended and we have traveled the world. This is our new standard of excellence. Thanks Stephan, Director Otto and each and every staff member for a memorable stay.

This hotel is seriously out of this world. The overall experience was seamless from checking in and being driven to your room to the exceptional service throughout our stay. This is ideally a place you want to go if you are on a honeymoon or wanting a romantic getaway. We did see a few families however who equally looked like they were having a great time. We had a terrace villa was was perfect for us. Everything was designed for the guests comfort and relaxation. The cherry on top being a heated (but not too hot) private pool with ample space for two sun loungers and a little perch for putting your feet up. The food in the Cascades restaurant was delicious with gorgeous views overlooking the valley. We recommend going for the option of having a chat with the chef to; â€¦

This hotel is the best of the best. Everything about this hotel is first class from the food, to the staff, to the facilities, to our gorgeous villa (#10). Highly recommended. And if youâ€™re looking for Bali drivers/tour guides, I canâ€™t recommend these two gentlemen enough. From the time you step off the plane until the time you leave, they give top notch service. Always on time, always going above and beyond and ALWAYS service with a smile. Gusti: WhatsApp +62 821-4770-7270 Jony: WhatsApp +62 878-6117-7773

This hotel is the definition of luxury ! From the moment you arrive , the staff is reading your mind as to what you may need or want. They all communicate so well , you never have to ask for anything twice. The rooms were perfectly set for me , my husband and our daughter. So thoughtful in every way - making sure there were three of everything. We thoroughly enjoyed every minute and are super sad to leave !
title: World-Class

text: This hotel was tucked away in unspoiled nature. Seeing the steam rise from the canyon after a rain never disappointed. On the first night, monkeys were migrating through my yard. I think they wanted the welcoming fruit basket. Jero took really good care of us. It was also nice talking to Agas, who has a sister in Nashville. Everyone was so friendly. I am not a fine diner, but I can appreciate the care and effort the restaurant staff took. Edi took time to talk about the local dishes created.
title: Honeymoon

text: This is a beautiful hotel, great staff fantastic service and beautiful rooms a free shuttle bus into ubud makes its location fantastic. I would definately recommend it.
title: Probably the best I've ever stayed in

text: This is a terrific place to stay if you wish to be pampered. The location, just out of Ubud an perched above a steep river valley, is most attractive. The staff are delightful. Ignore previous posts regarding the food. There is now a new chef. The restaurant is very much a "fine dining" experience. We will be back.

This is an exceptional hotel/villa complex located only minutes from the centre of Ubud, in the tranquility and centre of rice paddies and overlooking the river banks and tropical landscape. We spent 5 days here and could have stayed forever, superbly equipped villas,huge bathroom, great private pool, beautiful spa facilities and superb european and balinese food in an amazing restaurant and bar pavillion, complimented by the friendliest staff we have encountered, free and informative shuttles to and from any local shops, restaurants completed a perfect stay for a birthday and wedding anniversary.

This is my 2nd time staying in Ubud. Viceroy had made my 6 trip pleasant. Let me share with u the pros and Cons.(I am checking out in a couple of hours, still in my comfy bed in viceroy) Pros- 1. When I emailed them directly, they were very quick to respond... In fact they immediaty offer me a package that included a dinner for 2 ,a 2hr Spa Package for 2, small bottle of Moet, and VIP immigration services and airport transfers. The offer was quite irresistible, so I book the new Delux Terrace Villa. 2. At the airport, our names we held at the end of the airbridge before immigration, our passports were stamp bypassing all queues that's great, except that we were greeted by only one officer but he had to attend to another family as well, so even though we pass the queue and; â€¦
title: OMG - There is a heaven on earth & It is called the "Viceroy Bali"

text: This is our second honeymoon and I must say it was perfect . Viceroy Bali is 5 mins away from Ubud town centre but surrounded by beautiful padi fields and its villas are located the edge of a hill. We stayed in Garden Villa and the room is spacious yet cosy . The bathroom is the biggest I have ever seen! There is also a small pool , good for dipping on a hot day . Unlike some resorts that I have stayed in Bali , this resort is not only clean but very well maintained. Breakfast is alcarte , but very sumptious and delicious which can be served at your villa or at the Cacades restaurant. The conceirge are also very helpful and well equipped with local knowledge . Transportation to town by the hotel, back and forth is always very fast and efficent. We also rented; â€¦
title: Outstanding!

date post: GuÃ°rÃºn S wrote a review Apr 2019
text: This is really a luxury â€˜top endâ€™ hotel. They provide real luxury but itâ€™s relaxed, informal and very comfortable. The villaâ€™s are brilliant, get views and real privacy. Sitting in a pool looking over the valley and jungle. Great food, a breakfast you look forward to each morning. The staff, they are really, genuinely, friendly people. The staff seem very happy. Margaret and Otto have developed a real team here. Obviously we really enjoyed our stay, we feel relaxed and privileged to have had our stay at the Viceroy.
title: Good food - good service - beautiful quiet place

text: This is the best villa-style suite I have stayed at. The interior design and bathroom are exquisite. And the private pool was nice and warm with a beautiful view and gazebo to relax in. Other villas were more "rustic" but this one was like a 5-star hotel room in a villa-style setting, so we loved it. I highly recommend staying at Viceroy Bali if you're in Ubud.
title: Beyond Our Expectations!

text: This is the most beautiful hotel I have stayed in my life. I have no words to describe it. It is situated right in the jungle with an amazing view. The bungalow style rooms in traditional style have their own pool are absolutely amazing. Beautifully decorated and all details taken care of. It would be as well a perfect honeymoon location. The service goes beyond and above and will definitely not disappoint you. Excellent Hotel which keeps up to the standards. Highly recommendable!!

This is without a doubt the best Hotel in Ubud! The Villas are amazing and beautifully Conceived, The view is stunning, The food is first class Cuisine that any Chef in Europe would be proud of and the Service is friendly with great attention paid to detail. I would reccomend this place to anyone looking for a touch of class and a romantic setting.
title: Absolutely perfect!

text: This is without a doubt the best hotel we have ever stayed in. The lovely staff ensure your stay is perfect in every way. The hotel breakfast and the meal at Aperitif were outstanding. Excellent shuttle service with a chauffeur driven car into Ubud on your request at any time of day. We also used the hotel to arrange our day trips, which we could not fault. We were very sad to leave! Thank you Viceroy!!
title: Luxurious and spectacular place.

text: This place is a jungle paradise. The dinning, room decor, staff and ownership are all 5 star. I surprised my partner with a surprise trip to Bali for her Medical school graduation and I wanted her to have a once in a lifetime experience and rest assure Viceroy gave her that experience. The views are breathtaking and the breakfast by the pool every morning was a great way to start our day. The food at their restaurant is world class and this is coming from a person who travels often. The staff goes above and beyond to make you feel welcome and make sure all your needs all taken care of. Our Villa was spotless and very private. I would highly recommend this location to anyone who is looking for a luxury retreat thatâ€™s calm, peaceful and just the right size.

This place is absolutely stunning! A true luxury hotel. The staff are accommodating and professional and nothing is too much trouble. The suites are amazing, immaculately clean and have everything you could imagine. Our private infinity pool was heated and had the most amazing view over the rainforest tree tops. We also dined in the restaurant too which was also flawless, the service was great and the food was to die for. It is a little more pricey than other hotels in the area but itâ€™s clear to see why and you get what you pay for! Cocktails and breakfast delivered to your room to enjoy on your private terrace overlooking the pool. Everything was above expectations and we loved the place! The main pool area was very tidy and the gardens well kept. We still talk about this; â€¦

This place is amazing! The staff treat you like royalty and are always able to help in any way. We were very lucky that it was very quiet when we stayed and although there was building work going on, it really didn't affect our stay at all, apart from the view from the spa. That being said, the spa itself was wonderful and i recommend anyone staying goes for any one the treatments they offer! The restaurant food was of a wonderful quality and breakfast was faultless every morning. The villas are huge and the pools are a lovely touch. The service from the moment you arrive is exceptional and its really no surprise why the Viceroy has the great reputation that it does. I would be happy to recommend it to anyone wishing for a Bali getaway in the wonderful jungle!

This place is stunning, I stayed three nights and was so impressed! Each villa has access to very fast, free WiFi, and I loved the DVD library. It's almost a private branch of Blockbusters in the conference room below reception. You can choose from literally hundreds of movies, and a decent number of books too. Soft drinks are all free from the minibar here. This isn't something I've experienced anywhere else, and neither is the drinkable tap water, both huge plus points in Bali. They filter their own water around the resort! The hotel operates a shuttle bus as and when you need it, and the drivers will drop you and pick you up wherever you like in the Ubud area. The local village however, just five minutes down the road offers a fantastic taste of the local culture and I; â€¦
title: Tranquility lounge

text: This place is truly world class. From the rooms, to the architecture, to the finishes, to the food and especially to the service. Every guest is treated as a hotel should treat their guests. They go out of their way to accommodate any and all needs and provide a magnificent retreat in beautiful Bali. It's worth the 30 hours it took for my wife and I to get here from New York and we hope to one day come back. In the meantime, it's YOUR turn to visit!!
title: A Beautiful Property & an immaculate staff to boot.

text: This place itself is serene.ubud in itself is a different side of Bali which has to be first visited rather than the beaches, you can experience the local cuisine and their hospitality better here, more Indonesian to be precise. The resort itself is sprawling on top of the valley, the private infinity pool over looking the valley, the spread in the cascades restaurant, the humble and courteous service all are 5 stars. The room needs a special mention as it is the best I have seen for a suite with all the amenities for a luxurious stay at the viceroy. Definitely worth a visit.

This place took my breath away!! Just returned from 5 days here and I cannot put into words how beautiful it is ! From the moment we arrived at check in until we sadly left, everything was just perfect !! Our pool suite with our own private pool and daybed was fantastic ,spa treatments were wow! as was our lounge and bathroom,The food is just the best at cascades and the service and all the staff was amazing, tut and goong made breakfast a treat and a special Thankyou to sunti for organising a special candlelight dinner for our anniversary (and it certainly was special!!) Thankyou also to balek for looking after us so well poolside and serving our lovely lunches And a huge Thankyou to all at the Viceroy, we shall return ðŸŒž

This resort attempted to steal nearly $3,000 from me. I was planning a wonderful trip for my honeymoon this last July. Viceroy Bali was one of my top picks, so I made reservations in February. Later, we find a better deal in Fiji, so we decided to go with that trip. I not only called the resort to cancel my reservations, but sent a letter and fax to follow up. This was in May. On July 15th, during our trip in Fiji, I see a charge on my account for the full amount I originally was going to pay at viceroy bali (not cheap!). In fact, it wasnt even the full amount - it was over $200 more than the original reservation. I was furious, and tried everything I could to speak with a manager or someone who could straighten this up. I sent emails, copies of my original letter, and to no; â€¦

date post: Kevin H wrote a review Jul 2018
text: This resort is truly world-class. We made the mistake of only booking it for two nights because never wanted to leave! You could sit here and read all 1000+ of these glowing reviews and this resort would STILL exceed your expectations. We hope to return!
title: Great place!

text: This review is actually a year late (we stayed in June 2011) but I still remember every perfect detail to this day! Viceroy was the first stop on our honeymoon. Although The beginning of our stay was slightly dampened because my husband was suffering from severe headaches (which turned out to be an acute case of sinus infection), the staff at Viceroy did all they could to help & they all knew him by name & would ask how he was doing. It got so bad one day that we called the reception & asked for a doctor to come and take a look at him to which they were so accommodating & understanding. The doctors gave him some strong painkillers but wasn't able to diagnose the sinus infection & we don't blame him, there were no symptoms except for the constant headache. Over breakfast one; â€¦

This was our first visit to Viceroy Luxury Villas and what an amazing experience. The property has been designed beautifully with quality fittings and immaculate gardens throughout the property. The most memorable impact however was the relentless friendliness and service provided by the many staff at the Villas. You will feel like the only guests at the property with all staff from the restaurant, the drivers, the cleaners and front of house making you feel so very welcome. Location and quality of property is obvious when you arrive but the staff made our stay.

This was the best hotel we have every stayed at, the staff went above and beyond. We initially had an issue with a loud aircon unit, so were given an amazing upgrade, and tour of the local area. Would also highly recommend the spa services. Beautiful surroundings and pure luxury
title: A Secluded Haven

text: Title says it all. I converted my husband from being a Bali sceptic to a convert after only two nights at this incredible hote. We caught a taxi from Ubud for the 15 minute drive east to the remote, security protected hotel. While our allocated buggy driver loaded our luggage as we checked-in, sipping a welcome mocktail and were told our Terrace Villa with private infinity pool had been upgraded to one of only three Viceroy Villas (even though I'd jagged a major bargain online), we took in the luxury and absolute privelage that lay before us. While some could stanch the gushing nose bleed brought on by Viceroy's prices, it's worth the left kidney and mother-in-law's retinas to experience this once in a lifetime, priceless accomodation experience. Just once. And even if it's only; â€¦

To start, our flight had been delayed for one hour and our time at immigration took 2 hours, making our check in time at 4am by the time we reached Viceroy Bali. We were immediately welcomed with a bright refreshing smile by Dewa with raspberry mojitos and towels to clean our hands. After check in we were brought to our room with a "buggy" or golf cart which was offered as a main mode of transportation around the hotel during our stay. Upon our entrance into our deluxe room villa we were blown away by the fusion of elegance with the use of traditional and modern Balinese decor. It's simplicity and functionality kept us very comfortable. We thoroughly enjoyed all the room had to offer: private villa, private pool, garden tub, an extremely comfy king sized bed, 24 hour room; â€¦
title: Pool Suite

text: Today is April 11th and we are checking out of the Viceroy. Our stay here was a very good stay and we would come back. There are some pros and some cons on this property, more pros than cons...... Pros, are that we got exactly what we where looking for in a relaxing property. We could not have ask for anything else out of a relaxing property, but to relax. We found that the room which we stayed, the Vice Regal #1 was the nicest room we have ever stayed in. From the monkeys in the yard to the villa pool outside the door we found this property was spectacular. I keep saying relax because that is all there really is to do. When we planned our vacation of 8 nights in Bali, we knew that we needed to take the first 4 days and unwind and that is what the Viceroy has done, exactly; â€¦
title: Ubud

text: Travelled solo to Bali and had the most wonderful stay in the Viceroy. Staff were warm and welcoming and went out of their way every day to make sure everything was perfect for me. I loved the Balinese designs throughout the resort and the villa was so spacious. The food in both Cascades and Aperitif was delicious and very well presented. I couldn't recommend Viceroy enough. I will certainly be back!
title: AMAZING!

text: Tripadvisor needs to allow more than 5* ratings for hotels like the Viceroy! This is the most wonderful hotel we have ever stayed in and from start to finish the experience was out of this world. On arrival we were greeted with flower garlands and checked in while our bags were taken away to our room. The front of house manager took us on a tour around the hotel in one of the buggies and dropped us off at the beautiful hotel bar to enjoy a complimentary arrival cocktail. The bar has stunning views over the jungle and was a great place to unwind with a drink. Our pool suite room was luxurious with a semi outdoor heated plunge pool and semi outdoor bathroom. My only slight gripe is the hairdryer being outside where it's really too humid to dry your hair. If I had been staying; â€¦
title: Missed Balinese Cusine

text: Two days of unadulterated bliss, thank you to the entire team at The Viceroy (Ubud) for the sublime hospitality and Balinese charm. We stayed in a Deluxe Terrace Pool Villa and requested a villa in the front row of the resort which meant uninterrupted views of the luscious Petanu valley. The villa comes with a beautiful private pool which is heated for most of the day. It was the best private pool we have ever experienced in any villa around the world. We had an in-villa spa session on one of the days where the spa therapists visited us at our villa for a facial and leg massage treatment. Both treatments were flawless. This is a fantastic property in Ubud and is a must visit for couples.

Typically when going to Bali my expectation was beach, sand and sun... And exotic good food. When searching for a quiet place to finish on a PhD, I found the Viceroy. The small 5* boutique Hotel is perched at the cliff of a ravine in the ravishing jungle forest just 10 min of Ubud. My terrace villa left nothing to my dreams, an own infinity pool, had it, a small gazebo hut on top of the pool for my academic needs, had it, a fridge filled of a choice selection (free of charge), had it, a shower & bath area of half room size (20m2) - had it, a huge bed super king size - had it! Not to speak of the marvellous Spa (checked in twice!) and the outstanding restaurant and bar called CasCades. A true dream in the green! I can recommend it to any honeymooners wishing to escape the huzzle; â€¦

Ubud is clearly more suited for the mature person than Kuta, Legian and Seminak. Quieter shopping, less noise and bustle, fewer eyesores. Located a few minutes out of Ubud on the edge of a deep valleyed forest with a river flowing at the bottom and inpenetrable forest on the opposite hill is Viceroy. Every bit of attention has been padi to detail, the staff are attentive, courteous and professional, the bar, pools and restaurant great. The Spa is to die for. We stayed with two large sons 21 and 23 in the Viceroy Villa - we thought we were in heaven - the boys did too. Excurions and drivers are not a problem. We encourage you to visit and be one of the few able to experience such a wonderful hotel.

Very nice private villas with one of the best services. King size bed with many pillows. The breakfast is a la carte what is very good + fresh fruits. They have got everything you need for holidays to forget and avoid any problems. Good massage in spa. Do not have any complains at all. Free pick up from airport, free shuttle bus to Ubud centre ( 2 different stops ) . I travel a lot and highly recommend this place.

Viceroy ..i love you! From the minute we arrived till the minute we checked out this hotel was more than fantastic! The staff are super friendly and professional.. The hotel itself is a peace of art. Our villa was very comfortable and the view was awsome..loved the heated pool in our villa ( heated for 24 hours) .. The villa was very clean .. The cascades restaurant was yummy and the atmosphere was romantic.mwe oredered somthing outside thexmenu and the chef was happy to serve us..yann was very professi9nal and helpful.. The spa experience was good.. What was amazing is the free shuttle ride whenever you want ... I will come back again.. Thank you viceroy!

Viceroy Bali is a luxury villa complex just a few minutes from the main street in Ubud. It is perched on a jungle-draped hillside where your view from your villa and the restaurant is jungle with a few spots of rice fields, where you can watch the farmers at work while you eat breakfast. Monkeys were swinging from the trees outside our villa, birds and butterflies (and geckos) were everywhere. The only problem really with Viceroy is that Bali is flush with luxury villas now at half the price as Viceroy - many that are equally or more impressive. It's just overpriced compared to the market. That said, our week long stay here was lovely. The villas are built on the hillside, so something to think about if you have mobility issues. We were at the closest villa to the; â€¦

Viceroy Bali is absolutely stunning!! The resort is a secluded paradise, yet it's only 5 minutes away from all of the major Ubud attractions via the resort's complimentary shuttle. Upon arrival at Viceroy's beautiful open lobby, you are presented with a warm towel and a welcome drink. From that point forward, you are treated like a celebrity! I travel internationally for a living and stay in 25-30 luxury hotels/year... I don't think I've ever been to a hotel where the entire staff knew my name before I even introduced myself! This is the kind of service you can expect at Viceroy Bali! We stayed in their Deluxe Terrance Villa which was an absolute dream! Imagine waking up every morning, tossing on a robe and slippers, and sipping a coffee by your private infinity pool while; â€¦

Viceroy Bali is unmatched in terms of service and quality. Overall, the rooms were beautiful and spacious. The pool included in each room was a welcomed addition overlooking Bali's nature. The food was exquisite. Indonesian dishes were incredibly well prepared and flavorful. Western dishes surpassed the same dishes that can be found in upscale restaurants in new york city. 4/5 instead of a 5/5 because overall, there are many hotels and resorts in Bali that offer similar services and activities at slightly lower prices. If price is not a problem, then your stay at Viceroy Bali will be perfect.

date post: Alison H wrote a review Nov 2019
text: Viceroy Bali was the most perfect destination for our honeymoon. They went out of their way to make our stay special. The resort is flawless and our room was wonderful, especially the private pool. The infinity pool is amazing and the food is incredible. The staff is so helpful and friendly. We loved booking day trips through the hotel and driving around with Margi, heâ€™s the best! I definitely recommend the spa if you are hoping to relax. We wish we couldâ€™ve stayed a few more weeks!
title: Words canâ€™t describe

text: Viceroy Bali's goal is "to exceed our guests' expectations at every opportunity", and with this in mind, the hotel does not get top score. The general level of the service was not bad, of course, but we experienced more genuine and wholeheartedly service several other places in Bali. For a small luxury hotel we would also expect a higher level of personal touch and attention to detail in the design and decoration of the room (we stayed in a Pool Suite, that lacked both a terrace and a view). The quality of the food and service at the in house restaurant, CasCades, varied from excellent to average. Viceroy Bali is by all means a great place to stay, but the value for money is just not there, and our experience did not live up to the expectations. We will choose another hotel next; â€¦
title: An experience to be repeated

text: Viceroy hotel is one of the most beautiful hotels I have every been! It is very stylish and yet auhentic. Having my own small balinese pavilion and swimming pool was divine! Stayed there 5 days and was very sad to leave. The staff is wonderful and very kind! Great service! The restaurant is very beautiful but the food could use some improvement. Also missed Indonisian food on the menu.
title: Despite Some Issues, Still 5 Star Luxury

text: Viceroy is on a Hiilside/dropping down into a valley. This means that each of the villa's have fantastic backdrop and a jungle/forest-esque setting with a river at the bottom. We were going to stay at Four Seasons but changed to Viceroy last minute as it looked like better value considering it is the same class and as the Viceroy is only 5 years old. Villa's are 5 star - pure luxury cannot find a fault with them - we were upgraded to Viceroy Villa on arrival which was fantastic. Also managed to have a look at the Terrace Villas which were fantastic also. The villas are also designed in tandem with the local environment means they blend into the landscape - all of the furniture and fittings are locally made and the artwork is all balinese. Quite fitting given Ubud is the; â€¦
Viceroy is the best place to stay with your soul mate and to get lost in these wonderful views. Ubud is beautiful and pretty close to that hotel, so that seems to be a perfect combination
title: Great View, Great Food, Wonderful Place to Stay!

text: Viceroy was a pure luxury, the staff is very friendly, the property is well built and luxurious. Views are breadth taking. Rooms are amazing and the infinity pool faces the green lush trees. The food is amazing and hospitality is exceptional. The rooms are spotless everytime we went out they would come and clean it. its a beautiful property and very pampering. I would highly recommend staying here if relaxation and beautiful views are the charter for your trip
title: INCREDIBLE

text: Viceroy was the cherry on the cake for our final few days in Bali. The resort is very exclusive which caters for absolute privacy and has a 5* service. The villas are outstanding, decorated and designed to a high standard, with private heated pools and your own personal day bed overlooking a lush gorge. A coffee machine is provided as well as ample toiletries and an extensive mini bar. The villas are turned down in the evening whilst you are dining in the Cascades restaurant. The service in the restaurant is exceptional as is with the entire resort. Staff stop their job to smile and say good morning wherever you are. Guest experience is definitely key here. A golf buggy and driver is provided to take you to and from your villa up to the restaurant if you require it which; â€¦
title: Paradise at The Viceroy

text: Viceroy's location is great, so close to the heart of Ubud, yet still manage to keep its exclusive secluded feel. We stayed at the terrace villa, and I have to admit I could get used to waking up to green lushness and beautiful spread of breakfast at the little gazebo on top of the pool overlooking the valley everyday! Viceroy's staff is not only friendly, they cater to your every whims, quick on their feet, but still managed to keep their distance when not requested thus keeping your privacy. If you're looking for a honeymoon stay and/or luxury getaway, don't think twice about Viceroy. Unfortunately, the food in the Cascade Restaurant wasn't up to par with the reviews. I would highly suggest getting the concierge book you a table at Mosaic (which they did and even got us a; â€¦

We are looking forward to stay at Viceroy this summer for the third time within four years. After two visits I thought it might be time to look for another place in Ubud. Not because we where unhappy but just to experience something new - but at the same level. Well, after surfing for hours we decided we will stay at Viceroy again... Small hotel, personalized service, excellent food. Personally I think these kind of private held boutique hotels offer you as a guest a kind of environment chains will never be able to offer.
title: Best place for relax

date post: Isabela C wrote a review May 2019
text: We arrived in early May 2019. We had planned a trip to visit various areas of Bali and Ubud was one of them. As you drove up to The Viceroy hotel in Ubud it had the most amazing view of the volcano Agung, which you could just see in the distance. The entrance to the hotel leads you down a slight hill to a beautiful round reception building. We were greeted with flowers which were put around our necks and ice cold cocktails, which were very welcome. After a quick check in, one of the hotel staff a very friendly chap called Kadek Citrayasa gave us a quick tour of the hotel on a golf buggy, which we loved, he showed us the new restaurant that the owners have opened called Aperitif we took a look inside, it had a sunken bar great place for a cocktail before taking an amazing; â€¦
title: Amazing Stay but there's still room for improvement

date post: Paul P wrote a review Jan 2012
text: We booked a deluxe terrace view villa and were left speechless when we entered the room and saw our amazing views. The villa was incredibly spacious and peaceful. I am not really a 'villa' person as i do prefer to stay in a larger hotel, however, i found it difficult to leave the villa. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here and would highly recommend it to others. The free transport in and out of the town centre was a bonus. The staff were incredibly friendly. This was our first time in Ubud and I will definitely be coming back.
title: Total attention to detail

text: We booked a Garden villa for two nights and wished we could have stayed longer. The valley can even be seen from inside the villa, so we always had this amazing view of green trees. The room was very spacious and the beds were also large and very comfortable. Service was prompt and warm. It was one of the best hotel stays that we have had.
title: Just amazing.

text: We booked the Viceroy as a reward to ourselves for my 40th birthday and it completely lived up to expectations. We stayed in Terrace Villa 2 and loved it so much we wanted to move in! Meals at Cascades were delicious and the spa was also a great experience. Otto, Nila and the front office staff were a wealth of information and good humour, helping us to organise our activities and our daily yoga instructor Ketut (also fantastic and highly recommended). They genuinely cared. The combination of activities and relaxation was just what we wanted but the villa really made our stay with the private pool, gazebo and even a coffee machine! As everywhere in Bali, the price of wine was shocking but this is not particular to the Viceroy. Yes, the hairdryers were lacking but this is; â€¦
title: Fantastic

text: We came for the golf but fell in love with the escape games. My friends are now planning to try the games near home. Be sure to book directly with Mission Liberte. Once I realized I could book at missionliberte.com, it saved me money and the confirmation was in real-time.

We choose Viceroy to celebrate our first anniversary & it was the perfect setting to enjoy a romantic vacation. We had a deluxe terrace room and it looked brand new. The bale over the pool & overlooking the jungle was a perfect place to relax or enjoy a meal. The food was terrific for both breakfast & dinner. The attention to detail was wonderful & we'll definitely be coming back.

We chose Viceroy because we wanted a boutique close to Ubud center and our own plunge pool...plus we heard 4 Seasons is in need of renovations. In a word, Viceroy was fantastic. Very elegant and tip top service, surrounded by jungle and rice patties. Plus, free wireless internet around the entire hotel and free local transportation. VILLA - We were in Villa 7 which had a huge, comfortable bed, a massive open bathroom and plenty of living space. Keep the bathroom lights off (or dim) at night to keep the bugs away. We wound up not using the plunge pool bc it was freezing and our villa didn't get direct sunlight after 8:15am. FOOD - The food was outstanding. A la carte breakfast was included and came with choice of entree, fruit, tea or coffee, a delicious array of breads.; â€¦

We chose Viceroy reluctantly as choices were wide for Ubud hotels with brand names like Chedi and Four Seasons, however, this boutique hotel offers so much comfort and personal touch which makes you feel at home but without the running around of being home. Clean place, cozy, their restaurant Cascades is on the top of "to eat at places in Ubud", friendly staff, free shuttle is an amazing service which we enjoyed as they take you back and forth no matter what the hour! Real value for what you pay with the added benefits and free wifi! We were very impressed and would recommend this hotel to whoever wants to have a pleasant stay at Ubud and shop at Ubud market a lot. Special thanks goes to the owners who ensure they stay close to the guests! Regards from Bahrain.....
title: Flawless

text: We couldnâ€™t fault it! Not one bit. The Viceroy was our first stop in Bali and it did not disappoint. The food was hands down some of the best we ate when in Bali, the views are surreal and the staff were lovely. Full of honeymooners and you can see why, such a vibrant little gem. We cannot wait to come back!

We drove in from Seminyak after 3 days on the beach. The staff gave us a warm welcome and took us to the villa. It was grand and the pool was awesome! The views were amazing but peaceful and serene. We felt immediately this was paradise. The spa is located at the top of the property and has spectacular views and a terrific jacuzzi and steam room not to mention a great staff. Our couples massage included a flower petal bath that was beautifully decorated with frangipanis, roses and local flowers. We left the kids in the room for a romantic candlelight dinner at the restaurant. We were served a 5 course meal and we were surprised at the sophistication of the dishes. Our kids had great room service. The hotel also brought in balinese dance instructors who gave the kids a private; â€¦
title: absolute paradise !

text: We enjoyed our 2 nights stay here! From the staff on reception to the staff we saw day to day all were really friendly and helpful! We ate in Cascades restaurant and loved the food! The laksa was amazing! Even better than the ones I used to have in Singapore and Melaka! Our room was amazing! We had our own private pool and bathtub. We will be back to this such an amazing and relaxing place to stay. Thanks to all the staff for making our stay perfect!

date post: Neil C wrote a review Aug 2018
text: We enjoyed our time in Viceroy very much. Beautiful villas, nice pools (it was possible to heat them - we appreciated it very much), great views. Great food and people - one of the few hotels in the world where I would return...
title: Excellent - all prior positive reviews are true

date post: Paulina Perrucci wrote a review Jul 2019
text: We excitedly booked the Viceroy for our first honeymoon stop having heard and seen great things. We booked for a solid 8 nights, and nothing could prepare us for both the staggering natural beauty and the beautiful hotel itself, not to mention the warm Indonesian staff. The pictures just about do justice to the surroundings, but being there in person is the only way to take in the stunning ravine and jungle that the hotel is built into. Our private infinity pool looked right onto the valley, allowing for hours of staring peacefully right at nature. The view was even better from the Cascades restaurant where we ate breakfast, and a number of lunches and dinners! The view anytime of day is breathtaking. Our room was immaculate and luxurious but still felt in keeping with local; â€¦
title: Takes 5 star to another level!

text: we felt like we were on a beautiful honeymoon. Myself and my finances jaw dropped when we entered the villa.All the staff are amazing; warm and the luxury of paradise was felt from the minute we stepped into the Viceroy Bali Car at the airport. Food ( balanced with americanized and traditional local foods) to service ( front desk and room service so fast) ( clean the rooms multiple times a day) impeccable cleanliness is unmatched. The rooms was just breathtaking and the sceanery 360 degrees of pure bliss. I couldn't get enough of the outside. One morning at 6:00AM I even saw monkeys in some of the trees. It was magical and Margret and her family are doing something truly special with respect to Balinese culture and tradition!
title: Unbelievable Service

date post: David B wrote a review Jun 2013
text: We felt truly at home at Viceroy for five days on our honeymoon. This sets the benchmark very high for other hotels. The service - oh my god - truly fantastic. StÃ©phan and his staff made us feel like the only guests ever at the hotel. We stayed at terrace villa no. 15, we recommend splurging on one of those.
title: Outstanding

text: We had a fantastic stay here from the beginning to the end. We stayed in one of the terrace villas and it was one of the nicest rooms we ever had. It was even bigger and more beautiful than we expected. The room was very large with your own terrace and swimming pool and an amazing view on a beautiful green forest. The service was excellent. My wife who is pregnant was looking forward to a Bintang Zero already for the whole holiday and although they did not have it, they immediately arranged it for here. The taxi service from the hotel to Ubud is very convenient so nothing to withhold you form having dinner in Ubud. So if you go to Ubud and you can afford it you shoud stay here.

We had a great stay at the Viceroy last June and I was very happy of choosing this property. It is located outside the busy City centre of Ubud and the free shuttle is running upon request to drop you off or pick you up anywhere in Ubud. We chose a Terrace Villa and we do not regret our choice. They offer great views over the valley since they are located on the upper part of the property. The service was excellent from the time we arrived until our departure. We took the Visa Facilitator Service for our arrival at the airport which expedited the process in a few seconds. We found it good although there was not much crowd at the airport at that time. The property is very well maintained and the furniture and equipment are in excellent conditions. The views over the valley from; â€¦

We had a great time at the Viceroy. The grounds were beautiful, there were great views from the villas and the main areas, the service was great, and everyone was really nice. It was very quiet and we never saw too many people around, although they were fully booked while we were there (there are only 11 villas, I think?). Also, the location is great because it's only about 10 minutes from the center of town. We stayed in a Garden Villa but I wish we had stayed in the Terrace Villa. The Garden Villa was very nice - super clean, everything was immaculate and well-appointed - but the Terrace Villa has the bale and a better pool.
