Our pool was practically in the bathroom and it was very cold so we really couldn't use it. I think the layout of the Terrace Villa was much better. That; â€¦

We had a lovely stay as part of our honeymoon. We loved everything about Viceroy Bali; from the wonderful villas to the amazing service. Truly an unforgettable experience! Thanks very much for everything!!
title: Jaw-droppingly Awesome

text: We had a super wonderful and relaxing stay at this intimate luxury hotel. Our pool villa was gorgeous, the staff we're super helpful and the surrounding were beyond tranquil. Will definitely stay again.

We had a very enjoyable Buffett meal on Thursday night. The place is massive but was very quiet. However they cooked fresh starters and mains for us. No complaints from us and everybody got something they liked. Â£11.95 for buffet or was it Â£10.95.....whichever it was good value for what you got. Would use again.

We had a very relaxing stay for 4 nights at the VIceroy. The staff were exceptionally helpful. Having recently found out that one of us needed to avoid gluten the restaurant manager and his staff were brilliant. Having let them know when we arrived i was furnished with gluten free slightly altered dishes at every meal. The food was excellent and the gluten free bread that they made was ok. Although the hotel is out of the way there is a free car service back and forth between town which makes it easy to pop out to the shops or get a meal if you don't want to alwyas eat in the hotel. Our villa was very clean and very spacious, we were slightly concerned after staying in a hotel before where each room had a private pool, but this one was very clean and pleasant. We really felt; â€¦
title: Beautiful, romantic setting

text: We had the most breathtakingly beautiful holiday at the Viceroy. It was my partner's birthday and they made it so incredibly special. I still dream about the breakfast. Honestly the best breakfast you'll ever have. We are planning to return early next year.

We had the most wonderful stay at the Viceroy Bali in Ubud recently We chose a 1 bedroom garden Villa, 190sqm, with an indoor outdoor pool and stunning view. We never wanted to leave, and although the restaurant had a magnificent view, we ordered breakfast on the terrace in our own garden every morning after a refreshing dip in our pool. Then would lay on the daybed and read books. You could walk into Ubud center in 20 mins or use the complimentary shuttle service. But once at the Viceroy you will never want to leave, or will rush back to the absolute beauty and tranquility of the place. We had a huge Super King bed and the the best most restful sleeps we have had in years. We watched the sun disappear from CasCades Bar, chatting to Otto and his son Anthony who own this; â€¦
title: luxury + this resort is a must stay

date post: Melinda C wrote a review Nov 2018
text: We had the pleasure of spending 3 nights at The Viceroy at the end of our journey around Indonesia - an excellent finale ! Everything was outstanding â€“ location, accommodations and food â€“ made even more so by the genuine warmth, openness and commitment to service from everyone from the gardeners to the owner who was around each day.
title: My kind of luxury

text: We had the pleasure of staying at the Viceroy for our anniversary. What an amazing hotel, the surroundings are beautiful, with a view of the jungle from the infinity pool. The staff are phenomenal so helpful and remembered our names, hotel car to drive us to the centre and back, nothing was too much trouble. The spa is also amazing. Our villa was the best Iâ€™ve stayed in, magnificent with a private infinity pool with views of the jungle. A golf buggy is available to take you around the complex if required. The French toast and dragon fruit smoothie at breakfast were delicious. If you want your own slice of paradise stay here, worth every penny. We totally relaxed and recharged.
title: My favourite hotel

text: We have been to Bali several times, but this was our first stay at Ubud. This is a beautifully-locted resort, with green-hill views from our room. We got upgraded to the Viceroy Villa i/o the 2 Terrace Villas we had booked and this was a real treat. We were apprehensive at first as the Viceroy Villa was closest to nature - there was a sheer cliff where the villa wall (low) ended - but we ensured we never left the kids alone in that area and it turned out just fine. This is a great room, with a pool and 2 bedrooms. There was a lovely baby cot provided for the infant, i liked it so much that I wanted to bring it home! The service was great - except on the first day of Chinese New Year holiday, when they may have been understaffed. So breakfast took longer than usual - but that's; â€¦

We have chosen this hotel for us to rest in our around the world journey. Our decision couldn't have been wiser! The villas are very spaceous and we loved the fact that they had just been constructed and therefore the quality of every appliance and piece of furniture was intact. It's so nice to stay at a resort where things have not been worn down by use after use, for the past decade or so!!! The peacefulness of sorroundings is soo therapeutical!!! It's sooo beautiful!!! The staff is very polite and very helpful!! To give an example, I wanted a leaf of aloe vera to do a natural treatment for my hair, in the privacy of my villa, and since they didn't have the plant on the property, one of the gardeners went to procure it and bring it to me the second day!! That's what i call; â€¦
title: Magnificent!

text: We have found the most beautiful location. The Viceroy is set on a wonderfully lush hill side overlooking a valley with a waterfall and river running through it which is a beautiful aural experience. Surrounded by rice paddies and native forest. The owners run an impeccable establishment! The spa facilities are first rate. The staff are very professional and knowledgeable. The restaurant has a wonderful selection of food for breakfast, lunch & dinner. The staff are attentive & absolutely lovely. The views over the valley whilst having breakfast are such a stunning way to start the day. We stayed in Vice Regal 1 room which has a massive king size bed, lovely outdoor patio/lounge area with a wrap around private pool and lawned terrace garden all over looking the adjacent hillside,; â€¦

We have recently come back from our honeymoon and for the first 5 days we stayed at The Viceroy. The place is unbelievable, as soon as we arrived we felt very welcome. We were upgraded from the Vice Regal Villa to The Viceroy Villa which is truely stunning, the view across the villa of the gorge was amazing with lots of wild monkeys, one of which came over to the trees by us. The villa pool was fantastic, not too cold at all but The Viceroy Villa has the sun until around 4.30pm so plenty of time to warm it up and the main pool was just as nice and very empty so you felt you were the only people there. The food was delicious, definately try the Indonesian menu, it is not too spicey at all. We ventured into Ubud town and tried the famous suckling pig at Ibu Oka which was very; â€¦

We have stayed at the hotel VICEROY last September. My wife did a lot of research before our trip, as we had never been to Bali before, and we stayed here on the strength of these reviews. We found the location excellent, there are plenty of shops around, and it is not far from the Monkey forest. It's a bit of a hike to the Markets, but as we enjoy walking this was not a problem for us. Taxis are plentiful and cheap in any case. The fitness Centre is little more than a bench and a few weights, but useful as the other Gyms in Ubud are far away. I would still recommend joining Ubud Fitness Centre though as I did ( 165000 rp for 7 days membership ) if you are looking for a Gym to stay fit in the area, and just catch a Taxi there as it's about 2km away. We always found the food; â€¦
title: The hotel to stay at when in Ubud

text: We have stayed at the Viceroy twice before and we have to say, it never disappoints. The villas are thoughtfully, beautifully and tastefully designed with wonderful private pools and very comfortable beds. The setting on the gorge of the Petanu River is just spectacular and the design of the hotel takes full advantage of the naturally stunning setting while seeking minimal environmental impact and drawing on its Balinese setting and culture. It was a special birthday for my husband and the hotel were so wonderful to us, leaving flowers, fruit and a beautiful personalised cake in the room welcoming us back plus a further one a dinner for his birthday and a special romantic table by the pool strewn with flowers. During my stay one afternoon I lost an earring of great; â€¦

date post: Eric S wrote a review Aug 2018
text: We have stayed here with a daypass to enjoy our stay at the pool. The staff here is helpfull, understanding and very very nice. We booked everything as we walked in and that was fine. Also got a great place at the pool and restaurant later that night. Thank you for this great outstanding day!
title: Best Honeymoon Experience

text: We have stayed in the Viceroy Ubud for 3 nights. We were a group of 11 ladies. I stayed at the Pool Suite. The Viceroy Bali is a sanctuary in paradise that offers a complete privacy with breath-taking tropical valley views. This resort is a Member of â€œSmall Luxury Hotels of The Worldâ€ slh.com. The interior is a true Balinese bliss. Outdoors is a must in every feature especially the bathroom. I love the Ceiling fan in my suite. My suite has an expansive valley view, a private heated pool in outside terrace, marble bath with shower and separate tub and sitting areas in addition to the sleeping space. My bed had netted curtain all around. The suite size is 150mÂ². Viceroy is the ONLY resort with a private helipad. I had a healthy breakfast at the CasCades Restaurant. SEE Pool; â€¦

We have stayed in top class hotels around the world and this hotel ranks up there with the very best. A beautiful, relaxing setting, over hanging the Ubud Jungle. The hotel is very private. You are made to feel like this is your own private resort. The authenticity of the resort really shines through with local influence on the architecture. The staff are what really makes the hotel so special. Very friendly. Remembering you by name every morning. They cannot do enough for you. We had dinner plans outside the hotel most nights but once we had ate at the in house restaurant, Cascades we ate there every night . The food is exceptional. Credit to the chef who really cares about what he is cooking and puts his own twist on every dish. The hotel organised a car for the day so we; â€¦
title: Out of this world honeymoon experience

date post: Henry T wrote a review Dec 2019
text: We just finished up a short stay at the Viceroy and agreed it was the best hotel suite and service weâ€™d ever experienced. From the second we stepped out of the car we felt like royalty. Kadek was available to help us with every request big or small from laundry to delivering breakfast to our room to setting up private yoga. Highlights included: - incredible deluxe pool villa - service from every member of the staff - in room massages that were the best - the breakfast was just mind blowing. That French toast! - flower bath Thank you to the entire team for an unbelievable experience!
title: Extreme luxury, extreme hospitality

text: we just returned from our 9 year anniversary trip to the viceroy and have RAVE reviews to post! The staff were so helpful in the planning of our trip with quick and helpful responses to all my many many questions about the area! The VIP immigration service they offer was huge and so nice to be pampered and not wait in lines at the airport! Upon arrival to this tiny botique resort we were IN HEAVEN!!! From the lush manicured grounds, the swanky helicopter pad at the entrance, the grand marble foyer, to the friendly staff, it was just gorgeous! What we loved most was how small it was...this allowed them to be very detailed in their service and know us and made it very personal, they didn't miss a thing and we had total privacy and seclusion, rarely saw other couples! We stayed in; â€¦

We just returned home from our incredible honeymoon in Bali and are already wishing we were back. A photo of the main pool at the Viceroy hotel initially enticed us to book, but little did we know that was only the tip of the iceberg. First off, the service at this hotel is beyond amazing. I've never experienced anything like it. From the moment you arrive at the resort, someone is giving you a lei and a welcome drink and a handful of others are smiling at you and addressing you by name asking if there's anything they can do for you. The second you sit down at the pool, someone is bringing you ice cold water. A driver is always at the ready to drive you into town (this is a MAJOR perk). The turndown service comes with the yummiest little chocolates. Then there's the rooms. We; â€¦

We loved our stay at the Viceroy. It has breathtaking views, an intimate scale and amazing attention to detail. The room was lovely with outdoor spa, massive bathroom and immaculately presented (with the added bonus of a coffee machine, DVDs and complimentary soft drinks). The Cascades restaurant is excellent and the staff are all lovely. The spa is beautifully appointed and provided the best massage of my time in Bali - highly recommended. It was also a real luxury that hotel drivers are available to take guests into Ubud and collect them when required, they all spoke great english were all very happy to talk about local culture and answer any questions which enriched the experience. The owners of the hotel were visible and friendly and Jonathon, the hotel's English; â€¦

We loved our terrace villa. The view of the gorge was breathtaking. We relaxed in our pool and bale while listening hindu chnats emanating from a temple across the gorge. The staff was lovely. We got to meet the owner and the chef. Both were friendly and made us feel special. The food was amazing. We would definitely stay at the Viceroy again.
title: Second Visit, First Class

text: We needed a relaxing break and my goodness, the Viceroy knows how to deliver this. We stayed at this hotel for 6 nights in August. The staff are exceptionally nice and even I would go as far to say, genuinely kind. Despite being unlucky with rainy weather we were so lucky to have picked this hotel. I can't speak highly enough of the place; it is haven like and the atmosphere of the hotel is relaxing beyond measure. The staff genuinely seem to care that the guests enjoy every minute. The staff at the Cascades restaurant in particular; they were so impressive. I have never encountered anything like it and I have travelled ALOT. They are just so eager to please WITHOUT being intrusive at all. You really enjoy the meals there. The food is excellent, really delicious and wonderful.; â€¦

We picked Bali as our travel agent suggested this hotel. Which we I have to say the pictures had us hooked ! We spent 4 nights here during our 10 night stay in Bali .. We were worried this hotel wouldnâ€™t live up to expectations! Actually it exceeded them. From the moment we arrived to when we left this hotel and its staff wowed us !! We stayed in a terrace pool villa which was stunning . It was very spacious and felt very authentic Balinese style , spotlessly clean .The most amazing thing was sunbathing whilst watching the monkeys playing in the jungle opposite which is something I will treasure for ever ! Food was just gorgeous from breakfast having a huge menu to chose from everything we had tasted amazing! Room service the food tasted just as good .The evening meals; â€¦

date post: Vanessa I wrote a review Nov 2011
text: We purchased a five night stay via an auction website (Luxury Link.com). It was probably the best purchasing decision we have made via a site of that nature. The hotel is just amazing. It is set atop and into a hill in the Valley of Kings, so one looks down upon a river gorge and lush vegetation. We "won" a garden suite but on the advice of other Trip Advisors I contacted the hotel in advance and booked a Terrace Villa. The room was large and lovely, with a private infinity pool and a private lanai and patio. Essentially you step through a set of teak doors, and then down a few steps into your own private property. The room was gorgeously decorated, the amenities lovely and as others have noted all the non-alcoholic items in the mini-bar were free. The very comfortable bed was; â€¦
title: Luxury, Relaxing, Accommodating

date post: Mekal O wrote a review Nov 2018
text: We recently spent 21 days in Bali, across 6 hotels: Como Shambhala, Chedi Club, Ritz Mandapa, Four Seasons Sayan, Amankila, and Viceroy. Viceroy had possibly our favourite room. The interior has lots of green marble and is generally well-appointed but obviously not as luxurious as the Four Seasons or Ritz. The outside space though has a heated pool (the only one in any of the hotels we stayed in) and a nest perched overlooking the valley which we were very happy to spend hours in reading and watching the wildlife â€“ monkeys, birds, butterfliesâ€¦and bats in the night. Overall the hotel is not going to blow you away compared to the Four Seasons, but if you are looking at this price point I doubt it would be possible to find better. The service, food, spa is all competent; â€¦
title: Amazing Views

text: We recently stayed at the Viceroy for our Honeymoon - and what a fantastic experience we had! We had a beautiful stay from the moment we arrived, tranquil pool villa right on the edge of the rainforest. The honeymoon package included cake and champagne on arrival, couples in-room massage and we were treated with too many flower baths too count! We enjoyed a relaxing and indulgent stay at the Viceroy and couldn't fault a thing. Staff were friendly, with excellent service. In room meals were quick to be delivered and the cocktails excellent! Would love to come here every year for an anniversary stay!! Would highly recommend any honeymooners to stay here - you won't regret it !
title: Luxury for a honeymoon

text: We recently stayed at The Viceroy for our honeymoon after our wedding in Bali. Our stay was so peaceful and romantic. The private villa we had overlooked the forest and we enjoyed a lovely heated pool. The room was very comfortable and had great facilities including filtered water from the tap so you could brush your teeth without having to use bottled water! The staff were so lovely and attended to our every need. The shuttle service was fantastic as we were able to be dropped in the city centre free of charge every time. Overall the ambiance of the hotel was so lovely and tranquil. We would highly recommend to anyone!
title: Ubudâ€™s best hotel, real luxury. Viceroy

text: We recently stayed here for our honeymoon. It exceeded our expectations. The staff were extremely hospitable and amazing. They would attend to all our needs promptly. The views from the suite were also breathtaking. It is a great place if you are wanting privacy and peace. I would highly recommend for couples.
title: Stunning hotel and Service

text: We recently stayed in the Vice Regal 1 villa. I always thought that I was a pretty relaxed guy and knew how to unwind... Viceroy brought relaxation to a whole new level. We spent our first day in Kuta as it was my wifes first time to Bali and she wanted to experience the hussle and bustle before heading into the Viceroy for the majority of our quick trip. It was hot, muggy and after walking around all morning we were tired and had sore feet. Margy arrived at our hotel in a comfortable air conditioned car, cold wet face towels rolled up and ready, and bottles of cold water waiting for us. The drive took around an hour from Kuta and was a very comfortable trip. His english was great and he was very helpful and answered all our questions about Ubud and gave us some local; â€¦

We spend our Honeymoon at Viceroy and was not disappointed. What a beautiful and amazing place. We loved every bit of it. We had booked a Deluxe Terrace Villa which was really big and with out own pool (a bit cold though) The bathroom was beautiful and the terrace was very private and had a beautiful view over the valley. Very friendly and helpful staff. Top service!! Very romantic place!! The food from Cascade Restaurant was more than amazing. We were surprised every time from the breakfast menu, to the local Indonesian lunch to the 6 course menu. Wonderful!! On out last night we had our "private" dinner with flowers around the table and curtains closed around us. Indeed a very romantic night. However, that massage my husband received was not very good, and they didn't; â€¦
title: Very good resort, a tad pricey though..

text: We spent 3 nights and 4 days on a honeymoon package and had booked a Terrace Villa, (#2). In fact, we were trying to select between kamandalu and viceroy and what bowled me over were the prompt email responses by the staff.(Subrata and Eni) . Both were extremely courteous and detailed in the responses as I bugged them no end for months before hand. Once we reached the Denpasar airport, we were promptly attended to, as promised. The hotel was extremely beautiful. Unfortunately my wife fell ill on the very first day and we immediately got some tablets from the staff.The romantic dinner @Cascades was excellent as were the ala carte breakfast, though I believe the setting for the dinner could have been a bit more romantic with the use of some extra candles or such accessories.Also,; â€¦

date post: Peter H wrote a review Sep 2012
text: We spent 5 nights at The Viceroy at the end of August and thoroughly enjoyed our stay. We stayed in Garden Villa 6 and despite the fact that this is the Viceroy's entry level villa, it was amazing. Chilling on the large Balinese daybed staring out at the jungle and watching the mist rise from the river in the morning was so peaceful. Amenities at the resort itself was fantastic. Breakfasts were filling and well made, dinner at CasCades delicious and beautifully presented. The views are breathtaking, the staff so warm and friendly. The spa and treatments live up to the excellence that the resort operates with after treatment views that keep you ultra-relaxed. Anything that you need is accommodated by the team at The Viceroy. We were fortunate to have Made as our driver for a; â€¦
title: BEST RESORT IN BALI

text: We spent 9 nights at Terrace Villa 1 and 3 nights at the Vice Regal Villa 1. Both of them were the maximum one would expect. All villas have astonishing views on the valley and if you're lucky you might even meet some monkeys! The hotel is one of the best places we've ever been. Everything is just perfect. Initially it was our idea to dine in and around Ubud which would have been easy having a hotel driver at your disposal. But the Restaurant CasCades at the Hotel was so brilliant that we ended up having dinner there almost every night. We tried everything.. from a simple Cheeseburger to a 6-course Candlenight-Dinner and it was just delicious. In Switzerland we would have to run for miles to find food of such quality. We booked a tour with the hotel driver on two days and went; â€¦

We spent four days and three nights in Ubud for a company management retreat. The surrounding is very different from Kuala Lumpur, and the rooms of the Viceroy really let us enjoy the scenery to its best. Another reason why we chose to have the retreat here was the availability of a conference room. We used the wireless (and fast) Internet and video projector (which was really good quality). There was also a speaker conference phone but we didnâ€™t use it. What we really liked was the conference table. It is very sturdy and made from dark wood and there was space to sit 14 people although there was only 5 of us. The room had air conditioning too, a necessity for those of us who donâ€™t like feeling sweaty in the tropical heat. Some of us had our spouses with us and the concierge; â€¦
title: Beautiful views, romantic and cozy

text: We spent our four days here in Viceroy, and during our stay we were visited other luxury resorts as well, but Viceroy has the best service and amazing ambience, fantastic kitchen, witch present continuously the same standard. The owners Otto and Margaret keep their eyes on the resort all the time, and they make a really good job! They know what makes a different from a 5star to luxury. It's all about to serve guest and make them happy from all aspects. Wonderful, thank you so much...
title: Modern boutique villas with great shuttle service, great service though inconsistent...

text: We spent some days in Vice-roi Bali for our wedding trip and first anniversary of marriage. We were in Deluxe Villa. How can i describe this hotel. It is just amazing. The place is just beautiful, people are always ready to answer your request and personal swimming pool is heated... You have choice of two restaurants in vice-roi, one near the Â« common swimming pool Â» (Cascade) while other is more selective with great service and food too (Aperitif). We tested both of them. Cascade is very nice if you want to eat at good price in a lovely and calm place, while Aperitif deliver a 8 plates menu with very high quality of food, service and presentation... like in most rewarded Michelin restaurants. Whatever you are searching for, if you intend to go in vice-roi, you wonâ€™t be; â€¦

We stayed 2 nights with my wife for our honeymoon in this beautfiul hotel. The location is just perfect. The infinity pool in front of the jungle, separated from the river is simply breathtaking. We had a wonderful villa with a heated pool. You can ask to keep it heated until 11 pm so you can still enjoy bathing with a view on the palm trees. The restaurant is good. The service room is perfect with two cleaning a day, offering every day at 7pm some new towels and flowers for your bath. The shuttle service is at your disposal and the activities are perfect. I reccomand the cycling experience with a tour in the rice fields. Prepare your legs because it's up and down. The reception is at your complete disposal and will try to satisfy all your requests the best they can. We are sad; â€¦
title: Incredible

text: We stayed 4 nights at the Viceroy Hotel. Itâ€™s a small property with few villas and each villa has its own swimming pool and nice view of the valley. The hotel is a great choice for people who look for a romantic and relaxing holiday away from the noise, crowd and city centre. It has all the needed facilities, a restaurant, gymnasium, a nice swimming pool, a spa and a small shop. A shuttle service is also provided to the town of Ubud. The staff were amazing, always with a smile, so helpful and speaks perfect English. Spacious villas, the bathroom was amazing, it gives you the feeling as if you are taking a shower in an open area (garden). Even the extra bed we requested for was very comfortable, not like the usual small ones we usually get in hotels. All amenities are; â€¦

We stayed 5 nights for our 20th anniversary. This hotel far exceeded our expectations. You can't tell from the website or pictures how stunning this place is. When you first arrive, you see how luxurious this boutique hotel is. The staff is smiling, helpful and friendly and they all greet you by name. We were Mr. Chris and Mr. Tom. We enjoyed the CasCades restaurant many times (with shows and entertainment some nights and a wonderful included breakfast - not buffet), the bar (which we frequented a lot...I suggest the Viceroy Island Tea), massages in our room, playing pool at the very cool 1920's style bar, our day tour in the Viceroy's very nice SUV, the main pool and much more. The room itself was a fantastic with its own pool and gazebo overlooking the amazing jungle; â€¦
title: Heaven!

text: We stayed 7 nights at the Viceroy in one of the deluxe terrace pool villas and had a thoroughly brilliant time. We had high expectations based on recommendations from our Kuoni travel agent and we were not disappointed. From start to finish there is nothing we could have imagined differently. Our villa was beautiful and had a stunning view across the jungle. We had a villa on one of the lower levels and felt really immersed in the jungle. Having the heated pool as well made it lovely to use at all times of the day. The restaurant was also excellent. Breakfast each day was lovely and we enjoyed the amuse bouche each morning in addition to the fruit platter and plentiful options. W also ate at the Cascades restaurant in the evening and the BBQ pork was the best main course I have; â€¦
title: The only place to stay in Ubud

text: We stayed at the Viceroy after getting an amazing secret deal on wotif.com. The garden suite was beautiful. Amazing view into the valley from the day bed. The suite was spacious, clean and well maintained. Apart from the cold plunge pool, we did not want to leave. Perfect for the romantic getaway or honeymoon. Fantastic service and the day spa massage was the perfect way to cap off our trip.

We stayed at the Viceroy for 11 days, and enjoyed a special package rate offered to us for the two bedrooms Viceroy Villa. We were not disappointed. The Viceroy Villa itself comprises a substantial self-contained area. The bedrooms are large and comfortable, the bathrooms luxurious. Our infinity pool is fairly large (for a hotel private pool) and deep enough to swim short lengths. The communal living area between the bedrooms opens on to the pool, where there is a dining area, sitting area and tea/coffee facilities. There is also a pavilion to relax in at one end of the villaâ€™s perfectly maintained garden. Every morning, a staff of 4 to 5 would spend about 1.5 hours together immaculately servicing every part of the compound, including the garden and pool. â€˜Five star; â€¦

We stayed at the Viceroy for 3 glorious nights at the beginning of July for our 24th Wedding Anniversary and were very impressed with the quality of the villas and the lovely friendly staff. By far the best place we have stayed in. We both wanted to just relax and chill out and Viceroy ticks all the boxes if that is what your looking for. We had booked into a deluxe pool villa but were upgraded to a Vice Regal Villa on check in (with own pool) which is amazing, lying in bed in the mornings, looking out across the valley, so private and magical, such a nice start to the day.Had everything you would need in the villa for a relaxing time. Had room service on the first night and our meal was at our door within 15 minutes of making the call and was very nice. We were pampered at the; â€¦
title: No value for money

text: We stayed at the Viceroy for 3 nights in January 2011. Loved our stay there and would definitely recommend the hotel. Great location and impeccable service while we were there! Nothing but total relaxation, which is what we needed! Arrival - We paid for the VIP immigration service at the airport ($25 USD/person), which I think was definitely worth it. There was a man holding a sign with our name when we entered the airport. He walked us past the long immigration line and took our passports to get our visas while we waited for our luggage. It probably took a total of less than 15 minutes to get out of the airport, which was great after the long trip to Bali. He walked us to our driver, who had cold towels and water waiting for us. The driver was great (unfortunately I am; â€¦

We stayed at the Viceroy for four nights. It was absolutely sublime, we had deluxe terrace villa 15 which had uninterrupted views of the forest and waterfalls at the bottoms of the gorge. The room was stunning open plan with doors that opened to our private pool. We hardly left the hotel while we were there. Everything had been thought of and the amenities were superb. We spent most of our days reading and dipping into the pool, it was invredibly comfortable, peaceful and relaxing. The room comes with complementary soft drinks and water and we were never lacking for anything. The breakfast was lovely, al la carte with a great selection of fruit, cereal, pastry and cooked breakfast. We also ate at the bar a few times for lunch and went to Cascades for dinner. The bar; â€¦
title: magic place

text: We stayed at the Viceroy for our 40th wedding anniversary. I believe this is the nicest property in all of Ubud! We stayed in the suite with a private pool, what a treat it was to have the privacy of our own pool after a long day of site seeing around Ubud! The service in this hotel is outstanding and first class. Everyone is smiling and happy to help in any way. Lots of extras go a long way here, including a surprise hot bath filled with beautiful flowers!
title: Wow!!!

date post: Tracy G wrote a review Oct 2018
text: We stayed at The Viceroy for part of our honeymoon and we loved it! Our villa was lovely and had perfect views. The staff were all very friendly and helpful. We also had some treatments at the spa which were very relaxing, which I would definitely recommend.
title: Best Villa Ever

text: We stayed at the Viceroy Ubud for 8 nights and we hadn't had enough!!!! The place is set in an excellent location and the villas are designed with every luxurious detail. The staff seems always inclined to serve. The restaurant and the spa are equally excellent. We would love to go back :)
title: Best hotel in Bali!

date post: Daniel Haddad wrote a review Dec 2018
text: We stayed at this incredible resort for 3 nights. Where do I start? Viceroy is a top notch resort. From the moment you step onto the property, you are greeted with hospitality and endless smiles. Check in was quite fast and this is when the awesomeness really started for us. We were taken by golf cart on a tour of the resort on the way to our villa. Gorgeous main pool with breathtaking views! Our Deluxe Terrace Villa was located on the top tier which offered a phenomenal panoramic view of the forest. Our villa....WOW! Super clean, modern and spacious with a private heated pool. HEATED pool, people! Morning and evening dips in our pool became a ritual and you can ask the staff to extend the heat for whatever hours you like. There was a Bowers & Wilken boom box in our room; â€¦
title: Beautiful resort in Ubud

date post: Darien S wrote a review Oct 2018
text: We stayed at Viceroy for 4 nights as part of a longer trip to Bali. When we arrived to Viceroy, we were given a cool drink and upgraded from a terrace villa to a deluxe villa. We were not expecting this. During the check in process, they reconfirmed our candle light dinner reservation for the following night without us even asking. We stayed in villa 22, it was so private you could not see any neighbors at all, it was like a slice of paradise to yourself. The heated pool in the villa was amazing, we used it every chance we got. This was the best villa that I have ever stayed at in my life. I liked that the shampoo and conditioner containers in the shower were in real stone/glass bottles. Most hotels I have stayed at have toiletries in plastic bottles. This felt super; â€¦
title: Mr. Darien Samuel

text: We stayed at Viceroy for two nights during Christmas and it was one of the best hotels we've ever stayed. The staff was super nice and caring, the rooms are very luxurious and big. Also recommend to book a dinner at Aperatif restaurant.

date post: T S wrote a review May 2019
text: We stayed at Viceroy Ubud for two nights as a weekend gateway and it really did not disappoint. The villa is just incredible, even better than the photos on the website. Pool is secluded and you can stay there for days and not even see any other guest if you don't want to. The only two things I wish they could improve is that the reception staff could be more informative and give a more personalized attention to guests. We felt that sometimes they didn't know what to answer for some of our questions and requests but overall the staff is super friendly. The other point for improvement is that they offer a shuttle for Ubud's city center and then back to the hotel but you have to call to request it and we didn't have a working phone with a sim card for Indonesia. We stayed in a; â€¦
title: Honeymoon of our dreams!

text: We stayed for 2 nights as part of our recent honeymoon. We found the staff to be friendly, room was amazing, food was awesome, surroundings were peaceful and private. It was also easy access to everything (ie. their drivers drove us not only into the main part of town for nothing, they also picked us up from the airport and dropped us to our next hotel - this service was not provided free anywhere else). I'd stay there again no problem :)

We stayed for 5 nights and wanted peace and quiet. Unfortunately, a guy using his incredibly noisy chain-saw in the adjoining forest ruined the entire stay. Margaret, the owner, said he does this regularly each few months to thin the forest and reduce the monkey population and it was "too bad" we copped him. Also "too bad" for us was that Margaret held a private function in her restaurant and we had to walk up to order room service because staff for house guests that evening was sparse. Between chain-saw guy and the building of a few more villas, we found ourselves trying to escape from our villa during the day. The meals at Cascade restaurant are fabulous. The villa was wonderfully appointed, apart from the pool being in shade all day and a tad cold for us to use.

We stayed for 6 days and our high expectations were exceeded in every way. From exceptional rooms and scenery to quite frankly the best service we have ever had . The deluxe terrace villa was immaculate and beautiful and despite the additional bed for our daughter there was still lots of space for relaxing inside. The infinity pool had unobstructed view river valley and was quiet and secluded. We could initially hear our neighbours who had the in-room Bose music player up very loud but a call to reception dealt with this discretely and promptly. The terrace in the room with it's own private cabana allows you to sit in the shade if you prefer to avoid the sun. Towels are changed twice daily so you always have dry ones for the next day The room is much lower on the hill than the; â€¦

We stayed for four nights and had an absolutely wonderful time! Yan along with the rest of the staff took wonderful care of us! The spa, room service, restaurant, pool service, front desk staff.. EVERYONE acknowledged us and our special occasion and gave us phenomenal service! We have absolutely no complaints about our entire experience! We were in villa terrace 2, it is the best room on the property!

We stayed for our Honeymoon, and this hotel was nothing short of amazing. From the point in which you arrive through your entire stay, the staff treats you like royalty. The villas are amazing, and the center pool offers spectacular views of the valley. I wish we were able to stay long enough to take advantage of the mini adventures they offer (bike riding through rice fields).

date post: Fred L wrote a review Jun 2013
text: We stayed here as part of our honeymoon back in March 2011. We were here for three nights and it was our first time to Bali. From start to finish this was pure luxury; the food, the location, the villas, the pools-just amazing... We had a great value honeymoon package with a pampering couples massage and degustation. The food here is probably in our top three restaurants of all-time, worldwide. Even a simple snack like a club sandwich was elevated to the extent that we still salivate thinking of it over two years later! If you are after romance, great service, privacy and total bliss-come here. The experience of sitting on your bale next to your private plunge pool, overlooking the forest and valley is unbeatable and utterly relaxing. The bathrooms are also out of this world and; â€¦
title: Family owned and operated very freindly staff

text: We stayed here for 3 nights back in August 2010 ( a bit late with the review I know but am planning a return visit so turned my attention back to it) ) .i My husband and I have been to Bali many times ( 8) with our children and always stay at the Intercontinental in Jimbaran ( which is also great but not in the same league as the Viceroy). This time we were traveling without kids so decided to spoil ourselves a little more .From the moment we were met inside the customs area at the airport we knew this stay would be different. After a very quick immigration clearance ( Viceroy arrange this for you) we were met by our driver. He was a very pleasant guy with a killer smile who gave us lots of helpful information. Upon arrival at the hotel we were met by equally pleasant, smiling; â€¦

We stayed here for 7 nights in a Terrace Villa. The villa is huge and the private pool is more than big enough for dipping in and out of. The hut over the pool is excellent for dozing during the day and for taking the room service breakfast under (at no extra charge). All the staff were excellent and attention to detail was difficult to beat. The views over the jungle valley are fabulous and it's tranquility is awesome. Food choice is a little bit limited in the restaurant, but nontheless well presented and good value. Wine on the other hand is outrageously priced in Bali due to the luxury tax. Expect to pay around $US100 for a half reasonable bottle. The only fly in the ointment during our stay was the lamb at dinner one evening which was desperately under cooked and then; â€¦
title: When soul meets nature. Simply amazing luxury. Lovely and warm owners

text: We stayed here for a week in August 2013 with my wife, in a terrace villa. Our first impression of the villa was fantastic! Beautifully decorated and spacious, clean, with ample space for luggage and clothes. Nice small swimming pool with just the right temperature for a refreshing dive! The only restaurant in the resort - CasCades - was beautiful and with very nice food, excellent manager - thank you Stefan! - but with slow service which most of the times we did not mind as the staff are SOOOO friendly and attentive. Drinks are RIDICULOUSLY expensive!! Keep in mind that all meals are a la carte, so if you are a fan of buffets this resort is not for you. There is plenty of choice though, the cuisine is French/Indonesian and excellent. The owners are there most of the times; â€¦
title: Wonderful, Wonderful, Wonderful

text: We stayed here for our honeymoon in a Terrace Villa for 4 nights. The villa exceeded our expectations in so many ways - the views, private pool and balÃ¨ were fantastic. The attention to detail was also incredible (flowers, handwritten card from the owner etc). The food was wonderful, especially breakfast each morning. We ate at the restaurant most evenings but the staff were more than happy to arrange the complementary shuttle into town for you if you fancied exploring. We arranged a private tour through the hotel, which was a fantastic experience. Our guide and driver (a Viceroy employee) of course made the trip, but the extra touches were much appreciated too (cold bottled water, cold flannels, beach towels etc). We received a couples romance package as a wedding gift from; â€¦

date post: Anthony G wrote a review Aug 2013
text: We stayed here for our second part of our honeymoon. This has to be one of the most amazing hotels we have stayed in ever! We were given the terrace villa 1, which had amazing pretty much 360 views through glass windows, however after 1 night we had asked to move as the room was not bug proof at all! Geckos were coming in through small gaps and making noises all night and we woke up to bugs on our sheets from them falling from the roof! We then got moved to one of their Deluxe Villas, which was perfect and had no problems for the rest of the stay. The staff were very friendly and attentive, could not fault this in any way. The hotel's free shuttle service was brilliant as we could get into Ubud centre quickly without struggling with public transport. Few negative pointers:; â€¦
title: World class

text: We stayed here for the last 5 nights of our honeymoon. The place is truly a paradise in the jungle. All of the staff are friendly, helpful and will do anything to make your stay a pleasant one. The rooms are amazing, with huge beds and their own private pools. All of the food and drink was amazing and we had the best time. I would highly recommend!

We stayed here for the last part of our trip in Bali to relax and do nothing, no tours, no excursions, just food, pool, sun, and massages. We were celebrating our anniversary in Bali and the Viceroy did not disappoint! From the moment we drove in, we felt like everyone knew our names and that it was our anniversary. The attention from the staff was impeccable throughout our stay. Upon our entrance we were greeted and shown around the grounds on a buggy by the staff. We were able to check-in early and they accommodated us by having us wait as they checked that the room was ready at the beautiful bar overlooking the jungle with a complimentary drink (delicious)! Afterwards, we were driven to our room, we stayed in the Deluxe terrace villa. Upon entering it was spectacular,; â€¦

We stayed here for three nights during a two week holiday in Bali. Words hardly begin to describe the amazing time we had here. We stayed in a Terrace villa, which had a small Balinese pavilion overlooking the valley. The view was beautiful and it was so peaceful. The room was also more spacious and cozier than we expected. We always felt as if we were the only two people around as if we were having our honeymoon again. It was a wonderful stay.

We stayed here for three nights on our honeymoon and we were delighted with our choice. We needed some peace and quiet after our wedding and this was exactly what the doc ordered! We were blown away by the setting as soon as we arrived; we were greeted with a cold drink and a garland of frangipani flowers, and escorted to our villa by golf buggy. We were grinning from ear to ear! We had booked a terrace villa which was spectacular. So much so that we hardly left our room for three days! The room was huge, with a massive bed, bath, shower, private terrace and pool. The views were amazing too, and we even got the odd glimpse of monkeys!! The staff were lovely and extremely helpful - nothing was too much trouble. The food was wonderful although a little expensive, in comparisons to; â€¦
title: BEYOND OUR EXPECTATIONS!

text: We stayed here last week for our honey moon and I have to tell you that this hotel is like heaven on earth. Having stayed in a lot of 5 star accommodation in different parts of the world, this would definately rate as one of the best. The staff knew us by name, and were always friendly and no request was ever too hard. It is a credit to the hotel to have such lovely friendly staff. The views were breath taking and you always felt like you had total privacy at all times. The rooms were immaculate and were cleaned and restocked on a daily basis. The resteraunt. OMG where do you start. The food was some of the best food I think that I have ever eaten. The degustation menu is definately worth trying and the service is immaculate. I have read a few comments about the price; â€¦

We stayed in September 19 for our honeymoon. Amazing hotel with great view and amazing service! If the privacy matters for you it is the best option. Staff was super friendly and the room & pool were always clean
title: Amazing in every way

text: We stayed in Terrace Villa 3 for three nights. Very spacious rooms... beautiful views. Nice terrace for sitting out on. Quite a spacious pool which was in the sun for the morning. The staff were great and the shuttle into Ubud more or less on demand was a definite plus. The restaurant was supposed to be good....at least it had good reviews... However menu seemed quite traditional and a little on the heavy side... no salads or soups for lunch and we went into Ubud to eat every night. Wifi internet in the room was quite slow and kept going off but didnt really matter. We got an excellent rate at the last minute and would definitely stay here again
title: Beautiful Property

text: We stayed in the Deluxe Terrace pool villa which offered more modern features and a newer design than the regular terrace villas, while also exhibiting fascinating Balinese architecture. It was a very spacious room, with a heated swimming pool and traditional balÃ© bungalow looking out across Ubud. Overall, the design of the villa was elegant and impressive, and I spent much of my time there relaxing in the balÃ© or floating across the clear water. Aside from the swimming pool, my favorite part of the villa was its large marble bathroom filled with luxury amenities. In fact, everything there was of high quality - from the electronics to the pillows! During our visit, we were lucky enough to dine at Cascades restaurant, which is actually one of the top restaurants in Bali. We came; â€¦

date post: Claire C wrote a review Jan 2019
text: We stayed in the deluxe terrace villa nestled amongst the trees and it was absolutely amazing. The staff went above and beyond to ensure our experience was perfect. The food was divine - especially the breakfast, and having the option to dine right next to the main pool was great! We will definitely stay here again - thank you so much Viceroy!
title: Paradise in Ubud

text: We stayed in the Deluxe Terrasse Villa with my Love, during two nights, and it was mind-blowing. We loved the Room design, a mix of Balinese and elegant modern, the spacious open bathroom, and the cherry on the top was the outdoor swimming pool who is heated every morning ! (as the water can turn fresh, Viceroy is located by some mountain jungle and small cascade river side) On the morning, you have a really enjoyable A la Carte Breakfast, and they bring you smoothies and plate fruits, fresh bakery, on top of your order. Little tips, for couple, is to ask to take the breakfast in the little sala cabana who is by the swimming pool... Another add to the Viceroy, is that they have Aperitif restaurant, next door, by Chef Nic, so take the degustation menu with the wine pairing, you; â€¦
title: Best hotel experience

text: We stayed on a 4-night honeymoon package, which includes Champagne on arrival, a coupleâ€™s 3-hour spa treatment, breakfast each morning and more flowers than your can imagine. The hotel is situated a few miles from Ubud town centre but in no way feels like it. The hotel sits on the edge of a lush green valley with only a few other buildings that are only just in sight. One of the most important things for us was peace and quiet â€“ and we got it. There is one road to the front of the hotel and they use golf buggies for everything else: so no engines. All we heard were the sounds of nature and trickling water, and all we saw was well kept gardens that were full of colorful flowers. Our room was lovely with the biggest bed I have ever seen (the size of two double beds put; â€¦
title: Best Bet In Bali !!!!!

text: We stayed there for 7 night the service was top rate . The villas was wonderful large and airie massive bath rooms and a beautiful pool. The staff were very attentive and friendly thanks tutut for our bike ride and rice paddy treck. If you very go to Ubud the only place to stay is the Viceroy .
title: Best honeymoon worth every cent!

text: We stayed three nights in the Terrace Villa #1. It's the villa where the website video was taken. We were very impressed with the staff , facilities, restaurant and most of all the ambiance and view. A few specifics: Airport VIP clearance. We had our bags and were through immigration in less than 5 minutes. Made, our personal concierge who also functioned as our driver/interpreter was wonderful. He was very patient as we were unprepared without our customary guide books and phrase books of the local language. He arranged a hand off on our final day meeting my business partner requiring a three language discussion and rendezvous. He stuck with us until everyone was together. Very cool and comforting. We spent one whole day with Made touring the volcano, local dance; â€¦
title: Breath takingly beautiful

text: We travel a lot. We eat a lot. When it comes to the world of hotels and restaurants, the devil is in the details. Without a doubt, the Viceroy Bali hits all the marks from the personalised (charming!) knowledgeable staff to the luxurious and comfortable stay in their beautiful resort located in, Ubud, one of the most unique destinations in South East Asia. We had a small group with us (six people) set to stay for four days. We had airport pickup - which was more like a guided tour from the driver who kindly greeted us with cool towels and refreshing drinks. The scenery for the hour or so long drive was amazing and lush lush lush! Rolling into Ubud, you could already feel the artisan and laid back vibe of the area as we passed one temple after the next. Pulling into the; â€¦
title: Honeymoon @ Viceroy Bali

date post: Darsi P wrote a review Sep 2019
text: We travelled to Ubud for our honeymoon. The hotel was nothing short of spectacular. Outstanding. If you can, you shouldn't even hesitate before booking this hotel. The arrival process was flawless. The room (a deluxe terrace villa) was simply perfect. All members of staff at the hotel were incredibly happy to help. The hotel offer a taxi service which allows you to go to and from Ubud as you wish. Breakfast can be served in your hotel room for a small additional fee and this is very special. The standard of the spa was the best we experienced in Bali. The only thing that could be improved is the hotel gym which just needs a little bit of a refresh but is perfectly functional. This is one of the best hotels we have ever stayed in. A truly wonderful experience.
title: Sadly, disappointed in service, not in room!

text: We treated ourselves to 3 glorious nights at the Viceroy! The rooms were Honeymoon quality times 10! The breakfast incredible with lots of choices and we had an amazing driver Gema who was so amazing. If you are reading this...Thank you to all the staff. Nicole and Paul

We visited for 5 nights on our honeymoon and were blown away by the hospitality and attention to details. The room was immaculate every day and the staff were fantastic. We used a hotel shuttle to get around and the drivers were courteous and full of knowledge. The natural setting is gorgeous and private. The food was one of the best parts. I've never had such wonderful breakfasts in anywhere I've traveled before. We thought we'd eat in our villa every day but decided to go up to the restaurant and it's really worth eating up there. Due to the limited capacity, it meant that there were no crowds or line ups. We were able to do everything we wanted exactly when we wanted to it it. The staff strive to ensure you're taken care of and have nothing to worry about. It made for a; â€¦
title: Fabulous

date post: Tom B wrote a review Jul 2018
text: We visited here only for 4 nights in June for our honeymoon and was blown away, it truly is as beautiful as the pictures show! The spa was fantastic! The staff were all so welcoming and as a beautician myself I was very impressed with the massage and facial I had there! I think the new refurb of the Spa will make it ever better!! ** The refurb you do NOT notice at all any of the work!!** All The staff were so friendly and helpful, even down to the grounds men! The reception staff were brilliant always recommending restaurants to go and eat in town (even when they have a beautiful restaurant on site) plus they put on a free shuttle into town and even pick you up from you chosen restaurant! EXCELLENT SERVICE!! The waiter staff, always remembered yours names which is a lovely touch; â€¦
title: Incredible honeymoon hotel

date post: osiris martinez wrote a review Jan 2019
text: We visited in December for our honeymoon and enjoyed our time overall, but there were several misses. The positives: the villa was super relaxing and the private pool was phenomenal. The flower petal bath was fantastic. The negatives: 1) Food is sub-par, very average in taste although the presentation often looks great. Their breakfast pastries were inedible, so overloaded with butter that the croissant was soggy. Dinner was very average. 2) The staff is awkwardly nice - they try their best and smile but they're also very shy to the point that it's awkward to interact. They ask how everything is but they can't communicate well and don't know how to deal with feedback. 3) The hotel's recommended bike ride to the rice fields was pretty horrible. The website said: "your guide; â€¦
title: Real luxury in the middle of the jungle

text: We visited the Viceroy for 3 nights (should have been 4 but due to a lengthy 12h delay in Dubai we lost a night) and all I can say it was the BEST hotel we have been lucky enough to stay in. Everything about the Viceroy screams luxury!! On arrival, we were greeted by happy and smiling staff (even though it was 5am!!) who instantly made us feel welcome and after checking in were taken to our villa (which they upgraded for us for free) on a golf buggy. We were taken into our room and shown how everything worked and all I can say is WOW! The room was unbelievable! Huge and open plan, views to die for and a plunge pool that is constantly heated. Ultimate in luxury. Breakfast was bought to our room as we were so tired from the lengthy journey but as soon as weâ€™d had a rest, we; â€¦

We visited the Viceroy in June for 4 nights during our Honeymoon. It was an outstanding property and they provided many little touches to make our stay feel great: candle-lit dinner for two, rose petal path, and a complimentary couples massage were all included. Room: We stayed in a deluxe terrace villa. The villa was very spacious and the private infinity pool overlooking the gorge was absolutely stunning. Our favorite feature though was probably the shower â€“ definitely the biggest rain shower head we have ever had (would love one like that in our house some day!) Service: 5-star service the whole way. Food service, turndown service, cleaning service, spa service â€“ all of it was outstanding. But what we really appreciated was the guidance and advice of the staff when it; â€¦
title: Relax in luxury

text: We visited this hotel as part of our honeymoon, following a recommendation from friends. It is amazing! Beautiful surroundings, great food, superb staff, they provided a shuttle service for us to the Ubud town centre and we had guides to help navigate us around the local area. The villa was luxurious and wonderful. No negatives at all. Thank you for a wonderful experience.
title: AMAZING!!

text: We went to Bali for the first time and stayed at the Viceroy Hotel. It was a luxurious hotel in the middle of the jungle. We had the Terrace Pool Villa and the room was spacious and gorgeous with thoughtful dÃ©cor and amenities. The gazebo and the private pool flattered the setting. The hotel ground was green and well-maintained with the feel of Balinese culture. The infinity pool overlooking the jungle, the gazebo with white cushions and curtains enhanced the tranquility and made you feel relaxed. We were there during August, a high season but the hotel didnâ€™t feel overcrowded. We felt we had our own space and time. From the moment we stepped in to the hotel to the very last minute of our stay, the staff made you feel completely welcomed and connected to the place. We were; â€¦

We were at Viceroy on March 2nd 2019. Beautiful Villas. Amazing service and super sweet Staff. King style breakfast. Staff takes their job seriously. Highly Recommended for peaceful vacation. we had canceled and delayed flights. We lost two nights out of 3 from our stay at viceroy. Manager just didn't extend our stay there so we wouldn't loose our money and also upgraded to Delux villa from terrace villa complementary . its not much different but it was still very sweet of them

date post: Adam L wrote a review Jul 2019
text: We were 'blown away' by the absolutely beautiful location and fantastic suite with it's own heated infinity pool. The staff were so friendly and you felt like part of the family. Tranquil and relaxing. The complimentary couples massage treatment was brilliant.
title: Wonderful hotel!!!

text: We were looking to get away from the hussle and bussle of our busy life and this hotel was a perfect choise. While this place is prices we felt like we got an excellent value. The staff is very attentive and personable. The rooms are big and the views are spectacular. We stayed in the Terrace villa and it was perfect. If you want something initimate and romantic this is it. We were first put into a regal villa which was more expensive, but after seeing the terrace decided that we'd liked it much better. This place has only 11 villas which is great because we felt like we had the whole place to ourselves. The staff called knew us by name and was very attentive and personable. We stayed for 3 nights and it was perfect. We were originally going to stay for two, but then extended; â€¦
title: Really luxurious

text: We were staying at The Viceroy as part of our honeymoon across Asia and had high expectations of this small, intimate and prestigious hotel.... a part of you always thinks, can this place really be as good as all the reviews and the accolades...... trust me, it is - we were not disappointed, in fact it excelled our expectations and we didn't want to leave! The hotel is meticulously managed, from the beautiful villas, to the manicured gardens, restaurants (Cascades and Aperitif) and last but not least the staff who make it all gel together effortlessly. This hotel makes you feel special! Staff remember your name, nothing is too much trouble the service is first class. There is a lovely added touch of a personal driver who is on hand to take you into Ubud and back again at any; â€¦

Went for my honeymoon, once of the most wonderful places I have ever been. The staff is one of the best group of people i have ever meet. went out and beyond to make us feel comfortable and welcome. i will definitely go back.
title: Literally paradise

text: Went there for a high tea, but as we were too early, we decided on lunch instead. We were too early for high tea, so we decided on lunch. There were only the 4 of us for the lunch. We were possibly a little early for that too. :-) Food was excellent. Staff were excellent. Because I managed to say "kopi susu panas", they said that my coffee was free. :-) We had appetizers and palate cleansers that were given free, and I'm pretty sure that the 2 lots of warm crusty bread was also free. While I can't guarantee that your experience will be precisely the same as ours, you will be treated with kindness and professionalism. It was a wonderful experience. It would have been lovely to have stayed there as the place was immaculate, but we were already staying nearby in Ubud.
title: Best Hotel I Have Ever Experienced

text: What a wonderful place the Viceroy is. From the kind and helpful staff to the beautiful Indonesian styled super clean and modern rooms to the food that ended up after one week of trying all else in Ubud village to be the best around. The Viceroy is a once in a lifetime experience. The owners are fabulous and personally get to know you as the place is only 20 villas situated in a small and elegant stone village. It almost has an Indonesian/Italian vibe. Our room also had our very own infinity pool, with a waterfall and a stone mermaid. Do I need to say anything else. The showers, toilet and TV were all modern but everything had an Indonesian flair to it. And the food... after trying a different place everyday in Ubud but having a lunch or a dinner at the hotel we realized the; â€¦
title: Heaven on Earth!

text: What an amazing hotel .. great people amazing views had a monkey come to our private pool which is heated, we named him Alfredo ðŸ¤©. Please take me back ...! Best hotel eveeer . The cascades hotel is to die for, ohh and the collection of henny ( did they know we were coming ??) just one word ...Dope !

what an amazing place to stay! the rooms are simply fantastic! private, little splash pools, beautiful views! nice gym, lovely spa the staff are very helpful! the food excellent! a very special place to stay and a must!!

What an amazing place! The attention to detail unsurpassed -- from the beautiful stone & woodwork down to the in-room amenities. Staff were lovely, food superb, owners were absolutely delightful, architecture and landscaping stunning & the views into the jungle were spectacular. From our terrace, we could see monkeys swinging through the trees! We spent HOURS on the balÃ© and in the private pool (not wanting to leave our fabulous room, except of course for a luxurious spa treatment)! I gushâ€¦ but for good reason. Canâ€™t wait to book my next holiday here.
title: Impeccable place - but has Ubud lost it?

text: What an amazing place. Everything is meticulously designed and executed perfectly. The hotel is exquisite and on the hills of a river gorge with spectacular views. Highly recommend the vice regal villas - sensational decor and views. Can't recommend the hotel highly enough. Thanks to the fantastic staff as well. Will definitely be back!

What an incredible hotel. We spent our first 5 nights for our Bali honeymoon at the Viceroy and could not have had a better experience. The hotel is absolutely gorgeous! The views from the pool, the villa, the restaurants are all stunning. The staff always went above and beyond to ensure that you were comfortable and taken care of. If you plan on staying in Ubud then this is the place to stay. You will not be disappointed!
title: One of the Best hotels in the World

date post: Mia H wrote a review Nov 2018
text: What can I say about the Viceroy. Word of warning, be prepared to be dissapointed at every hotel you'll ever stay at afterwards. From start to finish our honeymoon stay with the Viceroy was simply magical. Big thank you to Chess our driver who picked us up from the airport and also took us on a amazing tour of Ubud. The hotel has many amazing features, including a shuttle bus to and from the main square which we used regularly. You just have to call the hotel and a private car will pick you up free of charge. The Cascades restaurant is also great, breakfast is a real treat. No rubbish breakfast buffets here! Everything is al a carte. The Ratatouille Eggs are to die for. We ate here for the majority of our stay, it is a very expensive restaurant by Bali standards but by; â€¦
title: Another level!

date post: Corey and Cait Holmes wrote a review Jul 2019
text: What can I say about the Viceroy... Perfection! We were greeted with a flower garland and a welcome drink in to our beautiful Terrace villa. The room was huge, as was the bed (literally could have slept 5 of us!) with robe and slippers laid out on the bed ready for us Sadly as we arrived in the evening, we couldnâ€™t see the view until the morning but boy, were we blown away once we woke up the following day! The hotel is surrounded by greenery and it makes you feel instantly relaxed The main pool area is also beautiful and never feels crowded as itâ€™s a small hotel The Cascades restaurant is truly special. The breakfast is delicious and they provide you with fresh fruit and smoothies each day. We also ate lunch here every day and pretty much every dinner as it was so good! This; â€¦
title: The epitome of world-class service and luxury

text: What can I say, the viceroy lived up to every expectation which had been set by the travel agent at kuoni in the UK. We are lucky enough to travel often to Spain, the US amongst other destinations so we wanted to make our honeymoon extra special. We were greeted warmly and given a lift to our villa in their on site golf buggy. This soon followed with a cake with happy honeymoon glazed on the plate. Throughout our stay, the staff couldnâ€™t do enough to make us feel special and welcome at their stunning resort. Yes, itâ€™s expensive however worth every penny in our eyes.

date post: stuart c wrote a review Apr 2013
text: When it comes to a stunningly immaculate resort, coupled with breathtaking views, superior staff hospitality, and food that will leave you wanting more (even after youâ€™re full) â€” The Viceroy (Ubud, Bali) ticks all the boxes â€” and beyond. In April 2013, my wife and I spent our honeymoon in The Viceroy for four nights. After leaving, letâ€™s just say we would have loved to have extended our stay for 40 nights (if only). Resort â€“ 10/10 Nestled in the lush forest mountains of Ubud this resort offers some of the most picture-perfect views a resort has to offer. The deluxe terrace villa (with a private infinity pool) is immensely luxurious and spacious. The highlight of the villa is the private infinity pool which overlooks the beautiful green valley. If youâ€™re not one to sleep-in; â€¦
title: stuart and Alinta Ubud 2013

text: When looking for the perfect Bali Wedding setting I had a few boxes to tick. Privacy, Luxury, Relaxation, Great food, Stunning views. The Viceroy really jumped out on paper and didnâ€™t disappoint in the flesh. This is by far friendliest place Iâ€™ve ever visited, each member of staff is really pulling for you to enjoy everything during your stay to the full whether thatâ€™s your morning coffee or putting together the biggest day of your life the attitude is the same. Putting together a wedding is usually a stressful operation at the best of times but not here.Even a last minute deconstruction of the whole setting wasnâ€™t too much to ask, they just want you to be happy and we were! (Are!) Jero, the Hotel Manager deserves a special mention, the guy is just incredible from the first; â€¦
title: Perfect experience

text: When my husband and I decided to go to Ubud we wanted to stay in a great hotel. What I found confusing when reading reviews is trying to figure out where the hotels were relative to the town of Ubud and which ones were truly the best. After reading loads of reviews we settled on Viceroy. I could not have made a better choice. From the VIP service at the airport (make sure you request this), to the friendliness of the staff, to the location, to the extraordinary accommodation and superb food, this is the Best of Bali. We had a Terrace Villa which I would highly recommend over the garden villa. Everything about the room, plunge pool, bathroom and the public spaces of the Viceroy are exceptional. I am in the hospitality business so I wanted to see other hotels in the area.; â€¦
title: Loved it!

text: Where do I begin with this hotel? From the moment we arrived we were stunned by how beautiful this place was. This is by far one of the most beautiful places we have visited. We were greeted with a flower garland and a welcome cocktail, which made us feel immediately welcome. The staff were very friendly and helpful. They were very thoughtful and even left petals in our bath for our last night. Our room was beautiful we had a Deluxe villa with a pool, from the smell of the room to the amazing dÃ©cor we could not find one fault. We enjoyed breakfast at Cascades and had dinner there one evening. The food was amazing, along with the service. Great location for exploring and the hotel provide a free shuttle to the town. We canâ€™t wait to return in the future!

date post: Ant M wrote a review Aug 2018
text: Where shall I start? It was probably the best 2 nights in a hotel my wife and I have stayed in. Arrived on my birthday and we were welcomed with such warm hospitality. And it didn't stop there, for the whole stay each and every staff member was fantastic. The suite was perfect. A very large size, open and bright. We had a villa right at the end and had full privacy, even when we were outside. What made the stay extremely special was the private infinity pool. Not only is it large and clean, it was heated. Yes that's right...heated!! And it's the only hotel I could find in Bali that had a private heated pool. Understandable that most of the year it's hot and not needed, but when we were there it was mostly cloudy and cold. We spent most of our time in the pool. Felt great; â€¦
title: One of the very best

date post: Ken Sugijanto wrote a review Oct 2020
text: Where to start! Aside from the wonderful communication with the reservations team when I made my booking, my first impression when I was welcomed by lovely Jero with a nice and refreshing cocktail overlooking the hill/jungle, was that I was absolutely immersed in a paradise movie. The smell, exotic birds and perfect location made it so dreamy. Our villa with a private pool accessible from our doorstep and beautiful surroundings, just complement the genuine and empathetic hospitality from the staff. Their dedication, knowledge and care made it all perfect. Me and my partner had an in-room massage that was so good, with the knowledgeable therapists taking the time to explain clearly the different essential oils and methods we could use. But I'd say the 'cherry on the cake' is; â€¦
title: The best one in Ubud!

text: Whilst I have not had the pleasure of fulfilling our planned stay on 23 May 2020 for a week due to COVID-19 I felt I had to write to say what a top class hotel Viceroy are. They actually emailed me and asked if I would like a refund!! As we are unable to travel in 2021 I was very grateful for this offer and certainly hope to stay with extended family in 2022. Well done Viceroy you offer a first class customer service - and we will definitely be booking with you when we plan a trip to Ubud in 2022 - thank you.
title: AMAZING

date post: Marcela C wrote a review May 2013
text: Wonderful luxury Hotel just 10mins by courtesy transport into UBUD township. Staff were friendly and helpful. We spent 3 days just lazing around in our own Private Pool. Perfect place for a Honeymoon or as we celebrated our Wedding Anniversary. Complete Privacy from every room. They still even have a turn down service with chocolates. Highly recommend for that special getaway. The breakfasts were superb!
title: Wonderful Stay

text: Wonderful stay booked online for a week enjoying the beautiful Ubud. Location is just stunning on the Petula river gorge. A bit on the periphery of Ubud proper, but the hotel provides a free carservice to take you anywhere you want in the Ubud area. SO not a problem. Our room a deluxe terrace villa had unobscured views of the whole valley and the green green nature. The room it self is pure luxury - every detail is just perfect, including the private pool with a 'Bale' on top of it where on can sit in the shade and enjoy the views or indulge in some lovely high-tea delivered to your room. Service levels were generally extremely high. Everyone welcoming and no wish to difficult to deal with. Wonderful Spa, and very good restaurant (see separate review.) The perfect place for a; â€¦
title: Excellent Hotel

text: Words canâ€™t describe this hotel. One of the best hotels I have EVER stayed. I am completely blown away with how me and my fiancÃ©e where treated by staff here during our stay at Viceroy. It was worth every penny. We felt like we where at home. Always greeted, I wish we could have brung some workers from Bali to Ny. Our trip to Bali was very memorable. Hotel was very very clean. The breakfast at Cascades was AMAZING!! I will never forget an employee by the name of Shanti (that works at Cascades) She was one of the sweetest women I have ever came across. Also, our first day arriving at the hotel Kadek and Jero welcomed us, with open arms. Our last day at Viceroy Jero sat down with me and my fiancÃ©e and gave us a background on the hotel. I have absolutely nothing but great things; â€¦
title: The Ultimate Hotel

date post: Tyler R wrote a review Jan 2020
text: World Class hotel with amazing facilities and unreal location . Rooms are amazing and the food is fantastic . The icing on the cake is the staff who will do anything they can to make your stay perfect . 100% recommend
title: Honeymoon perfection

date post: Margaret W wrote a review Feb 2019
text: Would give this hotel 10 stars if I could!!! Absolutely beautiful, in every sense, like a wonderful dream! Very friendly staff as well. Could not ask for anything more! Rooms were immaculately clean, furbished to high standards in everything.
title: Out of over 130 countries visited this is the best hotel I have ever stayed in!!!

text: Wow ... Beautiful family run boutique style hotel. From the moment you arrive you are made to feel â€˜specialâ€™ ... the staff, surroundings, rooms, private pool etc are perfect. Nothing seems to be too much trouble and the magic â€˜111â€™ number can get you most things 24 hours a day. It never felt crowded whilst we were there - in fact, bearing in mind it was near full, it felt as though there were only a dozen people staying there. Great facilities and a high attention to detail everywhere around the place. The hotel has thought about some of the little things that other hotels sadly miss (e.g. shuttles in Ubud when you want to go and just call to be picked up - not a timetable). Food and wine top notch too. Paradise is not an exaggeration. A perfect place to wind down and relax.; â€¦
title: First class!

text: Wow what a amazing hotel, I had a 3 night package there and wished it was 3 weeks, everything abouth the terrace villa was 5 star, so luxurious and amazing views across the green hills along with the odd monkey climbing in the trees. The gardens and grounds al perfectly presented and so peaceful and relaxing in the whole resort. Big cudos to having a coffee maker and iPod player in each villa, the bathroom was huge and had nice deep bath and large shower with two vanities, the downside being the bath oils/soaps were not very nice in fact both myself and a friend who stayed in another villa at Viceroy thought they smelt pretty awful. The food was good but would not rave about it, the breakfast a bit boring but I loved the toast and the french butter, I was surprised that if you; â€¦
title: One word sums it all up "Fantastic"

text: Wow!!! How to put the right words here to describe. We started our trip in a private Villa in Seminyak so set the bar high, however after 4 days we were hanging out to get to serene and beautiful Ubud. Can only say that "The Viceroy" blew our minds. The staff were fantastic, the food 1st class, the view over the valley and paddy fields divine. Their own website does not do them justice. We stayed in the Garden Villa and our only possible complaint (if you could call it one) was the water in our private pool was a bit too fresh (cool). With only 11 villa's in the complex, there's no overcrowding and the staff made us feel more than at home. Would thoroughly recommend The Viceroy to anyone who is considering it, as we'll definitely be going back.
title: Two weeks in a haven of peace

text: WOW, its hard to say more than just that. Its everything and more one could hope for a peacful oasis. As travellers to luxury resorts around the world, we are hard to impress. But The Viceroy did indeed impress us beyond words. Its hard to put into words how luxurious the Villas are, the scenery and resort does not photograph as well as the eye sees it up close. You have to stay there, its amazing you wont be dissapointed.The restuarant is the best meal we had whilst in Bali, the staff genuinely sincere.
