Margaret the Managing Director is a truelly lovely Aussie, very welcoming and extremely helpful for anything you require. She made the stay even more personable. We will absolutely return again and again
title: R&R Heaven

text: WOW, just WOW!! Tucked away in the beautiful jungle of Ubud, Bali, this hidden gem is the ultimate peaceful 5 star experience. I love boutique hotels, but this was surreal. Not just from the views, but the wonderful hospitality. My parents had stayed here for their 25th anniversary, so I booked myself a stay for my 30th birthday and it was the perfect way to relax!! The Lembah Spa is wonderful, Cascade's and Aperitif restaurants are delicious, and each villa is superb. The best part was having our own private pool and gazebo in our villa, where we didn't need to be at the main pool. Aside from each room having their own private pool, the coolest feature is the helicopter pad that can pick you up from the airport! I highly recommend for anyone, especially people going on their; â€¦

Wow, what a place. It's situated at the top of a valley with views of a working rice paddy across the valley. The pool is incredible, as is the food ...albiet rather gourmet for us simple Aussies. The room was something else entirely, and possibly the most beautiful hotel room we're likely to stay in for quite some time. There was a plunge pool on the terrace of the villa with an outside bathroom. A word to the wise, don't leave the outdoor bathroom lights on while you're out... the bugs go crazy. Everyone was very friendly and professional. The hotel was perfect for us, on our honeymoon, as it was completely quite. Everyone has a sense of quiet about them, even the guests which was lovely. We felt like we had the place to ourselves. We'd already arranged a private driver in; â€¦

Wow. The bathrooms alone will knock you out! Seriously killer rooms. We had our own private pool and the kids had a suite next to ours with their own private pool. I think all villas come with them. Dirty little secret of private pools: Not heated. So think of them more as a water feature. The main pool however, wow. The pictures I took in this place were spectacular enough to inspire us to have a book made. Really. The owner is on property and super cool, friendly guy. Austrian. The food was just ok. We are adventurous diners and even ate the famous suckling pig, but ah, just ok. Can't recommend this place enough. You will be amazed and your spouse will be impressed by your internet skills!
title: A very special Hotel with attentive and professional staff - Magnificient!

text: WOW. What a place!! Amazing hotel, amazing staff, amazing food. The food was the best Iâ€™ve ever had in my entire life! Very special for our honeymoon This hotel is worth every penny. Perfect throughout thank you so much

Wow.........no other words can describe the Viceroy in Ubud Sensational stay in the most amazing of places we have experienced The accommodation is perfect . We had 2 rooms, a deluxe water terrace and also a Viceroy Regal room. Both where dreamy rooms, superb views over the river below, and onto the jungle where we watched monkeys jump tree to tree The staff were amazing, so welcoming and so friendly . The food in both restaurants is super , especially in the new aperitif restaurant where we had a 10 course meal on our final night. Probably the best venison wellington I have ever experienced, carved by the head chef at your table. A truly wonderful dining experience . The breakfast is a real treat. We took a day tour organised by the hotel. Superb driver and host for the; â€¦

Wow; what a place! We came here for our honeymoon and were blown away with the beauty of the place and above all, the fantastic service and perks, having booked as honeymoon guests. From day one we were made to feel like VIPs - from the honeymoon cake and spiced mojitos on arrival, having a golf buggy on demand to bring us up to the top of the hotel (which we only used once FYI!) and the flawless hospitality throughout. The service really was impeccable, and they couldnâ€™t do enough for us. The hotel is small, meaning you do really feel like a VIP - the main infinity pool and huts are never crowded, and this just adds to the tranquil, exclusive feeling of the place. We loved the perks from being honeymoon guests - the welcome cake, the couples spa treatment (which was; â€¦

Yes, of course this place, I prefer the word "retreat", is expensive but how can you compare such a private and discreet sanctuary like this to anywhere else ? It is unique. We wanted to avoid the clamour of the beachside areas and The Viceroy gave us a chance to live for 2 blissful weeks in utter peace and quiet. We were never once disturbed by the cleaning team.We were left well alone and when we did need something a little motorised cart arrived within a couple of minutes. Many hotels in Perth could learn from the sincerity and good manners of the people who work there from the gardeners to the waiting staff in the restaurant or the charming reception staff. I can still see their calm, radiant faces as they tried their best to look after us. And how well they did. What we; â€¦
title: Paradise in the rice fields of Bali
